name: lane
trans: n. 小巷；[航][水运] 航线；车道；罚球区

sentences.english: a quiet country lane
sentences.chinese: 一条宁静的乡间小路

sentences.english: ...after being disqualified for running out of his lane in the 200 metres.
sentences.chinese: …在200米比赛中由于冲出跑道而被取消比赛资格以后。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow road in the countryside

name: supervisory
trans: adj. 监督的

sentences.english: Most supervisory boards meet only twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 大多数监理会一年只开两次会。

sentences.english: ...staff with a minor supervisory role.
sentences.chinese: ...担任少量监督工作的职员。

detailed_translations.english: Supervisory means involved in supervising people, activities, or places

name: proliferation
trans: n. 增殖，扩散；分芽繁殖

sentences.english: It is believed that it inhibits an enzyme that promotes cell proliferation in tumours.
sentences.chinese: 据信它能抑制一种能在肿瘤中促进细胞增殖的酶的生成。

sentences.english: "Brand proliferation is not a novelty, and it is profitable if you execute it well, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 他表示：“品牌扩散并不新鲜，如果执行得好，它是会带来盈利的。”

sentences.english: We do have differing perspectives on the problem, but we share an interest in reducing the violence, securing chemical weapons and ensuring they are neither used or are they subject to proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 我们确实在这个问题上有不同意见，但我们在减少暴力、获取化学武器和确保化学武器不被使用或扩散上拥有共同利益。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden increase in the amount or number of something

name: invest
trans: vi. 投资，入股；花钱买

sentences.english: I’ve got a few thousand dollars I’m looking to invest.
sentences.chinese: 我有几千美元想作投资。

sentences.english: It was very difficult to leave a home we had invested so much in.
sentences.chinese: 那个家我们投入得太多，要离开真的很难。

detailed_translations.english: to buy shares, property, or goods because you hope that the value will increase and you can make a profit

name: spark
trans: n. 火花；朝气；闪光

sentences.english: sparks from the fire
sentences.chinese: 火里飞出的火星

sentences.english: The scrape of metal on metal sent up a shower of sparks .
sentences.chinese: 金属之间互相摩擦，迸出一串火星。

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together
a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together

name: finance
trans: n. 财政，财政学；金融

sentences.english: leasing and other forms of business finance
sentences.chinese: 租赁及其他商业金融形式

sentences.english: Russia’s finance minister
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯财政部长

sentences.english: the world of high finance
sentences.chinese: 高级金融界

detailed_translations.chinese: 财政，金融；财源，财务情况
detailed_translations.english: the management of money by governments, large organizations etc
to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something

name: yellow fever
trans: n. 黄热病（热带疾病，可导致死亡）

name: predict
trans: vi. 作出预言；作预料，作预报

sentences.english: Sales were five percent lower than predicted.
sentences.chinese: 销售额比预期低5%。

sentences.english: As Liz had predicted , the rumours were soon forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 正如利兹所预料的，流言很快就被淡忘了。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something will happen, before it happens

name: indigence
trans: n. 穷困；贫乏；贫穷

sentences.english: The number of data is growing day by day, so a great deal of data is described as "data abundance, but information indigence ".
sentences.chinese: 数据量与日俱增，大量的数据被描述为“数据丰富，但信息贫乏”。

sentences.english: For one of the poets has said, 'Application to business is the root of prosperity, but those who ask questions that do not concern them are steering the ship of folly towards the rock of indigence'.
sentences.chinese: 有位诗人说道：心思用在生意上，乃是发财致富的根本； 凡是打听与此无关的问题的人，便是正在把愚蠢的船向贫穷的礁石撞去。

name: assessment
trans: n. 评定；估价

sentences.english: a reading assessment test
sentences.chinese: 阅读评估测试

detailed_translations.english: a process in which you make a judgment about a person or situation, or the judgment you make

name: envision
trans: vt. 想象；预想

sentences.english: I envisioned a future of educational excellence.
sentences.chinese: 我展望了一个有着优质教育的未来。

detailed_translations.english: to imagine something that you think might happen in the future, especially something that you think will be good

name: camp
trans: n. 露营

sentences.english: Let’s go back to camp – it’s getting dark.
sentences.chinese: 我们回营地吧，天快黑了。

sentences.english: a camp near Lake Ellen Wilson
sentences.chinese: 埃伦•威尔逊湖边的营地

sentences.english: The soldiers broke camp (= took down their tents etc ) and left before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在黎明前拔营出发了。

sentences.english: We set up camp (= made the camping place ready ) at nearby Icicle Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在附近的冰柱湖边建了营地。

sentences.english: The expedition’s base camp (= main camp ) was 6,000 feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 探险队的大本营在山峰下面6,000英尺处。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people stay in tents, shelters etc for a short time, usually in the mountains, a forest etc
to set up a tent or shelter and stay there for a short time

name: transgression
trans: n. [地质] 海侵；犯罪；违反；逸出

sentences.english: How many are mine iniquities and sins? make me to know my transgression and my sin.
sentences.chinese: 我的罪孽和罪过有多少呢。求你叫我知道我的过犯与罪愆。

sentences.english: Conscience is the detective that watches the direction of our steps and decries every conscious transgression.
sentences.chinese: 良心就像是一个侦察员，它时刻关注着我们脚步的方向，谴责我们想犯罪的意识。

name: donation
trans: n. 捐款，捐赠物；捐赠

sentences.english: There have been generous donations from EU funds.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟基金给予了慷慨的捐款。

detailed_translations.english: something, especially money, that you give to a person or an organ-ization in order to help them

name: motivation
trans: n. 动机；积极性；推动

name: depress
trans: vt. 压抑；使沮丧；使萧条

sentences.english: The thought of taking the exam again depressed him.
sentences.chinese: 想到要补考，他就心情沮丧。

sentences.english: It depresses me that nobody seems to care.
sentences.chinese: 似乎没有人在乎，这让我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Depress the clutch fully.
sentences.chinese: 把离合器踩到底。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very unhappy

name: rough
trans: n. 艰苦；高低不平的地面；未经加工的材料；粗糙的部分

sentences.english: Her hands were rough from hard work.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手因为干重活而变得很粗糙。

sentences.english: the rough terrain at the base of the mountains
sentences.chinese: 山脚下崎岖不平的地形

sentences.english: We were bumping over the rough ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们在崎岖的地面上颠簸而行。

sentences.english: a rough translation
sentences.chinese: 粗略的翻译

detailed_translations.english: having an uneven surface

name: addictive
trans: adj. 使人上瘾的

sentences.english: Tobacco is highly addictive .
sentences.chinese: 烟草很容易使人上瘾。

detailed_translations.english: if a substance, especially a drug, is addictive, your body starts to need it regularly and you are unable to stop taking it

name: periodical
trans: n. 期刊；杂志

sentences.english: She made periodical visits to her dentist.
sentences.chinese: 她定期去看牙医。

detailed_translations.english: Periodical events or situations happen occasionally, at fairly regular intervals
a magazine, especially one about a serious or technical subject

name: rigor
trans: n. 严厉；精确；苛刻；僵硬

sentences.english: We are not so much testing as proposal-thinning, and we can add rigor such as traceability and other documentation as the leading architectural candidates emerge.
sentences.chinese: 我们不像细化提议那样做太多测试，随着最主要的架构候选的出现，我们可以添加严密，如可溯性和其他文档。

sentences.english: The towers, not only ground the buildings with their visual weight, but they also contribute to the rigor of rhythmic play needed in such expansive internal spaces and environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些塔楼不仅利用其视觉上的厚重感将建筑物固定在地面上，还有助于生成这种开阔的内部空间和环境所需的严谨的韵律感。

name: breathe
trans: vi. 呼吸；低语；松口气；（风）轻拂

sentences.english: The room filled with smoke, and it was becoming difficult to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 房间里全是烟，呼吸越来越困难。

sentences.english: People are concerned about the quality of the air they breathe.
sentences.chinese: 人们关心他们所呼吸的空气的质量。

sentences.english: Relax and breathe deeply (=  take in a lot of air  ) .
sentences.chinese: 放松，深呼吸。

detailed_translations.english: to take air into your lungs and send it out again
to take air into your lungs and send it out again

name: formidable
trans: adj. 强大的；可怕的；令人敬畏的；艰难的

sentences.english: The building is grey, formidable, not at all picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 那幢建筑呈灰色，气势凛然，与漂亮沾不上边。

sentences.english: The new range of computers have formidable processing power.
sentences.chinese: 该系列的新型计算机处理能力惊人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕的；令人敬畏的，令人惊叹的
detailed_translations.english: very powerful or impressive, and often frightening

name: temple
trans: n. 庙宇；寺院；神殿；太阳穴

sentences.english: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.chinese: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.english: The entire valley reverberated with the sound of the temple bells.
sentences.chinese: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.english: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大火过后， 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

name: consistency
trans: n. [计] 一致性；稠度；相容性

sentences.english: She scores goals with remarkable consistency.
sentences.chinese: 她以非凡的连贯性进球得分。

detailed_translations.english: how thick, smooth etc a substance is

name: steadfast
trans: adj. 坚定的；不变的

sentences.english: her father’s steadfast love for her
sentences.chinese: 她父亲对她永不改变的爱

detailed_translations.english: being certain that you are right about something and refusing to change your opinion in any way

name: interrupt
trans: n. 中断

sentences.english: Will you stop interrupting me!
sentences.chinese: 别打断我的话！

sentences.english: Sorry to interrupt, but I need to ask you to come downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉打扰了，我得请你下楼来。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from continuing what they are saying or doing by suddenly speaking to them, making a noise etc

name: manipulator
trans: n. [机] 操纵器，调制器；操作者

name: bravery
trans: n. 勇敢；勇气

sentences.english: an act of great bravery
sentences.chinese: 非常勇敢的行为

detailed_translations.english: actions, behaviour, or an attitude that shows courage and confidence

name: vocabulary
trans: n. 词汇；词表；词汇量

sentences.english: Teachers were impressed by his vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 他的词汇量给老师们留下了深刻的印象。

detailed_translations.english: all the words that someone knows or uses

name: vacancy
trans: n. 空缺；空位；空白；空虚

sentences.english: There are still two vacancies on the school board.
sentences.chinese: 学校董事会还有两个职位空缺。

sentences.english: The council is making every effort to fill the vacancies.
sentences.chinese: 地方议会正想方设法填补这些职缺。

sentences.english: information about job vacancies
sentences.chinese: 招聘信息

detailed_translations.english: a job that is available for someone to start doing

name: departure
trans: n. 离开；出发；违背

sentences.english: There are several departures for New York every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天有好几个班次去纽约。

detailed_translations.english: an act of leaving a place, especially at the start of a journey

name: officious
trans: adj. 多管闲事的；非官方的

sentences.english: an officious traffic warden
sentences.chinese: 一名爱发号施令的交通督导员

detailed_translations.chinese: 爱发号施令的， 爱指手画脚的
detailed_translations.english: too eager to tell people what to do – used to show disapproval

name: chart
trans: n. 图表；海图；图纸；排行榜

sentences.english: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.chinese: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.english: a weather chart
sentences.chinese: 天气图

sentences.english: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.chinese: 剧场的座位图

detailed_translations.english: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
detailed_translations.english: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records

name: pavement
trans: n. 人行道

sentences.english: A small group of journalists waited on the pavement outside her house.
sentences.chinese: 有一小群记者守候在她家外面的人行道上。

sentences.english: a pavement cafe
sentences.chinese: 路边咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: a hard level surface or path at the side of a road for people to walk on

name: fatigue
trans: n. 疲劳，疲乏；杂役

sentences.english: She hoped to sleep off her fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 她希望睡一觉之后会消除疲劳。

sentences.english: I have got over my weakness and fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 我已从虚弱和疲劳中恢复过来了。

sentences.english: Everyone has analogy fatigue at this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上，人人都有类比疲劳。

detailed_translations.english: very great tiredness

name: bow
trans: n. 弓；鞠躬；船首

sentences.english: She bowed and left the stage.
sentences.chinese: 她鞠了一躬，离开了舞台。

sentences.english: Corbett entered the room, bowing respectfully.
sentences.chinese: 科比特走进房间，恭敬地鞠了一躬。

sentences.english: The servant bowed low and handed his master the sealed note.
sentences.chinese: 仆人深深一鞠躬，把那个封好的短笺递给了主人。

sentences.english: This is done with a formal bow to the king or queen.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，还要向国王或女王正式鞠躬行礼。

detailed_translations.english: to bend the top part of your body forward in order to show respect for someone important, or as a way of thanking an  audience
the act of bending the top part of your body forward to show respect for someone when you meet them, or as a way of thanking an audience

name: unwarranted
trans: adj. 无根据的；无保证的

sentences.english: unwarranted interference
sentences.chinese: 无理干涉

name: vanish
trans: n. 弱化音

sentences.english: My keys were here a minute ago but now they’ve vanished.
sentences.chinese: 我的钥匙刚刚还在这里，现在却不翼而飞了。

sentences.english: The bird vanished from sight.
sentences.chinese: 那只鸟从视线中消失了。

sentences.english: She seemed to have just vanished into thin air (= suddenly disappeared in a very mysterious way ).
sentences.chinese: 她好像就蒸发了似的。

detailed_translations.english: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained

name: title
trans: n. 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕

sentences.english: "Patience and Sarah" was first published in 1969 under the title "A Place for Us."
sentences.chinese: 《耐心与萨拉》于1969年以《我们的地方》为书名首次出版。

sentences.english: Pirandello titled his play "Six Characters in Search of an Author."
sentences.chinese: 皮兰德娄将其戏剧命名为《六个寻找作者的剧中人》。

sentences.english: The single is titled "White Love."
sentences.chinese: 这支单曲名为《白色之恋》。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕
detailed_translations.english: the name given to a particular book, painting, play etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为
detailed_translations.english: When a writer, composer, or artist titles a work, they give it a name

name: creature
trans: n. 动物，生物；人；创造物

sentences.english: all the living creatures in the sea
sentences.chinese: 海洋中所有的生物

detailed_translations.english: anything that is living, such as an animal, fish, or insect, but not a plant

name: supersede
trans: vt. 取代，代替；紧接着……而到来

sentences.english: Their map has since been superseded by photographic atlases.
sentences.chinese: 他们的地图从此被摄影地图册取代。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取代，代替；紧接着……而到来
detailed_translations.english: if a new idea, product, or method supersedes another one, it becomes used instead because it is more modern or effective

name: illiteracy
trans: n. 文盲；无知

sentences.english: India tolerated dissent, but it also tolerated inefficiency, disease and illiteracy.
sentences.chinese: 印度容许异议，但同时它也容忍了无能、疾病与文盲。

sentences.english: Tackling corruption would be the fastest way to address problems like poverty, disease, and illiteracy, he contended.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，反腐败可能是解决诸如贫困、疾病和文盲等问题的最快途径。

sentences.english: This great institution must work for great purposes -- to free people from tyranny and violence, hunger and disease, illiteracy and ignorance, and poverty and despair.
sentences.chinese: 这个伟大的机构必须努力达到伟大的目的──使人们摆脱暴政与暴力、饥饿与疾病、文盲与愚昧、贫困与绝望。

detailed_translations.english: Illiteracy is the state of not knowing how to read or write

name: incorporate
trans: vt. 包含，吸收；体现；把……合并

sentences.english: It allows you to harness existing technologies and incorporate them into one application.
sentences.chinese: 它允许您利用现有的技术并将它们合并到同一个应用程序中。

sentences.english: The next step is to generate the report and then incorporate it as an affiliated document of the master document.
sentences.chinese: 紧接着的步骤就是产生这个报告，然后将它作为主文档的附属文档与主文档合并。

name: ritual
trans: n. 仪式；惯例；礼制

sentences.english: ancient pagan rituals
sentences.chinese: 古老的异教仪式

sentences.english: the importance of religion and ritual in our lives
sentences.chinese: 我们生活中宗教和宗教仪式的重要性

sentences.english: The lady of the house performs the sacred ritual of lighting two candles.
sentences.chinese: 由女主人来完成点燃两根蜡烛的神圣仪式。

detailed_translations.english: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, in order to mark an important religious or social occasion

name: audience
trans: n. 观众；听众；读者；接见；正式会见；拜会

sentences.english: The show attracts a regular audience of about 20 million.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目吸引了大约两千万固定观众收看。

sentences.english: Goya was one of the first painters to look for a wider audience for his work.
sentences.chinese: 戈雅是最早为自己的作品寻找更多观赏者的画家之一。

detailed_translations.english: the people who watch or listen to a particular programme, or who see or hear a particular artist’s, writer’s etc work

name: infant
trans: n. 婴儿；幼儿；未成年人

sentences.english: An infant’s skin is very sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的皮肤非常敏感。

sentences.english: infant formula milk
sentences.chinese: 婴(幼)儿配方奶

detailed_translations.english: a baby or very young child
intended for babies or very young children

name: function
trans: n. 功能；[数] 函数；职责；盛大的集会

sentences.english: Her legs have now ceased to function .
sentences.chinese: 她的双腿现在已经丧失正常功能了。

sentences.english: You know I can’t function (= cannot perform normal activities ) without a coffee in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，我早上不喝杯咖啡就无法工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作， 运行； 起作用
detailed_translations.english: to work in the correct or intended way

detailed_translations.chinese: 功能，职务；【数】函数；重大聚会
detailed_translations.english: the purpose that something has, or the job that someone or something does

name: conventional
trans: adj. 符合习俗的，传统的；常见的；惯例的

sentences.english: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.chinese: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.english: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type

name: sportsman
trans: n. 运动员；运动家；冒险家

sentences.english: He’s a very keen sportsman .
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常喜爱运动的人。

sentences.english: a talented all-round sportsman
sentences.chinese: 一名有天赋的全能运动员

detailed_translations.english: a man who plays several different sports

name: perspective
trans: n. 观点；远景；透视图

sentences.english: the artist’s use of perspective
sentences.chinese: 那位画家对透视法的运用

sentences.english: a perspective of the whole valley
sentences.chinese: 山谷全景

sentences.english: His father’s death gave him a whole new perspective on life.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a method of drawing a picture that makes objects look solid and shows distance and depth, or the effect this method produces in a picture

name: profitable
trans: adj. 有利可图的；赚钱的；有益的

sentences.english: The advertising campaign proved very profitable.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，这次广告宣传活动卓有成效。

sentences.english: a highly profitable business
sentences.chinese: 盈利高的企业

sentences.english: a profitable afternoon
sentences.chinese: 有收获的下午

detailed_translations.english: producing a profit or a useful result

name: sympathy
trans: n. 同情；慰问；赞同

sentences.english: Our sympathies are with the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sorry for someone who is in a bad situation

name: bacteria
trans: n. [微] 细菌

sentences.english: Some of these bacteria are actually good for you.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这些细菌有的对你是很有好处的。

sentences.english: When you eat off the plate, all of those bacteria go into your stomach.
sentences.chinese: 当你吃掉了盘子里的食物时，这些细菌就会进入你的肚子。

sentences.english: But she correctly points out that bacteria are everywhere: on us, in us and all around us.
sentences.chinese: 但是她正确地指出细菌无处不在：在我们身上，在我们体内以及在我们周围。

detailed_translations.english: very small living things, some of which cause illness or disease

name: constantly
trans: adv. 不断地；时常地

sentences.english: He talked constantly about his work.
sentences.chinese: 他不断地谈到他的工作。

sentences.english: The English language is constantly changing .
sentences.chinese: 英语在不断地变化。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, or very often

name: diversity
trans: n. 多样性；差异

sentences.english: ...the cultural diversity of Latin America.
sentences.chinese: …拉丁美洲文化的多样性。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of including many different types of people or things

name: intense
trans: adj. 强烈的；紧张的；非常的；热情的

sentences.english: Young people today are under intense pressure to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 如今的年轻人面临要出人头地的巨大压力。

sentences.english: the intense heat of the desert
sentences.chinese: 沙漠的炽热

sentences.english: The pain was so intense I couldn’t sleep.
sentences.chinese: 疼得我都睡不着觉。

sentences.english: He took an intense interest in all religious matters.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有宗教事宜都很感兴趣。

sentences.english: a look of intense dislike
sentences.chinese: 极端厌恶的表情

sentences.english: The job demands intense concentration.
sentences.chinese: 这工作需要全神贯注。

detailed_translations.english: having a very strong effect or felt very strongly

name: electric
trans: n. 电；电气车辆；带电体

sentences.english: an electric blanket
sentences.chinese: 电热毯

detailed_translations.english: needing electricity to work, produced by electricity, or used for carrying electricity

name: scope
trans: n. 范围；余地；视野；眼界；导弹射程

sentences.english: measures to limit the scope of criminals’ activities
sentences.chinese: 限制罪犯活动范围的措施

detailed_translations.english: the range of things that a subject, activity, book etc deals with

name: sphere
trans: n. 范围；球体

sentences.english: Because the earth spins, it is not a perfect sphere.
sentences.chinese: 因为地球旋转，所以它不是个完完全全的球体。

detailed_translations.english: a ball shape

detailed_translations.chinese: 包围；放入球内；使…成球形

name: reduce
trans: vi. 减少；缩小；归纳为

sentences.english: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.
sentences.chinese: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.english: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.english: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

detailed_translations.english: to make something smaller or less in size, amount, or price

name: extensive
trans: adj. 广泛的；大量的；广阔的

sentences.english: The house stands in extensive grounds.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子占地面积很大。

sentences.english: Fire has caused extensive damage to the island’s forests.
sentences.chinese: 大火严重毁坏了岛上的森林。

sentences.english: the extensive use of pesticides
sentences.chinese: 杀虫剂的大量使用

sentences.english: The exhibition has received extensive coverage in the national press.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览会被全国媒体广泛报道。

detailed_translations.english: large in size, amount, or degree

name: distortion
trans: n. 变形；[物] 失真；扭曲；曲解

sentences.english: a distortion of the facts
sentences.chinese: 对事实的歪曲

sentences.english: modern alloys that are resistant to wear and distortion
sentences.chinese: 耐磨、防变形的新型合金

detailed_translations.english: the changing of something into something that is not true or not acceptable

name: classify
trans: vt. 分类；分等

sentences.english: We’d classify Drabble’s novels under ‘Romance’.
sentences.chinese: 我们把德拉布尔的小说归类为“言情小说”。

sentences.english: Families are classified according to the father’s occupation.
sentences.chinese: 各个家庭按父亲的职业分类。

detailed_translations.english: to decide what group something belongs to

name: anaesthesia
trans: n. 麻醉；麻木；感觉缺失（等于anesthesia）

detailed_translations.chinese: 麻醉；麻木；感觉缺失（等于anesthesia）
detailed_translations.english: the use of anaesthetics in medicine

name: privacy
trans: n. 隐私；秘密；隐居；隐居处

sentences.english: each individual’s right to privacy
sentences.chinese: 每个人的隐私权

detailed_translations.english: the state of being free from public attention

name: overflow
trans: vi. 溢出；泛滥；充溢

sentences.english: The drains flooded and water overflowed down the main street.
sentences.chinese: 下水道被淹，水溢到了大街上。

sentences.english: The river had overflowed its banks.
sentences.chinese: 河水漫堤了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 满得外溢，外流，泛滥；充满，洋溢
detailed_translations.english: if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges

detailed_translations.chinese: 淹没， 从…中溢出， 多得无法容纳
detailed_translations.english: if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges

detailed_translations.chinese: 容纳不下的物； 溢出， 满出； 溢流口， 溢流管
detailed_translations.english: the amount of something or the number of people that cannot be contained in a place because it is already full

name: journalistic
trans: adj. 新闻业的，新闻工作者的

sentences.english: He began his journalistic career in the early eighties in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他于八十年代早期在澳大利亚开始了他的新闻事业。

detailed_translations.chinese: 新闻业的， 新闻工作者的
detailed_translations.english: Journalistic means relating to journalism, or produced by or typical of a journalist

name: resist
trans: n. [助剂] 抗蚀剂；防染剂

sentences.english: to resist change
sentences.chinese: 抵制变革

sentences.english: He tried to pin me down, but I resisted.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制伏我，但我奋力反抗。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept sth and try to stop it from happening

name: divergent
trans: adj. 相异的，分歧的；散开的

sentences.english: Two people who have divergent views on this question are George Watt and Bob Marr.
sentences.chinese: 在这个问题上意见相左的两个人是乔治·瓦特和鲍勃·马尔。

detailed_translations.english: Divergent things are different from each other

name: traditionally
trans: adv. 传统上；习惯上；传说上

sentences.english: Women have had to prove themselves in every field that they have traditionally be barred from.
sentences.chinese: 女性必须在那些传统上被禁止的每一个领域中证明自己。

sentences.english: As we have seen, those changes tend to span disciplines that are not traditionally thought of as part of the mandate of Release Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 正如我们所看到的那样，那些变更是跨学科的，并且在传统上并不属于版本工程学要求的一部分。

sentences.english: To be successful selling to them, you have to cater to their emotions and concerns more than ever before, even when selling products that men traditionally buy.
sentences.chinese: 为了成功的向她们推销，你必须比以往更加迎合这部分人群的情感和关切，甚至传统上由男人来购买的产品也是一样。

name: verbose
trans: adj. 冗长的；啰嗦的

sentences.english: For once, his usually verbose wife was content to listen.
sentences.chinese: 他那个一贯唠叨的老婆难得一次愿意倾听。

sentences.english: Legal writing is often unclear and verbose.
sentences.chinese: 法律文书往往措辞含糊，行文冗长。

detailed_translations.english: using or containing too many words

name: costly
trans: adj. 昂贵的；代价高的

sentences.english: Such a database would be extremely costly to set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立这样一个数据库要花很多钱。

sentences.english: His delay in making a decision could prove costly in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 他的优柔寡断长久下去要付出巨大代价。

detailed_translations.english: very expensive, especially wasting a lot of money

name: size
trans: n. 大小；尺寸

sentences.english: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.english: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.chinese: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.english: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

detailed_translations.english: how big or small something is
to sort according to size

name: symmetry
trans: n. 对称（性）；整齐，匀称

sentences.english: the symmetry of the design
sentences.chinese: 图案的对称性

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being symmetrical

name: document
trans: n. 文件，公文；[计] 文档；证件

sentences.english: She produces legal documents for a downtown Seattle law firm.
sentences.chinese: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that has official information on it
to write about something, film it, or take photographs of it, in order to record information about it

name: jaw
trans: n. 颌；下巴；狭窄入口；唠叨

sentences.english: He punched him on the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 他一拳打在他的下巴上。

sentences.english: a rugged physique and a strong square jaw
sentences.chinese: 强健的体格以及结实的方下巴

sentences.english: She’s got a very determined jaw.
sentences.chinese: 她一脸坚毅。

detailed_translations.english: the lower part of your face. Its shape is sometimes thought to show your character

name: protest
trans: n. 抗议

sentences.english: ‘I don’t see why I should take the blame for this!’ she protested.
sentences.chinese: “我不明白为什么我要对此承担责任！”她抗议道。

detailed_translations.english: to come together to publicly express disapproval or opposition to something
something that you do to show publicly that you think that something is wrong and unfair, for example taking part in big public meetings, refusing to work, or refusing to buy a company’s products

name: photocopy
trans: n. 复印件；影印

sentences.english: I sent him the original document, not a photocopy.
sentences.chinese: 我寄给他的是原件，不是复印件。

detailed_translations.english: a photographic copy, especially of something printed, written, or drawn
to make a photographic copy of something

name: refectory
trans: n. 食堂；（修道院，学院等处的）餐厅

sentences.english: Conclusions Using HACCP method in refectory obtained good effect.
sentences.chinese: 结论：在学校食堂应用HACCP管理是有效的。

sentences.english: Do you know if hereabout have preferable refectory for Western - style food.
sentences.chinese: 你知道附近有比较好的西餐厅吗?。

sentences.english: There is no denying that the qualities of food in our refectory have gone from bad to worse .
sentences.chinese: 不可否认的，我们学校食堂食物的质量已经每况愈下。

detailed_translations.english: a large room in a school, college etc where meals are served and eaten

name: disseminate
trans: vt. 宣传，传播；散布

sentences.english: Her findings have been widely disseminated .
sentences.chinese: 她的发现已广为传播。

detailed_translations.english: to spread information or ideas to as many people as possible

name: graphics
trans: n. [测] 制图学；制图法；图表算法

sentences.english: In this in-depth motion graphics tutorial you will learn how to use vector shapes for 3D motion graphics.
sentences.chinese: 在这种深入的运动图形教程中，您将学习如何使用矢量图形的3D动态图像。

detailed_translations.chinese: 图形， 图像； 制图法， 制图学
detailed_translations.english: pictures or images that are designed to represent objects or facts, especially in a computer program

name: captivity
trans: n. 囚禁；被关

sentences.english: The hostages were released from captivity.
sentences.chinese: 人质被释放了。

detailed_translations.english: when a person or animal is kept in a prison,  cage  etc and not allowed to go where they want

name: sleek
trans: adj. 圆滑的；井然有序的

sentences.english: the sleek lines of the new Mercedes
sentences.chinese: 这款新梅赛德斯汽车的优美外形

detailed_translations.english: sleek hair or fur is straight, shiny, and healthy-looking
to make hair or fur smooth and shiny by putting water or oil on it

name: unrivalled
trans: adj. 无与伦比的；无敌的

name: clot
trans: n. [生理] 凝块

sentences.english: The patient's blood refused to clot.
sentences.chinese: 病人的血液无法凝结。

detailed_translations.english: if a liquid such as blood or milk clots, or if something clots it, it becomes thicker and more solid
a thick almost solid mass formed when blood or milk dries

name: behalf
trans: n. 代表；利益

sentences.english: She asked the doctor to speak to her parents on her behalf.
sentences.chinese: 她请医生代她同她父母谈谈。

sentences.english: On behalf of everyone here, may I wish you a very happy retirement.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我代表在座的各位祝你退休后生活愉快。

detailed_translations.english: instead of someone, or as their representative

name: foresight
trans: n. 先见，远见；预见；深谋远虑

sentences.english: It was an example of the authorities’ lack of foresight .
sentences.chinese: 这是当权者缺乏远见的一个例证。

detailed_translations.chinese: 先见，远见；预见；深谋远虑
detailed_translations.english: the ability to imagine what is likely to happen and to consider this when planning for the future

name: impede
trans: vt. 阻碍；妨碍；阻止

sentences.english: Storms at sea impeded our progress.
sentences.chinese: 海上风暴阻碍了我们的航程。

detailed_translations.english: to make it difficult for someone or something to move forward or make progress

name: principally
trans: adv. 主要地；大部分

sentences.english: The money is principally invested in stocks and shares.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱主要投资于股票。

sentences.english: He was principally a landscape painter.
sentences.chinese: 他主要是风景画画家。

sentences.english: We met principally to discuss the future of the school.
sentences.chinese: 我们开会主要是为了商讨学校的前途。

detailed_translations.english: mainly

name: ingenious
trans: adj. 有独创性的；机灵的，精制的；心灵手巧的

sentences.english: an ingenious device
sentences.chinese: 精巧的装置

sentences.english: an ingenious cook
sentences.chinese: 心灵手巧的厨师

detailed_translations.english: (of an object, a plan, an idea, etc.) very suitable for a particular purpose and resulting from clever new ideas

name: meticulous
trans: adj. 一丝不苟的；小心翼翼的；拘泥小节的

sentences.english: He kept meticulous accounts.
sentences.chinese: 他的账记得一丝不苟。

sentences.english: Their planning and preparation were meticulous.
sentences.chinese: 他们的计划和准备工作都很周密。

sentences.english: He cleaned the tools with meticulous care.
sentences.chinese: 他十分认真地清洁了工具。

sentences.english: The book describes his journey in meticulous detail.
sentences.chinese: 这本书很详细地描述了他的旅程。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一丝不苟的；小心翼翼的；拘泥小节的
detailed_translations.english: very careful about small details, and always making sure that everything is done correctly

name: suitable
trans: adj. 适当的；相配的

sentences.english: We are hoping to find a suitable school.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望能找到一所合适的学校。

detailed_translations.english: having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation

name: psychological
trans: adj. 心理的；心理学的；精神上的

sentences.english: Sleep disorders are a serious psychological problem .
sentences.chinese: 睡眠障碍是严重的心理疾病。

sentences.english: Freud’s psychological theories
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德的心理学理论

sentences.english: What was the patient’s psychological state ?
sentences.chinese: 病人的心理状态如何？

detailed_translations.english: relating to the way that your mind works and the way that this affects your behaviour

name: engross
trans: vt. 使全神贯注；用大字体书写；正式写成（决议等）；独占；吸引

sentences.english: The scene was stunning, and for a time engrossed all our attention.
sentences.chinese: 景色非常美丽，一时间把我们都完全吸引住了。

detailed_translations.english: if something engrosses you, it interests you so much that you do not notice anything else

name: mini-computer
trans: n. 微型电脑

name: dim
trans: n. 笨蛋，傻子

sentences.english: in the dim light of the early dawn
sentences.chinese: 在微弱的晨曦里

sentences.english: a dim glow
sentences.chinese: 昏暗的微光

sentences.english: I could see a dim shape in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 我模模糊糊看见门口有个人影。

detailed_translations.english: fairly dark or not giving much light, so that you cannot see well

name: assistance
trans: n. 援助，帮助；辅助设备

sentences.english: We offer financial assistance to students.
sentences.chinese: 我们向学生提供经济援助。

sentences.english: Can I be of any assistance (=  can I help you  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 我能帮什么忙吗？

detailed_translations.english: help or support

name: mislead
trans: vt. 误导；带错

sentences.english: Don’t be misled by appearances, he’s a good worker.
sentences.chinese: 不要被表象迷惑，他工作干得挺不错的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone believe something that is not true by giving them information that is false or not complete

name: idyllic
trans: 牧歌的

sentences.english: This idyllic pastoral scene is only part of the picture.
sentences.chinese: 但这种田园诗般的乡村风光仅仅是一个侧面。

sentences.english: Some believe that lemurians were much more like early humans living in a sort of idyllic paradise largely agrarian with lush forests and an abundance of flowers and fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 一些就相信利莫里亚更加像早期的人类，生活在一种田园诗般的天堂里，主要地与繁荣的森林，盛开的花朵和结果的树在一起。

sentences.english: I don't mind a bit of idiosyncrasy, but that strange ideology you believe in , coupled with your idyllic ideas on life, suggest to me that all you're doing is looking for some idol to follow.
sentences.chinese: 你有一点特殊的癖性我不在乎，但你相信的那种奇怪的意识形态，加上你向往田园诗般生活的想法，给我的印象是你在做的就是要找到一个偶像来效仿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 田园诗般的， 田园风光的， 牧歌的

name: foyer
trans: n. 门厅，休息室；大厅

sentences.english: I went and waited in the foyer.
sentences.chinese: 我去了，在门厅里等着。

detailed_translations.english: a room or hall at the entrance to a public building

name: supplementary
trans: n. 补充者；增补物

sentences.english: supplementary information
sentences.chinese: 补充信息

detailed_translations.english: provided in addition to what already exists

name: numerous
trans: adj. 许多的，很多的

sentences.english: Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.
sentences.chinese: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.english: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.chinese: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

detailed_translations.english: many

name: logically
trans: adv. 逻辑上；合乎逻辑

sentences.english: Some modes are logically equivalent but differ in their purpose. .
sentences.chinese: 有些模式逻辑上是等价的，但是用途却不同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 合乎情理地，符合逻辑地

name: observe
trans: vt. 庆祝

sentences.english: Scientists have observed a drop in ozone levels over the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.english: Predators have been observed to avoid attacking brightly coloured species.
sentences.chinese: 据观察发现，食肉动物会避免袭击色彩鲜艳的物种。

sentences.english: The army was observing a ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 军队当时在遵守一项停火协议。

sentences.english: ‘Sid looks ill,’ Doherty observed.
sentences.chinese: “锡德看上去病了。”多尔蒂说道。

detailed_translations.english: to see and notice something

name: psychology
trans: n. 心理学；心理状态

sentences.english: I understood the psychology of this, but it still hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我理解这种心理，但这仍然让我感到伤心。

sentences.english: It was not until the mid-twentieth century that psychology really came into its own.
sentences.chinese: 直到20世纪中叶心理学才得到应有的重视。

sentences.english: His speciality was psychology -- one important branch on the great tree of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他的专业是心理学，这是知识之树上的一个重要分枝。

name: levity
trans: n. 多变；轻浮；轻率；不稳定

sentences.english: At the time, Arnold had disapproved of such levity.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，阿诺德不赞成如此的轻浮行为。

detailed_translations.english: lack of respect or seriousness when you are dealing with something serious

name: alphabetical
trans: adj. 字母的；[计] 依字母顺序的

sentences.english: The files are arranged in alphabetical order .
sentences.chinese: 这些文件按字母顺序排列。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the alphabet

name: mosquito
trans: n. 蚊子

sentences.english: The male mosquito never stings.
sentences.chinese: 雄蚊不叮。

sentences.english: Are your mosquito bites still itching?
sentences.chinese: 你被蚊子咬的地方还痒吗?

sentences.english: The frog darted out its tongue to catch a mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 这只青蛙突然伸出舌头捕捉蚊子。

detailed_translations.english: a small flying insect that sucks the blood of people and animals, sometimes spreading the disease  malaria

name: zeal
trans: n. 热情；热心；热诚

sentences.english: ...his zeal for teaching.
sentences.chinese: …他对教学的热衷。

detailed_translations.english: eagerness to do something, especially to achieve a particular religious or political aim

name: choosy
trans: adj. 好挑剔的

sentences.english: Skiers should be particularly choosy about the insurance policy they buy.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪者在购买保险的问题上应特别谨慎。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is choosy will only accept things that they like a lot or they consider to be very good

name: contra
trans: Not Found

name: passenger
trans: n. 旅客；乘客；过路人；碍手碍脚的人

sentences.english: Neither the driver nor the passengers were hurt.
sentences.chinese: 司机和乘客均未受伤。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is travelling in a vehicle, plane, boat etc, but is not driving it or working on it

name: deviance
trans: n. 异常；异常行为

name: entrepreneur
trans: n. 企业家；承包人；主办者

sentences.english: “You have to be an optimist to be an inventor or entrepreneur, ” he concludes.
sentences.chinese: 要成为一位发明家或企业家，你必须得是个乐天派。

sentences.english: If any of you end up being entrepreneur, which I hope you will be, what do you have in store for yourself, and what does that journey look like?
sentences.chinese: 如果你们当中任何一个人成了企业家，这也是我希望你们做到的，你自己会有什么样的储备，那样的一段旅程又将是什么样的？

sentences.english: How would you define personal growth as an entrepreneur?
sentences.chinese: 你会如何定义,一个企业家的个人成长？

detailed_translations.english: someone who starts a new business or arranges business deals in order to make money, often in a way that involves financial risks

name: refurbish
trans: vt. 刷新；再磨光

sentences.english: We have spent money on refurbishing the offices.
sentences.chinese: 我们已在这些办公室的翻新上花了钱。

detailed_translations.english: To refurbish a building or room means to clean it and decorate it and make it more attractive or better equipped

name: degradation
trans: n. 退化；降格，降级；堕落

sentences.english: ...air pollution, traffic congestion, and the steady degradation of our quality of life.
sentences.chinese: …空气污染、交通阻塞以及我们生活质量的持续恶化。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which something changes to a worse condition

name: tendency
trans: n. 倾向，趋势；癖好

sentences.english: children with aggressive or anti-social tendencies
sentences.chinese: 具有攻击性倾向或反社会倾向的儿童

detailed_translations.chinese: 趋向， 趋势， 倾向
detailed_translations.english: if someone or something has a tendency to do or become a particular thing, they are likely to do or become it

name: injure
trans: vt. 伤害，损害

sentences.english: Angus injured his leg playing rugby.
sentences.chinese: 安格斯在打橄榄球时弄伤了腿。

detailed_translations.english: to hurt yourself or someone else, for example in an accident or an attack

name: boycott
trans: n. 联合抵制

sentences.english: We boycott all products tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 我们抵制所有拿动物做试验的产品。

sentences.english: They are now trying to organize a boycott.
sentences.chinese: 他们正试图组织一场抵制行动。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to buy something, use something, or take part in something as a way of protesting
an act of boycotting something, or the period of time when it is boycotted

name: hesitate
trans: vt. 踌躇，犹豫；有疑虑，不愿意

sentences.english: I hesitate.
sentences.chinese: 我犹豫。

detailed_translations.english: to be slow to speak or act because you feel uncertain or nervous

name: field
trans: n. 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land in the country, especially one where crops are grown or animals feed on grass

name: dialect
trans: n. 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征

sentences.english: the local dialect
sentences.chinese: 当地方言

detailed_translations.chinese: 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征
detailed_translations.english: a form of a language which is spoken only in one area, with words or grammar that are slightly different from other forms of the same language

name: generate
trans: vt. 使形成；发生；生殖；产生物理反应

sentences.english: a useful technique for generating new ideas
sentences.chinese: 能产生新创意的有用技术

sentences.english: The program would generate a lot of new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目将创造许多新的就业岗位。

detailed_translations.english: to produce or cause something

name: boom
trans: n. 繁荣；吊杆；隆隆声

sentences.english: The boom has created job opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 经济繁荣创造了就业的机会。

sentences.english: the economic boom of the 1950s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪50年代的经济繁荣

sentences.english: The economy went from boom to bust (=  from increasing to decreasing  ) very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 经济很快就从繁荣走向了萧条。

detailed_translations.english: a quick increase of business activity

name: momentum
trans: n. 势头；[物] 动量；动力；冲力

sentences.english: incentives to maintain the momentum of European integration
sentences.chinese: 保持欧洲一体化发展势头的激励措施

sentences.english: Governments often lose momentum in their second term of office.
sentences.chinese: 政府往往会在第二届任期中丧失冲劲。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to keep increasing, developing, or being more successful

name: morose
trans: adj. 郁闷的；孤僻的

sentences.english: Daniel seems very morose and gloomy.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔好像闷闷不乐，情绪低落。

detailed_translations.english: bad-tempered, unhappy, and silent

name: folktale
trans: n. 民间故事；民间传说

name: rational
trans: n. 有理数

sentences.english: Parents need to be fully informed so they can make a rational decision.
sentences.chinese: 父母需要充分了解情况，这样才可以作出合理的决定。

sentences.english: I’m sure there’s a rational explanation for all this.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这一切都有合理的解释。

sentences.english: It’s impossible to have a rational conversation with him.
sentences.chinese: 不可能和他进行理性的谈话。

detailed_translations.english: based on reason rather than emotions

name: compatible
trans: adj. 兼容的；能共处的；可并立的

sentences.english: The new software is IBM compatible (= can be used with IBM computers ) .
sentences.chinese: 这个新软件与IBM的计算机兼容。

detailed_translations.english: if two pieces of computer equipment are compatible, they can be used together, especially when they are made by different companies

name: route
trans: n. 路线；航线；通道

sentences.english: Trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.chinese: 火车正在运送过去由卡车运送的大批货物。

detailed_translations.english: to send something somewhere using a particular route
a way from one place to another

name: particularly
trans: adv. 特别地，独特地；详细地，具体地；明确地，细致地

sentences.english: Steve was in a particularly bad mood when he got back.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫回来时情绪特别不好。

sentences.english: The restaurant is particularly popular with young people.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅尤其受到年轻人的欢迎。

sentences.english: We are hoping to expand our business, particularly in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望扩大业务，尤其是在欧洲。

sentences.english: British farmers, particularly those producing lamb, are very worried.
sentences.chinese: 英国农场主，尤其是养羊羔的农场主，非常担忧。

detailed_translations.english: more than usual or more than others

name: steady
trans: n. 关系固定的情侣；固定支架

sentences.english: It takes a steady hand to perform surgery.
sentences.chinese: 做手术手要稳。

sentences.english: The plane steadied, and the passengers relaxed
sentences.chinese: 飞机平稳后，乘客们松了一口气。

detailed_translations.english: firmly held in a particular position and not moving or shaking
to hold someone or something so they become more balanced or controlled, or to become more balanced or controlled

name: foundation
trans: n. 基础；地基；基金会；根据；创立

sentences.english: It took the builders three weeks to lay the foundations .
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人花了三星期的时间打地基。

sentences.english: The earthquake shook the foundations of the house.
sentences.chinese: 地震动摇了那幢房子的地基。

sentences.english: the British Heart Foundation
sentences.chinese: 英国心脏病基金会

detailed_translations.english: the solid layer of  cement  , bricks, stones etc that is put under a building to support it

name: immutable
trans: adj. 不变的；不可变的；不能变的

sentences.english: This decision should not be seen as immutable.
sentences.chinese: 不该把这个决定看成是不可改变的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不变的；不可变的；不能变的
detailed_translations.english: never changing or impossible to change

name: certificate
trans: n. 证书；执照，文凭

sentences.english: birth/death/marriage certificate (=giving details of someone’s birth, death, or marriage)
sentences.chinese: 出生/死亡/结婚证书

sentences.english: a degree certificate
sentences.chinese: 学位证书

detailed_translations.chinese: 证书，证件，执照；（毕业）文凭，合格证书
detailed_translations.english: an official document that states that a fact or facts are true

name: reorganize
trans: vt. 整理；改组；重新制定

sentences.english: Our office is being completely reorganized.
sentences.chinese: 我们办公室正在彻底改组。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange or organize something in a new way

name: renowned
trans: v. 使有声誉（renown的过去分词）

sentences.english: The area is renowned for its Romanesque churches.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区以其罗马式教堂闻名。

detailed_translations.english: known and admired by a lot of people, especially for a special skill, achievement, or quality

name: terrestrial
trans: n. 陆地生物；地球上的人

sentences.english: ...terrestrial life forms.
sentences.chinese: …地球上的生命形态。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地球的；陆地的，[生物] 陆生的；人间的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth rather than to the moon or other  planets

name: complexity
trans: n. 复杂，复杂性；复杂错综的事物

sentences.english: a design of great complexity
sentences.chinese: 一项非常复杂的设计

detailed_translations.english: the state of being complicated

name: cowpox
trans: n. [兽医] 牛痘

name: implacable
trans: adj. 不能安抚的；难和解的；不能缓和的

sentences.english: implacable enemies
sentences.chinese: 死敌

detailed_translations.chinese: 不能安抚的；难和解的；不能缓和的

name: specifically
trans: adv. 特别地；明确地

sentences.english: advertising that specifically targets children
sentences.chinese: 专门针对儿童的广告

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别地， 特定地； 明确地， 具体地
detailed_translations.english: relating to or intended for one particular type of person or thing only

name: stagnate
trans: vt. 使淤塞；使沉滞；使萧条

sentences.english: Growth is expected to stagnate next year.
sentences.chinese: 预计明年增长会停滞。

sentences.english: His career had stagnated.
sentences.chinese: 他的事业停滞不前了。

detailed_translations.english: to stop developing or making progress

name: laboratory
trans: n. 实验室，研究室

sentences.english: a research laboratory
sentences.chinese: 研究实验室

sentences.english: tests on laboratory animals
sentences.chinese: 在实验室动物身上做的试验

detailed_translations.english: a special room or building in which a scientist does tests or prepares substances

name: Termite
trans: Not Found

name: editorial
trans: n. 社论

sentences.english: an editorial assistant
sentences.chinese: 编辑助理

detailed_translations.english: relating to the preparation of a newspaper, book, television programme etc for printing or broadcasting
a piece of writing in a newspaper that gives the editor’s opinion about something, rather than reporting facts

name: engage
trans: vi. 从事；答应，保证；交战；啮合

sentences.english: She engaged the clutch and the car moved.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下离合器，汽车便开动了。

sentences.english: The wheel engages with the cog and turns it.
sentences.chinese: 轮子咬住轮齿并带动它转动。

detailed_translations.english: if you engage part of a machine, or if it engages, it moves so that it fits into another part of the machine

name: contemplate
trans: vt. 沉思；注视；思忖；预期

sentences.english: He had even contemplated suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至想过自杀。

sentences.english: Jack went on vacation to contemplate his future.
sentences.chinese: 杰克去度假，仔细思考一下他的未来。

sentences.english: He contemplated her with a faint smile.
sentences.chinese: 他微微含笑注视着她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑；深思；细想；注视，凝视
detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you might do in the future

name: spew
trans: vt. 喷出；呕吐

sentences.english: Factory chimneys spewed fumes out into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 工厂的烟囱向空中喷吐浓烟。

detailed_translations.english: to flow out of something quickly in large quantities, or to make something flow out in this way

name: weather
trans: n. 天气；气象；气候；处境

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

name: analytical
trans: adj. 分析的；解析的；善于分析的

sentences.english: She’s got an analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 她思维缜密。

detailed_translations.english: thinking about things in a detailed and intelligent way, so that you can examine and understand things

name: galaxy
trans: n. 银河；[天] 星系；银河系；一群显赫的人

sentences.english: Astronomers have discovered a distant galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家们发现了一个遥远的星系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 银河；[天] 星系；银河系；一群显赫的人
detailed_translations.english: one of the large groups of stars that make up the universe

name: commute
trans: n. 通勤（口语）

sentences.english: Baldry’s 20-year prison sentence was commuted to three years.
sentences.chinese: 鲍德里二十年的刑期被减至三年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘公交车上下班，经常乘车往返于两地
减； 折合， 折偿； 上下班交通
detailed_translations.english: to regularly travel a long distance to get to work

name: sensible
trans: n. 可感觉到的东西; 敏感的人;

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.english: sensible advice
sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.english: It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.english: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

detailed_translations.english: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

name: entomophagy
trans: Not Found

name: wrestle
trans: n. 摔跤；搏斗；斗争

sentences.english: They run races; they wrestle; and sometimes they have mock fights together.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁参加各种赛跑，摔跤，有时还在一起模拟战斗。

detailed_translations.english: to fight someone by holding them and pulling or pushing them

name: spring
trans: n. 春天；弹簧；泉水；活力；跳跃

sentences.english: He sprang to his feet (= stood up suddenly ) and rushed after her.
sentences.chinese: 他腾地站起身，冲过去追她。

sentences.english: There are several hot springs in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这地区有几处温泉。

sentences.english: With a spring, the cat leapt on to the table.
sentences.chinese: 猫一跃跳上桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly and quickly in a particular direction, especially by jumping
a place where water comes up naturally from the ground

name: flat
trans: n. 平地；公寓；平面

sentences.english: The bed can be folded flat for storage.
sentences.chinese: 这张床可以折扁存放。

sentences.english: He lay flat on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他平躺在地板上。

sentences.english: That night I lay flat on my back and stared up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 那一夜，我仰面平躺，眼睛直直地盯着天花板。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平直地； 直截了当地
detailed_translations.english: in a position in which the surface of something is against another surface without curving or sloping

detailed_translations.chinese: 平的；固定的；漏气的；单调的，沉闷的；浅的
detailed_translations.english: smooth and level, without raised or hollow areas, and not sloping or curving
a place for people to live that consists of a set of rooms that are part of a larger building

name: tag
trans: n. 标签；名称；结束语；附属物

sentences.english: You just search for an artist, song, album , or just a random search tag.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要搜索艺术家、歌曲、相册、或者仅仅是一个随机搜索标签。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of paper, plastic etc attached to something to show what it is, who owns it, what it costs etc
to attach a tag to something

name: divide
trans: n. [地理] 分水岭，分水线

sentences.english: The book is divided into six sections.
sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.english: The money will be divided equally among the charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将被平分给各慈善机构。

detailed_translations.english: if something divides, or if you divide it, it separates into two or more parts

name: elicit
trans: vt. 抽出，引出；引起

sentences.english: My letters to her have elicited no response.
sentences.chinese: 我写给她的信没有得到回应。

detailed_translations.english: If you elicit a piece of information, you get it by asking the right questions

name: fatal
trans: adj. 致命的；重大的；毁灭性的；命中注定的

sentences.english: potentially fatal diseases
sentences.chinese: 潜在致命的疾病

sentences.english: If it is not treated correctly, the condition can prove fatal (= be fatal ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果治疗不当，这种病可能会致命。

detailed_translations.english: resulting in someone’s death

name: assumption
trans: n. 假定；设想；担任；采取

sentences.english: You would be making an assumption that's not based on any fact that you could report.
sentences.chinese: 你会做出不以你能报道的任何事实为依据的一种假设。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think is true although you have no definite proof

name: coastline
trans: n. 海岸线

sentences.english: California’s rugged coastline
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚崎岖的海岸线

sentences.english: a beautiful stretch of coastline
sentences.chinese: 一段景色优美的海岸线

detailed_translations.english: the land on the edge of the coast, especially the shape of this land as seen from the air

name: alcoholic
trans: n. 酒鬼，酗酒者

sentences.english: alcoholic drinks
sentences.chinese: 酒精饮料

detailed_translations.english: relating to alcohol or containing alcohol
someone who regularly drinks too much alcohol and has difficulty stopping

name: garden
trans: n. 花园；菜园

sentences.english: He’s outside in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他在外面花园里。

sentences.english: Grace brought us some flowers from her garden.
sentences.chinese: 格雷丝给我们送来一些她花园里的花。

sentences.english: the botanical gardens in Edinburgh
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的植物园

detailed_translations.english: piece of land next to or around your house where you can grow flowers, fruit, vegetables, etc., usually with an area of grass(called a lawn )

name: insect
trans: n. 昆虫；卑鄙的人

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

name: redundant
trans: adj. 多余的，过剩的；被解雇的，失业的；冗长的，累赘的

sentences.english: Seventy factory workers were made redundant in the resulting cuts.
sentences.chinese: 在继而发生的裁员中，70名工厂工人被解雇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过剩的；失业的，被解雇的
detailed_translations.english: if you are redundant, your employer no longer has a job for you

name: restructure
trans: vt. 调整；重建；更改结构

sentences.english: proposals to radically restructure Britain’s electronics industry
sentences.chinese: 彻底整顿英国电子行业的提议

detailed_translations.english: to change the way in which something such as a government, business, or system is organized

name: gush
trans: n. 涌出；迸发

sentences.english: All that pent-up frustration gushed out in a torrent of abuse.
sentences.chinese: 所有压抑着的失望与不快通过一阵痛骂全都发泄了出来。

detailed_translations.english: if words or emotions gush out, you suddenly express them very strongly
a large quantity of something, usually a liquid, that suddenly pours out of something

name: benchmark
trans: n. 基准；标准检查程序

sentences.english: benchmark data
sentences.chinese: 基准数据

sentences.english: The valuation becomes a benchmark against which to judge other prices.
sentences.chinese: 这个估价成了判断其他价格的依据。

detailed_translations.english: something that is used as a standard by which other things can be judged or measured

detailed_translations.chinese: 用基准问题测试（计算机系统等）

name: predecessor
trans: n. 前任，前辈

sentences.english: Kennedy’s predecessor as President was the war hero Dwight Eisenhower.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪总统的前任是战争英雄德怀特·艾森豪威尔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who had your job before you started doing it

name: moderate
trans: adj. 稳健的，温和的；适度的，中等的；有节制的

sentences.english: Even moderate amounts of alcohol can be dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 喝酒即使不多也会有危险。

sentences.english: a moderate degree of success
sentences.chinese: 一定程度上的成功

sentences.english: a student of moderate ability
sentences.chinese: 能力一般的学生

sentences.english: Moderate exercise, such as walking, is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 建议适度锻炼，比如散步。

sentences.english: Bake the pie for 30 minutes in a moderate oven.
sentences.chinese: 馅饼用中火烘烤30分钟。

sentences.english: moderate to strong winds
sentences.chinese: 中到大风

detailed_translations.english: not very large or very small, very hot or very cold, very fast or very slow etc
someone whose opinions or beliefs, especially about politics, are not extreme and are considered reasonable by most people
to make something less extreme or violent, or to become less extreme or violent

name: indeed
trans: adv. 的确；实在；真正地；甚至

sentences.english: The blood tests prove that Vince is indeed the father.
sentences.chinese: 验血证明文斯确实是父亲。

sentences.english: ‘Would it help if you had an assistant?’ ‘It would indeed.’
sentences.chinese: “你要是有个助手，会有帮助吗？”“那是肯定的。

sentences.english: Most of the essays were very good indeed.
sentences.chinese: 这些文章大多数都非常好。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a statement or answer

name: deride
trans: vt. 嘲笑；嘲弄

sentences.english: You shouldn’t deride their efforts.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该嘲笑他们的努力。

detailed_translations.english: to make remarks or jokes that show you think someone or something is silly or useless

name: bind
trans: n. 捆绑；困境；讨厌的事情；植物的藤蔓

sentences.english: The monks are bound by vows of silence.
sentences.chinese: 僧侣们必须遵守保持缄默的誓言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合；装订；有约束力；过紧
detailed_translations.english: if you are bound by an agreement, promise etc, you must do what you have agreed to do or promised to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 捆绑；困境；讨厌的事情；植物的藤蔓
detailed_translations.english: an annoying or difficult situation

name: underlie
trans: vt. 成为……的基础；位于……之下

sentences.english: the one basic principle that underlies all of the party’s policies
sentences.chinese: 贯穿该党各项政策的那一条基本原则

detailed_translations.english: to be the cause of something, or be the basic thing from which something develops

name: contentious
trans: adj. 诉讼的；有异议的，引起争论的；爱争论的

sentences.english: Sanctions are expected to be among the most contentious issues.
sentences.chinese: 制裁预计位居最具有争议的问题之列。

detailed_translations.chinese: 诉讼的；有异议的，引起争论的；爱争论的
detailed_translations.english: causing a lot of argument and disagreement between people

name: uncanny
trans: adj. 神秘的；离奇的；可怕的

sentences.english: an uncanny coincidence
sentences.chinese: 不可思议的巧合

detailed_translations.english: very strange and difficult to explain

name: terminal
trans: n. 末端；终点；终端机；极限

sentences.english: a terminal branch of a tree
sentences.chinese: 树顶枝条

sentences.english: terminal examinations (= at the end of a course, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 期终考试

sentences.english: the airport’s passenger terminal
sentences.chinese: 机场航站楼

detailed_translations.english: at the end of sth

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔飞机、公共汽车、轮船客运或货物运输的〕集散站，终点站
detailed_translations.english: a big building where people wait to get onto planes, buses, or ships, or where goods are loaded

name: gap
trans: n. 间隙；缺口；差距；分歧

sentences.english: ...the gap between rich and poor.
sentences.chinese: …贫富差距。

detailed_translations.english: a big difference between two situations, amounts, groups of people etc

name: flatten
trans: vt. 击败，摧毁；使……平坦

sentences.english: Use a rolling pin to flatten the dough.
sentences.chinese: 用擀面杖把面团擀平。

sentences.english: The land flattened out as we neared the coast.
sentences.chinese: 我们接近海岸时，地势变平坦了。

detailed_translations.english: to make something flat or flatter, or to become flat or flatter

name: apathy
trans: n. 冷漠，无兴趣，漠不关心；无感情

sentences.english: The campaign failed because of public apathy.
sentences.chinese: 由于公众反应冷淡，这次运动失败了。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of not being interested in something, and not willing to make any effort to change or improve things

name: convenient
trans: adj. 方便的；[废语]适当的；[口语]近便的；实用的

sentences.english: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.chinese: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.english: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会打电话给你安排一个方便的时间见面。

sentences.english: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres
sentences.chinese: 靠近商店和剧院的餐厅

detailed_translations.english: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems

name: impermeable
trans: adj. 不渗透性的；（对水等）不能渗透的

sentences.english: No paint is impermeable to water vapour.
sentences.chinese: 没有哪种涂料是不透水汽的。

detailed_translations.english: not allowing liquids or gases to pass through

name: sabotage
trans: n. 破坏；破坏活动；怠工

sentences.english: Every single plane had been sabotaged.
sentences.chinese: 每架飞机都遭到了破坏。

detailed_translations.english: to secretly damage or destroy equipment, vehicles etc that belong to an enemy or opponent, so that they cannot be used
deliberate damage that is done to equipment, vehicles etc in order to prevent an enemy or opponent from using them

name: narrative
trans: n. 叙述；故事；讲述

sentences.english: The novel contains more narrative than dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 这部小说里的叙述比对话多。

sentences.english: If this story must be written, we must have the courage to eliminate all adjectives that tend to excite wonder: they would achieve the opposite effect, of impoverishing the narrative.
sentences.chinese: 如果必须要写这篇故事，我们必须要有勇气剔除易于激发我们想入非非的所有形容词：这些词会使叙述贫瘠无力，起到相反的效果。

detailed_translations.english: a description of events in a story, especially in a novel

name: blonde
trans: n. 白肤金发碧眼的女人

sentences.english: He was blonder than his brother.
sentences.chinese: 他的头发比哥哥的还黄。

detailed_translations.chinese: 亚麻色的；金色的；白皙的；白肤金发碧眼的
detailed_translations.english: blonde hair is pale or yellow in colour
a woman with pale or yellow-coloured hair

name: striate
trans: adj. 有条纹的

detailed_translations.english: to mark with striae

name: pitiful
trans: adj. 可怜的，令人同情的

sentences.english: The refugees were a pitiful sight .
sentences.chinese: 难民们看上去真可怜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 值得同情的， 可怜的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is pitiful looks or sounds so sad and unfortunate that you feel very sorry for them

name: satellite
trans: n. 卫星；人造卫星；随从；卫星国家

sentences.english: the launch of a communications and weather satellite
sentences.chinese: 气象通信卫星的发射

detailed_translations.english: a machine that has been sent into space and goes around the Earth, moon etc, used for radio, television, and other electronic communication

name: specialize
trans: vi. 专门从事；详细说明；特化

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于

name: abstemious
trans: adj. 节约的，节省的；有节制的

sentences.english: Ireland looks like an abstemious jogger that has suffered a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰看似一位心脏病发作的有节制的慢跑者。

sentences.english: In this foundation, Proposed further deepening idea of energy conservation and taking measures to build an abstemious corporation.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上提出了进一步深化节能理念，建立节约型企业所采取的措施。

sentences.english: The women also mentioned the "rampant" sex that the supposedly spiritual and abstemious monks practiced with each other in the Gelugpa sect.
sentences.chinese: 这些妇女还提及在理论上应该精神化并有节制的格鲁派僧侣之间“疯狂的”性行为。

detailed_translations.english: careful not to have too much food, drink etc

name: separate
trans: n. .分开；抽印本

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

name: carriage
trans: n. 运输；运费；四轮马车；举止；客车厢

sentences.english: The president-elect followed in an open carriage drawn by six beautiful grey horses.
sentences.chinese: 新当选的总统紧随其后，坐着6匹灰色骏马开道的敞篷马车。

sentences.english: a railway carriage
sentences.chinese: 铁路客车厢

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with wheels that is pulled by a horse, used in the past

name: insurance
trans: n. 保险；保险费；保险契约；赔偿金

sentences.english: Your father took out insurance to cover the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲购买了抵押借款保险。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement with a company in which you pay them money, especially regularly, and they pay the costs if something bad happens, for example if you become ill or your car is damaged

name: conclusive
trans: adj. 决定性的；最后的；确实的；确定性的

sentences.english: Her attorneys claim there is no conclusive evidence that any murders took place.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师们声称没有任何发生过谋杀的确凿证据。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确实的； 最后的； 决定性的
detailed_translations.english: showing that something is definitely true

name: critical
trans: adj. 鉴定的；[核] 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

name: exploitative
trans: adj. 剥削的；利用的；开发资源的

sentences.english: the exploitative nature of multinational companies
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司的剥削本质

detailed_translations.chinese: 开发的， 利用的； 剥削的
detailed_translations.english: taking as much as possible from someone or something and giving very little in return

name: prevaricate
trans: vi. 搪塞；支吾其辞，闪烁其辞

sentences.english: ‘I’m not sure,’ he prevaricated.
sentences.chinese: “我不肯定。”他支支吾吾道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搪塞；支吾其辞，闪烁其辞
detailed_translations.english: to try to hide the truth by not answering questions directly

name: saturate
trans: adj. 浸透的，饱和的；深颜色的

sentences.english: Water poured through the hole, saturating the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 水从洞里流进来，浸湿了地毯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 浸透，使湿透；使饱和，使充满
detailed_translations.english: to make something very wet

detailed_translations.chinese: 浸透的，饱和的；深颜色的

name: coordinator
trans: n. 协调者；[自] 协调器；同等的人或物

sentences.english: But then, zero hour arrives. The AWACS plane becomes the coordinator of the raids.
sentences.chinese: 时钟跳过零点，AWACS飞机立刻成为了空袭的协调中心。

sentences.english: RM Inventory management: Cooperate with supply coordinator for the warehouse management.
sentences.chinese: 原料仓库管理：配合供应协调员做原料仓库管理。

sentences.english: Subsequent requests are treated similarly: the clients always contact the central coordinator node, and the coordinator node retrieves the data from the correct node.
sentences.chinese: 后续请求也被同等对待：客户端总是联系中心协调者节点，而协调者节点会从正确的节点检索数据。

detailed_translations.english: someone who organizes the way people work together in a particular activity

name: decline
trans: n. 下降；衰退；斜面

sentences.english: Offered the position of chairman, Smith declined, preferring to keep his current job.
sentences.chinese: 对担任主席的邀约，史密斯拒绝了，他宁愿留在现在的职位上。

sentences.english: Mary declined a hot drink and went to her room.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽谢绝了热饮料，到自己的房间去了。

sentences.english: The minister declined to comment (= refused to speak to people who report the news ) about the progress of the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 部长拒绝就和谈进程发表评论。

detailed_translations.english: to say no politely when someone invites you somewhere, offers you something, or wants you to do something

name: salubrious
trans: adj. 清爽的；气候有益健康的

sentences.english: The lines between salubrious and unwholesome government information are not easy to draw.
sentences.chinese: 有益和有害的政府信息之间的界线并不那么容易划分。

sentences.english: His features were pretty yet, and his eye and complexion brighter than I remembered them, though with merely temporary lustre borrowed from the salubrious air and genial sun.
sentences.chinese: 他的相貌挺好看，眼睛和气色也比我所记得的有精神些，虽然那仅仅是从有益健康的空气与和煦的阳光中借来的暂时的光辉。

name: subpoena
trans: n. 传票

sentences.english: James was subpoenaed as a witness.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯被传唤出庭作证。

detailed_translations.english: to order someone to come to a court of law and be a  witness
a written order to come to a court of law and be a  witness

name: responsibility
trans: n. 责任，职责；义务

sentences.english: Kelly’s promotion means more money and more responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 凯利获得提升，这意味着钱多了，责任也更大了。

detailed_translations.english: a duty to be in charge of someone or something, so that you make decisions and can be blamed if something bad happens

name: satisfactory
trans: adj. 满意的；符合要求的；赎罪的

sentences.english: His progress this term has been satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 他这学期的进步令人满意。

detailed_translations.english: good enough for a particular purpose

name: unlikely
trans: adj. 不太可能的；没希望的

sentences.english: Donna might be able to come tomorrow, but it’s very unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 唐娜明天也许能来，不过这可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: not likely to happen

name: jean
trans: n. 牛仔裤；[纺] 斜纹棉布

sentences.english: a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt
sentences.chinese: 一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人

detailed_translations.english: a tough twill-weave cotton fabric used for hard-wearing trousers, overalls, etc

name: translucent
trans: adj. 透明的；半透明的

sentences.english: Blue veins showed through her translucent skin.
sentences.chinese: 她半透明的皮肤下青筋显现。

detailed_translations.english: not trans-parent, but clear enough to allow light to pass through

name: archaeologist
trans: n. 考古学家

sentences.english: In fact, she was an archaeologist.
sentences.chinese: 其实她是一个考古学家。

sentences.english: But I do not believe, as a field archaeologist, that we can use the scientific method to prove or disprove [them].
sentences.chinese: 但作为一个在现场工作的考古学家，我不相信我们能用科学手段对它们进行证实或证伪”。

name: optimism
trans: n. 乐观；乐观主义

sentences.english: There are grounds for cautious optimism.
sentences.chinese: 有理由保持谨慎乐观。

detailed_translations.english: a tendency to believe that good things will always happen

name: evolve
trans: vi. 发展，进展；进化；逐步形成

sentences.english: The school has evolved its own style of teaching.
sentences.chinese: 学校逐步形成了自己的教学风格。

sentences.english: Businesses need to evolve rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 各项业务需要快速发展。

detailed_translations.english: to develop and change gradually over a long period of time

name: resume
trans: n. 摘要；[管理] 履历，简历

sentences.english: She hopes to resume work after the baby is born.
sentences.chinese: 她想生完孩子后继续工作。

sentences.english: The rebels have resumed hostilities against government troops.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱分子继续与政府军发生冲突。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新开始， 继续， 恢复
detailed_translations.english: to start doing something again after stopping or being interrupted

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要， 概要； 简历
detailed_translations.english: a short account of something such as an article or speech which gives the main points but no details

name: dull
trans: adj. 钝的；迟钝的；无趣的；呆滞的；阴暗的

sentences.english: Life is never dull when Elizabeth is here.
sentences.chinese: 有伊丽莎白在这里生活绝不会无聊。

sentences.english: a dull movie
sentences.chinese: 一部沉闷的电影

sentences.english: It sounded pretty dull to me.
sentences.chinese: 在我听来，这很无聊。

sentences.english: The weekly meeting tends to be deadly dull (= very dull ) .
sentences.chinese: 每周一次的会议总是十分无聊。

sentences.english: The bird is dull brown and gray in colour.
sentences.chinese: 这只鸟是暗淡的棕灰色。

detailed_translations.english: not interesting or exciting

name: longitude
trans: n. [地理] 经度；经线

sentences.english: The town lies at longitude 12˚ east.
sentences.chinese: 这个镇位于东经12度。

detailed_translations.english: the distance east or west of a particular  meridian (= imaginary line along the Earth’s surface from the North Pole to the South Pole )  , measured in degrees

name: accommodation
trans: n. 住处，膳宿；调节；和解；预订铺位

sentences.english: The price for the holiday includes flights and accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 度假的价格包括机票和住宿。

sentences.english: living accommodations for the crews
sentences.chinese: 船员的起居舱

sentences.english: travel and hotel accommodations
sentences.chinese: 旅行及酒店住宿

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["rented accommodation"]}
sentences.chinese: 租用的住处

sentences.english: secure accommodation for young offenders
sentences.chinese: 严密看管的少年犯囚室

sentences.english: Universities have to provide student accommodation for first-year students.
sentences.chinese: 大学必须为一年级生提供学生宿舍。

detailed_translations.english: a place for someone to stay, live, or work

name: allergy
trans: n. 过敏症；反感；厌恶

sentences.english: a food allergy
sentences.chinese: 食物过敏

detailed_translations.english: a medical condition in which you become ill or in which your skin becomes red and painful because you have eaten or touched a particular substance

name: landmark
trans: n. [航]陆标；地标；界标；里程碑；纪念碑；地界标；划时代的事

name: integrative
trans: adj. 综合的

name: entity
trans: n. 实体；存在；本质

sentences.english: The mind exists as a separate entity.
sentences.chinese: 思想作为一个独立的实体存在。

sentences.english: Good design brings a house and garden together as a single entity.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的设计能把一所房子和花园合为一体。

detailed_translations.english: something that exists as a single and complete unit

name: contraction
trans: n. 收缩，紧缩；缩写式；害病

sentences.english: the contraction of metal as it cools
sentences.chinese: 金属冷却时的收缩

detailed_translations.english: a very strong and painful movement of a muscle, especially the muscles around the  womb  during birth

name: boorish
trans: adj. 粗野的；粗鲁的；粗鄙的；笨拙的；乡土气的

sentences.english: ...their boorish rejection of the aging film star.
sentences.chinese: …他们对这老影星粗鲁的拒绝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粗野的；粗鲁的；粗鄙的；笨拙的；乡土气的
detailed_translations.english: Boorish behaviour is rough, uneducated, and rude

name: intentionally
trans: adv. 故意地，有意地

sentences.english: Or you can choose to accelerate your growth and intentionally devour life and all it offers .
sentences.chinese: 或者你可以选择加速你的成长，有意地吞噬生活及生活所赐予你的一切。

sentences.english: But in the past, we almost never intentionally or successfully utilized such wealth of information in creating, and reusing our knowledge and developed capability.
sentences.chinese: 但是在过去，我们几乎从未有意或成功地利用这些丰富的信息创建、重用我们的知识和拓展我们的能力。

sentences.english: Before it was fired, it was perfectly round, but the artist intentionally roughed up the edges.
sentences.chinese: 在它被烧制出来前，它相当的圆润。 但艺术家有意地把它的边缘弄粗糙。

name: pristine
trans: adj. 原始的，古时的；纯朴的

sentences.english: a pristine white shirt
sentences.chinese: 非常干净的白衬衫

name: flout
trans: n. 嘲笑；轻视；愚弄

sentences.english: ...illegal campers who persist in flouting the law.
sentences.chinese: …一向无视法律的非法露营者。

detailed_translations.english: If you flout something such as a law, an order, or an accepted way of behaving, you deliberately do not obey it or follow it

name: advertisement
trans: n. 广告，宣传

sentences.english: They put an advertisement in ‘The Morning News’, offering a high salary for the right person.
sentences.chinese: 他们在《晨报》上刊登了一则启事，出高薪寻找合适的人选。

sentences.english: The organizers of the concert had taken out a full page advertisement in ‘The New York Times’.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会筹办者在《纽约时报》上刊登了整版广告。

sentences.english: Only a handful of people answered the advertisement .
sentences.chinese: 只有寥寥数人对该广告作出了回应。

detailed_translations.english: a picture, set of words, or a short film, which is intended to persuade people to buy a product or use a service, or that gives information about a job that is available, an event that is going to happen etc

name: intimate
trans: n. 知己；至交

sentences.english: an intimate friend of Picasso’s
sentences.chinese: 毕加索的一个密友

sentences.english: an intimate relationship
sentences.chinese: 亲密的关系

sentences.english: She’s on intimate terms with people in government.
sentences.chinese: 她与政府官员关系密切。

detailed_translations.english: having an extremely close friendship
a close personal friend
to make people understand what you mean without saying it directly

name: dine
trans: vi. 进餐，用餐

sentences.english: He was dining with friends at the Ritz.
sentences.chinese: 他和朋友在里茨饭店一起进餐。

detailed_translations.english: to eat dinner

detailed_translations.chinese: (Dine)人名；(意、葡)迪内；(英)戴恩；(法)迪纳

name: quadrangle
trans: n. 四边形；方院

sentences.english: Such quadrangle-shaped logos may fit all kinds of projects: from hotel logos to social initiatives and to real estate agencies.
sentences.chinese: 这样的四边形logo可适用于各类项目：从旅馆logo到社会创意，再到房地产商。
