sentences.english: Naturally our whole being was depressed as we stepped through its doorway into the narrow quadrangle--and playing truant became chronic with us.
sentences.chinese: 很自然，当我们踏进校门进入那狭小的四方院子时，我们整个人都变得萎靡不振---逃学就成为我们的家常便饭。

sentences.english: Properly combined with other graphic elements, background, and color palette, quadrangle logos may become efficient identifications for businessand impressive addition to a logo designer’s portfolio.
sentences.chinese: 适当结合其他图形元素、背景和配色，四边形logo或可成为高效的商业标识，亦可为logo设计师的作品集里添上印象深刻的一笔。

detailed_translations.english: a square open area with buildings all around it, especially at a school or college

name: globalization
trans: n. 全球化

sentences.english: the increasing globalization of world trade
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易的日益全球化

detailed_translations.english: the process of making something such as a business operate in a lot of different countries all around the world, or the result of this

name: revive
trans: vt. 使复兴；使苏醒；回想起；重演，重播

sentences.english: Local people have decided to revive this centuries-old tradition.
sentences.chinese: 当地人决定复兴这一延续了数个世纪的传统。

sentences.english: an attempt to revive the steel industry
sentences.chinese: 复苏钢铁工业的努力

sentences.english: The doctors revived her with injections of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 医生给她注射葡萄糖，使她苏醒过来。

detailed_translations.english: to bring something back after it has not been used or has not existed for a period of time

name: considerably
trans: adv. 相当地；非常地

sentences.english: It’s considerably colder today.
sentences.chinese: 今天冷多了。

sentences.english: Conditions have improved considerably over the past few years.
sentences.chinese: 过去几年里条件已经得到了很大的改善。

detailed_translations.english: much or a lot

name: waver
trans: n. 动摇；踌躇；挥动者

sentences.english: Her voice wavered uncertainly.
sentences.chinese: 她吞吞吐吐的。

sentences.english: The students’ attention did not waver.
sentences.chinese: 学生的兴趣没有减弱。

detailed_translations.english: to become weaker or less certain

name: relax
trans: vi. 放松，休息；松懈，松弛；变从容；休养

sentences.english: Gentle exercise can relax stiff shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

detailed_translations.english: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

name: workable
trans: adj. 切实可行的；可经营的；能工作的

sentences.english: a workable solution to the problem
sentences.chinese: 解决这一问题的可行方法

sentences.english: a workable timetable
sentences.chinese: 可行的时间表

detailed_translations.chinese: 可经营的, 可使用的
detailed_translations.english: a workable system, plan etc will be practical and effective

name: focus
trans: n. 焦点；中心；清晰；焦距

sentences.english: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

name: creativity
trans: n. 创造力；创造性

sentences.english: artistic creativity
sentences.chinese: 艺术创造力

sentences.english: Teachers have been attacked for stifling creativity in their pupils.
sentences.chinese: 教师被批评压抑了学生的创造力。

sentences.english: Editors complain about the lack of creativity in the ideas put to them.
sentences.chinese: 编辑们抱怨说交给他们的选题缺乏创意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to use your imagination to produce new ideas, make things etc

name: replenish
trans: vt. 补充，再装满；把…装满；给…添加燃料

sentences.english: More vaccines are needed to replenish our stocks.
sentences.chinese: 还需要更多的疫苗来补充我们的储备。

detailed_translations.chinese: 补充，再装满；把…装满；给…添加燃料
detailed_translations.english: to put new supplies into something, or to fill something again

name: legislation
trans: n. 立法；法律

sentences.english: This is a very important piece of legislation (= law ).
sentences.chinese: 这是一条非常重要的法规。

detailed_translations.english: a law or set of laws

name: valuable
trans: n. 贵重物品

name: finalize
trans: vt. 完成；使结束

sentences.english: But if you lose your audience with technical explanations, you'll never get to what you want: a resolution so you can finalize your design.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果您用技术性的解释使受众迷惑，则您永远得不到希望达到的目的：完成设计的解决办法。

name: overgrow
trans: vt. 长满于；长得超过

sentences.english: The big banyan overgrow of my day of day of a block limb, hang below brawny and strong limb full each golden orange.
sentences.chinese: 一棵遮天蔽日的大榕树长满了枝干，粗壮有力的枝干下面挂满了一个个金灿灿的橘子。

sentences.english: These products have a chance to potentially overgrow their "M" and "P" roots, because they can be used to build a backbone of the enterprise-wide SOA.
sentences.chinese: 这些产品有机会增长它们的“M”与“P”根，因为它们可以用于构建企业范围 SOA 的框架。

sentences.english: Go on the ridge of field of overgrow fireweed , one pace is flabby accurate meeting falls.
sentences.chinese: 走在长满杂草的田埂上，一步不稳准会跌倒。

detailed_translations.english: to grow over or across (an area, path, lawn, etc)

name: receipt
trans: n. 收到；收据；收入

sentences.english: Keep your receipt in case you want to bring it back.
sentences.chinese: 保留收据以备退货之需。

sentences.english: Can you give me a receipt?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我一个收条吗？

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that you are given which shows that you have paid for something

name: distinction
trans: n. 区别；差别；特性；荣誉、勋章

sentences.english: There are obvious distinctions between the two wine-making areas.
sentences.chinese: 这两个酿酒区之间有明显的不同。

detailed_translations.english: a clear difference or separation between two similar things

name: centric
trans: adj. 中央的，中心的

sentences.english: That culture was characterized by fear, intimidation, favoritism, a very ego-centric CEO.
sentences.chinese: 之前那种文化的特征是：敬畏、威胁、徇私，还有一位以自我为中心的首席执行官。

sentences.english: In 2013, the company began to expand the software R & D team, for various industries, to expand the RFID technology centric industry solutions.
sentences.chinese: 2013年，公司开始扩大软件研发团队，面向各个行业，扩展以RFID技术为中心的行业解决方案。

sentences.english: An automatic tracing centric wavelength demodulation system based on the edge filter which can measure the wavelength of the narrow-band back-reflected spectrum FBG is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于边缘滤波器，可带中心波长自动跟踪，主要应用于海底水声信号的检测的光纤光栅波长解调器。

detailed_translations.english: being central or having a centre

name: bear
trans: n. 熊

sentences.english: a mother bear and her cubs
sentences.chinese: 母熊和它的熊崽们

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal with thick fur, that eats flesh, fruit, and insects

name: swagger
trans: n. 大摇大摆；吹牛；威吓；下摆散开状的女式短大衣

sentences.english: He swaggered over towards me.
sentences.chinese: 他趾高气扬地向我走来。

sentences.english: He walked with something of a swagger.
sentences.chinese: 他有点大摇大摆地走着。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吓唬；趾高气扬地行走或行事
detailed_translations.english: to walk proudly, swinging your shoulders in a way that shows you are very confident – used to show disapproval

detailed_translations.chinese: 大摇大摆；吹牛；威吓；下摆散开状的女式短大衣
detailed_translations.english: Swagger is also a noun

name: existence
trans: n. 存在，实在；生存，生活；存在物，实在物

sentences.english: Scientists have many theories about how the universe first came into existence (= started to exist ).
sentences.chinese: 关于宇宙的起源，科学家有多种理论。

sentences.english: Pablo led a miserable existence when he first moved to San Juan.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗刚搬到圣胡安时，生活很悲惨。

detailed_translations.english: the state of existing

name: victim
trans: n. 受害人；牺牲品；牺牲者

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

name: ephemeral
trans: adj. 短暂的；朝生暮死的

sentences.english: Fashion is by nature ephemeral.
sentences.chinese: 从本质上说，时尚不过是一时的潮流。

detailed_translations.english: existing or popular for only a short time

name: guidance
trans: n. 指导，引导；领导

sentences.english: I went to a counselor for guidance on my career.
sentences.chinese: 我去找了一位顾问给我作职业指导。

detailed_translations.english: help and advice that is given to someone about their work, education, or personal life

name: amalgamate
trans: vt. 合并；使（金属）汞齐化；混合

sentences.english: The firm has amalgamated with another company.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司已经与另一家公司合并了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 合并；汞齐化；调制汞合金
detailed_translations.english: if two organizations amalgamate, or if one amalgamates with another, they join and make one big organization

name: discursive
trans: adj. 散漫的；离题的；东拉西扯的；无层次的

sentences.english: a long, discursive article
sentences.chinese: 一篇冗长且不着边际的文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 散漫的， 不得要领的
detailed_translations.english: discussing many different ideas, facts etc, without always having a clear purpose

name: copyright
trans: n. 版权，著作权

sentences.english: Who owns the copyright of this book?
sentences.chinese: 谁拥有这本书的版权？

sentences.english: The database will be protected by copyright .
sentences.chinese: 这个数据库将受到版权保护。

detailed_translations.english: the legal right to be the only producer or seller of a book, play, film, or record for a specific length of time

name: versatility
trans: n. 多功能性；多才多艺；用途广泛

sentences.english: "It has very good range and is extremely popular with airlines because of its versatility, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “它有很好的服务范围并因其多功能性而受到航空公司的青睐，”他说。

name: horrify
trans: vt. 使恐惧；惊骇；使极度厌恶

sentences.english: His family was horrified by the change.
sentences.chinese: 他的家人对这一变化感到震惊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使恐惧；惊骇；使极度厌恶
detailed_translations.english: If someone is horrified, they feel shocked or disgusted, usually because of something that they have seen or heard

name: portrait
trans: n. 肖像；描写；半身雕塑像

sentences.english: a family portrait
sentences.chinese: 全家福

sentences.english: She’s been commissioned to paint Jackson’s portrait .
sentences.chinese: 她已受托为杰克逊画肖像。

detailed_translations.english: a painting, drawing, or photograph of a person

name: stability
trans: n. 稳定性；坚定，恒心

sentences.english: a period of relative stability
sentences.chinese: 相对稳定的一段时期

detailed_translations.english: the condition of being steady and not changing

name: access
trans: n. 进入；使用权；通路

sentences.english: Access is by means of a small door on the right.
sentences.chinese: 入口是右边的一扇小门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接近；通道，入口；接近的机会
detailed_translations.english: the way you use to enter a building or reach a place
to find information, especially on a computer

name: contrast
trans: n. 对比；差别；对照物

sentences.english: an essay comparing and contrasting (= showing how two things are similar and different ) Verdi and Wagner and their operas
sentences.chinese: 把威尔第和瓦格纳以及他们的歌剧进行比较和对照的一篇文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成对比， 对比之下显出区别
detailed_translations.english: if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising
something that is very different from something else
if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising

name: student union
trans: na. 〈美〉(大学生)学生活动大楼

name: malleable
trans: adj. 可锻的；可塑的；有延展性的；易适应的

sentences.english: malleable steel
sentences.chinese: 展性钢

detailed_translations.chinese: 可锻的；可塑的；有延展性的；易适应的
detailed_translations.english: something that is malleable is easy to press or pull into a new shape

name: consist
trans: vi. 由…组成；在于；符合

sentences.english: My diet consisted almost exclusively of chocolate-covered cookies and glasses of milk.
sentences.chinese: 我的饮食几乎只包含裹上巧克力的曲奇饼和一杯杯牛奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

name: pattern
trans: n. 模式；图案；样品

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

name: stigma
trans: n. [植] 柱头；耻辱；污名；烙印；特征

sentences.english: There is a social stigma attached to single parenthood.
sentences.chinese: 单身父母在社会上的名声不光彩。

sentences.english: In the US, smoking carries a stigma .
sentences.chinese: 在美国，吸烟是不光彩的。

detailed_translations.chinese: [植] 柱头；耻辱；污名；烙印；特征
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling in society that being in a particular situation or having a particular illness is something to be ashamed of

name: render
trans: n. 打底；交纳；粉刷

sentences.english: an obligation to render assistance to those in need
sentences.chinese: 为有困难的人提供援助的义务

sentences.english: a bill of $3,200 for services rendered
sentences.chinese: 一张3,200美元服务费的账单

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or do something, because it is your duty or because someone expects you to

name: educate
trans: vt. 教育；培养；训练

sentences.english: The Ormerod School educates handicapped children.
sentences.chinese: 奥默罗德学校的教育对象为残疾儿童。

sentences.english: a campaign to educate teenagers about HIV
sentences.chinese: 教育青少年了解艾滋病病毒的运动

detailed_translations.english: to teach a child at a school, college, or university

name: intersection
trans: n. 交叉；十字路口；交集；交叉点

sentences.english: We crossed at a busy intersection.
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过了一个繁忙的道路交叉口。

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉；十字路口；交集；交叉点
detailed_translations.english: a place where roads, lines etc cross each other, especially where two roads meet

name: weird
trans: n. （苏格兰）命运；预言

sentences.english: A really weird thing happened last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生了一件非常奇怪的事。

sentences.english: He’s a weird bloke.
sentences.chinese: 他是个古怪的家伙。

sentences.english: They sell all sorts of weird and wonderful (= very strange ) products.
sentences.chinese: 他们出售各种稀奇古怪的产品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 古怪的， 离奇的； 怪诞的， 神秘而可怕的
detailed_translations.english: very strange and unusual, and difficult to understand or explain

name: applicant

sentences.english: Before proceeding further, we must define our terms.

detailed_translations.english: to continue to do something that has already been planned or started

name: except
trans: conj. 除了；要不是

sentences.english: They were all there except me.
sentences.chinese: 除了我以外他们都在那里。

sentences.english: We all went except him.
sentences.chinese: 除他以外， 我们都去了。

sentences.english: They all howled with laughter except me.
sentences.chinese: 除了我以外，他们全都哈哈大笑起来。

name: surgeon
trans: n. 外科医生

sentences.english: ...a heart surgeon.
sentences.chinese: …一位心脏外科医生。

detailed_translations.english: a doctor who does operations in a hospital

name: recommendation
trans: n. 推荐；建议；推荐信

sentences.english: Academic staff are appointed on the recommendation of a committee.
sentences.chinese: 教员是委员会推荐任命的。

sentences.english: We will review the case and make a recommendation to the client.
sentences.chinese: 我们将审查此案，然后向当事人提出建议。

detailed_translations.english: a suggestion to someone that they should choose a particular thing or person that you think is very good

name: drill
trans: n. 训练；钻孔机；钻子；播种机

sentences.english: an electric drill
sentences.chinese: 电钻

sentences.english: rifle drill
sentences.chinese: 步枪操练

sentences.english: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

detailed_translations.english: a tool or machine used for making holes in something
to make a hole in something using a drill

name: Goal
trans: Not Found

name: capacity
trans: n. 能力；容量；资格，地位；生产力

sentences.english: The room had seating capacity for about 80.
sentences.chinese: 这房间能坐80个人左右。

sentences.english: The orchestra played to a capacity crowd (= the largest number of people who can fit into a hall, theatre etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 管弦乐队为满场的观众演奏。

sentences.english: All the hotels were filled to capacity.
sentences.chinese: 所有的宾馆都住满了。

sentences.english: a child’s capacity for learning
sentences.chinese: 孩子的学习能力

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space a container, room etc has to hold things or people

name: primarily
trans: adv. 首先；主要地，根本上

sentences.english: The advertisement is aimed primarily at children.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告的对象主要是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: mainly

name: global
trans: adj. 全球的；总体的；球形的

sentences.english: global climate change
sentences.chinese: 全球气候变化

sentences.english: the global economy
sentences.chinese: 全球经济

detailed_translations.english: affecting or including the whole world

name: expenditure
trans: n. 支出，花费；经费，消费额

sentences.english: huge cuts in public expenditure
sentences.chinese: 大幅度削减公共开支

sentences.english: government expenditure on education
sentences.chinese: 政府的教育开支

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["spending by a company on buildings, machinery, equipment etc"],"COLLOINEXA":["capital expenditure"]}
sentences.chinese: 〔公司的〕资本开支

detailed_translations.chinese: 经费， 支出额； 花费， 支出， 消耗
detailed_translations.english: the total amount of money that a government, organization, or person spends during a particular period of time

name: nitrogen
trans: n. [化学] 氮

sentences.english: Well, we know nitrogen has what?
sentences.chinese: 对于氮气我们知道什么？

sentences.english: The plant requires nitrogen in order to make proteins.
sentences.chinese: 植物需要氮以便制造蛋白质。

sentences.english: All of these from the group one and two through the group five and six elements, but what about elements, what about molecules like hydrogen, or nitrogen, or maybe oxygen?
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些都是来自于第一主族和第二组主族,到第五主族和第六组主族的悬殊，那么元素呢，比如氢气，氮气或氧气那样的分子呢？

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, and that forms most of the Earth’s air. It is a chemical element: symbol N

name: evaluation
trans: n. 评价；[审计] 评估；估价；求值

sentences.english: We need to carry out a proper evaluation of the new system.
sentences.chinese: 我们要对新系统进行合理的评估。

sentences.english: They took some samples of products for evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 他们抽取了一些产品样本以作评估。

detailed_translations.english: a judgment about how good, useful, or successful something is

name: dedicate
trans: vt. 致力；献身；题献

sentences.english: The actress now dedicates herself to children’s charity work.
sentences.chinese: 这名女演员现在致力于儿童慈善工作。

detailed_translations.english: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing

name: ascertain
trans: vt. 确定；查明；探知

sentences.english: A postmortem was ordered to try to ascertain the cause of death.
sentences.chinese: 下令验尸以查明死因。

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄清， 查明； 确定
detailed_translations.english: to find out something

name: grandiose
trans: adj. 宏伟的；堂皇的；浮夸的；宏大的

sentences.english: The lack of such leaders may also be the hallmark of a largely post-ideological era in which far less need is felt for unifying doctrines or the grandiose figures who provide them.
sentences.chinese: 这种领袖人物的缺乏可能也是一个大后意识形态时代的重要象征，在这个时代，人们更少需要一个统一的教义或是一个提供给大众的浮夸形象。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宏伟的；堂皇的；浮夸的；宏大的
detailed_translations.english: grandiose plans sound very important or impressive, but are not practical

name: productivity
trans: n. 生产力；生产率；生产能力

sentences.english: high productivity levels in manufacturing
sentences.chinese: 制造业中的高生产率

sentences.english: It cost the country $4 million in lost productivity .
sentences.chinese: 它对该国造成了400万美元的生产力损失。

detailed_translations.english: the rate at which goods are produced, and the amount produced, especially in relation to the work, time, and money needed to produce them

name: embassy
trans: n. 大使馆；大使馆全体人员

sentences.english: the American Embassy in Paris
sentences.chinese: 美国驻巴黎大使馆

detailed_translations.chinese: 大使馆； 大使馆全体成员
detailed_translations.english: a group of officials who represent their government in a foreign country, or the building they work in

name: consequence
trans: n. 结果；重要性；推论

sentences.english: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions

name: consumption
trans: n. 消费；消耗；肺痨

sentences.english: Vigorous exercise increases oxygen consumption.
sentences.chinese: 剧烈运动增加氧的消耗。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of energy, oil, electricity etc that is used

name: volume
trans: n. 量；体积；卷；音量；大量；册

sentences.english: Can you turn the volume up?
sentences.chinese: 请你把音量调大好吗？

sentences.english: The volume of the container measures 10,000 cubic metres.
sentences.chinese: 这个容器的容量是1万立方米。

sentences.english: The period from 1940 – 1945 is in volume 9.
sentences.chinese: 1940年至1945年这段时间在第9卷。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of sound produced by a television, radio etc

name: unavailable
trans: adj. 难以获得的；不能利用的；不近便的

sentences.english: Funding for the new school is unavailable.
sentences.chinese: 这座新学校没有经费。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难以获得的；不能利用的；不近便的
detailed_translations.english: not able to be obtained

name: subsequently
trans: adv. 随后，其后；后来

sentences.english: The book was subsequently translated into 15 languages.
sentences.chinese: 该书后来被译成 15 种语言。

sentences.english: Subsequently, the company filed for bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 随后，该公司申请了破产。

detailed_translations.english: after an event in the past

name: sales
trans: n. 销售（sale的复数）；销售额

name: visa
trans: n. 签证

sentences.english: I was still in New York, trying to get a visa to visit Russia.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在纽约，正在办理去俄罗斯的签证。

detailed_translations.english: an official mark put on your passport that gives you permission to temporarily enter or leave a foreign country

name: typical
trans: adj. 典型的；特有的；象征性的

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

name: canteen
trans: n. 食堂，小卖部；水壶

sentences.english: Rennie had eaten his supper in the canteen.
sentences.chinese: 伦尼已在食堂吃过晚饭。

detailed_translations.english: a place in a factory, school etc where meals are provided, usually quite cheaply

name: chimpanzee
trans: n. [脊椎] 黑猩猩

sentences.english: So when you go from head to toe, you're seeing a mosaic creature that is neither chimpanzee, nor is it human.
sentences.chinese: 所以从头到脚，让人看到的是一个在黑猩猩和人类之间模棱两可的生物，这就是始祖地人猿。

sentences.english: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.english: It was, if I can give a chimpanzee language, I can empty the contents of his mind. He can tell me what he's thinking, how he sees the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的想法是，如果我能交给黑猩猩一种语言的话，我就可以掏空他的想法，他可以告诉我他在想什么，他是怎样看这个世界的。

detailed_translations.english: an intelligent African animal that is like a large monkey without a tail

name: headway
trans: n. 前进；进步；航行速度；间隔时间

sentences.english: Stormy weather stopped the ship from making headway.
sentences.chinese: 船在暴风雨天气里不能向前开。

detailed_translations.chinese: 前进；进步；航行速度；间隔时间
detailed_translations.english: to move forwards – used especially when this is slow or difficult

name: dissonance
trans: n. 不一致；不调和；不和谐音

detailed_translations.chinese: 不一致；不调和；不和谐音
detailed_translations.english: a combination of notes that sound strange because they are not in  harmony

name: exercise
trans: n. 运动；练习；运用；操练；礼拜；典礼

sentences.english: Try to fit some regular exercise into your daily routine.
sentences.chinese: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

sentences.english: Working in an office, I don’t get much exercise.
sentences.chinese: 由于在办公室工作，我很少运动。

sentences.english: role-play exercises
sentences.chinese: 角色扮演练习

sentences.english: Horses need to be exercised regularly.
sentences.chinese: 马需要有规律的训练。

detailed_translations.english: physical activities that you do in order to stay healthy and become stronger
to do sports or other physical activities in order to stay healthy or become stronger; to make an animal do this

name: formation
trans: n. 形成；构造；编队

sentences.english: We now know a lot more about the early stages of planetary formation.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在对行星形成过程的早期阶段有了更多的了解。

sentences.english: the formation of a new government
sentences.chinese: 新政府的组成

sentences.english: the canyon’s impressive rock formations
sentences.chinese: 峡谷中壮观的岩层

detailed_translations.english: the process by which something develops into a particular thing or shape

name: hint
trans: n. 暗示；线索

sentences.english: There have been hints that he may take up coaching.
sentences.chinese: 他暗示过可能会出任教练。

sentences.english: ‘Look, I can’t tell you.’ ‘Oh, come on, give me a hint .’
sentences.chinese: “听着，我不能告诉你。”“得了，给我一点暗示吧。”

sentences.english: I made it clear I wasn’t interested in him, but he didn’t take the hint .
sentences.chinese: 我清楚地表明我对他不感兴趣，但他不明白我的意思。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to suggest something to someone, without telling them directly
to suggest something in an indirect way, but so that someone can guess your meaning

name: hemisphere
trans: n. 半球

sentences.english: the Northern hemisphere
sentences.chinese: 北半球

detailed_translations.english: a half of the Earth, especially one of the halves above and below the equator

name: ornamentation
trans: n. 装饰物

sentences.english: a bronze plate with gold ornamentation
sentences.chinese: 带有金饰的青铜盘子

detailed_translations.english: decoration on an object that makes it look attractive

name: strengthen
trans: vt. 加强；巩固

sentences.english: Our friendship has steadily strengthened over the years.
sentences.chinese: 我们的友谊逐年加深。

sentences.english: Steve’s opposition only strengthened her resolve to go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫的反对反而坚定了她继续下去的决心。

sentences.english: The company plans to strengthen its hand (= make itself more powerful ) in Europe by opening an office in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 该公司计划在西班牙设立办事处，以此增强在欧洲的实力。

detailed_translations.english: to become stronger or make something stronger

name: reject
trans: n. 被弃之物或人；次品

sentences.english: Sarah rejected her brother’s offer of help.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉拒绝了她弟弟的帮助。

sentences.english: Dexter flatly rejected (= completely rejected ) calls for his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 德克斯特断然拒绝让他辞职的要求。

sentences.english: His proposal was rejected outright (= completely rejected ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的建议被彻底否决了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拒绝； 拒纳， 退回， 摈弃
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept, believe in, or agree with something

detailed_translations.chinese: 被拒货品， 不合格产品
detailed_translations.english: a product that has been rejected because there is something wrong with it

name: vacuum
trans: n. 真空；空间；真空吸尘器

sentences.english: I vacuumed the carpets today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天用吸尘器清洁地毯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集； 用真空吸尘器打扫
detailed_translations.english: to clean using a vacuum cleaner
a space that is completely empty of all gas, especially one from which all the air has been taken away

name: bilateral
trans: adj. 双边的；有两边的

sentences.english: ...bilateral talks between Britain and America.
sentences.chinese: …英美之间的双边会谈。

detailed_translations.english: involving two groups or nations

name: premium
trans: n. 额外费用；奖金；保险费;(商)溢价

sentences.english: premium ice cream
sentences.chinese: 优质冰激凌

sentences.english: the current consumer trend for premium products
sentences.chinese: 当前消费者喜欢购买优质产品的趋向

sentences.english: premium quality British potatoes
sentences.chinese: 优质英国马铃薯

detailed_translations.chinese: 高级的，优质的；售价高的
detailed_translations.english: of very high quality

detailed_translations.chinese: 保险金；额外费用，加付款；奖品，赠品；额外津贴
detailed_translations.english: the cost of insurance, especially the amount that you pay each year

name: diverge
trans: vt. 使偏离；使分叉

sentences.english: The two species diverged millions of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这两个物种从数百万年前开始朝不同方向演变。

sentences.english: Global growth rates are diverging markedly.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的增长率在发生明显的分化。

detailed_translations.english: if similar things diverge, they develop in different ways and so are no longer similar

name: represent
trans: vt. 代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

name: exit
trans: n. 出口，通道；退场

sentences.english: We made for the nearest exit.
sentences.chinese: 我们走向最近的出口。

sentences.english: an exit door
sentences.chinese: 出口门

sentences.english: Two men were blocking her exit.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人挡住了她出去的路。

detailed_translations.english: a door or space through which you can leave a public room, building etc
to leave a place

name: thief
trans: n. 小偷，贼

sentences.english: Thieves broke into the offices and stole $150,000’s worth of computer equipment.
sentences.chinese: 小偷破门进入办公室，偷走了价值15万美元的电脑设备。

sentences.english: They were nothing but petty thieves (= thieves who steal small things ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们只不过是小毛贼。

detailed_translations.english: someone who steals things from another person or place

name: incidence
trans: n. 发生率；影响；[光] 入射；影响范围

sentences.english: an area with a high incidence of crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率高的地区

sentences.english: the angle of incidence
sentences.chinese: 入射角

detailed_translations.english: the extent to which sth happens or has an effect

name: prior
trans: adj. 优先的；在先的，在前的

sentences.english: You do not need any prior knowledge of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 你无需事先具备该方面的知识。

sentences.english: Changes may not be made without the prior approval of the council.
sentences.chinese: 未经委员会事先同意，不得作出改变。

sentences.english: Vegetarian meals are provided by prior agreement.
sentences.chinese: 经事先协商可提供素食。

sentences.english: Some prior experience with the software is needed.
sentences.chinese: 要求事先熟悉这个软件。

detailed_translations.english: existing or arranged before something else or before the present situation

name: wear midair
trans: Not Found

name: up-to-date
trans: adj. 最新的，最近的；现代的，新式的

sentences.english: ...the most up-to-date information available on foods today.
sentences.chinese: …今日有关食品的最新消息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直到最近的， 现代的； 跟上时代的
detailed_translations.english: modern or fashionable

name: implode
trans: vt. 使内爆

sentences.english: The windows on both sides of the room had imploded.
sentences.chinese: 房间两边的窗户都向内爆碎了。

detailed_translations.english: to explode inwards

name: heat
trans: n. 高温；压力；热度；热烈

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

name: waft
trans: n. 飘荡；吹拂

name: surpass
trans: vt. 超越；胜过，优于；非…所能办到或理解

sentences.english: He had surpassed all our expectations .
sentences.chinese: 他超越了我们所有的预期。

sentences.english: The number of multiple births has surpassed 100,000 for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 多胎产首次突破了 10 万例。

detailed_translations.english: to be even better or greater than someone or something else

name: weapon
trans: n. 武器，兵器

sentences.english: They all had sticks which they planned to use as weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们都持有棍棒，打算当武器用。

detailed_translations.english: something that you use to fight with or attack someone with, such as a knife, bomb, or gun

name: native
trans: adj. 本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的

sentences.english: Singapore has many native species of palm.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡有很多土生的棕榈树种。

sentences.english: You can always tell the difference between the tourists and the natives.
sentences.chinese: 游客与当地人之间的区别一望即知。

detailed_translations.english: growing, living, produced etc in one particular place
someone who lives in a place all the time or has lived there a long time

name: excite
trans: vt. 激起；刺激…，使…兴奋

sentences.english: His playing is technically brilliant, but it doesn’t excite me.
sentences.chinese: 他的演奏技巧娴熟，但并不让我激动。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel happy, interested, or eager

name: database
trans: n. 数据库，资料库

sentences.english: customer details held on a database
sentences.chinese: 存储在数据库内的客户详细信息

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of data stored in a computer system so that you can find and use it easily

name: repugnant
trans: adj. 讨厌的；矛盾的；敌对的

sentences.english: Everything about the affair was repugnant to her.
sentences.chinese: 有关那件事的一切令她反感。

name: correct
trans: adj. 正确的；恰当的；端正的

sentences.english: If my calculations are correct, we’re about ten miles from Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 如果我计算得没错的话，我们离埃克塞特大约十英里。

sentences.english: Score one point for each correct answer .
sentences.chinese: 答对一题得一分。

sentences.english: You are absolutely correct, the Missouri is the longest river in the US.
sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，密苏里河是美国最长的河流。

sentences.english: Some eyesight problems are relatively easy to correct.
sentences.chinese: 有些视力问题比较容易矫正。

detailed_translations.english: having no mistakes
to make something right or to make it work the way it should

name: counsel
trans: n. 法律顾问；忠告；商议；讨论；决策

sentences.english: He assisted me with good counsel and encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 他以良好的忠告和鼓励帮助我。

sentences.english: Those who counsel US privately, point out that we are wrong, are true friends.
sentences.chinese: 那些私下忠告我们，指出我们错误的人，才是真正的朋友。

sentences.english: Their free guidance and counsel will be the most priceless gift you can receive.
sentences.chinese: 他们的免费指导和忠告，将是你能够收到的最无价的礼物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 劝告， 忠告；法律顾问； 辩护人
detailed_translations.english: a type of lawyer who represents you in court

name: counsellor
trans: n. 顾问；参赞；辅导员（等于counselor）；律师；法律顾问

sentences.english: Are you seeing a counsellor?
sentences.chinese: 你是不是在看心理辅导员？

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to help and support people with problems

name: literacy
trans: n. 读写能力；精通文学

sentences.english: a new adult literacy campaign
sentences.chinese: 新一轮成人识字[扫盲]运动

detailed_translations.chinese: 识字， 有文化， 读写能力
detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to read and write

name: Budget
trans: Not Found

name: maximum
trans: n. [数] 极大，最大限度；最大量

sentences.english: The car has a maximum speed of 120 mph.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车的最高时速为120英里。

sentences.english: They made maximum use of the resources available.
sentences.chinese: 他们充分利用可获取的资源。

sentences.english: To get the maximum benefit, do the exercises slowly.
sentences.chinese: 要想获得最佳的效果，这些运动要做得慢一点。

sentences.english: Display the hologram under a strong light for maximum effect.
sentences.chinese: 把立体全息图放在强光下展示以得到最佳效果。

sentences.english: The plant is operating at maximum capacity .
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂正在开足马力生产。

sentences.english: The award will consist of a lump sum to a maximum value of $5,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖学金最高将是5,000美元，一次性给付。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最大的； 最高的； 顶点的
detailed_translations.english: the maximum amount, quantity, speed etc is the largest that is possible or allowed
the largest number or amount that is possible or is allowed

name: sharp
trans: n. 尖头；骗子；内行

sentences.english: Make sure you use a good sharp knife.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要用锋利的好刀。

sentences.english: Its teeth are razor sharp (= very sharp ) .
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿非常锋利。

sentences.english: Do not cross the bridge but turn sharp left to go down on to the towpath.
sentences.chinese: 不要过桥，而是向左急转下到纤道上去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的
detailed_translations.english: having a very thin edge or point that can cut things easily
Sharp is also an adverb

name: gouge
trans: n. 沟；圆凿；以圆凿刨

sentences.english: He heard the heavy rounds gouge the ancient concrete, followed by the panicked cries of Grunts in the distance as they dove for cover—and into the semi-gelatinous, ankle-deep liquid.
sentences.chinese: 子弹凿击古老混凝土的声音清晰可辨，接着远处传来了野猪兽卧倒在深及脚踝的半凝胶状液体中隐蔽时恐慌的呼喊声。

name: contradiction
trans: n. 矛盾；否认；反驳

sentences.english: apparent contradictions in the defendant’s testimony
sentences.chinese: 被告证词中的明显矛盾

detailed_translations.chinese: 矛盾， 不一致； 否认， 反驳
detailed_translations.english: a difference between two statements, beliefs, or ideas about something that means they cannot both be true

name: ecology
trans: n. 生态学；社会生态学

sentences.english: the natural ecology of the Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球的自然生态

sentences.english: plant ecology
sentences.chinese: 植物生态学

detailed_translations.english: the way in which plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment, or the scientific study of this

name: device
trans: n. 装置；策略；图案

sentences.english: modern labour-saving devices
sentences.chinese: 省力的现代设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 器械， 装置； 设计； 手段， 策略
detailed_translations.english: a machine or tool that does a special job

name: religious
trans: n. 修道士；尼姑

sentences.english: I don’t share her religious beliefs .
sentences.chinese: 她的宗教信仰和我的不同。

sentences.english: a religious school
sentences.chinese: 宗教学校

sentences.english: the dates of major religious observances such as Easter or Christmas
sentences.chinese: 复活节和圣诞节等重要宗教节日的日期

detailed_translations.chinese: 宗教的； 笃信宗教的， 虔诚的
detailed_translations.english: relating to religion in general or to a particular religion

name: modification
trans: n. 修改，修正；改变

sentences.english: They have used the same process for almost 50 years with only minor modifications.
sentences.chinese: 同样的工序他们用了将近50年，期间只做过很小的改动。

detailed_translations.english: a small change made in something such as a design, plan, or system

name: amenity
trans: n. 舒适；礼仪；愉快；便利设施

sentences.english: The hotel is in the city centre, close to shops and local amenities.
sentences.chinese: 该酒店位于市中心，紧邻商店和当地的便利设施。

sentences.english: houses that lack basic amenities
sentences.chinese: 缺乏基本生活设施的房屋

detailed_translations.chinese: 舒适；礼仪；愉快；便利设施
detailed_translations.english: something that makes a place comfortable or easy to live in

name: platinum
trans: n. [化学] 铂；白金；唱片集达100万张的销售量；银灰色

sentences.english: a platinum ring
sentences.chinese: 白金戒指

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 铂；白金；唱片集达100万张的销售量；银灰色
detailed_translations.english: a silver-grey metal that does not change colour or lose its brightness, and is used in making expensive jewellery and in indus-try. It is a chemical element: symbol Pt

name: intransigence
trans: n. 不妥协；不让步；不调和

name: outskirt
trans: n. 郊区，市郊

sentences.english: The hotel is situated in the outskirt of the city.
sentences.chinese: 这个酒店位于城市的郊区,是全城最好的酒店之一。

detailed_translations.english: a part of the city far removed from the center

name: discrimination
trans: n. 歧视；区别，辨别；识别力

sentences.english: laws to prevent discrimination
sentences.chinese: 防止歧视的法律

sentences.english: shape discrimination
sentences.chinese: 形状识别力

detailed_translations.english: the practice of treating one person or group differently from another in an unfair way

name: consistent
trans: adj. 始终如一的，一致的；坚持的

sentences.english: We need to be consistent in our approach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在方法上要前后一致。

detailed_translations.english: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval

name: illusion
trans: n. 幻觉，错觉；错误的观念或信仰

sentences.english: She was under no illusion that he loved her.
sentences.chinese: 她不再幻想他爱她了。

sentences.english: It is an illusion that the Arctic is dark in winter.
sentences.chinese: 认为北极冬天一片黑暗是错误的。

sentences.english: She had no illusions about her physical attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 她对自己外表的吸引力不抱幻想。

sentences.english: ‘I hate to shatter your illusions,’ he said.
sentences.chinese: “我不愿意打破你的幻想。”他说。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幻想， 错误的观念； 错觉， 幻觉， 假象
detailed_translations.english: an idea or opinion that is wrong, especially about yourself

name: paradigm
trans: n. 范例；词形变化表

sentences.english: ...a new paradigm of production.
sentences.chinese: …一种新的生产范例。

detailed_translations.english: a very clear or typical example of something

name: reluctant
trans: adj. 不情愿的；勉强的；顽抗的

sentences.english: She gave a reluctant smile.
sentences.chinese: 她勉强笑了笑。

detailed_translations.english: slow and unwilling

name: pathological
trans: adj. 病理学的；病态的；由疾病引起的（等于pathologic）

sentences.english: a pathological hatred of women
sentences.chinese: 对女人的病态憎恨

sentences.english: a pathological liar
sentences.chinese: 病态说谎者

detailed_translations.chinese: 病态的， 不理智的； 病理学的
detailed_translations.english: pathological behaviour or feelings happen regularly, and are strong, unreasonable, and impossible to control

name: frugality
trans: n. 俭省，节俭

sentences.english: If your goal is frugality, then consider what things are not necessary, the long-term impact of the choice you make and whether you can afford it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的目标是俭省，那么就考虑什么东西是没必要的，你做出选择后的长期影响以及你是否可以担负得起。

sentences.english: I’m doing so to show you that if there’s not a little frugality in you already, there easily could be. Why?
sentences.chinese: 我这么做只是为了告诉你们如果到这一刻为止你还未曾尝试过节俭一点的话，那么你是很容易做到的，为什么？

sentences.english: So there you have it, a few ways in which we have brought frugality into our lives.
sentences.chinese: 就是这么多了，一些方法让我们把节俭带入了我们的生活。

name: sample
trans: n. 样品；样本；例子

sentences.english: They took a blood sample to test for hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 他们取了血样做肝炎化验。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that is examined in order to find out something about the whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…抽样； 品尝， 体验
detailed_translations.english: to taste food or drink in order to see what it is like

name: leaflet
trans: n. 小叶；传单

sentences.english: a leaflet on skin cancer
sentences.chinese: 有关皮肤癌的宣传页

sentences.english: Students were handing out election leaflets at the station.
sentences.chinese: 学生在车站分发选举传单。

detailed_translations.english: a small book or piece of paper advertising something or giving information on a particular subject

name: embed
trans: vt. 栽种；使嵌入，使插入；使深留脑中

sentences.english: Feelings of guilt are deeply embedded in her personality.
sentences.chinese: 负罪感在她的性格里根深蒂固。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…嵌入， 扎牢； 使深留脑中
detailed_translations.english: to put something firmly and deeply into something else, or to be put into something in this way

name: transmission
trans: n. 传动装置，[机] 变速器；传递；传送；播送

sentences.english: worldwide data transmission
sentences.chinese: 全球数据传输

detailed_translations.english: the process of sending out electronic signals, messages etc, using radio, television, or other similar equipment

name: urgent
trans: adj. 紧急的；急迫的

sentences.english: He was in urgent need of medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 他急需治疗。

sentences.english: The report called for urgent action to reduce lead in petrol.
sentences.chinese: 报告呼吁迅速采取行动，减少汽油中的铅含量。

sentences.english: an urgent message
sentences.chinese: 一封急报

detailed_translations.english: very important and needing to be dealt with immediately

name: plump
trans: n. 扑通声

sentences.english: The nurse was a cheerful plump woman.
sentences.chinese: 那护士是个性格开朗、体形丰满的女人。

sentences.english: The baby’s nice and plump.
sentences.chinese: 那个婴儿很可爱，胖嘟嘟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使丰满；使鼓起；突然放下

detailed_translations.english: to sit down suddenly and heavily
slightly fat in a fairly pleasant way – used especially about women or children, often to avoid saying the word ‘fat’
a heavy abrupt fall or the sound of this

name: blur
trans: n. 污迹；模糊不清的事物

sentences.english: The street lights were blurred by the fog.
sentences.chinese: 街灯在迷雾的笼罩下十分昏暗。

sentences.english: Many of the details in the picture are blurred.
sentences.chinese: 照片中的许多细节部分都模糊了。

detailed_translations.english: to become difficult to see, or to make something difficult to see, because the edges are not clear
a shape that you cannot see clearly

name: nuclear
trans: adj. 原子能的；[细胞] 细胞核的；中心的；原子核的

sentences.english: France’s reliance on nuclear energy
sentences.chinese: 法国对核能的依赖

sentences.english: a nuclear power station
sentences.chinese: 核电站

sentences.english: a nuclear-powered submarine
sentences.chinese: 核动力潜艇

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the nucleus of an atom, or the energy produced when the nucleus of an atom is either split or joined with the nucleus of another atom

name: measure
trans: n. 测量；措施；程度；尺寸

sentences.english: New safety measures were being demanded after last night’s horrific train crash.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生严重的火车相撞事故后，民众要求制定新的安全措施。

sentences.english: The new bridge was erected as a temporary measure to replace the one which was destroyed by floods.
sentences.chinese: 建这座新桥是为了临时代替被洪水毁坏的那座桥。

detailed_translations.english: an action, especially an official one, that is intended to deal with a particular problem

name: translocation
trans: n. [遗] 易位；迁移，移动；改变位置（半透明性）；置换

name: forecast
trans: n. 预测，预报；预想

sentences.english: The weather forecast is good for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报说明天是晴天。

sentences.english: Rain was forecast for the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 预报周末有雨。

detailed_translations.english: a description of what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now
to make a statement saying what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now

name: probability
trans: n. 可能性；机率；[数] 或然率

sentences.english: You must decide whether, on the balance of probabilities , he committed the crime.
sentences.chinese: 你们一定要权衡正反两方面的可能性，然后再裁定他是否犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: how likely something is, sometimes calculated in a mathematical way

name: scrutiny
trans: n. 详细审查；监视；细看；选票复查

sentences.english: Their activities have come under police scrutiny .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动受到警方的严密监视。

detailed_translations.chinese: 详细检查， 仔细观察
detailed_translations.english: careful and thorough examination of someone or something

name: organization
trans: n. 组织；机构；体制；团体

sentences.english: The public expect high standards from any large organization.
sentences.chinese: 公众对任何大型机构都期望很高。

sentences.english: the World Trade Organization
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易组织

sentences.english: a voluntary organization which helps disabled people with their transport needs
sentences.chinese: 帮助残疾人士满足其交通需求的一个志愿组织

sentences.english: an illegal terrorist organization
sentences.chinese: 非法的恐怖组织

sentences.english: international organizations such as the UN
sentences.chinese: 诸如联合国之类的国际组织

detailed_translations.english: a group such as a club or business that has formed for a particular purpose

name: convert
trans: n. 皈依者；改变宗教信仰者

sentences.english: a 19th-century converted barn
sentences.chinese: 由19世纪谷仓改建的房子

detailed_translations.english: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way

name: famous
trans: adj. 著名的；极好的，非常令人满意的

sentences.english: a famous actor
sentences.chinese: 著名演员

sentences.english: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.english: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.chinese: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

detailed_translations.english: known about by many people in many places

name: track and field
trans: n. 田径运动

sentences.english: Having said this, and because of my actions, I am retiring from the sport of track and field, a sport which I deeply love.
sentences.chinese: 话已至此,由于我的行为,我决定退出田径运动, 退出我无比深爱的田径运动.

sentences.english: The contest marks the beginning of the Drake Relays, one of the nation‘s oldest and most prestigious track and field meets.
sentences.chinese: 这场斗牛犬选美比赛也因此拉开了英国历史悠久、声名远扬的德雷克大学田径运动会的序幕。

sentences.english: I’m proud to be part of the revolution now in America whereby track and field is getting recognized and the athletes are getting better and better all the time.
sentences.chinese: 美国的田径运动目前正在经历重大变革──田径运动日益受到重视，运动员也越来越强──能够在此时置身其中我深感自豪。

detailed_translations.english: sports such as running and jumping

name: distinct
trans: adj. 明显的；独特的；清楚的；有区别的

sentences.english: The outline of the ship became more distinct.
sentences.chinese: 船的轮廓变得更加清晰了。

detailed_translations.english: easily or clearly heard, seen, felt, etc.

name: meander
trans: n. 漫步；曲流（常用复数）

sentences.english: We took a gravel road that meandered through farmland.
sentences.chinese: 我们走上了一条蜿蜒穿越农田的石子路。

detailed_translations.english: to walk somewhere in a slow relaxed way rather than take the most direct way possible

name: legal
trans: adj. 法律的；合法的；法定的；依照法律的

sentences.english: What the company has done is perfectly legal.
sentences.chinese: 公司所做的这一切完全合法。

sentences.english: plans to make the carrying of identity cards a legal requirement
sentences.chinese: 使携带身份证成为法定要求的计划

sentences.english: He had twice the legal limit of alcohol in his bloodstream.
sentences.chinese: 他血液中的酒精含量是法定限度的两倍。

sentences.english: a pressure group that is campaigning to make cannabis legal
sentences.chinese: 争取大麻合法化的压力团体

detailed_translations.english: if something is legal, you are allowed to do it or have to do it by law

name: brand
trans: n. 商标，牌子；烙印

sentences.english: products which lack a strong brand image
sentences.chinese: 缺乏鲜明品牌形象的产品

sentences.english: The owner couldn't be bothered to brand the cattle.
sentences.chinese: 主人懒得给这牛打上烙印。

detailed_translations.english: a type of product made by a particular company, that has a particular name or design

detailed_translations.chinese: 铭刻， 打烙印于； 加污名于， 谴责
detailed_translations.english: When you brand an animal, you put a permanent mark on its skin in order to show who it belongs to, usually by burning a mark onto its skin

name: habitant
trans: n. 居民，居住者

name: entrance
trans: n. 入口；进入

sentences.english: the station entrance
sentences.chinese: 车站的入口处

sentences.english: Bridget made a dramatic entrance into the room.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特动作夸张地进了房间。

detailed_translations.english: a door, gate etc that you go through to enter a place

name: nucleus
trans: n. 核，核心；原子核

sentences.english: Neutrons and protons are bound together in the nucleus of an atom.
sentences.chinese: 在一个原子的核内，中子和质子聚合在一起。

sentences.english: the nucleus of an effective team
sentences.chinese: 高效团队的核心

detailed_translations.english: the central part of an atom, made up of neutrons, protons, and other elementary particles

name: recalcitrant
trans: n. 顽抗者；不服从的人

sentences.english: a recalcitrant pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名不服管教的学生

name: outlandish
trans: adj. 古怪的；奇异的；异国风格的；偏僻的

sentences.english: outlandish clothes
sentences.chinese: 奇装异服

sentences.english: Her story seemed so outlandish.
sentences.chinese: 她的故事太不寻常了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 古怪的；奇异的；异国风格的；偏僻的
detailed_translations.english: strange and unusual

name: format
trans: n. 格式；版式；开本

sentences.english: The courses were run to a consistent format.
sentences.chinese: 这些课程的编排是有连续性的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计，安排；格式，样式，版式
detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a television show or meeting is organized or arranged
to organize the space on a computer  disk  so that information can be stored on it

name: balance
trans: n. 平衡；余额；匀称

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: helpful
trans: adj. 有帮助的；有益的

sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.english: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

detailed_translations.english: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

trans: n. 海滩；湖滨

sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

trans: vt. 把降低到；归入；提交

sentences.chinese: 使该国王降级到一种纯粹礼仪性的职能难道不更好吗？

trans: n. 妥协，和解；折衷

sentences.chinese: 她承认自己无法作出妥协。

detailed_translations.chinese: 妥协； 危及； 放弃

an agreement that is achieved after everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first, or the act of making this agreement

name: factor
trans: n. 因素；要素；[物] 因数；代理人

name: presentation
trans: n. 展示；描述，陈述；介绍；赠送

sentences.english: the presentation ceremony
sentences.chinese: 颁奖仪式

sentences.english: Dr Evans thanked him for coming to make the presentations .
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯博士感谢他来颁奖。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提供， 显示； 外观， 图像； 授予， 赠送； 报告， 介绍； 表演
detailed_translations.english: the act of giving someone a prize or present at a formal ceremony

sentences.chinese: 单调的饮食

sentences.chinese: 一个老是尿床的小男孩

detailed_translations.english: boring because of always being the same

trans: n. 商店；储备，贮藏；仓库

sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节期间，商店营业到很晚。

sentences.english: a store of wood
sentences.chinese: 木料储备

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are sold to the public. In British English, a store is large and sells many different things, but in American English, a store can be large or small, and sell many things or only one type of thing.

name: unemotional
trans: adj. 不易动感情的；非感情的；无动于衷的

trans: n. 圣人；贤人；哲人

sentences.chinese: 人非圣贤，孰能无过?

very wise, especially as a result of a lot of experience

trans: n. 小心，谨慎；警告，警示

sentences.english: Business leaders are cautioning against hasty action that would hamper flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 企业领导人被告诫不要贸然采取行动，以免把事情搞僵。

to warn someone that something might be dangerous, difficult etc

trans: n. 道路；小路；轨道

sentences.chinese: 我提心吊胆地沿着花园的小道向前门走去。

sentences.english: a well-worn path across the grass
sentences.chinese: 草地上被踏出的小径

sentences.chinese: 沿着河边的小路走到那座桥。

sentences.english: a path leading to the summer house

detailed_translations.english: a track that has been made deliberately or made by many people walking over the same ground

name: procedure
trans: n. 程序，手续；步骤

sentences.english: On board, we were given the usual talk on safety procedures (= what to do if an accident happens, or to prevent an accident ) .
sentences.chinese: 在飞机上，我们听了例行的飞行安全讲解。

sentences.chinese: 迈克挑剔地打量着她。

sentences.english: He has spoken critically of the government’s refusal to support the industry.
sentences.chinese: 他谈到政府拒绝支持这个行业时颇有微词。

trans: Not Found

sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是找出时间，找出这个问题的动力学。

sentences.chinese: 我们了解外包的动力。

sentences.chinese: 认为这两者在海冰动力学方面都有重要的作用，但是他们尚不清楚是多么重要。

detailed_translations.english: the branch of mechanics concerned with the forces that change or produce the motions of bodies

trans: adv. 生动地；活灵活现地；用图表表示；轮廓分明地

trans: n. 名声，名望；传闻，传说

sentences.chinese: 他称自己对出名真的没有兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being known about by a lot of people because of your achievements

sentences.chinese: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.english: a police crackdown on car crime

sentences.english: a town with a relatively low crime rate

detailed_translations.english: illegal activities in general

sentences.chinese: …一家保险公司利用多媒体技术改善其分支机构的客户服务的实例。

involving computers and computer programs that use a mixture of sound, pictures, video, and writing to give information

name: cultivate
trans: vt. 培养；陶冶；耕作

sentences.chinese: 我们种植玉米和西瓜。

trans: n. 公告；宣告；发表；通告

detailed_translations.english: an important or official statement

trans: n. 全家人，一家人；(包括佣工在内的)家庭，户

sentences.chinese: 家务杂活

sentences.chinese: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house

sentences.chinese: 违反外交礼节

sentences.chinese: 国王想通过战争来提高自己的威信。

sentences.chinese: 我父亲把他所有的钱都投在上市债券上。

sentences.chinese: 该学位课程有两个主要目标。

sentences.chinese: 主要目的是要增长儿童的地理知识。

sentences.chinese: 你的首要工作目标之一应该是拥有自己的办公室。

sentences.english: the cheapest TV on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上最便宜的电视机

sentences.chinese: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。

sentences.english: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )

sentences.chinese: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。

sentences.chinese: 不到一小时我们就网住了三条鱼。

sentences.chinese: 学生认为拉丁语无聊且无关紧要。

detailed_translations.english: not useful or not relating to a particular situation, and therefore not important

trans: adj. 严峻的；简朴的；苦行的；无装饰的

sentences.chinese: 那座教堂的朴实无华

detailed_translations.english: plain and simple and without any decoration

name: edible
trans: n. 食品；食物

sentences.english: These berries are edible, but those are poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 这些浆果可以吃，但那些有毒。

sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，男女双方径直回到自己的宿舍餐厅吃早饭。

sentences.chinese: 为了检验这个假设，研究者在斯坦福大学食堂门口发放关于约会和吃饭的问卷，一些在进去的时候填，另一些被试在出来的时候填写。

trans: adj. 平流层的；同温层的

trans: n. 热力学

sentences.chinese: 但我们知道热力学都是关于平衡的。

sentences.english: And we went through that and saw what the thermodynamics worked out to be.
sentences.chinese: 我们算出了他们,并看到了它们的热力学应该是怎样的。

sentences.english: And so we can immediately start in deriving all of the thermodynamics, right?
sentences.chinese: 这样我们可以马上开始,得到所有热力学的量对吧？

detailed_translations.english: the science that deals with the relationship between heat and other forms of energy

name: access to
trans: Not Found

trans: adj. 精力充沛的；积极的；有力的

sentences.english: an energetic man
sentences.chinese: 精力旺盛的男子

sentences.english: an energetic drive to get more customers
sentences.chinese: 争取更多客户的十足干劲

detailed_translations.english: having or needing a lot of energy or determination

name: postgraduate
trans: n. 研究生，研究所学生

sentences.english: "Given the level of competition in law, I definitely think that my postgraduate degree helped to distinguish me from the crowd, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“考虑到在法律行业的竞争水平，我确实认为我的研究生学位让我从众人中脱颖而出”。

sentences.english: Attracted by the greatness of English language, Gu even changed her major from accounting to English in her postgraduate study.
sentences.chinese: 顾秋蓓被英语这门语言的魅力所吸引，她甚至将自己的研究生专业从会计转到了英语专业。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is studying at a university to get a  master’s degree  or a  phd

name: wallet
trans: n. 钱包，皮夹

sentences.chinese: 他从钱包里拿出一张信用卡。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat case, often made of leather, that you carry in your pocket, for holding paper money, bank cards etc

name: coda
trans: n. 结尾部分；终结句；尾声；终曲

name: restaurant
trans: n. 餐馆；[经] 饭店

sentences.chinese: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.english: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 公司经营连锁饭店。

sentences.english: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can buy and eat a meal

name: implausible
trans: adj. 难以置信的，不像真实的

sentences.english: It’s not entirely implausible that a galaxy could be identical to our own.
sentences.chinese: 某个星系和我们这个星系完全相同并非完全不可能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难以置信的，不像真实的
detailed_translations.english: difficult to believe and therefore unlikely to be true

name: series
trans: n. 系列，连续；[电] 串联；级数；丛书

sentences.english: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.chinese: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.english: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.english: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一系列， 连续； 丛书， 连续剧
detailed_translations.english: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other

name: cyclone
trans: n. 旋风；[气象] 气旋；飓风

sentences.english: The race was called off as a cyclone struck.
sentences.chinese: 由于旋风袭击，比赛被取消了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋风；[气象] 气旋；飓风
detailed_translations.english: a very strong wind that moves very fast in a circle

name: descent
trans: n. 下降；血统；袭击

sentences.english: Passengers must fasten their seat belts prior to descent.
sentences.chinese: 乘客在飞机降落之前必须系好安全带。

sentences.english: young men and women of Asian descent
sentences.chinese: 亚裔男女青年

sentences.english: There is a gradual descent to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 有一片斜坡缓缓伸延到海边。

detailed_translations.english: the process of going down

name: scatter
trans: n. 分散；散播，撒播

sentences.chinese: 枪声使人群四散奔逃。

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people or animals scatter, or if something scatters them, they move quickly in different directions

name: summer
trans: n. 夏季；全盛时期

sentences.english: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.english: Food must be refrigerated in summer.
sentences.chinese: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.english: After a summer here the poorest sheep and cattle grow strong and fat.
sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

sentences.english: The city boasts two excellent museums.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市以拥有两个优秀的博物馆而自豪。

sentences.english: The Society boasts 3,000 members worldwide.
