sentences.chinese: 愚昧的问题

detailed_translations.chinese: 愚笨的；昏庸的；发呆的；自满的
detailed_translations.english: very silly or stupid

sentences.chinese: 妈妈深爱着爸爸，虽然他们总是为琐事争吵。

sentences.english: There have been minor squabbles about phone bills.
sentences.chinese: 为电话账单已闹过口角。

detailed_translations.english: to argue about something unimportant
Squabble is also a noun

name: visitor
trans: n. 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟

sentences.chinese: 时代广场每年吸引三千多万游客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟
detailed_translations.english: someone who comes to visit a place or a person

name: occupy
trans: vt. 占据，占领；居住；使忙碌

sentences.chinese: 足球占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。

detailed_translations.english: if something occupies you or your time, you are busy doing it

sentences.english: infectious diseases
sentences.chinese: 传染性疾病

detailed_translations.english: an infectious illness can be passed from one person to another, especially through the air you breathe

trans: n. 寄宿学校

sentences.english: She and her brother are both at boarding school.
sentences.chinese: 她和她弟弟都在寄宿学校念书。

sentences.english: "It was school, " she said. "I went to a boarding school.
sentences.chinese: “都是学校做的好事”，她说，“我去了一所寄宿学校。

sentences.english: I can stand Janet now. She and her brother are both at boarding school.
sentences.chinese: 维罗尼卡说，“我现在能受得了珍妮特，她兄妹两都在寄宿学校。”

detailed_translations.english: a school where students live as well as study

name: dispel
trans: vt. 驱散，驱逐；消除（烦恼等）

sentences.chinese: 我们要消除在英国吃不好的误解。

sentences.chinese: 阳光洒进大厅，驱散了阴影。

trans: n. 仪表板；嵌板；座谈小组，全体陪审员

sentences.chinese: 一组专家审核了那项提议。

sentences.english: There will be at least three senior doctors on the panel.
sentences.chinese: 专家小组中至少有三名资深医生。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people with skills or specialist knowledge who have been chosen to give advice or opinions on a particular subject

name: ameliorate
trans: vt. 改善；减轻（痛苦等）；改良

sentences.chinese: 他们给他做了血检看是否有缺乏维生素的迹象。

sentences.chinese: 果不其然，他的后代莫卧尔帝国继续统治大片亚洲次大陆，直到这个帝国的最后一个朝代于1857年被英国废黜。

sentences.english: Very roughly this river defines the north west edge of the Indian subcontinent and the Persians, Greeks, Romans and the rest of us applied the name to everything on the other side of that river.
sentences.chinese: 这条河很粗略地定义了印第安次大陆的西北端，而波斯人、希腊人、罗马人和其他的人把这个名字应用到那条河对岸的任何事情。

sentences.chinese: 此病发生在非洲、亚洲和印度次大陆。

detailed_translations.english: a very large area of land that is part of a  continent

name: compete
trans: vi. 竞争；比赛；对抗

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

name: telecommunication
trans: n. 电讯；[通信] 远程通信；无线电通讯

sentences.english: If large media and telecommunication companies decide to close their offerings to the web, I am convinced the web will route around it.
sentences.chinese: 如果大型媒体和电信公司决定停止向万维网提供内容，我很确信万维网会绕过这一点。

sentences.english: He became rich through his well diversified conglomerates which deal with oil, banking and telecommunication business in his homeland, Russia.
sentences.chinese: 他在他的祖国俄罗斯通过分类得当的联合企业集团以经营石油、银行业务及电信业务获得财富。

detailed_translations.english: the telegraphic or telephonic communication of audio, video, or digital information over a distance by means of radio waves, optical signals, etc, or along a transmission line

name: underground
trans: n. 地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体

sentences.english: This animal spends most of its life underground.
sentences.chinese: 这种动物一生中的大部分时间都待在地下。

sentences.english: nuclear waste buried deep underground
sentences.chinese: 深埋在地下的核废物

detailed_translations.english: under the earth’s surface

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下的；秘密的；先锋派的
detailed_translations.english: below the surface of the earth

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体
detailed_translations.english: a railway system under the ground

name: arbitrate
trans: vt. 仲裁；公断

sentences.english: He arbitrates between investors and members of the association.
sentences.chinese: 他在投资者与该协会成员之间做仲裁。

detailed_translations.english: to officially judge how an argument between two opposing sides should be settled

name: equivalent
trans: n. 等价物，相等物

sentences.english: I had no dollars, but offered him an equivalent amount of sterling.
sentences.chinese: 我没有美金，但给了他等值的英镑。

detailed_translations.english: having the same value, purpose, job etc as a person or thing of a different kind
something that has the same value, purpose, job etc as something else

name: concise
trans: adj. 简明的，简洁的

sentences.english: Your summary should be as clear and concise as possible.
sentences.chinese: 你的总结应该尽可能地明白简洁。

detailed_translations.english: short, with no unnecessary words

name: psychologist
trans: n. 心理学家，心理学者

sentences.english: a clinical psychologist
sentences.chinese: 临床心理学家

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained in psychology

name: genre
trans: n. 类型；种类；体裁；样式；流派；风俗画

sentences.english: a literary genre
sentences.chinese: 文学体裁

detailed_translations.chinese: 类型；种类；体裁；样式；流派；风俗画
detailed_translations.english: a particular type of art, writing, music etc, which has certain features that all examples of this type share

detailed_translations.chinese: 风俗画的；以日常情景为主题的

name: outdated
trans: adj. 过时的；旧式的

sentences.english: outdated teaching methods
sentences.chinese: 不合时宜的教学方法

sentences.english: a factory with outdated equipment
sentences.chinese: 设备陈旧的工厂

sentences.english: His writing style is now boring and outdated.
sentences.chinese: 他的写作风格如今已显得乏味而过时了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is outdated, it is no longer considered useful or effective, because something more modern exists

name: opt
trans: vi. 选择

sentences.english: Depending on your circumstances you can opt for one method or the other.
sentences.chinese: 根据自己的情况，你可以选择这种或那种方法。

if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container

sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the environmental destruction caused by the road building programme

trans: vi. 追赶；继续进行

sentences.chinese: 她计划从政。

sentences.english: Students should pursue their own interests , as well as do their school work.
sentences.chinese: 除了完成课业之外，学生也应该追求自己的兴趣。

sentences.chinese: 艰巨的任务

detailed_translations.english: work or a responsibility that is onerous is difficult and worrying or makes you tired

sentences.chinese: 希望科西嘉有更多自治权的活动家

sentences.english: a major importer of cotton manufactures
sentences.chinese: 棉花产品的主要进口商

name: overweight

sentences.chinese: 我想知道这封信是否超重。

sentences.english: If your luggage is overweight, you'll have to pay extra.
sentences.chinese: 假如你的行李过重了， 你得付额外的运费。

trans: n. 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性

sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

name: avenue

sentences.english: a tree-lined avenue
sentences.chinese: 林荫道

detailed_translations.english: used in the names of streets in a town or city

sentences.chinese: 球员们戴着黑纱悼念已故的队友。

sentences.chinese: 我谨向党内工作人员致敬，感谢他们的辛苦努力。

name: thread
trans: n. 线；螺纹；思路；衣服；线状物；玻璃纤维；路线

sentences.chinese: 我在找针线。

sentences.chinese: 用金线和银线手工缝制的

sentences.chinese: 他走神了，跟不上她的思路。

trans: adj. 丰富的；足够的；宽敞的

sentences.chinese: 丰满的胸部

trans: adj. 操作的；运作的

sentences.chinese: 营运上的活动 / 成本 / 困难

sentences.chinese: 今天下午这艘船应该可以使用了。

sentences.english: The new system became operational in March.
sentences.chinese: 新的系统于3月份启用。

sentences.chinese: 我们的总部现已全面投入运营。

sentences.chinese: 这项危险的任务使他精神振奋。

trans: n. 人类学

sentences.chinese: “在人类学中，你不能将同性恋和第三性别混同，”他说。

sentences.chinese: 当我还在剑桥读书的时候，我记得有一位人类学的教授拿出一张照片，上面是一根有28个切口的骨头。

sentences.english: Not to be the skunk at this party, but I think it's important to ask whether neuroscience reveals anything more than we already know from, say, anthropology.
sentences.chinese: 我并不想成为派对上的讨厌鬼，但我认为很重要的是，要问清楚神经科学是否揭示出我们已知之外的东西，比如人类学。

sentences.chinese: 许多小孩子都是在书被改编成电视剧之后才去买的。

sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.chinese: 她无视这项声明，认为是个空口威胁。

sentences.chinese: 学校的官员说他们在今天上午11点半左右收到过炸弹恐吓。

sentences.chinese: 这本小册子提供了关于那所学院的所有必需信息。

sentences.chinese: 工厂倒闭是来自国外的竞争加剧的必然结果。

sentences.english: However, I believe in questionings, doubtings, searchings, skepticism, and I discredit credulity or blind faith.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我也相信询问、质疑、探索与怀疑，但拒绝轻信或盲从的信仰。

sentences.english: Lily: : But the interviewers don't think so, they discredit the unmarried women above the normal age have mentality defects, although they are turly bright people.
sentences.chinese: 但是面试官却认为年龄这么大了还没结婚也没男朋友，怀疑她们有心理缺陷，尽管她们确实是人才。 。

detailed_translations.english: the loss of other people’s respect or trust

trans: n. 启迪；启蒙运动；教化

trans: n. 工厂；制造厂；代理店

sentences.english: a car factory

sentences.english: factory workers
sentences.chinese: 工厂工人

name: topic

sentences.chinese: 如今环境是一个热门话题。

sentences.english: The main topic for discussion will be the proposed new supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 讨论的主要议题是拟建中的超级市场。

sentences.chinese: 广泛的话题

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目， 论题， 话题

sentences.english: a slightly salty taste

sentences.english: salty foods
sentences.chinese: 咸味的食物

detailed_translations.english: tasting of or containing salt

name: basketball
trans: n. 篮球；篮球运动

sentences.english: We love playing basketball.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱打篮球。

sentences.english: They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻遍了整个教室寻找他们的篮球。

detailed_translations.english: a game played indoors between two teams of five players, in which each team tries to win points by throwing a ball through a net

name: ingenuous
trans: adj. 天真的；坦白的；正直的；朴实的

sentences.english: He seemed too ingenuous for a reporter.
sentences.chinese: 他好像太天真诚实，不适合做记者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 天真的；坦白的；正直的；朴实的
detailed_translations.english: an ingenuous person is simple, trusting, and honest, especially because they have not had much experience of life

name: knoll
trans: n. 小山

name: wage
trans: n. 工资；代价；报偿

sentences.english: The police are waging war on drug pushers in the city.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在市内开展一场打击毒贩的斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to be involved in a war against someone, or a fight against something

name: oxygen
trans: n. [化学] 氧气，[化学] 氧

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

name: impact
trans: vi. 影响；撞击；冲突；压紧（on，upon，with）

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击
detailed_translations.english: to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something
the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

name: accumulation
trans: n. 积聚，累积；堆积物

sentences.english: ...an accumulation of experience and knowledge.
sentences.chinese: …经验和知识的一种积累。

detailed_translations.english: An accumulation of something is a large number of things that have been collected together or acquired over a period of time

name: impair
trans: vt. 损害；削弱；减少

sentences.english: The illness had impaired his ability to think and concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病损害了他的思维能力和注意力。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something or make it not as good as it should be

name: hasten

sentences.english: Their departure was hastened by an abnormally cold winter.
sentences.chinese: 那个冬天异常寒冷，所以他们提前走了。

detailed_translations.english: to make something happen faster or sooner

name: elephant
trans: n. 象；大号图画纸

sentences.english: A trunk distinguishes the elephant.
sentences.chinese: 长鼻是象的特征。

sentences.english: So the part of the elephant I experience applies what we know about people and how we apply that to UX design.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我体验的那部分的大象就是我们对人的了解和我们将我们的了解应用于用户体验设计。

sentences.english: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.chinese: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

detailed_translations.english: a very large grey animal with four legs, two tusks(= long curved teeth ) and a trunk(= long nose ) that it can use to pick things up

name: smallpox

name: strive

sentences.english: I was still striving to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在努力争取成功。

sentences.english: We must continue to strive for greater efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须继续为提高效率而努力。

detailed_translations.english: to make a great effort to achieve something

name: invisible
trans: adj. 无形的，看不见的；无形的；不显眼的，暗藏的

sentences.english: The house was surrounded by trees, and invisible from the road.
sentences.chinese: 这所房子树木环绕，从路上是看不见的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is invisible cannot be seen

name: transcend
trans: vt. 胜过，超越

sentences.english: The desire for peace transcended political differences.
sentences.chinese: 对和平的渴望超越了政治分歧。

detailed_translations.english: to go beyond the usual limits of something

name: biochemistry
trans: n. 生物化学

sentences.english: ...the effects of air pollutants on the biochemistry of plants or animals.
sentences.chinese: …大气污染物对植物或动物生化过程的影响。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the chemistry of living things

name: dependence
trans: n. 依赖；依靠；信任；信赖

sentences.english: ...the city's traditional dependence on tourism.
sentences.chinese: …这个城市对旅游业的传统依赖。

detailed_translations.english: when you depend on the help and support of someone or something else in order to exist or be successful

name: elaborate
trans: adj. 精心制作的；详尽的；煞费苦心的

sentences.english: pure silks embroidered with elaborate patterns
sentences.chinese: 绣有精美图案的真丝衣服

sentences.english: A spokesman declined to elaborate on a statement released late yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 发言人拒绝对昨天晚些时候发表的一份声明作出更多说明。

detailed_translations.chinese: 复杂的； 精心制作的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of small parts or details put together in a complicated way
If you elaborate on something that has been said, you say more about it, or give more details

name: gullible
trans: adj. 易受骗的；轻信的

sentences.english: Plastic replicas of the Greek pottery are sold to gullible tourists.
sentences.chinese: 仿古希腊陶器的塑料复制品被卖给易受骗的游客。

detailed_translations.english: too ready to believe what other people tell you, so that you are easily tricked

name: politics
trans: n. 政治，政治学；政治活动；政纲

sentences.english: I assume her politics must be fairly conservative.
sentences.chinese: 我猜她的政治观点一定相当保守。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s political beliefs and opinions

name: stagnant
trans: adj. 停滞的；不景气的；污浊的；迟钝的

sentences.english: a stagnant pond
sentences.chinese: 死水塘

detailed_translations.chinese: 停滞的；不景气的；污浊的；迟钝的
detailed_translations.english: stagnant water or air does not move or flow and often smells bad

name: imitation
trans: n. 模仿，仿造；仿制品

sentences.english: The remake of ‘Casablanca’ was a pale imitation (= something that is much less good than the thing it imitates ) of the original movie.
sentences.chinese: 重拍的《卡萨布兰卡》远不如原版。

sentences.english: ...a complete set of Dickens bound in imitation leather.
sentences.chinese: …用人造革装帧的一整套《狄更斯全集》。

detailed_translations.english: when you copy someone else’s actions
Imitation things are not genuine but are made to look as if they are

name: ancestry
trans: n. 祖先；血统

sentences.english: Most people of European or African ancestry have the "wet" kind: thick and sticky.
sentences.chinese: 大多数欧洲或者非洲血统的人耳垢是湿的，厚的，有粘性的。

sentences.english: Martin has shown that, of the eukaryotic genes whose ancestry can be traced, 75 per cent or more came from bacteria rather than the host cell.
sentences.chinese: 马丁揭示，在哪些可以追溯到祖先的线粒体基因上，有75%或更多的成分来自当时外来的细菌而非宿主细胞。

sentences.english: You can only explain this by evolutionary common ancestry.
sentences.chinese: 你只能通过存在“进化上的共同祖先”来解释。

detailed_translations.english: the members of your family who lived a long time ago

name: dangerous
trans: adj. 危险的

sentences.english: laws about dangerous dogs
sentences.chinese: 有关危险犬类的法律

sentences.english: Some of these prisoners are extremely dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.english: The powdered milk was not as good as breast milk, and was downright dangerous (= actually dangerous ) when it was mixed with unclean water.
sentences.chinese: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

detailed_translations.english: able or likely to harm or kill you

name: recoup
trans: vt. 收回；恢复；偿还；扣除

sentences.english: The movie will have to be a huge hit to recoup its cost.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影必须大获成功才能收回成本。

sentences.english: He was desperate to try and recoup his losses.
sentences.chinese: 他不顾一切地试图挽回损失。

detailed_translations.english: to get back an amount of money you have lost or spent

name: difficulty
trans: n. 困难，困境

sentences.english: They had great difficulty in finding a replacement.
sentences.chinese: 他们找接替的人费了很大劲

sentences.english: If you have any difficulties, give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果你遇到困难，就给我打电话。

sentences.english: She soon got into difficulty with debt.
sentences.chinese: 她很快就因债务陷入了困境。

detailed_translations.english: if you have difficulty doing something, it is difficult for you to do

name: ascetic
trans: n. 苦行者；禁欲者

sentences.english: an ascetic life
sentences.chinese: 清苦的生活

detailed_translations.english: living without any physical pleasures or comforts, especially for religious reasons
An ascetic is someone who is ascetic

name: diatribe
trans: n. 诽谤；恶骂

sentences.english: The book is a diatribe against the academic left.
sentences.chinese: 该书是对学术左派的抨击。

detailed_translations.english: a long speech or piece of writing that criticizes someone or something very severely

name: box
trans: n. 箱，盒子；包厢；一拳

sentences.english: the jury box
sentences.chinese: 陪审团席

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a theatre or court that is separate from where other people are sitting

name: caustic
trans: n. [助剂] 腐蚀剂；苛性钠；焦散曲线

sentences.english: caustic soda (= a chemical used for cleaning things )
sentences.chinese: 苛性钠，烧碱

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 腐蚀性的；[化学] 苛性的；刻薄的；焦散的
detailed_translations.english: a caustic substance can burn through things by chemical action

detailed_translations.chinese: [助剂] 腐蚀剂；苛性钠；焦散曲线

name: reconstruction
trans: n. 再建，重建；改造；复兴

sentences.english: ...America's part in the postwar reconstruction of Germany.
sentences.chinese: …美国在战后德国重建中扮演的角色。

detailed_translations.english: the work that is done to repair the damage to a city, industry etc, especially after a war

name: compare
trans: vi. 相比，匹敌；比较，区别；比拟（常与to连用）

sentences.english: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 把…比作
detailed_translations.english: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different

name: underwater
trans: n. 水下

sentences.english: an underwater camera
sentences.chinese: 水下摄影机

sentences.english: ...giant submarines able to travel at high speeds underwater.
sentences.chinese: …能在水下高速行驶的巨型潜艇。

sentences.english: Some stretches of beach are completely underwater at high tide.
sentences.chinese: 有些沙滩在涨潮时会完全被水淹没。

detailed_translations.english: below the surface of an area of water, or able to be used there
Something that exists or happens underwater exists or happens below the surface of the ocean, a river, or a lake

name: sensation
trans: n. 感觉；轰动；感动

sentences.english: One sign of a heart attack is a tingling sensation in the left arm.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病发作的一个征兆是左臂有刺痛感。

sentences.english: The sex scenes in the film caused a sensation.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片中的性爱镜头引起了轰动。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that you get from one of your five senses, especially the sense of touch

name: jack
trans: n. 千斤顶；[电] 插座；男人

sentences.english: a hydraulic jack
sentences.chinese: 液压千斤顶

detailed_translations.chinese: 千斤顶；[电] 插座；男人
detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used to lift a heavy weight off the ground, such as a car, and support it while it is in the air

detailed_translations.chinese: 增加；提醒；抬起；用千斤顶顶起某物
detailed_translations.english: to lift or push (an object) with a jack
tired or fed up with (something)

name: reaction
trans: n. 反应，感应；反动，复古；反作用

sentences.english: What was Jeff’s reaction when you told him about the job?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

detailed_translations.english: something that you feel or do because of something that has happened or been said

name: commotion
trans: n. 骚动；暴乱

sentences.english: He heard a commotion outside.
sentences.chinese: 他听到外面一阵骚动。

detailed_translations.english: A commotion is a lot of noise, confusion, and excitement

name: conservation
trans: n. 保存，保持；保护

sentences.english: wildlife conservation
sentences.chinese: 野生生物保护

sentences.english: a local conservation group
sentences.chinese: 当地的一个环境保护团体

detailed_translations.english: the protection of natural things such as animals, plants, forests etc, to prevent them from being spoiled or destroyed

name: headphone
trans: n. 双耳式耳机；头载数话器；戴在头上的收话器

name: trickery
trans: n. 欺骗；诡计；奸计

sentences.english: No steel rods, no magnets, no computer trickery.
sentences.chinese: 那里没有钢条、没有磁铁也没有电脑欺骗。

sentences.english: But does not necessarily connote dishonesty, insincerity, or trickery.
sentences.chinese: 有可能——但是并不必然地——意味着不诚实， 不诚心或欺骗。

sentences.english: Yet there is no cheating involved in any of the photographs. No steel rods, no magnets, no computer trickery. The only glue he uses is Nature's. Gravity.
sentences.chinese: 然而，其中任何一张照片都没有涉及到欺骗。那里没有钢条、没有磁铁也没有电脑欺骗。他使用的唯一粘合剂是大自然的重力。

detailed_translations.english: the use of tricks to deceive or cheat people

name: propensity
trans: n. 倾向，习性；癖好，偏爱

sentences.english: Mr. Bint has a propensity to put off decisions to the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 宾特先生有一种将决定拖到最后一分钟的倾向。

detailed_translations.english: a natural tendency to behave in a particular way

name: democrat
trans: n. 民主党人；民主主义者；民主政体论者

sentences.english: Murray has joined other Senate Democrats in blocking the legislation.
sentences.chinese: 默里已经加入其他民主党参议员反对这项立法了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民主党人；民主主义者；民主政体论者
detailed_translations.english: someone who believes in democracy, or works to achieve it

name: celebrate
trans: vt. 庆祝；举行；赞美；祝贺；宣告

sentences.english: It’s Dad’s birthday and we’re going out for a meal to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今天是爸爸的生日，我们打算出去吃饭庆祝一下。

sentences.english: My folks are celebrating their 50th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我父母正在庆祝他们结婚50周年。

sentences.english: poems that celebrate the joys of love
sentences.chinese: 赞美爱之喜悦的诗歌

detailed_translations.english: to show that an event or occasion is important by doing something special or enjoyable

name: message
trans: n. 消息；差使；启示；预言；广告词

sentences.english: The message of the film is that good always triumphs over evil.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影的主题思想是善良终必战胜邪恶。

sentences.english: The result of this legal battle sends an important message to people in similar situations.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼战的结果给情况相似的人们传递了一个重要的信息。

sentences.english: It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (= communicate what you want to say ) without being so angry.
sentences.chinese: 就算不这么生气，你也完全可以把意思说清楚。

sentences.english: They use illustrations to convey their message.
sentences.chinese: 他们用图示来表达他们的意思。

detailed_translations.english: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc

name: non-attendance
trans: Not Found

name: technology
trans: n. 技术；工艺；术语

sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

name: benefit
trans: n. 利益，好处；救济金

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

name: specific
trans: n. 特性；细节；特效药

sentences.english: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.chinese: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.english: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

detailed_translations.english: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
particular details

name: vulnerable
trans: adj. 易受攻击的，易受…的攻击；易受伤害的；有弱点的

sentences.english: He took advantage of me when I was at my most vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 他在我最脆弱的时候利用了我。

sentences.english: We work mainly with the elderly and other vulnerable groups.
sentences.chinese: 我们主要和老年人以及其他弱势群体打交道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 脆弱的, 易受影响的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is vulnerable can be easily harmed or hurt

name: platform
trans: n. 平台；月台，站台；坛；讲台

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

sentences.english: a small raised platform at one end of the room
sentences.chinese: 房间一端凸起的小讲台

sentences.english: an oil exploration platform
sentences.chinese: 石油勘探平台

detailed_translations.english: the raised place beside a railway track where you get on and off a train in a station

name: connotation
trans: n. 内涵；含蓄；暗示，隐含意义；储蓄的东西（词、语等）

sentences.english: a negative connotation
sentences.chinese: 负面的含义

detailed_translations.chinese: 内涵；含蓄；暗示，隐含意义；储蓄的东西（词、语等）
detailed_translations.english: a quality or an idea that a word makes you think of that is more than its basic meaning

name: ethical
trans: n. 处方药

sentences.english: The president must have the highest ethical standards.
sentences.chinese: 总统必须具备最高的道德水准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伦理的；道德的；凭处方出售的
detailed_translations.english: relating to principles of what is right and wrong

name: environmental
trans: adj. 环境的，周围的；有关环境的

sentences.english: the environmental damage caused by the chemical industry
sentences.chinese: 化学工业对环境造成的破坏

sentences.english: an international meeting to discuss environmental issues
sentences.chinese: 探讨环境问题的国际会议

sentences.english: the environmental impact of pollution from cars
sentences.chinese: 汽车造成的污染对环境的影响

sentences.english: an environmental group
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织

detailed_translations.english: concerning or affecting the air, land, or water on Earth

name: ominous
trans: adj. 预兆的；不吉利的

sentences.english: ‘How long will she be ill?’ he asked. There was an ominous silence.
sentences.chinese: “她的病多久会好？”他问。大家的沉默让人感觉不妙。

sentences.english: The car is making an ominous rattling sound.
sentences.chinese: 汽车在发出一种不妙的咔嗒声。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel that something bad is going to happen

name: integrity
trans: n. 完整；正直；诚实；廉正

sentences.english: I have always regarded him as a man of integrity.
sentences.chinese: 我一直把他当作一个正直诚实的人。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being honest and strong about what you believe to be right

name: aisle
trans: n. 通道，走道；侧廊

sentences.english: Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat (=  seat next to the aisle  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 您想要靠窗的座位还是靠过道的座位？

detailed_translations.english: a long passage between rows of seats in a church, plane, theatre etc, or between rows of shelves in a shop

name: essay
trans: n. 散文；试图；随笔

sentences.english: an essay on Bernard Shaw
sentences.chinese: 关于萧伯纳的文章

sentences.english: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of writing about a particular subject by a student as part of a course of study

name: methane
trans: n. [有化] 甲烷；[能源] 沼气

sentences.english: Methane is one of the principal gases contributing to the greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 甲烷是造成温室效应的主要气体之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: [有化] 甲烷；[能源] 沼气
detailed_translations.english: a gas that you cannot see or smell, which can be burned to give heat

name: diagnose
trans: vt. 诊断；断定

sentences.english: How did they diagnose you?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么给你的诊断的？

sentences.english: What tools do you need to help you diagnose the problem, and where do you get them?
sentences.chinese: 您需要什么工具来帮助您诊断问题，可以从哪里获得这些工具？

sentences.english: Evidently this springs from some defect in their nature, but it is one not altogether easy either to diagnose of to cure.
sentences.chinese: 这种情形显然源于他们本性上的某种缺陷，但是这种缺陷既不容易诊断也不容易治疗。

detailed_translations.english: to find out what illness someone has, or what the cause of a fault is, after doing tests, examinations etc

name: phosphorus
trans: n. 磷

sentences.english: Because scientists have found a bacterium that can do without phosphorus—live on arsenic instead.
sentences.chinese: 因为科学家已经发现了一种细菌，可以无需磷生活而以砷代替。

sentences.english: When mixed with sulfur, phosphorus, and the kind of heat you get from, say, friction, it's very unstable.
sentences.chinese: 当与硫磺、磷、你从某处获得的某种热量（比如说摩擦力）混合时，它就变得很不稳定。

sentences.english: He says not only does arsenic belong under phosphorus, I predict that there is an element that lies below aluminum and above indium.
sentences.chinese: 他认为不仅砷属于在磷下面，我预言还有一个元素,是在铝之上和铟的下边的。

detailed_translations.english: Phosphorus is a poisonous yellowish-white chemical element. It glows slightly, and burns when air touches it.

name: notion
trans: n. 概念；见解；打算

sentences.english: She had no notion what he meant.
sentences.chinese: 她根本不明白他是什么意思。

sentences.english: misguided notions of male superiority
sentences.chinese: 男尊女卑的错误观念

detailed_translations.english: an idea, belief, or opinion

name: wheatmeal
trans: n. （未去麸皮的）粗面粉，粗麦粉

name: confront
trans: vt. 面对；遭遇；比较

sentences.english: The problems confronting the new government were enormous.
sentences.chinese: 新政府面临的难题是巨大的。

sentences.english: I confronted him with my suspicions, and he admitted everything.
sentences.chinese: 我当面向他提出我的怀疑，他什么都承认了。

detailed_translations.english: (of problems or a difficult situation) to appear and need to be dealt with by sb

name: reminder
trans: n. 暗示；提醒的人/物；催单

sentences.english: a reminder from the dentist for your check-up
sentences.chinese: 牙医寄来的检查提醒函

detailed_translations.english: something, for example a letter, that reminds you to do something which you might have forgotten

name: attention
trans: n. 注意力；关心；立正！（口令）

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

name: management
trans: n. 管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段

sentences.english: a lack of management skills
sentences.chinese: 缺乏管理技巧

sentences.english: a management consultant
sentences.chinese: 一个管理顾问

sentences.english: management training courses
sentences.chinese: 管理培训课程

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理； 处理； 管理部门， 管理人员
detailed_translations.english: the activity of controlling and organizing the work that a company or organization does

name: fraction
trans: n. 分数；部分；小部分；稍微

sentences.english: I got these shoes at a fraction of the original price.
sentences.chinese: 我以原价的一个零头买到了这双鞋子。

detailed_translations.english: a very small amount of something

name: township
trans: n. 镇区；小镇

sentences.english: ...her 20 years of service with the township and county.
sentences.chinese: ...她为镇区和郡服务的20年。

detailed_translations.english: a town in Canada or the US that has some local government

name: inventive
trans: adj. 发明的；有发明才能的；独出心裁的

sentences.english: It inspired me to be more inventive with my own cooking.
sentences.chinese: 它激励我在自己烹饪时更具创造力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明的；有发明才能的；独出心裁的
detailed_translations.english: An inventive person is good at inventing things or has clever and original ideas

name: arrangement
trans: n. 布置；整理；准备

sentences.english: Have you made all your travel arrangements?
sentences.chinese: 你的旅行都安排好了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 整理， 排列； 安排； 准备工作
detailed_translations.english: plans and preparations that you must make so that something can happen

name: violate
trans: vt. 违反；侵犯，妨碍；亵渎

sentences.english: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.english: regimes that violate human rights
sentences.chinese: 侵犯人权的政权

detailed_translations.english: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

name: dismal
trans: n. 低落的情绪

sentences.english: The future looks pretty dismal right now.
sentences.chinese: 目前前景似乎相当暗淡。

sentences.english: a dismal, grey afternoon
sentences.chinese: 一个阴沉灰暗的下午

detailed_translations.chinese: 凄凉的，忧郁的；阴沉的，沉闷的
detailed_translations.english: if a situation or a place is dismal, it is so bad that it makes you feel very unhappy and hopeless

name: horn
trans: n. 喇叭，号角；角

sentences.english: A mature cow has horns.
sentences.chinese: 成年母牛头上长有角。

detailed_translations.english: a container in the shape of an animal’s horn, used in the past for drinking from, carrying  gunpowder  etc

name: exclusion
trans: n. 排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物

sentences.english: Your essays tend to concentrate on one theme to the exclusion of everything else.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章往往会集中于一个主题而不顾及其他各个方面。

detailed_translations.chinese: 排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物
detailed_translations.english: when someone is not allowed to take part in something or enter a place

name: holiday
trans: n. 假日；节日；休息日

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 学校假期从明天开始。

sentences.english: a national holiday
sentences.chinese: 全国假日

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

name: cathedral
trans: n. 大教堂

sentences.english: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world .
sentences.chinese: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Rosie gray is the one and only person , if it had not been for her , this crystal cathedral would not be here.
sentences.chinese: 她就是那一位，唯一的一人若没有她，水晶宫大教堂不会存在，这事工永远不会展开。

detailed_translations.english: the main church of a particular area under the control of a  bishop

name: tasteless
trans: adj. 无味的；无鉴赏力的

sentences.english: The fish was mushy and tasteless.
sentences.chinese: 这鱼烧得烂而无味。

detailed_translations.english: food or drink that is tasteless is unpleasant because it has no particular taste

name: exemplify
trans: vt. 例证；例示

sentences.english: Problems are exemplified in the report.
sentences.chinese: 问题都在报告中作了举例说明。

detailed_translations.english: to give an example of something

name: original
trans: n. 原件；原作；原物；原型

sentences.english: The land was returned to its original owner.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地归还给了原主。

sentences.english: The kitchen still has many original features (= parts that were there when the house was first built ).
sentences.chinese: 这间厨房仍保留着当初的许多特点。

sentences.english: the original meaning of the word
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的原意

sentences.english: The original plan was to fly out to New York.
sentences.chinese: 原先的计划是飞往纽约。

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening first, before other people or things

name: latter
trans: adj. 后者的；近来的；后面的；较后的

sentences.english: In the latter case, buyers pay a 15% commission.
sentences.chinese: 在后一种情况下，买家付15%的佣金。

detailed_translations.english: being the second of two people or things, or the last in a list just mentioned

name: novelty
trans: n. 新奇；新奇的事物；新颖小巧而廉价的物品

sentences.english: Many toys have no attraction beyond their novelty value.
sentences.chinese: 许多玩具除了有些新奇感之外，别无吸引力。

sentences.english: Then the Internet was still something of a novelty.
sentences.chinese: 那时因特网还是个挺新鲜的东西。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being new, unusual, and interesting

name: impervious
trans: adj. 不受影响的，无动于衷的；不能渗透的

sentences.english: impervious volcanic rock
sentences.chinese: 不透水的火山岩

detailed_translations.chinese: 不受影响的，无动于衷的；不能渗透的
detailed_translations.english: not affected or influenced by something and seeming not to notice it

name: potion
trans: n. 一剂；一服；饮剂

sentences.english: a magic potion
sentences.chinese: 魔法药水

sentences.english: a love potion
sentences.chinese: 春药饮剂

detailed_translations.english: a drink intended to have a special or magical effect on the person who drinks it, or which is intended to poison them

name: symptom
trans: n. [临床] 症状；征兆

sentences.english: One of the most common symptoms of schizophrenia is hearing imaginary voices.
sentences.chinese: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。

detailed_translations.english: something wrong with your body or mind which shows that you have a particular illness

name: coalition
trans: n. 联合；结合，合并

sentences.english: the centre-right coalition government
sentences.chinese: 政治上中间偏右的联合政府

sentences.english: an emergency meeting of the three coalition parties
sentences.chinese: 三个联盟政党召开的一次紧急会议

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合体， 同盟； 结合， 联合
detailed_translations.english: a union of two or more political parties that allows them to form a government or fight an election together

name: cast
trans: n. 投掷，抛；铸件，[古生] 铸型；演员阵容；脱落物

sentences.english: the shade cast by low-hanging branches
sentences.chinese: 低垂的树枝投下的阴影

detailed_translations.english: to make light or a shadow appear somewhere

detailed_translations.chinese: 演员表， 全体演员； 石膏绷带； 铸型， 铸件； 投， 抛
detailed_translations.english: all the people who perform in a play, film etc

name: ancestor
trans: n. 始祖，祖先；被继承人

sentences.english: My ancestors were French.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖先是法国人。

detailed_translations.english: a member of your family who lived a long time ago

name: pilot
trans: n. 飞行员；领航员

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.english: a fighter pilot
sentences.chinese: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.english: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .
sentences.chinese: 那宗事故的官方报告称事故是由飞行员失误造成的。

sentences.english: The plan is to launch a pilot programme next summer.
sentences.chinese: 计划是在明年夏天实施一个试验性方案。

detailed_translations.english: someone who operates the controls of an aircraft or spacecraft
A pilot plan or a pilot project is one that is used to test an idea before deciding whether to introduce it on a larger scale
to guide an aircraft, spacecraft, or ship as its pilot

name: momentary
trans: adj. 瞬间的；短暂的；随时会发生的

sentences.english: There was a momentary pause.
sentences.chinese: 停顿了片刻。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瞬间的；短暂的；随时会发生的
detailed_translations.english: continuing for a very short time

name: strife
trans: n. 冲突；争吵；不和

sentences.english: Money is a major cause of strife in many marriages.
sentences.chinese: 钱在许多婚姻中是导致冲突的一个主要原因。

detailed_translations.english: trouble between two or more people or groups

name: autumn
trans: n. 秋天；成熟期；渐衰期，凋落期

sentences.english: autumn mists
sentences.chinese: 秋天的雾霭

detailed_translations.english: the season between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes cooler

name: commit
trans: vt. 犯罪，做错事；把...交托给；指派…作战；使…承担义务

sentences.english: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
sentences.chinese: 女性犯罪比男性少。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯， 干； 使承诺； 把…托付给； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
detailed_translations.english: to do something wrong or illegal

name: underneath
trans: prep. 在…的下面；在…的形式下；在…的支配下

sentences.english: He got out of the car and looked underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他下车往底下看了看。

sentences.english: It’s near where the railway goes underneath the road.
sentences.chinese: 它靠近铁路从公路下方穿过的地方。

sentences.english: She was wearing a smart jacket with a T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了件时髦的夹克，里面是一件 T 恤衫。

sentences.english: Her blonde hair was hidden underneath a baseball cap.
sentences.chinese: 一顶棒球帽裹住了她的满头金发。

sentences.english: He has on his jeans and a long-sleeved blue denim shirt with a white T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他身穿牛仔裤和一件蓝色长袖粗斜纹棉布衬衫，里面还有件白色T恤衫。

sentences.english: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fixtures.
sentences.chinese: 射击场被一排排宝石红照明装置从下面照亮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…的下面；在…的形式下；在…的支配下
detailed_translations.english: directly under another object or covered by it
Underneath is also an adverb
the bottom surface of something, or the part of something that is below or under something else

name: owe
trans: vt. 欠；感激；应给予；应该把……归功于

sentences.english: How much do I owe you (= often used to show that you want to pay for something )?
sentences.chinese: 我该付你多少钱？

sentences.english: He owes his success to hard work.
sentences.chinese: 他的成功是靠勤奋工作。

detailed_translations.english: to need to pay someone for something that they have done for you or sold to you, or to need to give someone back money that they have lent you

name: initiative
trans: n. 主动权；首创精神

sentences.english: I wish my son would show more initiative.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我的儿子能表现得再主动一些。

sentences.english: Don’t keep asking me for advice. Use your initiative.
sentences.chinese: 别老是要我给你出主意，发挥一下你自己的决断能力吧。

sentences.english: Lt. Carlos was not obeying orders. He acted on his own initiative (= he was not told what to do ).
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯中尉没有服从命令，而是自作主张。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to make decisions and take action without waiting for someone to tell you what to do

name: disagree
trans: vi. 不同意；不一致；争执；不适宜

sentences.english: Barr strongly disagreed with Kronfeld’s statement.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔强烈反对克龙费尔德的说法。

sentences.english: The statements of several witnesses disagree.
sentences.chinese: 几名证人的证词不一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express a different opinion from someone else

name: fragrance
trans: n. 香味，芬芳

sentences.english: ...a shrubby plant with a strong characteristic fragrance.
sentences.chinese: …一种有独特浓郁香味的灌木。

detailed_translations.english: a pleasant smell

name: technician
trans: n. 技师，技术员；技巧纯熟的人

sentences.english: a laboratory technician
sentences.chinese: 实验室技术人员

sentences.english: a hospital technician
sentences.chinese: 医院技术人员

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to check equipment or machines and make sure that they are working properly

name: referee
trans: n. 裁判员；调解人；介绍人

sentences.english: His headmaster agreed to act as his referee.
sentences.chinese: 他的校长同意做他的推荐人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who makes sure that the rules of a sport such as football,  basketball  , or  boxing  , are followed
to be the referee of a game

name: scale
trans: n. 规模；比例；鳞；刻度；天平；数值范围

sentences.english: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.chinese: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大小，规模；等级，级别；天平，磅秤；比例；刻度，标度；鳞
detailed_translations.english: the size or level of something, or the amount that something is happening
to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

name: motive
trans: n. 动机，目的；主题

sentences.english: What do you suppose the killer’s motive was?
sentences.chinese: 你认为凶手的动机是什么？

sentences.english: The violence was clearly prompted by political motives.
sentences.chinese: 这次暴力事件显然是由政治动机引发的。

sentences.english: It’s not the kind of thing he’d do unless he had an ulterior motive (= a reason he kept hidden ) .
sentences.chinese: 他不会做这种事的，除非他另有隐情。

detailed_translations.english: the reason that makes someone do something, especially when this reason is kept hidden
the motive power or force for a machine, vehicle etc makes it move

name: raw
trans: n. 擦伤处

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: grated raw carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的生胡萝卜

sentences.english: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 洋白菜可以生吃。

sentences.english: raw sugar
sentences.chinese: 原糖

detailed_translations.english: not cooked

name: magnanimity
trans: n. 宽宏大量；慷慨

name: vivid
trans: adj. 生动的；鲜明的；鲜艳的

sentences.english: I’ve got vivid memories of that summer.
sentences.chinese: 我对那年夏天记忆犹新。

sentences.english: He had a vivid picture of her in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的脑海中清晰地留着她的形象。

detailed_translations.english: vivid memories, dreams, descriptions etc are so clear that they seem real

name: policeman
trans: n. 警察，警员；[分化] 淀帚（橡皮头玻璃搅棒）

sentences.english: He tried to corrupt the policeman with money.
sentences.chinese: 他设法用金钱向警察行贿。

sentences.english: The thief withered under the stare of the policeman.
sentences.chinese: 小偷在警察的逼视下显得惶恐不安。

sentences.english: I think he must be a policeman, he keeps fishing for information.
sentences.chinese: 我想他肯定是警察，他不断地转弯抹角地打听消息。

detailed_translations.english: A policeman is a man who is a member of the police force

name: affluent
trans: n. 支流；富人

sentences.english: affluent families
sentences.chinese: 富裕的家庭

sentences.english: The diet of the affluent has not changed much over the decades.
sentences.chinese: 富人的饮食数十年来没怎么变。

detailed_translations.english: having plenty of money, nice houses, expensive things etc
The affluent are people who are affluent

name: oceanic
trans: adj. 海洋的；海洋产出的；在海洋中生活的；广阔无垠的

sentences.english: an oceanic island
sentences.chinese: 大洋岛

sentences.english: oceanic waters
sentences.chinese: 海域

detailed_translations.english: relating to the ocean

name: obligate
trans: vt. 使负义务；强使，强迫；对…施以恩惠

sentences.english: The ruling obligates airlines to release information about their flight delays.
sentences.chinese: 这一裁决迫使航空公司公布航班晚点信息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使负义务；强使，强迫；对…施以恩惠
detailed_translations.english: to make someone have to do something, because it is the law, their duty, or the right thing to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 有责任的，有义务的；必需的

name: aesthetic
trans: adj. 美的；美学的；审美的，具有审美趣味的

sentences.english: From an esthetic point of view, it’s a nice design.
sentences.chinese: 从美学角度看，这是个不错的设计。

sentences.english: a work of great aesthetic appeal
sentences.chinese: 极富美之神韵的作品

detailed_translations.english: connected with beauty and the study of beauty

name: equal
trans: n. 对手；匹敌；同辈；相等的事物

sentences.english: Both candidates received an equal number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 两位候选人的得票数相等。

sentences.english: I’m not sure he’s equal to the task.
sentences.chinese: 我不确定他是否能胜任这项任务。

sentences.english: He treats all his staff as equals.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有员工都一视同仁。

sentences.english: Two plus two equals four.
sentences.chinese: 二加二等于四。

detailed_translations.english: the same in size, number, amount, value etc as something else
someone who is as important, intelligent etc as you are, or who has the same rights and opportunities as you do
to be exactly the same in size, number, or amount as something else

name: wisdom
trans: n. 智慧，才智；明智；学识；至理名言

sentences.english: a man of great wisdom
sentences.chinese: 一个有大智慧的男人

sentences.english: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫总能冒出几句至理名言。

detailed_translations.english: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life

name: asteroid
trans: n. [天] 小行星；[无脊椎] 海盘车；小游星

sentences.english: Astronomers have detected an asteroid not far from Earth, moving in the same orbit around the Sun.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家在距离地球不远处发现一颗与地球绕日轨道相同的小行星。

sentences.english: Look at the movies that we see all the time. It's easy to imagine the end of the world. An asteroid destroying all life and so on.
sentences.chinese: 瞧瞧那些我们一直在看的电影，要想像世界末日那是很容易的事，比如一个小行星毁灭了所有生命之类的。

sentences.english: Moving on through the asteroid belt we enter the realms of the gas giant planets: Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune, all of which dwarf the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 穿过小行星带继续前进，我们进入了气体巨行星区域：木星、土星、天王星、海王星，所有这些都使地球看起来像个侏儒。

detailed_translations.english: one of the many small  planet s  that move around the Sun, especially between Mars and Jupiter

name: contribution
trans: n. 贡献；捐献；投稿

sentences.english: All the money has been raised by voluntary contribution.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些钱都是靠自愿捐献筹集的。

detailed_translations.english: something that you give or do in order to help something be successful

name: inadvertently
trans: adv. 非故意地，无心地

sentences.english: Viruses can be spread inadvertently by email users.
sentences.chinese: 病毒会被电子邮件用户无意中传播开来。

sentences.english: Robinson’s name was inadvertently omitted from the list.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾逊的名字被人无意之中从名单上漏掉了。

detailed_translations.english: without realizing what you are doing

name: cycle
trans: n. 循环；周期；自行车；整套；一段时间

sentences.english: a woman’s menstrual cycle
sentences.chinese: 女性的月经周期

detailed_translations.chinese: 自行车、 摩托车； 循环
detailed_translations.english: a number of related events that happen again and again in the same order

name: individual
trans: n. 个人，个体

sentences.english: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.chinese: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.english: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.chinese: 每位顾客的需求

detailed_translations.english: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in

name: stint
trans: n. 节约；定额，定量

detailed_translations.english: to provide or use too little of something

name: minority
trans: n. 少数民族；少数派；未成年

sentences.english: Gaelic is still spoken in Ireland by a tiny minority.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰仍有极少数人在说盖尔语。

detailed_translations.english: a small group of people or things within a much larger group

name: communication
trans: n. 通讯，[通信] 通信；交流；信函

sentences.english: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication.
sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.english: There has been a breakdown in communication (= failure to communicate ) .
sentences.chinese: 沟通失败。

sentences.english: Paris has good communications with many European cities.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎与许多欧洲城市之间交通便捷。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

name: reward
trans: n. [劳经] 报酬；报答；酬谢

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.english: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

detailed_translations.english: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked fo

name: distress
trans: n. 危难，不幸；贫困；悲痛

sentences.english: The dream had distressed her greatly.
sentences.chinese: 这场梦使她深感不安。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very upset

name: innovation
trans: n. 创新，革新；新方法

sentences.english: We must encourage innovation if the company is to remain competitive.
sentences.chinese: 公司要想保持竞争力，就必须鼓励革新。

sentences.english: recent innovations in English teaching
sentences.chinese: 英语教学的新创举

detailed_translations.english: the introduction of new ideas or methods

name: block
trans: n. 块；街区；大厦；障碍物

sentences.english: a wall made of concrete blocks
sentences.chinese: 由混凝土块砌成的墙

detailed_translations.english: a piece of hard material such as wood or stone with straight sides
to prevent anything moving through a space by being or placing something across it or in it

detailed_translations.chinese: 成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的

name: rectify
trans: vt. 改正；精馏；整流

sentences.english: I did my best to rectify the situation, but the damage was already done.
sentences.chinese: 我竭尽全力去挽回局面，但损害已经造成了。

detailed_translations.english: to correct something that is wrong

name: transport
trans: n. 运输；运输机；狂喜；流放犯

sentences.english: trucks used for transporting oil
sentences.chinese: 运输石油的卡车

sentences.english: Canals were used for the transport of goods.
sentences.chinese: 利用运河来运输货物。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, people etc from one place to another in a vehicle
the process or business of taking goods from one place to another

name: stellar
trans: adj. 星的；星球的；主要的；一流的

sentences.english: the company’s stellar growth
sentences.chinese: 这家公司辉煌的发展

detailed_translations.chinese: 星的；星球的；主要的；一流的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the stars

name: creed
trans: n. 信条，教义

sentences.english: It has never been weaker as a political creed .
sentences.chinese: 作为一种政治信条，它从来没有像现在这样衰微过。

sentences.english: a religious creed
sentences.chinese: 宗教信条

sentences.english: people of all colours and creeds
sentences.chinese: 各种肤色和信仰的人

detailed_translations.english: a set of beliefs or principles

name: correlation
trans: n. [数] 相关，关联；相互关系

sentences.english: ...the correlation between smoking and disease.
sentences.chinese: …吸烟和疾病之间的关联。

detailed_translations.english: a connection between two ideas, facts etc, especially when one may be the cause of the other

name: theme
trans: n. 主题；主旋律；题目

sentences.english: The book’s theme is the conflict between love and duty.
sentences.chinese: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。

sentences.english: Freia’s theme in Wagner’s opera
sentences.chinese: 瓦格纳歌剧中的弗莱雅主旋律

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目；主题；主旋律；（句子的）主位；词干
detailed_translations.english: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc

name: eccentric
trans: n. 古怪的人

sentences.english: His eccentric behaviour lost him his job.
sentences.chinese: 他古怪的行为使他丢了工作。

sentences.english: Aunt Nessy was always a bit eccentric.
sentences.chinese: 内西姑妈总是有点古怪。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is unusual and different from most people
someone who behaves in a way that is different from what is usual or socially accepted

name: terrain
trans: n. [地理] 地形，地势；领域；地带

sentences.english: rocky terrain
sentences.chinese: 多石的地形

detailed_translations.chinese: [地理] 地形，地势；领域；地带
detailed_translations.english: a particular type of land

name: fluent
trans: adj. 流畅的，流利的；液态的；畅流的

sentences.english: She was fluent in English, French, and German.
sentences.chinese: 她的英语、法语和德语都很流利。

detailed_translations.english: able to speak a language very well

name: gross
trans: n. 总额，总数

sentences.english: He abused the Admiral in the grossest terms.
sentences.chinese: 他用最粗俗的字眼辱骂那位海军上将。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone's speech or behaviour is gross, you think it is very coarse, vulgar, or unacceptable

name: horticultural
trans: adj. 园艺的

sentences.english: ...the John A. Sibley Horticultural Centre.
sentences.chinese: …约翰A.西布莉园艺中心。

detailed_translations.english: Horticultural means concerned with horticulture

name: dissemble
trans: vt. 掩饰，掩盖；假装

sentences.english: Henry was not slow to dissemble when it served his purposes.
sentences.chinese: 形势一对他有利，亨利就马上开始隐瞒。

detailed_translations.english: to hide your true feelings, thoughts etc

name: deadline
trans: n. 截止期限，最后期限

sentences.english: I’m always working under pressure to meet deadlines (= finish something on time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我总是在赶工期的压力下工作。

detailed_translations.english: a date or time by which you have to do or complete something

name: conduct
trans: n. 进行；行为；实施

sentences.english: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.chinese: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.english: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.chinese: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.english: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.chinese: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
detailed_translations.english: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
detailed_translations.english: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

name: successful
trans: adj. 成功的；一帆风顺的

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

detailed_translations.english: achieving what you wanted, or having the effect or result you intended

name: per capita
trans: adj. 每人的；人均的

sentences.english: the country’s per capita income
sentences.chinese: 该国的人均收入

sentences.english: the number of crimes that occur per capita
sentences.chinese: 人均犯罪数

detailed_translations.chinese: 每人， 照人数分配的
detailed_translations.english: used to describe the average amount of something in a particular place, calculated according to the number of people who live there

name: decorum
trans: n. 礼仪；礼貌；端正；恪守礼仪

sentences.english: I was treated with decorum and respect throughout the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 整个调查当中我受到了礼遇和尊重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼仪；礼貌；端正；恪守礼仪
detailed_translations.english: Decorum is behaviour that people consider to be correct, polite, and respectable

name: carbohydrate
trans: n. [有化] 碳水化合物；[有化] 糖类

sentences.english: Around one third of our meals should be based on carbohydrate, with roughly one half of these grains being whole.
sentences.chinese: 我们每餐食物应当差不多有三分之一是碳水化合物，大概有一半谷物食品为全麦的。

sentences.english: There have been no studies of the effects of a low carbohydrate diet on pregnancy, so its effect on the fetus, if any, are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 目前为止还没有关于怀孕时低碳水化合物饮食影响的研究，因此如果对胎儿有什么影响也是不知道的。

sentences.english: The reason for this is that carbohydrate consumption stimulates insulin production, which aids the production of muscle glycogen.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为是碳水化合物的消耗刺激了胰岛素的分泌，后者对于肌肉糖原产生有帮助。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is in foods such as sugar, bread, and potatoes, which provides your body with heat and energy and which consists of oxygen,  hydrogen  , and  carbon

name: assimilation
trans: n. 同化；吸收；[生化] 同化作用

sentences.english: Process of soaking up or assimilation of one substance by another.
sentences.chinese: 一种介质向另一种介质渗透和同化的过程。

sentences.english: The first period of the English Renaissance was one of imitation and assimilation.
sentences.chinese: 英国文艺复兴初期只是一个学习模仿与同化的阶段。

sentences.english: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.chinese: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

detailed_translations.english: the process of understanding and using new ideas

name: complementary
trans: adj. 补足的，补充的

sentences.english: The computer and the human mind have different but complementary abilities.
sentences.chinese: 电脑与人脑各不相同，却又互为补充。

detailed_translations.english: complementary things go well together, although they are usually different

name: latent
trans: adj. 潜在的；潜伏的；隐藏的

sentences.english: latent aggression
sentences.chinese: 潜在的侵略

detailed_translations.english: something that is latent is present but hidden, and may develop or become more noticeable in the future

name: expansion
trans: n. 膨胀；阐述；扩张物

sentences.english: The industry underwent a period of rapid expansion.
sentences.chinese: 该产业经历了一轮快速扩张。

detailed_translations.english: when something increases in size, range, amount etc

name: mature
trans: adj. 成熟的；充分考虑的；到期的；成年人的

sentences.english: Laura is very mature for her age.
sentences.chinese: 相对她的年龄来说劳拉是很成熟的。

sentences.english: We’re mature enough to disagree on this issue but still respect each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们都很成熟，尽管我们对此事意见不同，但还是彼此尊重。

sentences.english: As the fish matures, its colours and patternings change.
sentences.chinese: 随着发育成熟，这种鱼的颜色和斑纹都会改变。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a child or young person, who is mature behaves in a sensible and reasonable way, as you would expect an adult to behave
to become fully grown or developed

name: circumstance
trans: n. 环境，情况；事件；境遇

sentences.english: The Soviet Union had been forced by circumstances to sign a pact with Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 苏联为形势所迫同纳粹德国签订了一项条约。

sentences.english: I can’t imagine a circumstance in which I would be willing to steal.
sentences.chinese: 我无法想象我在什么情况下会愿意去偷东西。

sentences.english: Grants are awarded according to your financial circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 补助金根据经济状况发给。

detailed_translations.english: the conditions that affect a situation, action, event etc

name: expressive
trans: adj. 表现的；有表现力的；表达…的

sentences.english: You can train people to be more expressive.
sentences.chinese: 你可以培训人们使其更富于表现力。

sentences.english: ...the present fashion for intuitive, expressive painting.
sentences.chinese: …当前凭直觉的、富于表现力的绘画风尚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现的；有表现力的；表达…的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe a person or their behaviour as expressive, you mean that their behaviour clearly indicates their feelings or intentions

name: evident
trans: adj. 明显的；明白的

sentences.english: Bob ate his lunch with evident enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 显然鲍勃吃午饭吃得津津有味。

detailed_translations.english: easy to see, notice, or understand

name: colleague
trans: n. 同事，同僚

sentences.english: a colleague of mine from the bank
sentences.chinese: 我在银行的一位同事

sentences.english: She discussed the idea with some of her colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 她和几位同事讨论了这个想法。

detailed_translations.english: someone you work with – used especially by professional people

name: crisis
trans: n. 危机；危险期；决定性时刻

sentences.english: The country now faces an economic crisis .
sentences.chinese: 该国目前正面临一场经济危机。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister was criticized for the way in which he handled the crisis .
sentences.chinese: 首相处理危机的方式遭到了批评。

sentences.english: the current debt crisis
sentences.chinese: 当前的债务危机

sentences.english: a major political crisis
sentences.chinese: 重大的政治危机

sentences.english: I was relieved that we had averted yet another financial crisis .
sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.english: Oil companies were heavily criticized when they made large profits during the oil crisis of the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.english: The car industry is now in crisis .
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业现在正处于危机之中。

sentences.english: He doesn’t seem to be very good at crisis management .
sentences.chinese: 他好像不大擅长处理危机。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there are a lot of problems that must be dealt with quickly so that the situation does not get worse or more dangerous

name: enrol
trans: vi. 注册；参军

name: simple
trans: n. 笨蛋；愚蠢的行为；出身低微者

sentences.english: Completing the race is not just a simple matter of physical fitness.
sentences.chinese: 跑完比赛不仅仅是纯粹的体力问题。

sentences.english: I’m afraid Luke’s a bit simple.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得卢克有点笨。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that only one thing is involved

name: alleviate
trans: vt. 减轻，缓和

sentences.english: measures to alleviate poverty
sentences.chinese: 扶贫措施

detailed_translations.english: to make something less painful or difficult to deal with

name: habitation
trans: n. 居住；住所

sentences.english: There was no sign of habitation as far as the eye could see.
sentences.chinese: 放眼望去，了无人烟。

detailed_translations.english: a building that is unfit for human habitation is not safe or healthy for people to live in

name: stress
trans: n. 压力；强调；紧张；重要性；重读

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.english: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

name: item
trans: n. 条款，项目；一则；一件商品（或物品）

sentences.english: He opened the cardboard box and took out each item.
sentences.chinese: 他打开纸板箱把里面的物品一一拿出来。

sentences.english: The store is having a sale on furniture and household items.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店正在减价出售家具和家居用品。

sentences.english: luxury items such as exotic spices and perfumes
sentences.chinese: 异国香料和香水之类的奢侈品

sentences.english: The original 1965 bottle is now a collector’s item (= one of a set of objects people like to collect because they are interesting or valuable ).
sentences.chinese: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔尤指清单上、一群或一组事物中的〕一项，一件，一条
detailed_translations.english: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things

name: smoke
trans: n. 烟；抽烟；无常的事物

sentences.english: I don’t smoke and I don’t drink much.
sentences.chinese: 我不吸烟，酒也喝得不多。

sentences.english: Do you mind if I smoke?
sentences.chinese: 我抽烟你介意吗？

sentences.english: He sat on the grass smoking a cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在草地上吸烟。

sentences.english: He admitted that he had smoked marijuana when he was a student.
sentences.chinese: 他承认在读书时吸过大麻。

sentences.english: a smoking chimney
sentences.chinese: 冒烟的烟囱

sentences.english: Smoke from burning fields drifted across nearby roads.
sentences.chinese: 地里燃烧产生的烟雾飘到了附近的公路上。

detailed_translations.english: to suck or breathe in smoke from a cigarette, pipe etc or to do this regularly as a habit
white, grey or black gas that is produced by something burning

name: donor
trans: n. 捐赠者；供者；赠送人

sentences.english: We urgently need more assistance from donor countries (= countries that give money, food etc to help in poor countries or disaster areas ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们急需捐赠国的更多援助。

sentences.english: An anonymous donor (= whose name is unknown ) has given £500 towards the restoration fund.
sentences.chinese: 一位匿名捐赠者向重建基金捐了500英镑。

sentences.english: ...the severe shortage of donor organs.
sentences.chinese: …捐献器官的严重匮乏。

detailed_translations.english: a person, group etc that gives something, especially money, to help an organization or country

detailed_translations.chinese: 捐献的；经人工授精出生的
detailed_translations.english: Donor organs or parts are organs or parts of the body which people allow doctors to use to help people who are ill

name: jet
trans: n. 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉

sentences.english: He owns a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉
detailed_translations.english: a fast plane with a jet engine
if a liquid or gas jets out from somewhere, it comes quickly out of a small hole

name: drop-out
trans: n. 逃避现实社会的人；中途退学的人；[计] 漏失

name: honorary
trans: n. 名誉学位；获名誉学位者；名誉团体

sentences.english: Brown received an honorary doctorate from Seoul University.
sentences.chinese: 布朗获得了首尔大学的荣誉博士学位。

detailed_translations.english: an honorary title, rank, or university degree is given to someone as an honour

name: unpredictable
trans: n. 不可预言的事

sentences.english: He is utterly unpredictable.
sentences.chinese: 他这个人完全让人捉摸不透。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone or something as unpredictable, you mean that you cannot tell what they are going to do or how they are going to behave

name: aspect
trans: n. 方面；方向；形势；外貌

sentences.english: a south-facing aspect
sentences.chinese: 朝南方向

detailed_translations.english: one part of a situation, idea, plan etc that has many parts

name: unreliable
trans: adj. 不可靠的；靠不住的

sentences.english: The car’s becoming very unreliable.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车的性能变得非常不稳定。

sentences.english: an unreliable witness
sentences.chinese: 不可靠的证人

detailed_translations.english: unable to be trusted or depended on

name: combine
trans: n. 联合收割机；联合企业

sentences.english: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.chinese: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.english: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.chinese: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

detailed_translations.english: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合企业； 联合收割机
detailed_translations.english: a machine used by farmers to cut grain, separate the seeds from it, and clean it

name: eliminate
trans: vt. 消除；排除

sentences.english: a ruthless dictator who eliminated all his rivals
sentences.chinese: 铲除所有异己的残酷独裁者

detailed_translations.english: to completely get rid of something that is unnecessary or unwanted

name: explain
trans: v. 说明；解释

sentences.english: He carefully explained the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 他仔细解释了程序。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone about something in a way that is clear or easy to understand

name: subscribe
trans: vt. 签署；赞成；捐助

sentences.english: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.chinese: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.english: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.english: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

name: recognition
