sentences.english: Crowds burst through the barriers and ran onto the pitch.
sentences.chinese: 人群冲破围栏跑进球场。

sentences.english: The mountains form a natural barrier between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 群山构成了两国之间的天然屏障。

detailed_translations.english: a rule, problem etc that prevents people from doing something, or limits what they can do

name: publication
trans: n. 出版；出版物；发表

sentences.english: The guide is being translated into several languages for publication near Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 这本指南正被翻译成好几种语言，准备在圣诞节前后出版。

sentences.english: a delay in the publication of the exam results
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩的延期公布

detailed_translations.english: the act of printing a book, a magazine, etc. and making it available to the public; a book, a magazine, etc. that has been published

name: frequency
trans: n. 频率；频繁

sentences.english: Businesses come and go with alarming frequency.
sentences.chinese: 商家开张停业惊人地频繁。

sentences.english: the frequency of serious road accidents
sentences.chinese: 重大道路交通事故的发生率

detailed_translations.english: the fact that something happens a lot

name: contemporary
trans: n. 同时代的人；同时期的东西

sentences.english: She writes a lot of contemporary music for people like Whitney Houston.
sentences.chinese: 她为惠特尼·休斯敦等人创作大量当代音乐作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现代的， 当代的； 同时代的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to the present time

name: production
trans: n. 成果；产品；生产；作品

sentences.english: That model won't go into production before late 2007.
sentences.chinese: 那种型号要到2007年底才会投入生产。

sentences.english: a drop in oil and gas production
sentences.chinese: 石油和天然气产量的下降

detailed_translations.english: the process of making or growing things to be sold, especially in large quantities

name: exhaustion
trans: n. 枯竭；耗尽；精疲力竭

sentences.english: We can define burnout as exhaustion.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以把burnout (燃尽)解释为 exhaustion (耗尽)。

sentences.english: Could not this very Socratic way be  a sign of collapse, exhaustion, sickness, and the dissolution of the  anarchic instinct?
sentences.chinese: 这个非常苏格拉底式的方法不能是无法无天的天性的崩塌、耗尽、疾患和解体的一个信号？

detailed_translations.english: when all of something has been used

name: puzzle
trans: n. 谜；难题；迷惑

sentences.english: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 那首诗的含义始终是个谜。

sentences.english: He thought he had solved the puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.english: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
sentences.chinese: 令我不解的是，他的书为什么如此受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: something that is difficult to understand or explain
to confuse someone or make them feel slightly anxious because they do not understand something

name: rural
trans: adj. 农村的，乡下的；田园的，有乡村风味的

sentences.english: a rural setting
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境

sentences.english: rural bus routes
sentences.chinese: 乡村公共汽车路线

detailed_translations.english: happening in or relating to the countryside, not the city

name: coherent
trans: adj. 连贯的，一致的；明了的；清晰的；凝聚性的；互相耦合的；粘在一起的

sentences.english: The three years of the course are planned as a coherent whole.
sentences.chinese: 这三年的课程是作为连贯的整体来安排的。

sentences.english: a coherent account of the incident
sentences.chinese: 对该事件条理分明的陈述

sentences.english: He's so calm when he answers questions in interviews. I wish I could be that coherent.
sentences.chinese: 他如此镇定地回答了访谈中的问题。我希望我也能那样有条不紊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一致的，协调的；(话语等)条理清楚的
detailed_translations.english: if a piece of writing, set of ideas etc is coherent, it is easy to understand because it is clear and reasonable

name: initially
trans: adv. 最初，首先；开头

sentences.english: Stan initially wanted to go to medical school.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦最初想进医学院。

sentences.english: Initially, I thought I would only stay there a year.
sentences.chinese: 起初，我以为我只会在那儿待一年。

detailed_translations.english: at the beginning

name: multitude
trans: n. 群众；多数

sentences.english: I had never seen such a multitude of stars before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从未见过这么多的星星。

sentences.english: a multitude of possible interpretations
sentences.chinese: 种种可能的解释

detailed_translations.english: a very large number of people or things

name: compensation
trans: n. 补偿；报酬；赔偿金

sentences.english: People who are wrongly arrested may be paid compensation .
sentences.chinese: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

detailed_translations.english: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged

name: devolution
trans: n. 相传，转移；委付；依次；落下

sentences.english: ...the devolution of power to the regions.
sentences.chinese: …权力下放到地方。

detailed_translations.english: when a national government gives power to a group or organization at a lower or more local level

name: wavy
trans: adj. 多浪的；波动起伏的

sentences.english: She had short, wavy brown hair.
sentences.chinese: 她有一头又短又卷的褐发。

detailed_translations.english: wavy hair grows in waves

name: illegal
trans: n. 非法移民，非法劳工

sentences.english: illegal drugs
sentences.chinese: 违禁药品

sentences.english: They were involved in illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 他们参与了非法活动。

detailed_translations.english: not allowed by the law

name: salt
trans: n. 盐；风趣，刺激性

sentences.english: This might need some salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 这里面也许要加点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: a pinch of salt
sentences.chinese: 一撮盐

sentences.english: Could you pass the salt?
sentences.chinese: 递一下盐好吗？

detailed_translations.english: a natural white mineral that is added to food to make it taste better or to preserve it

detailed_translations.chinese: 咸水的；含盐的，咸味的；盐腌的；猥亵的
detailed_translations.english: preserved with salt

detailed_translations.chinese: 用盐腌；给…加盐；将盐撒在道路上使冰或雪融化
detailed_translations.english: to add salt to food to make it taste better

name: academic
trans: n. 大学生，大学教师；学者

sentences.english: He possessed no academic qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 他没有学历。

sentences.english: a program to raise academic standards
sentences.chinese: 旨在提高学术水平的计划

detailed_translations.english: relating to education, especially at college or university level

name: recovery
trans: n. 恢复，复原；痊愈；重获

sentences.english: Hopes of economic recovery are fading.
sentences.chinese: 经济复苏的希望越来越渺茫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 恢复， 痊愈； 追回， 寻回， 收复
detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better after an illness, injury etc

name: discovery
trans: n. 发现，发觉；被发现的事物

sentences.english: the discovery of oil in Alaska
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉斯加发现石油

sentences.english: The Hubble Telescope allowed astronomers to make significant discoveries about our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望远镜使天文学家对我们的银河系有了重大发现。

detailed_translations.english: when someone discovers something

name: prospectus
trans: n. 内容说明书；样张；创办计划书；学校的入学简介

sentences.english: ...a prospectus for a new issue of stock.
sentences.chinese: …新发行股票的招股说明书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 内容说明书；样张；创办计划书；学校的入学简介
detailed_translations.english: A prospectus is a detailed document produced by a company, college, or school, which gives details about it

name: ambivalence
trans: n. [心理] 矛盾情绪；正反感情并存

name: emulation
trans: n. [计] 仿真；竞争；效法

name: cognition
trans: n. 认识；知识；认识能力

sentences.english: the regions of the brain that are responsible for memory and cognition
sentences.chinese: 大脑主管记忆与认知的区域

detailed_translations.english: the process of knowing, understanding, and learning something

name: socioeconomic
trans: adj. 社会经济学的

name: considerable
trans: adj. 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的

sentences.english: Michael has already spent considerable time in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔在巴塞罗那已经待了相当长的时间了。

sentences.english: issues of considerable importance
sentences.chinese: 相当重要的问题

sentences.english: The series has aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 这套系列节目引起了观众相当浓厚的兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: fairly large, especially large enough to have an effect or be important

name: barbecue
trans: n. 烤肉；吃烤肉的野宴

sentences.english: On New Year's Eve we had a barbecue on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 除夕那天我们在海滩上举行了烧烤野餐。

sentences.english: barbecued chicken
sentences.chinese: 〔用烤架烧的〕烤鸡

detailed_translations.english: a meal or party during which food is cooked on a metal frame over a fire and eaten outdoors
to cook food on a metal frame over a fire outdoors

name: shunt
trans: vt. 使转轨；使分流；回避讨论；推延

detailed_translations.chinese: 使转轨；使分流；回避讨论；推延
detailed_translations.english: to move a train or railway carriage onto a different track
an act of moving a train or railway carriage to a different track

name: neglect
trans: vt. 疏忽，忽视；忽略

sentences.english: She smoked and drank, neglected the children, and left the clothes unmended.
sentences.chinese: 她抽烟喝酒，既不照顾孩子，也不缝补衣服。

sentences.english: a neglected garden
sentences.chinese: 疏于打理的花园

sentences.english: The building has been badly neglected.
sentences.chinese: 这栋大楼严重疏于维护。

detailed_translations.english: to fail to look after someone or something properly

name: mitigate
trans: vt. 使缓和，使减轻

sentences.english: Measures need to be taken to mitigate the environmental effects of burning more coal.
sentences.chinese: 需要采取措施来减轻燃煤增加对环境造成的影响。

detailed_translations.english: to make a situation or the effects of something less unpleasant, harmful, or serious

name: suppress
trans: vt. 抑制；镇压；废止

sentences.english: The uprising was ruthlessly suppressed.
sentences.chinese: 起义受到了残酷的镇压。

detailed_translations.english: to stop people from opposing the government, especially by using force

name: a host
trans: Not Found

name: incentive
trans: n. 动机；刺激

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

name: false positive
trans: Not Found

name: scarcity
trans: n. 不足；缺乏

sentences.english: ...an ever increasing scarcity of water.
sentences.chinese: …越来越匮乏的水资源。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is not enough of something

name: background
trans: n. 背景；隐蔽的位置

sentences.english: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.chinese: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.english: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.chinese: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.english: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.chinese: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
detailed_translations.english: someone’s family, education, previous work etc

name: predictable
trans: adj. 可预言的

sentences.english: The snow had a predictable effect on traffic.
sentences.chinese: 这场雪对交通造成的影响可以预见。

sentences.english: an entertaining but predictable film
sentences.chinese: 一部有趣但老套的电影

sentences.english: Logan’s reaction was predictable.
sentences.chinese: 洛根的反应可想而知。

detailed_translations.english: if something or someone is predictable, you know what will happen or what they will do – sometimes used to show disapproval

name: establish
trans: vi. 植物定植

sentences.english: He’d already begun to establish quite a reputation as a journalist.
sentences.chinese: 身为记者，他已经声名鹊起。

sentences.english: He had three years in which to establish himself as Prime Minister.
sentences.chinese: 他有三年时间来确立自己首相的地位。

detailed_translations.english: to make people accept that you can do something, or that you have a particular quality

name: linguist
trans: n. 语言学家

sentences.english: He had a scholarly air and was an accomplished linguist.
sentences.chinese: 他有一种学者的风度，而且是个熟练掌握多国语言的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who studies or teaches linguistics

name: privilege
trans: n. 特权；优待

sentences.english: He had no special privileges and was treated just like every other prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他不享受特权，待遇和任何其他犯人一样。

detailed_translations.english: a special advantage that is given only to one person or group of people

name: representation
trans: n. 代表；表现；表示法；陈述

sentences.english: The clock in the painting is a symbolic representation of the passage of time.
sentences.chinese: 画上的时钟象征着光阴的流逝。

sentences.english: A group of students made representations to the college about the poor standard of the accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 一群学生就恶劣的住宿条件同校方交涉。

sentences.english: Minority groups need more effective parliamentary representation.
sentences.chinese: 少数族群需要办事更为高效的议会代表。

detailed_translations.english: a painting, sign, description etc that shows something

name: effective
trans: adj. 有效的，起作用的；实际的，实在的；给人深刻印象

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.chinese: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.english: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.chinese: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

name: clean-shaven
trans: adj. 胡子刮光了的；不蓄胡子的

name: wealth
trans: n. 财富；大量；富有

sentences.english: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.english: the distribution of wealth
sentences.chinese: 财富的分配

sentences.english: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
sentences.chinese: 工业的目的就是创造财富。

detailed_translations.chinese: 财富； 财产； 丰富
detailed_translations.english: a large amount of money, property etc that a person or country owns

name: park
trans: n. 公园；[交] 停车场

sentences.english: Let’s go for a walk in the park.
sentences.chinese: 我们去公园散步吧。

sentences.english: a park bench
sentences.chinese: 公园长椅

sentences.english: a flat overlooking Hyde Park
sentences.chinese: 一套可以俯瞰海德公园的公寓

detailed_translations.english: a large open area with grass and trees, especially in a town, where people can walk, play games etc

name: certainly
trans: adv. 当然；行（用于回答）；必定

sentences.english: They’re certainly not mine.
sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.english: ‘I’d like a beer, please.’ ‘Certainly, sir.’
sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.english: ‘Can I come along?’ ‘Certainly.’
sentences.chinese: “我可以一起去吗？”“当然可以。”

detailed_translations.english: without doubt

name: ward
trans: n. 病房；保卫；监视

sentences.english: the other patients in the ward
sentences.chinese: 病房里的其他病人

detailed_translations.english: a large room in a hospital where people who need medical treatment stay

name: goat
trans: n. 山羊；替罪羊（美俚）；色鬼（美俚）

sentences.english: The tiger sprang on the goat.
sentences.chinese: 老虎向山羊扑去。

sentences.english: The goat bunted the calf.
sentences.chinese: 山羊用角抵小牛。

sentences.english: They staked the goat in the back yard.
sentences.chinese: 他们把山羊拴在后院的木桩上。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that has horns on top of its head and long hair under its chin, and can climb steep hills and rocks. Goats live wild in the mountains or are kept as farm animals.

name: admittance
trans: n. 进入；入场权；通道

sentences.english: Gaining admittance to the club was no easy matter.
sentences.chinese: 获准进入那家俱乐部并非易事。

detailed_translations.english: permission to enter a place

name: income
trans: n. 收入，收益；所得

sentences.english: low-income families
sentences.chinese: 低收入家庭

detailed_translations.english: the money that you earn from your work or that you receive from investments, the government etc

name: minimum
trans: n. 最小值；最低限度；最小化；最小量

sentences.english: This will take a minimum of one hour.
sentences.chinese: 这最少要用一个小时。

sentences.english: The minimum number of students we need to run the course is fifteen.
sentences.chinese: 我们开这门课程最少要有15个学生。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest amount of something or number of things that is possible or necessary
the minimum number, degree, or amount of something is the smallest or least that is possible, allowed, or needed

name: derive
trans: vt. 源于；得自；获得

sentences.english: Mr. Ying is one of those happy people who derive pleasure from helping others.
sentences.chinese: 英先生是那种助人为乐的快活人。

detailed_translations.english: to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
to develop or come from something else

name: rash
trans: n. [皮肤] 皮疹；突然大量出现的事物

sentences.english: Please Jessie, don’t do anything rash.
sentences.chinese: 求你了，杰西，不要草率行事。

sentences.english: Don’t go making any rash decisions about your future!
sentences.chinese: 不要对你的未来贸然作决定！

sentences.english: It was rather rash of you to lend them your car.
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车借给他们实在有欠考虑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻率的；鲁莽的；不顾后果的
detailed_translations.english: if you are rash, you do things too quickly, without thinking carefully about whether they are sensible or not

detailed_translations.chinese: [皮肤] 皮疹；突然大量出现的事物
detailed_translations.english: a lot of red spots on someone’s skin, caused by an illness

name: inspire
trans: vt. 激发；鼓舞；启示；产生；使生灵感

sentences.english: We need someone who can inspire the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

sentences.english: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
sentences.chinese: 阳光明媚的天气令人振奋，我决定到森林里寻幽探胜。

sentences.english: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事的创作灵感来自与一位俄国老公爵的不期而遇。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something

name: disapproval
trans: n. 不赞成；不喜欢

sentences.english: His action had been greeted with almost universal disapproval.
sentences.chinese: 他的行动遭到了几乎一致的反对。

detailed_translations.english: If you feel or show disapproval of something or someone, you feel or show that you do not approve of them

name: precipitation
trans: n. [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽
detailed_translations.english: rain, snow etc that falls on the ground, or the amount of rain, snow etc that falls

name: tong
trans: n. 帮会，堂；钳子

name: would-be
trans: n. 想要成为…人

name: efficacy
trans: n. 功效，效力

sentences.english: Recent medical studies confirm the efficacy of a healthier lifestyle.
sentences.chinese: 近来的医学研究证实了更健康的生活方式的功效。

detailed_translations.english: the ability of something to produce the right result

name: subsidy
trans: n. 补贴；津贴；补助金

sentences.english: European farmers are planning a massive demonstration against farm subsidy cuts.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的农场主们正在策划一场反对削减农场补贴的大游行。

detailed_translations.english: money that is paid by a government or organization to make prices lower, reduce the cost of producing goods etc

name: supreme
trans: n. 至高；霸权

sentences.english: the Supreme Allied Commander in Europe
sentences.chinese: 欧洲盟军最高指挥官

sentences.english: a country where the car reigns supreme
sentences.chinese: 汽车占绝对优势地位的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高的；至高的；最重要的
detailed_translations.english: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence

name: worthy
trans: n. 杰出人物；知名人士

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

sentences.english: A couple of other books are worthy of mention.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些其他的书值得一提

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

name: amend
trans: vt. 修改；改善，改进

sentences.english: The law was amended to include women.
sentences.chinese: 该法律经修改把女性也包括在内。

sentences.english: The defendant later amended his evidence.
sentences.chinese: 被告后来修改了证词。

sentences.english: ‘Steve stole it – or rather borrowed it,’ he amended.
sentences.chinese: “史蒂夫偷的——应该说是借的。”他改口道。

detailed_translations.english: to correct or make small changes to something that is written or spoken

name: teamwork
trans: n. 团队合作；协力

sentences.english: We want to encourage good teamwork and communication.
sentences.chinese: 我们要鼓励良好的团队合作和沟通。

detailed_translations.english: when a group of people work effectively together

name: currency
trans: n. 货币；通货

sentences.english: The bank can supply you with foreign currency .
sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.english: There are moves towards a single currency in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有向单一货币发展的趋势。

sentences.english: The local currency is the Swiss franc.
sentences.chinese: 当地的货币是瑞士法郎。

detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money that a country uses

name: minor
trans: adj. 未成年的；次要的；较小的；小调的；二流的

sentences.english: We have made some minor changes to the program.
sentences.chinese: 我们对那个程序做了一些小改动。

sentences.english: a relatively minor error
sentences.chinese: 相对较小的错误

sentences.english: a minor road
sentences.chinese: 小路

sentences.english: They played only a minor role in local government.
sentences.chinese: 他们在当地政府里只是扮演次要角色。

detailed_translations.english: small and not very important or serious, especially when compared with other things

name: introduce
trans: vt. 介绍；引进；提出；采用

sentences.english: Several senators introduced legislation aimed at sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 几位参议员提交了针对性骚扰的立法议案。

detailed_translations.english: to formally present a possible new law to be discussed

name: regurgitation
trans: n. 回流；反刍；流回

name: shopper
trans: n. 购物者；顾客

sentences.english: The streets were crowded with shoppers.
sentences.chinese: 街上挤满了购物的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys things in shops

name: export
trans: n. 输出，出口；出口商品

sentences.english: Italian food has been exported all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

detailed_translations.english: to sell goods to another country
to sell goods to another country
the business of selling and sending goods to other countries

name: swarm
trans: n. 蜂群；一大群

sentences.english: Within minutes the area was swarming with officers who began searching a nearby wood.
sentences.chinese: 几分钟之内这个地方挤满了警官，他们开始搜查附近的一片树林。

detailed_translations.english: If a place is swarming with people, it is full of people moving about in a busy way
a large group of insects, especially  bee s  ,moving together

name: space
trans: n. 空间；太空；距离

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

name: hormone
trans: n. [生理] 激素，荷尔蒙

sentences.english: ...the male sex hormone testosterone.
sentences.chinese: …男性性激素睾酮。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance produced by your body that influences its growth, development, and condition

name: collaborative
trans: adj. 合作的，协作的

sentences.english: ...a collaborative research project.
sentences.chinese: …一个合作研究项目。

detailed_translations.english: a job or piece of work that involves two or more people working together to achieve something

name: draft
trans: n. 汇票；草稿；选派；（尤指房间、烟囱、炉子等供暖系统中的）（小股）气流

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

name: proportional
trans: n. [数] 比例项

sentences.english: The fee charged by the realtor is directly proportional to the price of the property.
sentences.chinese: 房产代理人收取的费用和房产价格是成正比的。

sentences.english: a proportional increase in costs
sentences.chinese: 成本的相应提高

detailed_translations.chinese: 比例的，成比例的；相称的，均衡的
detailed_translations.english: something that is proportional to something else is in the correct or most suitable relationship to it in size, amount, importance etc

name: pocket
trans: n. 口袋；钱；容器

sentences.english: Luke came in with his hands in his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 卢克走了进来，双手插在口袋里。

sentences.english: The policeman told me to turn out my pockets (= take everything out of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 警察让我把口袋里的东西都掏出来。

sentences.english: a pocket dictionary
sentences.chinese: 袖珍词典

detailed_translations.english: a type of small bag in or on a coat, trousers etc that you can put money, keys etc in
small enough to be carried in your pocket

name: awareness
trans: n. 意识，认识；明白，知道

sentences.english: Health officials have tried to raise awareness (=  improve people’s knowledge  ) about AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部官员努力提高人们对艾滋病的认识。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or understanding of a particular subject or situation

name: competent
trans: adj. 胜任的；有能力的；能干的；足够的

sentences.english: A competent mechanic should be able to fix the problem.
sentences.chinese: 一名合格的机修工应该能够解决这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: having enough skill or knowledge to do something to a satisfactory standard

name: strength
trans: n. 力量；力气；兵力；长处

sentences.english: The police force is below strength at the moment (= there are fewer police than there should be ).
sentences.chinese: 目前警力不足。

sentences.english: the strength of a rope
sentences.chinese: 绳子的强度

detailed_translations.english: the number of people in a team, army etc

name: intelligent
trans: adj. 智能的；聪明的；理解力强的

sentences.english: a group of highly intelligent (= very intelligent )students
sentences.chinese: 一组聪明异常的学生

sentences.english: Sontag was once famously described as the most intelligent woman in America.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔格曾被称为美国最聪明的女人，这是众人皆知的事。

detailed_translations.english: an intelligent person has a high level of mental ability and is good at understanding ideas and thinking clearly

name: duration
trans: n. 持续，持续的时间，期间

sentences.english: The course is of three years’ duration.
sentences.chinese: 该课程为期三年。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that something continues

name: predicament
trans: n. 窘况，困境；状态

sentences.english: the country’s economic predicament
sentences.chinese: 该国的经济困境

sentences.english: She went to the office to explain her predicament .
sentences.chinese: 她到办事处去说明她的难处。

detailed_translations.english: a difficult or unpleasant situation in which you do not know what to do, or in which you have to make a difficult choice

name: individualize
trans: vt. 赋予个性；个别处理；使适应个别需要

name: opportunity
trans: n. 时机，机会

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

name: metamorphosis
trans: n. 变形；变质

name: campus
trans: n. （大学）校园；大学，大学生活；校园内的草地

sentences.english: a beautiful campus in New England
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰的一个美丽校园

detailed_translations.english: the land and buildings of a university or college, including the buildings where students live

name: telescope
trans: n. 望远镜；缩叠式旅行袋

sentences.english: The captain was rectifying his telescope.
sentences.chinese: 船长正在调他的望远镜。

sentences.english: The telescope reveals many distant stars to our sight.
sentences.chinese: 望远镜把许多遥远的星球显现在我们的眼前。

sentences.english: With the aid of a telescope a ship could be made out on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 借助望远镜可以看出在地平线上有一只船。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, used for making distant objects look larger and closer

name: motor
trans: n. 发动机，马达；汽车

sentences.english: an electric motor
sentences.chinese: 电动马达

sentences.english: That’s a nice motor you’ve got, Dave.
sentences.chinese: 你这车不错啊，戴夫。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a machine that makes it work or move, by changing power, especially electrical power, into movement

name: subsidiary
trans: n. 子公司；辅助者

sentences.english: a subsidiary hypothesis
sentences.chinese: 一个附带假设

detailed_translations.english: connected with, but less important than, something else
a company that is owned or controlled by another larger company

name: poll
trans: n. 投票；民意测验；投票数；投票所

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项民意调查发现80%的加利福尼亚人支持州长。

sentences.english: Polls indicate that education is the top issue with voters.
sentences.chinese: 民意调查显示，教育是选民心中的头等大事。

sentences.english: Labour is ahead in the polls.
sentences.chinese: 工党在民意调查中处于领先地位。

sentences.english: The latest public opinion poll showed that 25% of us consider ourselves superstitious.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民意调查显示我们中有25%的人认为自己迷信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out what people think about something by asking many people the same question, or the record of the result

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…进行民意测验； 获得
detailed_translations.english: to ask a lot of people the same questions in order to find out what they think about a subject

name: queen
trans: n. 女王，王后；（纸牌中的）皇后；（蜜蜂等的）蜂王

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白女王

sentences.english: the future queen
sentences.chinese: 未来的王后

sentences.english: the queen of diamonds
sentences.chinese: 方块Q，方块王后

detailed_translations.english: the female ruler of a country

name: increasingly
trans: adv. 越来越多地；渐增地

sentences.english: Marketing techniques are becoming increasingly sophisticated.
sentences.chinese: 市场营销技巧越来越巧妙。

sentences.english: Increasingly, young people distrust all forms of government.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人越来越不相信任何形式的政府。

detailed_translations.english: more and more all the time

name: patriotism
trans: n. 爱国主义；爱国心，爱国精神

sentences.english: He was a country boy who had joined the army out of a sense of patriotism and adventure.
sentences.chinese: 他是个乡下小伙子，出于爱国心和冒险精神参了军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爱国主义；爱国心，爱国精神
detailed_translations.english: Patriotism is love for your country and loyalty toward it

name: mathematics
trans: n. 数学；数学运算

sentences.english: ...a professor of mathematics at Boston College.
sentences.chinese: …一位波士顿大学的数学教授。

detailed_translations.english: the science of numbers and of shapes, including  algebra  ,  geometry  , and  arithmetic

name: cereal
trans: n. 谷类，谷物；谷类食品；谷类植物

sentences.english: a bowl of breakfast cereal
sentences.chinese: 一碗早餐麦片

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷类，谷物；谷类食品；谷类植物
detailed_translations.english: a breakfast food made from grain and usually eaten with milk

name: counter
trans: n. 柜台；对立面；计数器；（某些棋盘游戏的）筹码

sentences.english: He wondered if the girl behind the counter recognised him.
sentences.chinese: 他在想柜台后面的那个女孩是否认出了他。

sentences.english: Set the video counter to zero before you press play.
sentences.chinese: 在按播放键之前，把录像机上的计数器调到零。

detailed_translations.english: the place where you pay or are served in a shop, bank, restaurant etc

name: growth
trans: n. 增长；发展；生长；种植

sentences.english: measures to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 刺激经济增长的措施

detailed_translations.english: an increase in amount, number, or size

name: conundrum
trans: n. 难题；谜语

sentences.english: the conundrum of our purpose on Earth
sentences.chinese: 我们为何目的活在世上这一难题

detailed_translations.english: a confusing and difficult problem

name: fatality
trans: n. 死亡；宿命；致命性；不幸；灾祸

sentences.english: a 50% increase in the number of traffic fatalities
sentences.chinese: 交通事故死亡人数50%的增长

detailed_translations.chinese: 死亡；宿命；致命性；不幸；灾祸
detailed_translations.english: a death in an accident or a violent attack

name: employment
trans: n. 使用；职业；雇用

sentences.english: She was offered employment in the sales office.
sentences.chinese: 她获聘在销售部工作。

sentences.english: terms and conditions of employment
sentences.chinese: 雇用条款和条件

sentences.english: Steve’s still looking for full-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫还在寻找全职工作。

sentences.english: the needs of women who combine paid employment and care for their families
sentences.chinese: 兼顾有薪工作和照料家庭的女性的需要

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作； 雇用； 使用
detailed_translations.english: the condition of having a paid job

name: football
trans: n. 足球，橄榄球

sentences.english: Which football team do you support?
sentences.chinese: 你支持哪个球队？

sentences.english: kids playing football in the street
sentences.chinese: 在街上踢球的小孩子

sentences.english: My Dad took me to watch my first football match .
sentences.chinese: 爸爸带我去看了我人生第一场足球比赛。

sentences.english: a football club
sentences.chinese: 足球俱乐部

detailed_translations.english: a game played by two teams of eleven players who try to kick a round ball into the other team’s  goal

name: disinterested
trans: adj. 无私的；公正的；冷漠的；廉洁的

sentences.english: A lawyer should provide disinterested advice.
sentences.chinese: 律师应该提供客观公正的建议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无私的；公正的；冷漠的；廉洁的
detailed_translations.english: able to judge a situation fairly because you are not concerned with gaining any personal advantage from it

detailed_translations.chinese: 使不再有利害关系；使无兴趣（disinterest的过去分词）

name: search
trans: n. 搜寻；探究，查究

sentences.english: It was too dark to search further.
sentences.chinese: 天太暗，无法继续寻找。

sentences.english: The area was thoroughly searched .
sentences.chinese: 这一地区已被彻底搜查过。

sentences.english: I’ve searched high and low (= everywhere ) for my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 我到处找我的眼镜。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find someone or something by looking very carefully
an attempt to find someone or something

name: binge
trans: n. 狂欢，狂闹；放纵

sentences.english: She went on occasional drinking binges.
sentences.chinese: 她偶尔狂饮一番。

detailed_translations.english: If you go on a binge, you do too much of something, such as drinking alcohol, eating, or spending money
to do too much of something, such as eating or drinking, in a short period of time

name: twin
trans: n. 双胞胎中一人

sentences.english: I always confounded him with his twin brother.
sentences.chinese: 我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.english: The twin brothers were removed from our class.
sentences.chinese: 这一对孪生兄弟已从我们班转走。

sentences.english: The twin brothers bled for their country and died without any regrets.
sentences.chinese: 这对孪生兄弟为国流血牺牲， 死而无憾。

name: bedroom
trans: n. 卧室

sentences.english: a hotel with 50 bedrooms
sentences.chinese: 有50间客房的旅馆

detailed_translations.english: a room for sleeping in

detailed_translations.chinese: 两性关系的；城郊住宅区的

name: attitude
trans: n. 态度；看法；意见；姿势

sentences.english: As soon as they found out I was a doctor, their whole attitude changed.
sentences.chinese: 他们一听说我是医生，态度就完全改变了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 态度， 看法； 姿势
detailed_translations.english: the opinions and feelings that you usually have about something, especially when this is shown in your behaviour

name: illuminate
trans: vt. 阐明，说明；照亮；使灿烂；用灯装饰

sentences.english: A single candle illuminated his face.
sentences.chinese: 一支蜡烛照亮了他的脸。

sentences.english: The report illuminated the difficult issues at the heart of science policy.
sentences.chinese: 报告阐明了科学方针核心部分的难点。

detailed_translations.english: to make a light shine on something, or to fill a place with light

name: entourage
trans: n. 随从；周围；环境

sentences.english: the president and his entourage
sentences.chinese: 总统和他的随行人员

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who travel with an important person

name: devote
trans: vt. 致力于；奉献

sentences.english: He decided to devote the rest of his life to scientific investigation.
sentences.chinese: 他决定把余生奉献给科学研究。

detailed_translations.english: to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone

name: surveillance
trans: n. 监督；监视

sentences.english: electronic surveillance equipment
sentences.chinese: 电子监控设备

detailed_translations.english: when the police, army etc watch a person or place carefully because they may be connected with criminal activities

name: revolution
trans: n. 革命；旋转；运行；循环

sentences.english: the French Revolution of 1789
sentences.chinese: 1789年法国大革命

sentences.english: the planets’ revolution around the sun
sentences.chinese: 行星围绕太阳的公转

detailed_translations.english: an attempt, by a large number of people, to change the government of a country, especially by violent action

name: vicious
trans: adj. 恶毒的；恶意的；堕落的；有错误的；品性不端的；剧烈的

sentences.english: Sarah can be quite vicious at times.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉有时相当狠毒。

sentences.english: a vicious personal attack on the Duchess
sentences.chinese: 对公爵夫人恶毒的人身攻击

sentences.english: She was shocked by the vicious tone in his voice.
sentences.chinese: 她对他恶毒的语气感到震惊。

detailed_translations.english: very unkind in a way that is intended to hurt someone’s feelings or make their character seem bad

name: discreate
trans: Not Found

name: reform
trans: n. 改革，改良；改正

sentences.english: plans to radically reform the tax system
sentences.chinese: 彻底改革税收制度的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 改革， 改良， 改造； 改正， 改过自新
detailed_translations.english: to improve a system, law, organization etc by making a lot of changes to it, so that it operates in a fairer or more effective way

name: frame
trans: n. 框架；结构；[电影] 画面

sentences.english: Newman played a central role in framing the new law.
sentences.chinese: 纽曼在拟定新法的过程中发挥了主要作用。

name: speculate
trans: vi. 推测；投机；思索

sentences.english: She refused to speculate.
sentences.chinese: 她拒绝猜测。

detailed_translations.english: to guess about the possible causes or effects of something, without knowing all the facts or details

name: explicitly
trans: adv. 明确地；明白地

sentences.english: You have to grant us control explicitly.
sentences.chinese: 你们必须允许我们明确地控制。

sentences.english: Tell them explicitly you want to continue the friendship.
sentences.chinese: 明确地告诉他们你想继续这段友谊。

sentences.english: Therefore, you need to include these in your source files explicitly.
sentences.chinese: 因此，您需要将这些都明确地包含进源文件中。

name: initial
trans: n. 词首大写字母

sentences.english: an initial investment of £5,000
sentences.chinese: 5,000英镑的初始投资

sentences.english: The initial response has been encouraging.
sentences.chinese: 最初的反应情况很乐观。

detailed_translations.english: happening at the beginning
the first letter of someone’s first name

name: interpretation
trans: n. 解释；翻译；演出

sentences.english: One possible interpretation is that they want you to resign.
sentences.chinese: 一种可能的解释是，他们想要你辞职。

sentences.english: It’s difficult to put an accurate interpretation on (= explain ) the survey results.
sentences.chinese: 对调查结果难以作出确切的解释。

sentences.english: What exactly the author meant by that statement is open to interpretation (= able to be understood or explained in different ways ).
sentences.chinese: 作者这句话的确切含义可有各种理解。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which someone explains or understands an event, information, someone’s actions etc

name: welcome
trans: n. 欢迎

sentences.english: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.english: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.english: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.english: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place

name: pluralism
trans: n. 多元主义；多元论；兼任

sentences.english: a nation characterized by cultural pluralism
sentences.chinese: 以多元文化为特色的国家

detailed_translations.english: when people of many different races, religions, and political beliefs live together in the same society, or the belief that this can happen successfully

name: qualifier
trans: n. [语] 修饰语

detailed_translations.english: a word or phrase that limits or adds to the meaning of another word or phrase

name: predispose
trans: vt. 预先处置；使…偏向于

sentences.english: They take pains to hire people whose personalities predispose them to serve customers well.
sentences.chinese: 他们煞费苦心雇用那些具备把顾客服务好的个性的人。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone more likely to suffer from a particular health problem

name: geology
trans: n. 地质学；地质情况

sentences.english: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是佐治亚大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.english: the geology of the British Isles
sentences.chinese: 不列颠群岛的地质

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the earth, including the origin and history of the rocks and soil of which the earth is made

name: hunger
trans: n. 饿，饥饿；渴望

sentences.english: Try to satisfy your hunger by eating some fruit.
sentences.chinese: 吃些水果充充饥吧。

sentences.english: her hunger for knowledge
sentences.chinese: 她的求知欲

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you need to eat

name: division
trans: n. [数] 除法；部门；分配；分割；师（军队）；赛区

sentences.english: the division sign (÷)
sentences.chinese: 除号

sentences.english: the Computer Services Division
sentences.chinese: 电脑维修部

detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out how many times one number is contained in another

name: nourish
trans: vt. 滋养；怀有；使健壮

sentences.english: The cream contains vitamin A to nourish the skin.
sentences.chinese: 这种护肤霜含有滋养肌肤的维生素A。

sentences.english: a well nourished baby
sentences.chinese: 营养良好的婴儿

detailed_translations.english: to give a person or other living thing the food and other substances they need in order to live, grow, and stay healthy

name: atmosphere
trans: n. 气氛；大气；空气

sentences.english: The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.english: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
sentences.chinese: 家里的气氛很紧张。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that an event or place gives you

name: belie
trans: vt. 掩饰；与…不符；使失望；证明…虚假错误

sentences.english: Her pleasant manner belied her true character.
sentences.chinese: 她讨人喜欢的举止掩饰了她真实的个性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩饰；与…不符；使失望；证明…虚假错误
detailed_translations.english: to give someone a false idea about something

name: convince
trans: vt. 说服；使确信，使信服

sentences.english: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists

name: irascible
trans: adj. 易怒的

sentences.english: an irascible old man
sentences.chinese: 一位脾气暴躁的老人

detailed_translations.english: easily becoming angry

name: backache
trans: n. 背痛；腰痛

sentences.english: Many workers go home from their first day on the job with either a bad headache or a backache—undoubtedly the result of nervous tension.
sentences.chinese: 许多员工在第一天上班的时候会带着头痛或背痛回家，这无疑就是紧张情绪造成的结果。

sentences.english: This may cause stomach upset, ulcers, headache, backache, high blood pressure and in severe cases can lead to panic attacks or a panic disorder.
sentences.chinese: 这可能会引起胃部不适，溃疡，头痛，背痛，高血压，甚至在严重的情况下可能导致惊恐发作或惊恐障碍等疾病。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in your back

name: distribute
trans: vt. 分配；散布；分开；把…分类

sentences.english: a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
sentences.chinese: 一个向路人派发传单的男子

sentences.english: Make sure that your weight is evenly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 注意让你的重量分布均匀。

detailed_translations.english: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way

name: joint
trans: n. 关节；接缝；接合处，接合点；（牛，羊等的腿）大块肉

sentences.english: The two ministers have issued a joint statement.
sentences.chinese: 两位部长发布了一项联合声明。

sentences.english: Both companies are involved in the joint development of a new medium-sized car.
sentences.chinese: 两家公司联合开发一款新的中型汽车。

sentences.english: The meal was a joint effort(= two or more people worked on it together ).
sentences.chinese: 这顿饭是大家一起做的。

sentences.english: Manchester United and Arsenal are joint favourites to win the title (= are thought to have the same chance of winning ).
sentences.chinese: 曼联和阿森纳均为夺冠的热门球队。

sentences.english: Both parties must sign the form if the account is to be in joint names(= belong to two named people ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这是联名账户的话，双方都必须在表格上签名。

detailed_translations.english: involving two or more people or groups, or owned or shared by them
a part of your body that can bend because two bones meet there

name: plagiarism
trans: n. 剽窃；剽窃物

sentences.english: The journal accused the professor of plagiarism.
sentences.chinese: 那份刊物指控该教授剽窃。

detailed_translations.english: when someone uses another person’s words, ideas, or work and pretends they are their own

name: magnitude
trans: n. 大小；量级；[地震] 震级；重要；光度

sentences.english: an increase of this order of magnitude
sentences.chinese: 如此大幅度的增长

sentences.english: The star varies in brightness by about three magnitudes.
sentences.chinese: 星体的亮度大约分三个星等。

detailed_translations.english: the great size or importance of something

name: interpreter
trans: n. 解释者；口译者；注释器

sentences.english: Speaking through an interpreter (= using an interpreter ), Ahmed said, ‘I’m very worried about my wife and children.’
sentences.chinese: 艾哈迈德通过口译者说:“我很担心我的妻子和孩子们。”

detailed_translations.english: someone who changes spoken words from one language into an-other, especially as their job

name: jabber
trans: n. 快而含糊不清的话

sentences.english: The tourists were jabbering away on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 那些游客在公共汽车上叽叽呱呱地说话。

detailed_translations.english: to talk quickly in an excited and unclear way – used to show disapproval

name: steal
trans: n. 偷窃；便宜货；偷垒；断球

sentences.english: Boys broke into a shop and stole £45 in cash.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们闯进一家商店，盗走了45英镑现金。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that belongs to someone else
to be very cheap

name: harangue
trans: n. 长篇大论；高谈阔论；热烈的演说

detailed_translations.chinese: 长篇大论；高谈阔论；热烈的演说
向…滔滔不绝地演讲；大声训斥

name: warden
trans: n. 区长；看守人；典狱官；学监

detailed_translations.english: a person who is responsible for a particular place and whose job is to make sure its rules are obeyed

name: inaccurate
trans: adj. 错误的

sentences.english: This is a silly and inaccurate way to think about time, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这是一种愚蠢和错误的看待时间的方法。

sentences.english: It could also be an invalidation notice specifying that part of data should not be considered in the integration process because it is inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 它经常是一个无效的通告，部分的数据集成过程中应该不会被考虑，因为他们是错误的。

name: allocate
trans: vt. 分配；拨出；使坐落于

sentences.english: Tickets are limited and will be allocated to those who apply first.
sentences.chinese: 票数有限，将分配给那些先申请的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分配； 分派， 把…拨给
detailed_translations.english: to use something for a particular purpose, give something to a particular person etc, especially after an official decision has been made

name: instruction
trans: n. 指令，命令；指示；教导；用法说明

sentences.english: (= I have been told ) to give the package to him personally.
sentences.chinese: 我接到的指示是亲手把包裹交给他。

sentences.english: Make sure you carry out the doctor’s instructions.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要遵照医生的嘱咐。

sentences.english: The school gives instruction in first aid.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校教授急救课

detailed_translations.english: a statement telling someone what they must do

name: solve
trans: vt. 解决；解答；溶解

sentences.english: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.english: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.chinese: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.english: attempts to solve a mathematical equation
sentences.chinese: 解数学方程式的尝试

detailed_translations.english: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem

name: compel
trans: vt. 强迫，迫使；强使发生

sentences.english: ...the introduction of legislation to compel cyclists to wear a helmet.
sentences.chinese: …强制骑车人戴头盔的法律的引入。

detailed_translations.english: to force someone to do something

name: triple
trans: n. 三倍数；三个一组

sentences.english: a triple murder investigation
sentences.chinese: 对一宗三重谋杀案的调查

sentences.english: a triple bill of horror movies
sentences.chinese: 三部恐怖电影的连续放映

sentences.english: the triple world champion
sentences.chinese: 三连冠世界冠军

sentences.english: a triple bypass heart operation
sentences.chinese: 三重心脏搭桥手术

detailed_translations.chinese: 三部分的，三方的；三倍的，三重的
detailed_translations.english: having three parts or involving three groups, people, events etc
to increase by three times as much, or to make something do this

name: grammatical
trans: adj. 文法的；符合语法规则的

sentences.english: grammatical rules
sentences.chinese: 语法规则

detailed_translations.english: concerning grammar

name: undertake
trans: vt. 承担，保证；从事；同意；试图

sentences.english: University professors both teach and undertake research.
sentences.chinese: 大学教授既要教学又要从事研究工作。

sentences.english: He undertook to pay the money back in six months.
sentences.chinese: 他保证在六个月之内还钱。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself responsible for sth and start doing it

name: illustrative
trans: adj. 说明的；作例证的；解说的

sentences.english: graphics and other illustrative material
sentences.chinese: 图表和其他图解材料

detailed_translations.chinese: 说明的；作例证的；解说的
detailed_translations.english: helping to explain the meaning of something

name: fad
trans: n. 时尚；一时的爱好；一时流行的狂热

sentences.english: Interest in organic food is not a fad, it’s here to stay.
sentences.chinese: 对有机食品的兴趣不是一时的风尚，它是长久的喜好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时尚；一时的爱好；一时流行的狂热
detailed_translations.english: something that people like or do for a short time, or that is fashionable for a short time

name: hardware
trans: n. 计算机硬件；五金器具

sentences.english: 英文例句:To be totally secure, you need a piece of hardware that costs about $200.
sentences.chinese: 为保证绝对安全，你需要一个花费约为两百美元的硬件。

sentences.english: ...a shop from which an uncle had sold hardware and timber.
sentences.chinese: …一家叔叔曾经在那里卖五金器具和木材的店铺。

detailed_translations.english: computer machinery and equipment, as opposed to the programs that make computers work

name: dichotomy
trans: n. 二分法；两分；分裂；双歧分枝

sentences.english: This dichotomy has its uses, but it can cause problems if taken too literally.
sentences.chinese: 这种二分法有它的用途，但如果死板地应用也会引发一些问题。

sentences.english: What is needed is a less rigid dichotomy between the autonomy of nurses and doctors, and more collaborative teamwork.
sentences.chinese: 需要减少护士和医生之间僵化的二分法，并进行更多团队合作。

name: artery
trans: n. 动脉；干道；主流

sentences.english: Of, like, or in an artery or arteries.
sentences.chinese: 动脉的动脉的，似动脉的，或在动脉里的。

sentences.english: When they are found, doctors pass a tube with a balloon into the narrowed area and inflate the balloon to compress plaque deposits against the side of the artery.
sentences.chinese: 当它们被发现后，医生通过一个软管把一个小气球进入狭小的区域并且膨胀这个气球去压缩动脉边沉淀下来的血小板。

sentences.english: This term is used to describe a condition in which the blood supply to part of the brain is suddenly and critically impaired by a blood clot or when a ruptured artery leaks blood into the brain.
sentences.chinese: 该术语是用来形容如下的一种情况：提供给大脑部分的血液突然地削弱，这种削弱是由于血液的凝固或由于动脉割裂导致血液漏到大脑里面。

detailed_translations.english: one of the tubes that carries blood from your heart to the rest of your body

name: synonym
trans: n. 同义词；同义字

sentences.english: The term "industrial democracy" is often used as a synonym for worker participation.
sentences.chinese: “工业民主”这一词语常被用作“工人参与”的同义词。

detailed_translations.english: a word with the same meaning as another word in the same language

name: indeterminate
trans: adj. 不确定的；模糊的；含混的

sentences.english: I hope to carry on for an indeterminate period.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在一段不确定的时间内这样继续下去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不确定的；模糊的；含混的
detailed_translations.english: If something is indeterminate, you cannot say exactly what it is

name: attentive
trans: adj. 留意的，注意的

sentences.english: an attentive audience
sentences.chinese: 聚精会神的听众

detailed_translations.english: listening to or watching someone carefully because you are interested

name: contortion
trans: n. 扭弯；扭歪

name: visualize
trans: vt. 形象，形象化；想像，设想

sentences.english: I tried to visualize the house while he was describing it.
sentences.chinese: 我一边听他描述，一边想象那房子的样子。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture of someone or something in your mind

name: cohort
trans: n. 一群；步兵大队；支持者；同生群

name: articulate
trans: adj. 发音清晰的；口才好的；有关节的

sentences.english: Many people are unable to articulate the unhappiness they feel.
sentences.chinese: 许多人都表达不出内心的痛苦。

detailed_translations.chinese: 清晰地发（音）；明确有力地表达；用关节连接；使相互连贯
detailed_translations.english: to express your ideas or feelings in words

detailed_translations.chinese: 发音清晰的；口才好的；有关节的
detailed_translations.english: writing or speech that is articulate is very clear and easy to understand even if the subject is difficult

name: identify
trans: vt. 确定；鉴定；识别，辨认出；使参与；把…看成一样 vi. 确定；认同；一致

sentences.english: He was too far away to be able to identify faces.
sentences.chinese: 他离得太远，没法看面孔认出谁是谁。

sentences.english: The police took fingerprints and identified the body.
sentences.chinese: 警方采集了指纹，对尸体作了身份确认。

detailed_translations.english: to recognize and correctly name someone or something

name: layer
trans: n. 层，层次；膜；[植]压条；放置者，计划者

sentences.english: He pulled off layer upon layer of clothing (= many layers of clothing ).
sentences.chinese: 他把衣服一件件地脱掉。

detailed_translations.english: an amount or piece of a material or substance that covers a surface or that is between two other things

name: region
trans: n. 地区；范围；部位

sentences.english: efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.chinese: 给这个地区带来和平的努力

detailed_translations.english: a large area of a country or of the world, usually without exact limits

name: appease
trans: vt. 使平息；使满足；使和缓；对…让步

sentences.english: Gandhi was accused by some of trying to appease both factions of the electorate.
sentences.chinese: 甘地被一些人指责试图对两派选民都加以姑息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使平息；使满足；使和缓；对…让步
detailed_translations.english: If you try to appease someone, you try to stop them from being angry by giving them what they want

name: observable
trans: adj. 显著的；觉察得到的；看得见的

name: adequate
trans: adj. 充足的；适当的；胜任的

sentences.english: Farmers have been slow to make adequate provision for their retirement.
sentences.chinese: 农民们迟迟没有为退休做好适当安排。

sentences.english: Some creams we tested failed to give adequate protection against UV light.
sentences.chinese: 我们检测的有些防晒霜不能提供足够的防紫外线保护。

sentences.chinese: 他的工作水准勉强合格。

sentences.english: The company has yet to provide an adequate explanation for its actions.
sentences.chinese: 该公司对其行动仍未作出充分解释。

detailed_translations.chinese: 足够的； 可以胜任的

name: tome
trans: n. 册；大本书

detailed_translations.chinese: 册， 大部头书； 巨著
detailed_translations.english: a large heavy book

name: fashion
trans: n. 时尚；时装；样式；时髦人物

sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Please leave the building in an orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 请大家有秩序地离开大楼。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

trans: n. 偏爱，倾向；优先权

sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

name: fervour
trans: n. 热情（等于fervor）

sentences.english: religious fervour
sentences.chinese: 宗教热忱

sentences.english: revolutionary fervour
sentences.chinese: 革命热情

sentences.english: patriotic fervor
sentences.chinese: 爱国热情

detailed_translations.english: very strong belief or feeling

name: trivial
trans: adj. 不重要的，琐碎的；琐细的

sentences.chinese: 细枝末节

sentences.english: I know it sounds trivial , but I'm worried about it.
sentences.chinese: 我知道这事听起来微不足道，但我还是放心不下。

detailed_translations.english: not important or serious; not worth considering

trans: adj. 声名狼藉的，臭名昭著的

sentences.chinese: 声名狼藉的电脑黑客

sentences.english: notorious cases of human rights abuses
sentences.chinese: 臭名昭著的践踏人权案

detailed_translations.english: famous or well-known for something bad

name: unremarkable
trans: adj. 平凡的；不显著的；不值得注意的

trans: n. 参数；系数；参量

sentences.chinese: …一些决定葡萄酒味道的参数。

detailed_translations.english: Parameters are factors or limits that affect the way something can be done or made

trans: adj. 不可抵抗的；不能压制的；极为诱人的

detailed_translations.english: too strong or powerful to be stopped or prevented

trans: n. 宿舍（等于dormitory）

sentences.chinese: 但是我在宿舍没有东西可吃，所以我只能去餐厅了。

sentences.chinese: 因此，有些学生能待在宿舍里整整一个月不与任何人讲话。

sentences.chinese: 如果你有宿舍或公寓的号码、手机号码，还有其他什么电话号码，可以通过谷歌声音把它们集成为一个号码。

detailed_translations.english: a  dormitory

name: catalogue

sentences.chinese: 邮购商品目录

sentences.english: an online catalogue
sentences.chinese: 网上目录

trans: n. 属性；特质

sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful

name: equivocate
trans: vi. 说模棱两可的话；支吾， 躲闪；推诿；含糊其词

sentences.english: He is equivocating a lot about what is going to happen if and when there are elections.
sentences.chinese: 他含含糊糊地说着很多如果进行选举会发生的状况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说模棱两可的话；支吾， 躲闪；推诿；含糊其词

name: desirable
trans: n. 合意的人或事物

sentences.chinese: 能说一门外语是非常理想的。

sentences.english: a desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 理想的社区

sentences.english: It is desirable that you should have some familiarity with computers.
sentences.chinese: 应该对电脑有所熟悉，这是很有益处的。

sentences.english: It is desirable to keep the cost as low as possible.
sentences.chinese: 把成本控制得越低越好。

name: traditional
trans: adj. 传统的；惯例的

sentences.chinese: 传统的意大利烹饪

sentences.english: a traditional Irish folk song
sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.english: a traditional method of brewing beer
sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法

detailed_translations.english: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people

name: anachronism

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that seems to belong to the past, not the present

name: hygiene
trans: n. 卫生；卫生学；保健法

sentences.chinese: 个人卫生的重要性

sentences.english: a food hygiene training course
sentences.chinese: 食品卫生培训课程

detailed_translations.english: the practice of keeping yourself and the things around you clean in order to prevent diseases

trans: n. 问卷；调查表

sentences.chinese: 教师们将被要求填写一份调查问卷。

sentences.chinese: 企图阻止在报纸上传播内阁分裂谣言的笨拙做法

sentences.chinese: 运动场

sentences.english: an indoor arena
sentences.chinese: 室内剧场

detailed_translations.english: a building with a large flat central area surrounded by seats, where sports or entertainments take place

name: midnight

sentences.english: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.chinese: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

sentences.chinese: 贬损自己国家的人

detailed_translations.english: to say things to make someone or something seem less important or good

name: interspecific
trans: adj. 种类间的

name: default
trans: n. 违约；缺席；缺乏；系统默认值

sentences.chinese: 按揭借款违约在近一年里呈上升趋势。

sentences.english: to default on a loan/debt
sentences.chinese: 拖欠借款 / 债务

trans: n. 牙科医生

sentences.chinese: 每年看两次牙医做检查。

trans: n. 钟摆；摇锤；摇摆不定的事态

sentences.chinese: 政治的钟摆已经摆向了自由派。

trans: n. 常客；密友

trans: adj. 非故意的；无意识的

trans: n. 纲要；概略

sentences.chinese: 罗马天主教会已经发行了一份其教义的概略。

name: stout
trans: n. 矮胖子；烈性啤酒

sentences.english: a stout pair of shoes
sentences.chinese: 一双厚实耐穿的鞋子

detailed_translations.chinese: 结实的；矮胖的；勇敢的；激烈的
detailed_translations.english: strong and thick
strong dark beer

trans: n. 无经验的人；刚会飞的幼鸟

sentences.chinese: 一个新兴的共和国

trans: n. 几何学

sentences.chinese: 数学和几何学描述自然的条理性

detailed_translations.english: the study in  mathematics  of the angles and shapes formed by the relationships of lines, surfaces, and solid objects in space

name: intermediate
trans: n. [化学] 中间物；媒介

sentences.chinese: 中级课本

sentences.english: an intermediate stage/step in a process

trans: n. 类似；相似点

sentences.chinese: 农民们俯身收割小麦。

sentences.chinese: 这笔交易的利远大于弊。

name: treaty
trans: n. 条约，协议；谈判

sentences.chinese: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.english: The peace treaty ends nearly four years of violence.

name: profile

sentences.chinese: 达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

detailed_translations.english: a side view of someone’s head

name: style

sentences.english: an attempt to use Japanese management style in a European business
sentences.chinese: 将日本的管理方式用于欧洲企业的尝试

sentences.english: I sent him a memo reminding him about the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我发给他一个通知，提醒他开会的事。

detailed_translations.english: a short official note to another person in the same company or organization

name: equality
trans: n. 平等；相等；[数] 等式

sentences.english: ...equality of the sexes.
sentences.chinese: …性别平等。

detailed_translations.chinese: 等同； 平等； 相等

name: popular
trans: adj. 流行的，通俗的；受欢迎的；大众的；普及的

sentences.english: Hilary was popular at school.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在学校里很受欢迎。

sentences.english: a popular holiday resort
sentences.chinese: 人们喜欢的度假胜地

sentences.english: Coffee is probably the most popular drink in the world.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡很可能是世界上最受欢迎的饮料。

sentences.english: a popular movement for democracy
sentences.chinese: 争取民主的全民运动

detailed_translations.english: liked by a lot of people

name: fibre

sentences.english: Fruit and vegetables are high in fibre content .
sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜的纤维素含量很高。

sentences.english: food that is high in dietary fibre
sentences.chinese: 富含膳食纤维的食物

sentences.chinese: 尼龙是一种人造纤维。

name: disparate
trans: n. 无法相比的东西

sentences.chinese: 涉及许多不同议题的会议

sentences.english: the difficulties of dealing with disparate groups of people

detailed_translations.chinese: 不同的；不相干的；全异的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of things or people that are very different and not related to each other

name: powerful
trans: adj. 强大的；强有力的

sentences.chinese: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.english: a very influential and powerful family

name: extrapolation
trans: n. [数] 外推法；推断

sentences.chinese: 大部分是一个大胆的推断。

name: update
trans: n. 更新；现代化

sentences.chinese: 这些档案需要更新。

detailed_translations.english: to add the most recent information to something

name: perfection
trans: n. 完善；完美

sentences.english: My father expected perfection from all of us.
sentences.chinese: 父亲期望我们都尽善尽美。

sentences.english: the search for technical perfection
sentences.chinese: 对技术的精益求精

detailed_translations.english: the state of being perfect

name: deliver
trans: n. 投球

sentences.english: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.chinese: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.english: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.english: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

name: convict
trans: n. 罪犯

sentences.english: a convicted murderer
sentences.chinese: 已定罪的谋杀犯

sentences.english: an escaped convict
sentences.chinese: 越狱犯

detailed_translations.english: to prove or officially announce that someone is guilty of a crime after a trial in a law court
someone who has been proved to be guilty of a crime and sent to prison

name: hire
trans: n. 雇用，租用；租金，工钱

sentences.chinese: 在该岛寻幽访胜的最好方式就是租用一辆汽车。

sentences.english: What does it cost to hire a boat for a week?
sentences.chinese: 一艘小船租用一星期的费用是多少？

sentences.english: a car hire company
sentences.chinese: 汽车租赁公司

name: outdoors
trans: adv. 在户外

sentences.english: It’s warm enough to eat outdoors tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚很暖和，可以在户外用餐。

sentences.english: He likes to work outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢在户外工作。

detailed_translations.english: outside, not in a building

name: controversial
trans: adj. 有争议的；有争论的

sentences.chinese: 福利改革这一有争议的话题

sentences.english: a highly controversial (= very controversial ) plan to flood the valley in order to build a dam
sentences.chinese: 一个把山谷淹掉来建造水坝的极具争议的计划

sentences.english: He is a controversial figure (= person who does controversial things ) in the art world.
sentences.chinese: 他是艺术界极具争议的人物。

sentences.chinese: 白宫官员命令威廉斯公开宣布放弃自己的观点。

name: experimental
trans: adj. 实验的；根据实验的；试验性的

sentences.chinese: 试验性教学方法

detailed_translations.english: based on new ideas, forms or methods that are used to find out what effect they have

name: pre-requisite

name: index
trans: n. 指标；指数；索引；指针

sentences.english: ...the consumer price index.
sentences.chinese: …消费价格指数。

detailed_translations.english: a standard by which the level of something can be judged or measured

name: revise
trans: n. 修订；校订

sentences.english: The college has revised its plans because of local objections.
sentences.chinese: 由于地方上的反对，学院已经修改了计划。

sentences.english: We have revised our estimates of population growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们已修正了对人口增长的估计。

detailed_translations.english: to change something because of new information or ideas

name: dark
trans: n. 黑暗；夜；黄昏；模糊

sentences.english: The church was dark and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里黑魆魆的，寂静无声。

sentences.english: the dark winter days
sentences.chinese: 阴暗的冬日

sentences.english: Suddenly, the room went dark (= became dark ) .
sentences.chinese: 房间突然变暗了。

sentences.english: (= night begins ) about ten o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 大约十点钟开始天黑。

sentences.english: It was still dark (= was night ) when we boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 我们上火车时天还是黑的。

sentences.english: It was pitch dark (= completely dark ) in the attic.
sentences.chinese: 阁楼上漆黑一片。

detailed_translations.english: if it is dark, there is little or no light

name: Gymnasium
trans: Not Found

name: herald
trans: n. 预兆，征兆；先驱；传令官；报信者

sentences.english: A flash of lightning heralded torrential rain.
sentences.chinese: 一道闪电预示着暴雨即将来临。

sentences.english: Flashing blue lights heralded the arrival of the police.
sentences.chinese: 闪烁的蓝色灯光预示警察就要到达。

sentences.english: I welcome the report as a herald of more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 我欢迎这份报告，认为它预示着更多的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to be a sign of something that is going to come or happen soon

detailed_translations.chinese: 信使； 预示， 预兆
detailed_translations.english: Something that is a herald of a future event or situation is a sign that it is going to happen or appear

name: investor
trans: n. 投资者

sentences.english: The main investor in the project is the French bank Credit National.
sentences.chinese: 该项目的主要投资方是法国国民信贷银行。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives money to a company, business, or bank in order to get a profit

name: accessible
trans: adj. 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的

sentences.english: The island is only accessible by boat.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛只有坐船才能到。

sentences.english: There is a church which is easily accessible from my home.
sentences.chinese: 有座教堂离我家很近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的
detailed_translations.english: a place, building, or object that is accessible is easy to reach or get into

name: racism
trans: n. 种族主义，种族歧视；人种偏见

sentences.english: The government has promised to continue the fight against racism.
sentences.chinese: 政府已承诺继续打击种族歧视。

sentences.english: the problem of racism in schools
sentences.chinese: 学校里的种族歧视问题

detailed_translations.chinese: 种族主义，种族歧视；人种偏见
detailed_translations.english: unfair treatment of people, or violence against them, because they belong to a different race from your own

name: compensate
trans: vt. 补偿，赔偿；付报酬

sentences.english: the government’s promise to compensate victims of the flood
sentences.chinese: 政府对水灾灾民给予补偿的许诺

sentences.english: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.chinese: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone money because they have suffered injury, loss, or damage

name: hexagon
trans: n. 六角形，六边形

sentences.english: He presses the bolt against a small hexagon tattooed on his forearm. The sizes match.
sentences.chinese: 他将螺钉与他前臂的一个小六边形纹身比了比，尺寸是一样的。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with six sides

name: supportive
trans: adj. 支持的；支援的；赞助的

sentences.english: My family were very supportive throughout the divorce.
sentences.chinese: 离婚过程中我的家人自始至终都很支持我。

detailed_translations.english: giving help or encouragement, especially to someone who is in a difficult situation – used to show approval

name: obvious
trans: adj. 明显的；显著的；平淡无奇的

sentences.english: The obvious way of reducing pollution is to use cars less.
sentences.chinese: 减少污染显而易见的办法就是少用汽车。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice or understand

name: obedience
trans: n. 顺从；服从；遵守

sentences.english: obedience classes for dogs and their owners
sentences.chinese: 为狗和主人安排的服从训练课

detailed_translations.english: when someone does what they are told to do, or what a law, rule etc says they must do

name: knock down
trans: na. 打倒；拆除；拆卸；(拍卖时)敲槌卖出

name: culture
trans: n. 文化，文明；修养；栽培

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

name: profession
trans: n. 职业，专业；声明，宣布，表白

sentences.english: people who work in the professions
sentences.chinese: 从事专业性工作的人

sentences.english: nurses, social workers, and other people in the caring professions
sentences.chinese: 护士、社工和其他从事护理行业的人

detailed_translations.english: a job that needs a high level of education and training

name: antipathy
trans: n. 反感；厌恶；憎恶；不相容

sentences.english: ...the voting public's antipathy toward the president.
sentences.chinese: …投票民众对总统的憎恶。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of strong dislike towards someone or something

name: automatic
trans: n. 自动机械；自动手枪

sentences.english: an automatic weapon
sentences.chinese: 自动武器

sentences.english: an automatic gearbox
sentences.chinese: 自动变速箱

sentences.english: My camera is fully automatic .
sentences.chinese: 我的照相机是全自动的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动的； 必然发生的； 无意识的
detailed_translations.english: an automatic machine is designed to work without needing someone to operate it for each part of a process
a weapon that can fire bullets continuously

name: advantageous
trans: adj. 有利的；有益的

sentences.english: He was now in a more advantageous position.
sentences.chinese: 他现在的位置更有利。

detailed_translations.english: helpful and likely to make you successful

name: permeable
trans: adj. 能透过的；有渗透性的

sentences.english: the permeable cell membrane
sentences.chinese: 渗透性的细胞膜

detailed_translations.english: material that is permeable allows water, gas etc to pass through it

name: character
trans: n. 性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符

sentences.english: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

detailed_translations.english: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person

name: analyse
trans: vt. 分析；分解；细察

sentences.english: She still needs to analyse the data.
sentences.chinese: 她仍需要分析这些数据。

sentences.english: You need to sit down and analyse why you feel so upset.
sentences.chinese: 你得坐下来想一想自己为什么会那么生气。

sentences.english: Joe had never tried to analyze their relationship.
sentences.chinese: 乔从未试图去理清他们的关系。

detailed_translations.english: to examine the nature or structure of sth, especially by separating it into its parts, in order to understand or explain it

name: luxurious
trans: adj. 奢侈的；丰富的；放纵的；特级的

sentences.english: a luxurious 30-room villa
sentences.chinese: 一栋有30个房间的豪华度假别墅

detailed_translations.english: very expensive, beautiful, and comfortable

name: honour
trans: n. 荣誉；尊敬；勋章

sentences.english: He was showered with honours – among them an Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 他获得了很多荣誉–其中包括奥斯卡奖。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

detailed_translations.chinese: 尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据
detailed_translations.english: to treat someone with special respect

name: dogmatic
trans: adj. 教条的；武断的

sentences.english: Her staff find her bossy and dogmatic.
sentences.chinese: 她的员工认为她爱指挥别人而且自以为是。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is dogmatic is completely certain of their beliefs and expects other people to accept them without arguing

name: dissolution
trans: n. 分解，溶解；（议会等的）解散；（契约等的）解除；死亡

sentences.english: the dissolution of the monasteries
sentences.chinese: 修道院的解散

detailed_translations.chinese: 分解，溶解；（议会等的）解散；（契约等的）解除；死亡
detailed_translations.english: the act of breaking up an organization, institution etc so that it no longer exists

name: landscape
trans: n. 风景；风景画；景色；山水画；乡村风景画；地形；（文件的）横向打印格式

sentences.english: the beauty of the New England landscape
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰风光之美

detailed_translations.english: an area of countryside or land of a particular type, used especially when talking about its appearance
to make a park, garden etc look attractive and interesting by changing its design, and by planting trees and bushes etc

name: commence
trans: v. 开始；着手；<英>获得学位

sentences.english: Work will commence on the new building immediately.
sentences.chinese: 新大楼即将破土动工。

detailed_translations.english: to begin or to start something

name: survivor
trans: n. 幸存者；生还者；残存物

sentences.english: Don’t worry about Kurt; he’s a survivor.
sentences.chinese: 不用担心库尔特，他是个坚强的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who continues to live after an accident, war, or illness

name: skilled
trans: adj. 熟练的；有技能的；需要技能的

sentences.english: Skilled craftsmen, such as carpenters, are in great demand.
sentences.chinese: 对木工之类的熟练工匠需求量很大。

sentences.english: The company is fortunate to have such highly skilled workers.
sentences.chinese: 公司有这样一些技能熟练的工人真是幸运。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled has the training and experience that is needed to do something well

name: equipment
trans: n. 设备，装备；器材

sentences.english: a shop selling camping equipment
sentences.chinese: 出售露营装备的商店

sentences.english: some brand new computer equipment
sentences.chinese: 一些全新的计算机设备

sentences.english: a very useful piece of equipment
sentences.chinese: 一件非常有用的设备

sentences.english: A lot of money was spent on the equipment of the new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 新医院的装备花费巨大。

detailed_translations.english: the tools, machines etc that you need to do a particular job or activity

name: description
trans: n. 描述，描写；类型；说明书

sentences.english: The booklet gives a brief description of each place.
sentences.chinese: 这本小册子对每一个地方都作了简短的介绍。

sentences.english: Berlin sounds fascinating from your description.
sentences.chinese: 从你的描述来看，柏林是个迷人的城市。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or speech that gives details about what someone or something is like

name: various
trans: adj. 各种各样的；多方面的

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

name: eloquent
trans: adj. 意味深长的；雄辩的，有口才的；有说服力的；动人的

sentences.english: an eloquent appeal for support
sentences.chinese: 极具说服力的求助呼吁

detailed_translations.english: able to express your ideas and opinions well, especially in a way that influences people

name: variety
trans: n. 多样；种类；杂耍；变化，多样化

sentences.english: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢这家商店商品的丰富多样。

sentences.english: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
sentences.chinese: 那个湖里有二十多种鱼。

sentences.english: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.chinese: 兰花的稀有品种

detailed_translations.english: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting

name: seduce
trans: vt. 引诱；诱惑；诱奸；怂恿

sentences.english: The head lecturer was sacked for seducing female students.
sentences.chinese: 这个首席讲师因诱奸女学生而被解雇。

sentences.english: Are you trying to seduce me?
sentences.chinese: 你是在勾引我吗？

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone to have sex with you, especially in a way that is attractive and not too direct

name: prioritize
trans: vt. 把…区分优先次序

sentences.english: You need to prioritize your tasks.
sentences.chinese: 你需要按照轻重缓急安排自己的工作。

detailed_translations.english: to put several things, problems etc in order of importance, so that you can deal with the most important ones first

name: gymnastics
trans: n. 体操；体育；体操运动

sentences.english: a gymnastics display
sentences.chinese: 体操表演

sentences.english: We don’t do gymnastics at school.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校没有体操训练。

detailed_translations.english: a sport involving physical exercises and movements that need skill, strength, and control, and that are often performed in competitions

name: institution
trans: n. 制度；建立；（社会或宗教等）公共机构；习俗

sentences.english: powerful institutions such as world banks
sentences.chinese: 诸如世界银行之类的强大机构

sentences.english: the Institution of Electrical Engineers
sentences.chinese: 电机工程师学会

detailed_translations.english: a large organization that has a particular kind of work or purpose

name: kitchen
trans: n. 厨房；炊具；炊事人员

sentences.english: Sam went into the kitchen to make a pot of tea.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆走进厨房去沏一壶茶。

sentences.english: She is in the kitchen making a meal.
sentences.chinese: 她在厨房里做饭。

detailed_translations.english: the room where you prepare and cook food

name: summary
trans: n. 概要，摘要，总结

sentences.english: A brief summary is given on a separate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 摘要另写一页。

sentences.english: It says torture and summary execution are common.
sentences.chinese: 据说酷刑和草草处决很常见。

detailed_translations.english: a short statement that gives the main information about something, without giving all the details
a summary report, statement etc gives the main facts in a report etc without any of the details or explanations

name: humanitarian
trans: n. 人道主义者；慈善家；博爱主义者；基督凡人论者

sentences.english: And on each of those issues we have said that we would consider that and, in fact, have provided some humanitarian support.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一件这样的事情，我们都说过，我们将会对此进行考虑，事实上，我们向他们提供了人道主义援助。

sentences.english: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.chinese: 但是，对缅甸人民来说，正确的行动部分是为他们提供人道主义援助，而在目前这个时刻更是极端的需要”。

sentences.english: But otherwise, it is best left to the humanitarian experts, who will be there after you are gone and therefore need to preserve their independence and their impartiality.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果不能，最好将这些任务留给人道主义专家，这些专家在部队撤退之后仍将留在那，因此需要保持他们的独立和公正。

name: talent
trans: n. 才能；天才；天资

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

name: label
trans: vt. 标注；贴标签于

sentences.english: a luggage label
sentences.chinese: 行李标签

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper or another material that is attached to something and gives information about it
