sentences.chinese: 总统已经批准了这个计划。

sentences.english: It is just three months since we received official approval to go ahead with the project.
sentences.chinese: 三个月前我们刚刚得到正式批准进行这个项目。

sentences.english: A company cannot be sold without the approval of the shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 没有股东的同意不能出售公司。

sentences.english: The bill will be submitted for approval by Congress.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案将提交国会通过。

sentences.english: The President would appoint the Council of Ministers, subject to the approval of the National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 总统将任命内阁成员，但需经国民议会批准。

sentences.english: The IMF has given its seal of approval to the government’s economic strategy.
sentences.chinese: 国际货币基金组织已经同意该政府的经济策略。

sentences.english: appointments requiring parliamentary approval
sentences.chinese: 需经议会批准的任命

sentences.english: She looked to Greg for approval.
sentences.chinese: 她指望格雷格同意。

detailed_translations.english: when a plan, decision, or person is officially accepted

name: ornament
trans: n. 装饰；[建][服装] 装饰物；教堂用品

sentences.english: a shelf covered with books and ornaments
sentences.chinese: 摆满书籍和装饰品的架子

sentences.english: a cabinet in which she kept her collection of china ornaments
sentences.chinese: 她放置瓷器摆设收藏品的柜子

detailed_translations.chinese: 装饰品，点缀品；装饰，点缀
detailed_translations.english: a small object that you keep in your house because it is beautiful rather than useful

detailed_translations.chinese: 装饰， 点缀， 美化

name: institutional
trans: adj. 制度的；制度上的

sentences.english: accusations of institutional racism in the police force
sentences.chinese: 对警察队伍中已形成风气的种族主义的谴责

detailed_translations.english: institutional attitudes and behaviour have existed for a long time in an organization and have become accepted as normal even though they are bad

name: mobility
trans: n. 移动性；机动性；[电子] 迁移率

sentences.english: It improves the strength and mobility of joints.
sentences.chinese: 它能提高关节的力量和灵活性。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to move easily from one job, area, or social class to another

name: correspondent
trans: n. 通讯记者；客户；通信者；代理商行

sentences.english: The result was correspondent with my wishes.
sentences.chinese: 结果与我的愿望是一致的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通讯员，记者；异地代理商；代理银行
detailed_translations.english: someone who is employed by a newspaper or a television station etc to report news from a particular area or on a particular subject

name: framework
trans: n. 框架，骨架；结构，构架

sentences.english: We have to act within the existing legal framework.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在现行的法律框架下行事。

detailed_translations.english: a set of ideas, rules, or beliefs from which something is developed, or on which decisions are based

name: delicacy
trans: n. 美味；佳肴；微妙；精密；精美；敏锐，敏感；世故，圆滑

sentences.english: Snails are considered a delicacy in France.
sentences.chinese: 在法国，蜗牛被认为是一种珍贵的美食。

detailed_translations.chinese: 美味；佳肴；微妙；精密；精美；敏锐，敏感；世故，圆滑
detailed_translations.english: something good to eat that is expensive or rare

name: divest
trans: vt. 剥夺；使脱去，迫使放弃

sentences.english: The company divested itself of its oil interests.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司从石油生意中抽身。

detailed_translations.english: If you divest yourself of something that you own or are responsible for, you get rid of it or stop being responsible for it

name: casually
trans: adv. 随便地；偶然地；临时地

detailed_translations.chinese: 偶然地； 随便地； 临时地

name: scandal
trans: n. 丑闻；流言蜚语；诽谤；公愤

sentences.english: It caused quite a scandal when he left his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他离开妻子成了一大丑闻。

sentences.english: The college has recently been involved in a drugs scandal .
sentences.chinese: 这所大学最近卷入了毒品丑闻。

sentences.english: He has been at the centre of a political scandal .
sentences.chinese: 他成了一桩政治丑闻的焦点。

sentences.english: a major scandal involving the government
sentences.chinese: 涉及政府的一桩重大丑闻

sentences.english: a series of financial scandals
sentences.chinese: 一连串金融丑闻

sentences.english: a sex scandal that ruined his reputation
sentences.chinese: 让他名誉扫地的性丑闻

sentences.english: They had already left the country when the scandal broke .
sentences.chinese: 丑闻爆出时他们已经离开了这个国家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丑事， 丑闻； 流言蜚语； 反感， 愤慨
detailed_translations.english: an event in which someone, especially someone important, behaves in a bad way that shocks people

name: endanger
trans: vt. 危及；使遭到危险

sentences.english: Smoking during pregnancy endangers your baby’s life.
sentences.chinese: 孕期吸烟会危及胎儿生命。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in danger of being hurt, damaged, or destroyed

name: disguise
trans: n. 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西

sentences.english: He made no attempt to disguise his agitation.
sentences.chinese: 他无意掩饰他的不安。

sentences.english: He is a master of disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他是伪装高手。

detailed_translations.english: to hide sth or change it, so that it cannot be recognized
the art of changing your appearance so that people do not recognize you

name: watercolor
trans: n. 水彩画，水彩；水彩颜料

sentences.english: My uncle did a beautiful watercolor of a sunset while in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 我的叔叔在墨西哥时画了一幅漂亮的日落水彩画。

sentences.english: Instead, she started to examine the kitchen carefully, evaluating each watercolor on the wall, each shelf, the spice box, the plants, the pots.
sentences.chinese: 相反，她开始仔细检查厨房，评估每一种水彩，墙上的，架子上的，调味品盒子上的，植物的，以及锅上的。

name: envelope
trans: n. 信封，封皮；包膜；[天] 包层；包迹

sentences.english: envelopes and stamps
sentences.chinese: 信封和邮票

sentences.english: She tore open the envelope and frantically read the letter.
sentences.chinese: 她撕开信封慌忙看信。

sentences.english: He got a job stuffing envelopes (= filling them with letters ) at the campaign headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 他找了一份在竞选总部装信封的工作。

detailed_translations.english: a thin paper cover in which you put and send a letter

name: surfer
trans: n. 冲浪运动员，乘冲浪板冲浪的人

name: prevention
trans: n. 预防；阻止；妨碍

sentences.english: a fire prevention officer
sentences.chinese: 消防官员

sentences.english: You know what they say, prevention is better than cure (= it is better to stop something bad from happening than to remove the problem once it has happened ) .
sentences.chinese: 正所谓预防胜于治疗。

detailed_translations.english: when something bad is stopped from happening

name: castigation
trans: n. 惩罚；苛评；修订

name: pioneer
trans: n. 先锋；拓荒者

sentences.english: the early pioneers of the Dakota territory
sentences.chinese: 达科他地区的早期拓荒者

detailed_translations.english: someone who is important in the early development of something, and whose work or ideas are later developed by other people
to be the first person to do, invent or use something

name: skill
trans: n. 技能，技巧；本领，技术

sentences.english: Reading and writing are two different skills.
sentences.chinese: 阅读和写作是两种不同的技能。

sentences.english: Many jobs today require computer skills.
sentences.chinese: 如今的许多工作都需要计算机技能。

detailed_translations.english: an ability to do something well, especially because you have learned and practised it

name: impose
trans: vt. 强加；征税；以…欺骗

sentences.english: Parents should beware of imposing their own tastes on their children.
sentences.chinese: 父母应该提防把自己的兴趣强加给孩子。

sentences.english: A new tax was imposed on fuel.
sentences.chinese: 当局开始对燃油征收一项新税。

detailed_translations.english: If you impose your opinions or beliefs on other people, you try and make people accept them as a rule or as a model to copy

name: relate
trans: vt. 叙述；使…有联系

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

name: punch
trans: n. 冲压机；打洞器；钻孔机

sentences.english: The guard punched my ticket and I got on.
sentences.chinese: 守卫在我的票上打孔后，我就上去了。

sentences.english: a hole punch
sentences.chinese: 打孔器

detailed_translations.english: to make a hole in something, using a metal tool or other sharp object
a metal tool for cutting holes or for pushing something into a small hole

name: faith
trans: n. 信仰；信念；信任；忠实

sentences.english: People have lost faith in the government.
sentences.chinese: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

sentences.english: deep religious faith
sentences.chinese: 坚定的宗教信仰

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of trust or confidence in someone or something

name: trial
trans: n. 试验；审讯；努力；磨炼

sentences.english: The trial is due to start next week.
sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a legal process in which a judge and often a  jury  in a court of law examine information to decide whether someone is guilty of a crime

name: criminal
trans: n. 罪犯

sentences.english: Experts cannot agree on the causes of criminal behaviour .
sentences.chinese: 专家对犯罪行为的原因不能取得一致意见。

sentences.english: I was sure he was involved in some kind of criminal activity .
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他在从事某种犯罪活动。

sentences.english: She has not committed a criminal offence (= a crime ) .
sentences.chinese: 她没有犯罪。

sentences.english: He was arrested and charged with criminal damage (= damaging someone’s property illegally ) .
sentences.chinese: 他遭到逮捕并被指控犯有刑事损坏罪。

sentences.english: The doctor was found guilty of criminal negligence (= not taking enough care to protect people you are responsible for ) .
sentences.chinese: 这名医生被判过失犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: relating to crime
someone who is involved in illegal activities or has been proved guilty of a crime

name: so-called
trans: adj. 所谓的；号称的

sentences.english: The so-called experts couldn’t tell us what was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 那些所谓的专家说不出问题出在哪里。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe someone or something that has been given a name that you think is wrong

name: Everest
trans: n. 珠穆朗玛峰（世界最高峰）

name: drought
trans: n. 干旱；缺乏

sentences.english: ...a country where drought and famines have killed up to two million people during the last eighteen years.
sentences.chinese: …过去18年来干旱和饥荒致死达两百万人的一个国家。

detailed_translations.english: a long period of dry weather when there is not enough water for plants and animals to live

name: pricey
trans: adj. 高价的，过分昂贵的

name: basic
trans: n. 基础；要素

sentences.english: the basic principles of chemistry
sentences.chinese: 化学的基本原理

sentences.english: The basic idea is simple.
sentences.chinese: 基本思想很简单。

sentences.english: basic research
sentences.chinese: 基础研究

sentences.english: basic information
sentences.chinese: 基本信息

detailed_translations.english: forming the most important or most necessary part of something

name: depiction
trans: n. 描写，叙述

sentences.english: You would think that such western imports would champion any depiction of homosexuality on television, right?
sentences.chinese: 你会想，像这些西方进口会拥护电视媒体对同性恋的描写，对吧？

sentences.english: Watching Cheese in the Trap can be addictive, but it's educational too, thanks to its realistic depiction of campus life.
sentences.chinese: 看《奶酪陷阱》会让人上瘾，而且由于对大学生活的真实描写，它也有一定的教育意义。

detailed_translations.english: A depiction of something is a picture or a written description of it

name: respect
trans: n. 尊敬，尊重；方面；敬意

sentences.english: The boys showed a complete lack of respect for authority.
sentences.chinese: 这些男孩子根本无视权威。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of admiring someone or what they do, especially because of their personal qualities, knowledge, or skills
to admire someone because they have high standards and good qualities such as fairness and honesty

name: vary
trans: vi. 变化；变异；违反

sentences.english: Test scores vary from school to school.
sentences.chinese: 测验成绩各校不同。

sentences.english: The heights of the plants vary from 8 cm to 20 cm.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.english: Medical treatment varies greatly from state to state.
sentences.chinese: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.english: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.english: Charges vary according to size.
sentences.chinese: 费用因大小而异。

sentences.english: She has tried different diets with varying degrees of success.
sentences.chinese: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.english: tests of varying levels of difficulty
sentences.chinese: 难易程度不一的测验

sentences.english: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.chinese: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

detailed_translations.english: if several things of the same type vary, they are all different from each other

name: promote
trans: vi. 成为王后或其他大于卒的子

sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

name: soccer
trans: n. 英式足球，足球

sentences.english: I never play soccer.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不踢足球。

sentences.english: France and Spain will meet in the soccer cup final.
sentences.chinese: 法国队和西班牙队将在足球锦标赛决赛中交锋。

sentences.english: It must be one of those soccer scarfs from England.
sentences.chinese: 那一定是某个英国足球队的围巾。

detailed_translations.english: a sport played by two teams of 11 players, who try to kick a round ball into their opponents’  goal

name: renewable
trans: n. 再生性能源

sentences.english: It’s a six-month lease but it’s renewable.
sentences.chinese: 租期六个月，但是可以续签。

sentences.english: a renewable visa
sentences.chinese: 可延期的签证

detailed_translations.english: if an agreement or official document is renewable, you can make it continue for a further period of time after it ends

name: delusion
trans: n. 迷惑，欺骗；错觉；幻想

sentences.english: I was under the delusion that he intended to marry me.
sentences.chinese: 我有一种错觉，他要娶我。

detailed_translations.english: a false belief about yourself or the situation you are in

name: arc
trans: n. 弧（度）；弧光（全称electric arc）；弧形物；天穹

sentences.english: the arc of a rainbow
sentences.chinese: 彩虹的弧状

detailed_translations.english: a curved shape or line

name: degree
trans: n. 程度，等级；度；学位；阶层

sentences.english: Newspapers vary in the degree to which they emphasize propaganda rather than information.
sentences.chinese: 报纸重宣传轻资讯的程度各不相同。

detailed_translations.english: the level or amount of something

name: biologist
trans: n. 生物学家

sentences.english: Similarly, every time a biologist discovers a new species, there is the opportunity to honour someone or something.
sentences.chinese: 类似地，每次一位生物学家发现一个新物种，就又有了一个纪念某人或某事的机会。

sentences.english: One biologist developed a formula for how much genetic material would have to be to saved in the act of altruism for it to be worthwhile.
sentences.chinese: 一位生物学家发展了一套公式，用来计算到底有多少遗传物质可以被保留下来的时候，利他的行为才是值得的。

sentences.english: An evolutionary biologist would say physical activity is the only voluntary means you have of varying or regulating your energy expenditure.
sentences.chinese: 一个进化生物学家会说体力活动是唯一的志愿就是你的不同或管理您的能源开支的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who studies or works in biology

name: coercive
trans: adj. 强制的；胁迫的；高压的

sentences.english: coercive measures to reduce absenteeism
sentences.chinese: 减少旷工现象的高压措施

detailed_translations.english: using threats or orders to make someone do something they do not want to do

name: interview
trans: n. 接见，采访；面试，面谈

sentences.english: a portfolio of work presented at interview
sentences.chinese: 在面试时呈递的工作成果样本

sentences.english: a police interview
sentences.chinese: 警方问讯

sentences.english: We’re interviewing six candidates for the job.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作我们要面试六名申请人。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc
to ask someone questions during an interview

name: basement
trans: n. 地下室；地窖

sentences.english: They bought an old schoolhouse to live in and built a workshop in the basement.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了座旧校舍居住，还在地下室建了个作坊。

detailed_translations.english: a room or area in a building that is under the level of the ground

name: pervasive
trans: adj. 普遍的；到处渗透的；流行的

sentences.english: the pervasive influence of television
sentences.chinese: 电视无所不在的影响

sentences.english: the all-pervasive mood of apathy
sentences.chinese: 到处弥漫的冷漠情绪

detailed_translations.chinese: 普遍的；到处渗透的；流行的
detailed_translations.english: existing everywhere

name: sensitivity
trans: n. 敏感；敏感性；过敏

sentences.english: Each user should have access to a security level based upon the level of data sensitivity he or she can see.
sentences.chinese: 根据用户可以看到的数据的敏感性级别，每个用户都应该可以访问某个安全级别。

sentences.english: The authentication mode you choose for your environment will be determined by the level of sensitivity of your data.
sentences.chinese: 应该为您的环境选择什么样的身份验证模式，这是由数据的敏感级别来决定的。

sentences.english: The sensitivity of the test meets WHO standards for detecting the toxin in drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试的灵敏度满足了世界卫生组织探测饮用水毒物的标准。

name: consume
trans: vt. 消耗，消费；使…着迷；挥霍

sentences.english: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
sentences.chinese: 一些能效最高的冰箱比传统型号少消耗70%的电。

detailed_translations.english: To consume an amount of fuel, energy, or time means to use it up
to use time, energy, goods etc

name: prestigious
trans: adj. 有名望的；享有声望的

sentences.english: a prestigious literary award
sentences.chinese: 享有盛名的文学奖

sentences.english: a highly prestigious university
sentences.chinese: 赫赫有名的大学

detailed_translations.english: admired as one of the best and most important

name: hamstring
trans: n. 腿筋

sentences.english: Meanwhile, work on strengthening and stretching your hip, hamstring and lower-back muscles.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时还要拉伸和增强你臀部、腿筋和腰背部的肌肉。

sentences.english: Far more telling was the correlation between the various runners’ tight or loose hamstring muscles and their running economy, a measure of how much oxygen they used while striding.
sentences.chinese: 进一步讲，不同跑步者腿筋肌的松紧和步伐频率是有联系的，这是一种对他们在跨步行进时耗氧量的评估。

sentences.english: For stretching, focus on the hamstring stretch, the hip &lower-back stretch, and the hamstring &back stretch.
sentences.chinese: 拉伸方面——特别要关注腿筋拉伸、髋关节和腰背部拉伸、腿筋和背部锻炼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 切断腿筋使成跛腿；使残废

name: mini-lecture
trans: 讲座；微型讲座；小型讲座

name: village
trans: n. 村庄；村民；（动物的）群落

sentences.english: a little fishing village
sentences.chinese: 一座小渔村

detailed_translations.english: a very small town in the countryside

name: curriculum
trans: n. 课程

sentences.english: Languages are an essential part of the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 语言是学校课程中必不可少的部分。

sentences.english: curriculum planning
sentences.chinese: 课程安排

detailed_translations.english: the subjects that are taught by a school, college etc, or the things that are studied in a particular subject

name: apartment
trans: n. 公寓；房间

sentences.english: She lives in a small apartment.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一套小公寓里。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms on one floor of a large building, where someone lives

name: constraint
trans: n. [数] 约束；局促，态度不自然；强制

sentences.english: the constraints of family life
sentences.chinese: 家庭生活的约束

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 约束；局促，态度不自然；强制
detailed_translations.english: something that limits your freedom to do what you want

name: tolerable
trans: adj. 可以的；可容忍的

sentences.english: The heat in this room is barely tolerable.
sentences.chinese: 这房间里热得让人要受不了了。

detailed_translations.english: unpleasant or painful and only just able to be accepted

name: greatly
trans: adv. 很，大大地；非常

sentences.english: All offers of help will be greatly appreciated .
sentences.chinese: 如蒙帮助，感激不尽。

sentences.english: The quality of health care varies greatly .
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务质量差别很大。

detailed_translations.english: extremely or very much

name: intake
trans: n. 摄取量；通风口；引入口；引入的量

sentences.english: Your intake of alcohol should not exceed two units per day.
sentences.chinese: 你每天酒精摄入量不能超过两个单位。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of food, drink etc that you take into your body

name: tutorial
trans: n. 个别指导

sentences.english: tutorial staff
sentences.chinese: 辅导人员

sentences.english: tutorial supervision
sentences.chinese: 老师的教授指导

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅导的；家庭教师的，个别指导的
detailed_translations.english: relating to a tutor or their work

name: terrorism
trans: n. 恐怖主义；恐怖行动；恐怖统治

sentences.english: The government is doing everything possible to combat terrorism .
sentences.chinese: 政府正在尽其所能打击恐怖主义。

sentences.english: a despicable act of terrorism
sentences.chinese: 恐怖主义的卑劣行径

sentences.english: their involvement in international terrorism
sentences.chinese: 他们参与国际恐怖主义活动

detailed_translations.english: the use of violence such as bombing, shooting, or  kidnapping  to obtain political demands such as making a government do something

name: cluster
trans: n. 群；簇；丛；串

sentences.english: Do this for all nodes in the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 对集群中的所有节点都这样做。

sentences.english: This can be done on any server of the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 可以在集群的任何服务器中这样做。

sentences.english: However, there are some problems in the cluster environment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在集群环境中却存在一些问题。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things of the same kind that are very close together
if a group of people or things cluster somewhere, or are clustered somewhere, they form a small group in that place

name: responsible
trans: adj. 负责的，可靠的；有责任的

sentences.english: We are determined to bring the people responsible to justice.
sentences.chinese: 我们决意要将肇事者绳之以法。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is responsible for an accident, mistake, crime etc, it is their fault or they can be blamed

name: asset
trans: n. 资产；优点；有用的东西；有利条件；财产；有价值的人或物

sentences.english: the value of a company’s assets
sentences.chinese: 公司的资产价值

detailed_translations.chinese: 资产， 财产； 有价值的特性或技能， 优点
detailed_translations.english: the things that a company owns, that can be sold to pay debts

name: poverty
trans: n. 贫困；困难；缺少；低劣

sentences.english: Millions of elderly people live in poverty .
sentences.chinese: 数百万老年人生活在贫困之中。

sentences.english: We need an effective strategy to fight poverty .
sentences.chinese: 我们需要制定一个有效的对策来与贫困作斗争。

sentences.english: continued efforts to alleviate poverty and raise living standards
sentences.chinese: 缓解贫困和提高生活水平的不懈努力

sentences.english: scenes of abject poverty
sentences.chinese: 极度贫困的情景

sentences.english: the causes of urban poverty
sentences.chinese: 造成城市贫困的原因

detailed_translations.english: the situation or experience of being poor

name: wonder
trans: n. 惊奇；奇迹；惊愕

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

name: illustration
trans: n. 说明；插图；例证；图解

sentences.english: The book contains 62 pages of illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 这本书有62页插图。

detailed_translations.english: a picture in a book, article etc, especially one that helps you to understand it

name: pertinent
trans: adj. 相关的，相干的；中肯的；切题的

sentences.english: He asked me a lot of very pertinent questions .
sentences.chinese: 他问了我许多直接相关的问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相关的，相干的；中肯的；切题的
detailed_translations.english: directly relating to something that is being considered

name: honestly
trans: adv. 真诚地；公正地

sentences.english: Tell me honestly, Kate, what do you think of John?
sentences.chinese: 跟我说实话，凯特，你认为约翰怎么样？

sentences.english: We talked openly and honestly.
sentences.chinese: 我们开诚布公地谈了谈。

sentences.english: ‘No, I don’t,’ she answered honestly.
sentences.chinese: “不。”她诚实地回答道。

detailed_translations.english: in an honest way

name: aggression
trans: n. 侵略；进攻；侵犯；侵害

sentences.english: an unprovoked act of aggression
sentences.chinese: 无端的侵犯

detailed_translations.english: the act of attacking a country, especially when that country has not attacked first

name: wing
trans: n. 翼；翅膀；飞翔；派别；侧厅，耳房，厢房

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

name: coverage
trans: n. 覆盖，覆盖范围；新闻报道

sentences.english: live coverage of the match (= the match is broadcast at the same time that it is happening )
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛的现场直播

detailed_translations.english: when a subject or event is reported on television or radio, or in newspapers

name: shadow
trans: n. 阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处

sentences.english: the long dark shadow of an old oak tree
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树长长的影子

detailed_translations.chinese: 阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处
detailed_translations.english: the dark shape that someone or something makes on a surface when they are between that surface and the light
to follow someone closely in order to watch what they are doing
the group of politicians in the British parliament who would become ministers if their party was in government

name: complement
trans: n. 补语；余角；补足物

sentences.english: The team needs players who complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 球队需要能够相互取长补短的队员。

sentences.english: This wine would be a nice complement to grilled dishes.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒配烧烤食物会很不错。

detailed_translations.english: to make a good combination with someone or something else
someone or something that emphasizes the good qualities of another person or thing

name: beam
trans: n. 横梁；光线；电波；船宽；[计量] 秤杆

sentences.english: ...high-energy laser beams.
sentences.chinese: …高能激光束。

detailed_translations.chinese: 横梁；光线；电波；船宽；[计量] 秤杆
detailed_translations.english: a long heavy piece of wood or metal used in building houses, bridges etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露
detailed_translations.english: to send a radio or television signal through the air, especially to somewhere very distant

name: reflection
trans: n. 反射；沉思；映象

sentences.english: Can you see your reflection in the glass?
sentences.chinese: 你能看到玻璃里你的影像吗？

sentences.english: ...the reflection of a beam of light off a mirror.
sentences.chinese: …一束光线在镜面上的反射。

sentences.english: Inhibition in adulthood seems to be a reflection of a person's experiences as a child.
sentences.chinese: 成年期的压抑似乎是一个人童年经历的一种反映。

detailed_translations.english: an image that you can see in a mirror, glass, or water

name: ski
trans: n. 滑雪橇

sentences.english: ski slopes
sentences.chinese: 滑雪坡

sentences.english: a ski resort (= where people can go skiing )
sentences.chinese: 滑雪度假胜地

sentences.english: ...the Swiss ski resort of Klosters.
sentences.chinese: …瑞士的克洛斯特斯滑雪胜地。

sentences.english: ...a private ski instructor.
sentences.chinese: …一位私人滑雪教练。

detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of long thin narrow pieces of wood or plastic that you fasten to your boots and use for moving on snow or on water
to move on skis for sport or in order to travel on snow or water
You use ski to refer to things that are concerned with skiing

name: timely
trans: adj. 及时的；适时的

sentences.english: The fight ended only with the timely arrival of the police.
sentences.chinese: 幸亏警察及时赶到，打斗总算停止。

detailed_translations.english: done or happening at exactly the right time

name: porous
trans: adj. 多孔渗水的；能渗透的；有气孔的

sentences.english: porous material
sentences.chinese: 渗透性材料

detailed_translations.english: allowing liquid, air etc to pass slowly through many very small holes

name: inure
trans: vt. 使…习惯；使…适应

sentences.english: We should inure ourselves to hard life.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该使自己习惯艰苦生活。

detailed_translations.english: to cause to accept or become hardened to; habituate

name: promotional
trans: adj. 促销的；增进的；奖励的

sentences.english: "Jeans," according to one company's promotional material, "are designed and made to be worn hard."
sentences.chinese: 根据一家公司促销材料上所说的，“牛仔裤为耐穿而设计和制作。”

detailed_translations.english: Promotional material, events, or ideas are designed to increase the sales of a product or service

name: elevation
trans: n. 高地；海拔；提高；崇高；正面图

sentences.english: The city is at an elevation of 2 000 metres.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市海拔2000米。

detailed_translations.english: the height of a place, especially its height above sea level

name: conversation
trans: n. 交谈，会话；社交；交往，交际；会谈；（人与计算机的）人机对话

sentences.english: a telephone conversation
sentences.chinese: 电话交谈

sentences.english: Children quickly get bored by adult conversation.
sentences.chinese: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.english: They had a short conversation in German and seemed to be disagreeing about something.
sentences.chinese: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.english: It’s impossible to carry on a conversation with all this noise in the background.
sentences.chinese: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.english: ‘Did you have a good journey?’ he said, trying to make conversation .
sentences.chinese: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.english: He was silent, no matter how hard Sofia tried to engage him in conversation .
sentences.chinese: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.english: After a while, the conversation turned to a friend’s coming wedding.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.english: They were deep in conversation , relaxed and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.english: He could hear snatches of conversation from across the room.
sentences.chinese: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。

detailed_translations.english: an informal talk in which people exchange news, feelings, and thoughts

name: depth
trans: n. [海洋] 深度；深奥

sentences.english: What's the depth of the water here?
sentences.chinese: 这儿的水有多深？

sentences.english: the depth of her love
sentences.chinese: 她那爱之深

sentences.english: Astronomers may one day travel to the depths of space.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家也许有一天可以到太空深处去。

detailed_translations.english: the distance from the top or surface to the bottom of sth

name: patient
trans: n. 病人；患者

sentences.english: You’ll just have to be patient and wait till I’m off the phone.
sentences.chinese: 你只能耐心点，等我打完电话。

sentences.english: She was tough but wonderful with her patients.
sentences.chinese: 她很严厉，但对病人很好。

detailed_translations.english: able to wait calmly for a long time or to accept difficulties, people’s annoying behaviour etc without becoming angry
someone who is receiving medical treatment from a doctor or in a hospital

name: crop
trans: n. 产量；农作物；庄稼；平头

sentences.english: The main crops were oats and barley.
sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

sentences.english: crops grown for market
sentences.chinese: 为供应市场而种植的作物

sentences.english: Fruit growers are gathering in a bumper crop (= a very large amount of something produced in season ) .
sentences.chinese: 果农正在采摘丰收的果实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农作物，庄稼；一熟：一季的收成
detailed_translations.english: a plant such as wheat, rice, or fruit that is grown by farmers and used as food

name: vast
trans: n. 浩瀚；广阔无垠的空间

sentences.english: The refugees come across the border in vast numbers.
sentences.chinese: 大量难民涌过边境。

sentences.english: In the past five years, there has been a vast improvement in graduation rates.
sentences.chinese: 过去的五年内，毕业率大幅度提高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨大的， 大量的； 浩瀚的
detailed_translations.english: extremely large

name: rely
trans: vi. 依靠；信赖

sentences.english: I knew I could rely on David.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我可以信赖戴维。

sentences.english: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

detailed_translations.english: to depend on something in order to continue to live or exist

name: heart
trans: n. 心脏；感情；勇气；心形；要点

sentences.english: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.english: Can you hear my heart beating?
sentences.chinese: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.english: Her cheeks were hot and her heart was pounding.
sentences.chinese: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.chinese: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.english: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.english: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.chinese: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.english: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

detailed_translations.english: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body

name: reuse
trans: n. 重新使用，再用

sentences.english: Copper, brass, and aluminium are separated and remelted for reuse.
sentences.chinese: 铜、黄铜和铝被分门别类重新熔化以供再利用。

detailed_translations.english: Reuse is also a noun
to use something again

name: automatically
trans: adj. 不经思索的

sentences.english: Join now and you will automatically receive 50% off your first purchase.
sentences.chinese: 现在加入，立即享受首次购物五折优惠。

detailed_translations.english: as the result of a situation or action, and without you having to do anything more

name: commercial
trans: n. 商业广告

sentences.english: Our top priorities must be profit and commercial growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须把利润和贸易增长作为我们的第一要务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 商业的， 商务的； 商品化的， 商业性的
detailed_translations.english: related to business and the buying and selling of goods and services

name: utilize
trans: vt. 利用

sentences.english: We must consider how best to utilize what resources we have.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须考虑怎样充分利用现有的资源。

detailed_translations.english: to use something for a particular purpose

name: situational
trans: adj. 环境形成的；情形的

name: talented
trans: adj. 有才能的；多才的

sentences.english: a talented actor
sentences.chinese: 一名很有天赋的演员

detailed_translations.english: having a natural ability to do something well

name: democratise
trans: v. <主英>（使）民主化

name: corporation
trans: n. 公司；法人（团体）；社团；大腹便便；市政当局

sentences.english: He works for a large American corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他在一家美国大公司工作。

sentences.english: multinational corporations
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司

sentences.english: the Siemens Corporation
sentences.chinese: 西门子公司

detailed_translations.english: a big company, or a group of companies acting together as a single organization

name: assuage
trans: vt. 平息；缓和；减轻

sentences.english: Nothing could assuage his guilt.
sentences.chinese: 什么都不能减轻他的内疚。

detailed_translations.english: to make an unpleasant feeling less painful or severe

name: mysterious
trans: adj. 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的

sentences.english: The police are investigating the mysterious deaths of children at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在调查这家医院的儿童神秘死亡事件。

sentences.english: Benson later disappeared in mysterious circumstances .
sentences.chinese: 本森后来就神秘地失踪了。

sentences.english: There’s something mysterious going on.
sentences.chinese: 出了件怪事。

detailed_translations.english: mysterious events or situations are difficult to explain or understand

name: acquire
trans: vt. 获得；取得；学到；捕获

sentences.english: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.chinese: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.english: She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取得， 获得； 学到
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by buying it or being given it

name: convey
trans: vt. 传达；运输；让与

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

name: adaptable
trans: adj. 适合的；能适应的；可修改的

sentences.english: The American Constitution has proved adaptable in changing political conditions.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明美国宪法能适应政治形势的变化。

detailed_translations.english: able to change in order to be successful in new and different situations

name: precipice
trans: n. 悬崖；绝壁；险境

sentences.english: A loose rock tumbled over the precipice.
sentences.chinese: 一块松动的岩石从悬崖上滚落下来。

detailed_translations.english: a very steep side of a high rock, mountain, or cliff

name: congestion
trans: n. 拥挤；拥塞；淤血

sentences.english: The problems of traffic congestion will not disappear in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 交通堵塞问题不会很快消失。

detailed_translations.english: If there is congestion in a place, the place is extremely crowded and blocked with traffic or people

name: righten
trans: vt. 使恢复正常；整顿

name: inhibit
trans: vt. 抑制；禁止

sentences.english: An unhappy family life may inhibit children’s learning.
sentences.chinese: 不幸福的家庭生活可能会阻碍儿童的学习。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from growing or developing well

name: ultimately
trans: adv. 最后；根本；基本上

sentences.english: Ultimately, the decision rests with the child’s parents.
sentences.chinese: 最终，决定权在这孩子的父母手中。

sentences.english: a long but ultimately successful campaign
sentences.chinese: 一场历时很久但最终成功的运动

detailed_translations.english: finally, after everything else has been done or considered

name: disease
trans: n. 病，[医] 疾病；弊病

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

name: secular
trans: n. 修道院外的教士，(对宗教家而言的) 俗人

sentences.english: secular education
sentences.chinese: 世俗教育

sentences.english: our modern secular society
sentences.chinese: 我们的现代世俗社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 世俗的；长期的；现世的；不朽的
detailed_translations.english: not connected with or controlled by a church or other religious authority

detailed_translations.chinese: 修道院外的教士，(对宗教家而言的) 俗人

name: incongruity
trans: n. 不协调；不一致；不适宜

sentences.english: The incongruity of her situation struck Gina with unpleasant force.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜猛然意识到自己处境尴尬，心里很不舒服。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不调和的, 不适宜的
detailed_translations.english: the fact that something is strange, unusual, or unsuitable in a particular situation

name: audition
trans: n. 听力，听觉；试听

sentences.english: ...an audition for a Broadway musical.
sentences.chinese: …一部百老汇歌舞剧的试演。

detailed_translations.english: An audition is a short performance given by an actor, dancer, or musician so that a director or conductor can decide if they are good enough to be in a play, film, or orchestra
to take part in an audition

name: expectation
trans: n. 期待；预期；指望

sentences.chinese: 他唤起了大家的希望，但接着只是帮助了几个人。

sentences.english: The show exceeded all expectations (= was much better than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 这场演出比人们预期的要好得多。

sentences.english: The number of people who attended fell short of expectations (= was lower than expected ).

detailed_translations.english: what you think or hope will happen

name: consumer
trans: n. 消费者；用户，顾客

sentences.english: Consumers will soon be paying higher airfares.
sentences.chinese: 不久消费者就要支付更高的机票价了。

sentences.english: It will offer a wider choice of goods for the consumer (= consumers in general ).
sentences.chinese: 它将为消费者提供更多的商品选择。

sentences.english: Consumer demand led to higher imports of manufactured goods.
sentences.chinese: 消费者需求促使制造商品的进口量增加了。

sentences.english: Consumer spending was down by 0.1% last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月消费支出下降了0.1%。

sentences.english: sources of consumer advice
sentences.chinese: 给予消费者建议的信息来源

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys and uses products and services

name: pedestrian overpass
trans: Not Found

sentences.chinese: 当然，托马斯冷静、超脱且遇事沉着。

detailed_translations.english: remaining calm and unworried in spite of problems or difficulties

name: devastate
trans: vt. 毁灭；毁坏

sentences.english: The city centre was devastated by the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 市中心被这枚炸弹摧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something very badly or completely

name: eclectic
trans: n. 折衷派的人；折衷主义者

sentences.english: But they are the tip of an eclectic iceberg in the country.
sentences.chinese: 其实这只不过是折衷主义在这个国家表现出来的冰山一角。

sentences.english: One of my (several) frustrations in life is the eclectic way the word “science” is used in human discourse.
sentences.chinese: 我在生活中遇到的挫折之一，是试图改变人类在使用“科学”一词时的折衷的态度。

sentences.english: At the same time, countless of Jazz clubs, discotheques and the endless music from open air beer garden even made the OrdRoad turn into a popular gathering location for eclectic today.
sentences.chinese: 同时不计其数的爵士俱乐部，迪斯科舞厅和露天啤酒花园的无休止的音乐也使乌节路成为了今天折中主义者聚集的场所。

name: bluff
trans: n. 吓唬；绝壁；断崖

sentences.english: The threat was only a bluff.
sentences.chinese: 这种威胁不过是吓唬人而已。

sentences.chinese: 不管你说什么，你一定得去做，这可不是在唬人。

to pretend something, especially in order to achieve what you want in a difficult or dangerous situation
a bluff person, usually a man, is pleasant but very direct and does not always consider other people

name: regulation
trans: n. 管理；规则；校准

sentences.chinese: 如今好像条条框框很多。

sentences.chinese: 监控玩具安全的条例

sentences.english: All companies must comply with the regulations .
sentences.chinese: 所有公司都必须遵守规定。

detailed_translations.english: an official rule or order

name: case study
trans: n. 个案研究；专题研究；案例研究

name: twofold
trans: adj. 双重的；两倍的

sentences.chinese: 结核病例两倍的增加

detailed_translations.chinese: 两倍的，双重的；两部分的
detailed_translations.english: two times as much or as many of something

trans: n. 接近，[数]邻近；接近；接近度，距离；亲近

sentences.chinese: 在这里，富人和穷人比邻而居。

name: historically
trans: adv. 历史上地；从历史观点上说

sentences.english: After all, historically, the two nations have been enemies.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟在历史上，两个国家曾经是敌人。

sentences.english: Because historically, we have not defined marriage in our constitution.
sentences.chinese: 因为历史上我们从未在宪法中给婚姻下过定义。

name: align
trans: vt. 使结盟；使成一行；匹配

sentences.chinese: 书桌一行行排得整整齐齐。

sentences.chinese: 确保所有的洞眼成一条直线。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange things so that they form a line or are parallel to each other, or to be in a position that forms a line etc

sentences.chinese: 他们在五月份举行了世俗婚礼。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the people who live in a country

name: distribution
trans: n. 分布；分配

sentences.chinese: 经销中心

detailed_translations.english: the act of sharing things among a large group of people in a planned way

name: source
trans: n. 来源；水源；原始资料

sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

trans: adj. 猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["rampant inflation"]}
sentences.chinese: 失控的通货膨胀

detailed_translations.chinese: 猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的
detailed_translations.english: if something bad, such as crime or disease, is rampant, there is a lot of it and it is very difficult to control

name: severe
trans: adj. 严峻的；严厉的；剧烈的；苛刻的

sentences.chinese: 他的伤势很严重。

sentences.chinese: 她患有严重的抑郁症。

sentences.chinese: 美国面临严重的经济问题。

sentences.chinese: 这场暴风雨造成了严重的破坏。

detailed_translations.english: severe problems, injuries, illnesses etc are very bad or very serious

name: reliable
trans: n. 可靠的人

sentences.english: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.chinese: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.english: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.chinese: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on

name: venus
trans: Not Found

detailed_translations.english: the Roman goddess of love

name: vertical
trans: n. 垂直线，垂直面

sentences.chinese: 垂直线

sentences.english: the vertical axis of a graph
sentences.chinese: 图的纵轴

sentences.english: vertical window blinds
sentences.chinese: 垂直百叶窗

sentences.chinese: 这堵墙倾斜了有好几度。

a vertical line or position

sentences.chinese: 那个村子因洪水而与外界中断了联系。

sentences.chinese: 五十多年来最严重的水灾

sentences.chinese: 全国各地的城镇都被淹没了。

sentences.chinese: 我预料大家只有感激赞许。

to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time

trans: n. 印象派，印象主义

sentences.english: Impressionism has long been one of the most popular art movements.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，印象主义一直是最具有影响力的艺术运动之一。

sentences.english: Impressionism has long been one of the most popular art movements.Van Gogh‘s impressionistic paingting entitled "Dr.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，印象主义一直是最具有影响力的艺术运动之一。

detailed_translations.english: Impressionism is a style of painting developed in France between 1870 and 1900 that concentrated on showing the effects of light and colour rather than on clear and exact detail

sentences.chinese: 管理顾问

sentences.chinese: 那些提案还在审查之中。

sentences.chinese: 这部影片展现了费里尼的天赋。

sentences.english: a work of pure genius

sentences.english: Being compared to Abba is a great compliment.
sentences.chinese: 能和阿巴乐队相提并论是极大的赞誉。

sentences.chinese: 发动机运转平稳吗？

sentences.chinese: 我们因发动机故障而被困在空无一人的公路上。

sentences.english: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.chinese: 1941年，火车可能已由蒸汽机车来牵引了。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a vehicle that produces power to make it move

name: substance
trans: n. 物质；实质；资产；主旨

sentences.english: The leaves were covered with a strange sticky substance.
sentences.chinese: 树叶上覆着一层黏糊糊的怪东西。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of solid, liquid, or gas

sentences.chinese: 接近山顶时，我们感到越来越累了。

detailed_translations.english: to start to feel tired, or make someone feel tired

name: inappropriate

sentences.chinese: 没有迹象表明向客户出售过不适当的保险单。

detailed_translations.english: not suitable or right for a particular purpose or in a particular situation

sentences.chinese: 国有企业/公共事业单位

sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找有事业心和创造力的年轻人。

detailed_translations.english: a company, organization, or business

sentences.chinese: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.chinese: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧。

sentences.chinese: …一个新的冰球场。

name: heritage

sentences.chinese: 保护民族遗产的重要性

sentences.english: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
sentences.chinese: 属于我们遗产一部分的漂亮古建筑

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权
detailed_translations.english: the traditional beliefs, values, customs etc of a family, country, or society

name: aftermath

detailed_translations.english: the period of time after something such as a war, storm, or accident when people are still dealing with the results

name: remarkable
trans: adj. 卓越的；非凡的；值得注意的

sentences.english: She has made remarkable progress.
sentences.chinese: 她取得了显著的进步。

sentences.english: a remarkable coincidence
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的巧合

sentences.english: He’s a remarkable man .
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人。

detailed_translations.english: unusual or surprising and therefore deserving attention or praise

name: principal

sentences.chinese: 他那次旅程的首要目的是探访家人。

sentences.english: Teaching is her principal source of income.
sentences.chinese: 教书是她主要的收入来源。

sentences.english: the principal character in the book

detailed_translations.chinese: 负责人， 校长； 资本， 本金； 主要演员， 主角
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in charge of a school

name: substantiate

sentences.english: Katzen offered little evidence to substantiate his claims .
sentences.chinese: 卡曾拿不出什么证据来证明他的说法。

detailed_translations.english: to prove the truth of something that someone has said, claimed etc

name: chronic

sentences.english: chronic arthritis
sentences.chinese: 慢性关节炎

sentences.english: chronic asthma
sentences.chinese: 慢性哮喘

sentences.english: chronic heart disease
sentences.chinese: 慢性心脏病

sentences.chinese: 歌迷们被拦在路障后面。

name: professionally

name: notoriously
trans: adv. 众所周知地；声名狼藉地；恶名昭彰地

sentences.english: Derrida famously, notoriously, said "there is nothing outside the text," right? What he meant by that, of course, is that there's nothing but text.
sentences.chinese: 德里达著名地，恶名昭彰地，说道，文本之外什么都没有“,是吧，当然，他意思就是说，需要考虑的只有文本。

name: formula

sentences.english: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.english: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.chinese: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.english: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.chinese: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。

sentences.english: the formula for calculating distance
sentences.chinese: 计算距离的公式

detailed_translations.english: a series of numbers or letters that represent a mathematical or scientific rule

name: spine
trans: n. 脊柱，脊椎；刺；书脊

sentences.english: cactus spines
sentences.chinese: 仙人掌的刺

detailed_translations.chinese: 脊柱， 脊椎； 刺， 刺毛； 书脊
detailed_translations.english: the row of bones down the centre of your back that supports your body and protects your  spinal cord

name: cafeteria
trans: n. 自助餐厅

sentences.english: the school cafeteria
sentences.chinese: 学校餐厅

detailed_translations.english: a restaurant, often in a factory, college etc, where you choose from foods that have already been cooked and carry your own food to a table

name: flourish
trans: n. 兴旺；茂盛；挥舞；炫耀；华饰

sentences.english: He took his cap from under his arm with a flourish and pulled it low over his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他挥手从腋下取出帽子，拉低帽檐盖住眼睛。

sentences.english: He flourished the glass to emphasize the point.
sentences.chinese: 他挥舞着杯子来强调这一点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 兴旺；茂盛；挥舞；炫耀；华饰
detailed_translations.english: a curved line that you use to decorate writing
If you flourish an object, you wave it about in a way that makes people notice it

name: robust
trans: adj. 强健的；健康的；粗野的；粗鲁的

sentences.english: a robust man of six feet four
sentences.chinese: 一个身高六英尺四英寸的壮汉

detailed_translations.english: a robust person is strong and healthy

name: error
trans: n. 误差；错误；过失

sentences.english: There must be an error in our calculations.
sentences.chinese: 我们的计算肯定有错。

detailed_translations.english: a mistake

name: condone
trans: vt. 宽恕；赦免

sentences.english: I cannot condone the use of violence under any circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 我不能原谅在任何情况下使用暴力。

detailed_translations.english: to accept or forgive behaviour that most people think is morally wrong

name: attenuate
trans: vt. 使减弱；使纤细

sentences.english: The repetition of symbols was to be enough, without trauma, as well, perhaps, to attenuate it, or even jar it altogether loose from her memory.
sentences.chinese: 象征的重复快要足够，即便没有可能的从她记忆中流出的创伤，去减弱它去刺激它。

sentences.english: You could never eliminate risk, but preparation and training could attenuate it.
sentences.chinese: 风险不可能完全消除，但可以通过防范和培训来降低。

detailed_translations.english: To attenuate something means to reduce it or weaken it

name: visual
trans: adj. 视觉的，视力的；栩栩如生的

sentences.english: Artists translate their ideas into visual images.
sentences.chinese: 画家把自己的思想转换成视觉画面。

detailed_translations.english: relating to seeing

name: requirement
trans: n. 要求；必要条件；必需品

sentences.english: The refugees’ main requirements are food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 难民的主要需求是食物和住所。

sentences.english: to meet/fulfil/satisfy the requirements
sentences.chinese: 符合 / 满足必备的条件

detailed_translations.english: something that someone needs or asks for

name: intricate
trans: adj. 复杂的；错综的，缠结的

sentences.english: intricate patterns
sentences.chinese: 繁复的图案

detailed_translations.chinese: 错综复杂的， 复杂精细的
detailed_translations.english: containing many small parts or details that all work or fit together

name: video
trans: n. [电子] 视频；录像，录像机；电视

sentences.english: video production
sentences.chinese: 录像制作

sentences.english: video materials for language teaching
sentences.chinese: 语言教学的影像素材

detailed_translations.english: relating to or used in the process of recording and showing pictures on television
a copy of a film or television programme, or a series of events, recorded on videotape

name: gene
trans: n. [遗] 基因，遗传因子

sentences.english: human genes
sentences.chinese: 人类基因

sentences.english: the genes that regulate cell division
sentences.chinese: 控制细胞分裂的基因

detailed_translations.english: a part of a cell in a living thing that controls what it looks like, how it grows, and how it develops. People get their genes from their parents

name: occupancy
trans: n. 居住；占有；占用

sentences.english: Hotels in Tokyo enjoy over 90% occupancy.
sentences.chinese: 东京的宾馆入住率高达90%以上。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people who stay, work, or live in a room or building at the same time

name: journalist
trans: n. 新闻工作者；报人；记日志者

sentences.english: a well-known journalist and broadcaster
sentences.chinese: 一位著名的新闻记者兼播音员

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes news reports for newspapers, magazines, television, or radio

name: drink
trans: n. 酒，饮料；喝酒

sentences.english: You should drink plenty of water.
sentences.chinese: 你应该大量喝水。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝点什么？

sentences.english: Take a seat while I get you something to drink .
sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.english: She filled the glass and drank.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
an amount of liquid that you drink, or the act of drinking something

name: tiny
trans: adj. 微小的；很少的

sentences.english: a tiny community in the Midwest
sentences.chinese: 中西部地区一个极小的社区

sentences.english: The earrings were tiny.
sentences.chinese: 耳环很小。

sentences.english: a tiny little baby
sentences.chinese: 丁点大的婴儿

sentences.english: She always felt a tiny bit sad.
sentences.chinese: 她总是感到一丝悲伤。

sentences.english: Bad teachers are a tiny minority .
sentences.chinese: 差老师只占极少数。

sentences.english: tiny pieces of paper
sentences.chinese: 碎纸屑片

detailed_translations.english: extremely small

name: invective
trans: n. 恶言漫骂

sentences.english: The deputy leader of the group, which is based in Baghdad, explained its campaign using a stream of homophobic invective.
sentences.chinese: 这个组织总部设在巴格达，其副首领用一连串谩骂同性恋者的语言解释了这个运动。

sentences.english: Is it true that they and the entire  political culture will stop the self-sustaining and self-serving pendulum  of blame and invective only after a congressman has been shot?
sentences.chinese: 我们整个政治文化会出现终止自我维持和面对指责和谩骂时的自私摇摆不定的态度，改变从议员被枪杀开始吗？

sentences.english: A country whose politics have been damaged recently by bitter, racially tinged invective offered hundreds of thousands of visitors an affectionate welcome.
sentences.chinese: 就是这样一个被尖锐，夹带谩骂种族问题损害的政体的国家给了成百上千的来访者们热情的欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: rude and insulting words that someone says when they are very angry

name: emergent
trans: adj. 紧急的；浮现的；意外的；自然发生的

sentences.english: Discovering these patterns is the key to emergent design.
sentences.chinese: 发现这些模式是紧急设计的关键。

sentences.english: The real trick in emergent design is discovering these patterns.
sentences.chinese: 紧急设计的真正诀窍就是发现这些模式。

name: precise
trans: adj. 精确的；明确的；严格的

sentences.english: precise sales figures
sentences.chinese: 准确的销售数据

sentences.english: It was difficult to get precise information.
sentences.chinese: 很难得到确切的消息。

sentences.english: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise .’
sentences.chinese: “她比你大很多，是不是？”“准确地说，大了15岁。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的
detailed_translations.english: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct

name: gladiator
trans: n. 斗剑者；古罗马公开表演的格斗者；争论者

sentences.english: This is an arena for gladiators only, for the Titans of the track.
sentences.chinese: 这是个仅为勇士而且是仅为此行里的大力士勇士所设的竞技场。

detailed_translations.chinese: 角斗士， 与野兽搏斗者
detailed_translations.english: a soldier who fought against other men or wild animals as an entertainment in ancient Rome

name: generation
trans: n. 一代；产生；一代人；生殖

sentences.english: Like most of my generation, I had never known a war.
sentences.chinese: 和我们这一代的大多数人一样，我并没有经历过战争。

sentences.english: In my generation the divorce rate is very high.
sentences.chinese: 我们这一代人离婚率很高。

sentences.english: the need to preserve the planet for future generations
sentences.chinese: 为子孙后代保护地球的必要性

sentences.english: The story has been handed down from generation to generation.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事是一代一代传下来的。

sentences.english: the generation of electricity
sentences.chinese: 发电

detailed_translations.english: all people of about the same age

name: sudden
trans: n. 突然发生的事

sentences.english: a sudden change in the weather
sentences.chinese: 天气的突然变化

sentences.english: Life is cruel, she thought, with a sudden rush of anger.
sentences.chinese: 生活真残酷，她想，心头突然涌上一股怒气。

sentences.english: a sudden movement
sentences.chinese: 突然的一动

sentences.english: Her death was sudden.
sentences.chinese: 她的死很突然。

detailed_translations.english: happening, coming, or done quickly or when you do not expect it

name: facetious
trans: adj. 诙谐的；爱开玩笑的；滑稽的；(尤指在不合适的时候)开玩笑的

sentences.english: Don’t be so facetious!
sentences.chinese: 别这么乱开玩笑！

sentences.english: facetious comments
sentences.chinese: 不当的戏谑评论

detailed_translations.chinese: 诙谐的；爱开玩笑的；滑稽的；(尤指在不合适的时候)开玩笑的
detailed_translations.english: saying things that are intended to be clever and funny but are really silly and annoying

name: wrap
trans: n. 外套；围巾

sentences.english: I’ve still got a few Christmas presents to wrap up.
sentences.chinese: 我还有一些圣诞礼物要包起来。

detailed_translations.english: to put paper or cloth over something to cover it
a piece of thick cloth that a woman wears around her shoulders

name: flap
trans: n. 拍打，拍打声；神经紧张；[航] 襟翼

sentences.english: The flags were flapping in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 旗帜在微风中飘扬。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飘动， 拍动； 振翅
detailed_translations.english: if a bird flaps its wings, it moves them up and down in order to fly

detailed_translations.chinese: 片状垂悬物；飘动，摆动，振动；激动，慌忙状态
detailed_translations.english: a thin flat piece of cloth, paper, skin etc that is fixed by one edge to a surface, which you can lift up easily
to move quickly up and down or from side to side, often making a noise

name: volleyball
trans: n. 排球

sentences.english: I like playing beach volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢打沙滩排球。

sentences.english: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.chinese: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.english: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.chinese: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

detailed_translations.english: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net

name: vaccination
trans: n. 接种疫苗；种痘

sentences.english: But now there is no mumps at all in some countries because of vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 但现在因为接种疫苗在某些国家腮腺炎已经不见。

sentences.english: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

sentences.english: There are some reasons why some people believe they have gotten influenza after vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 有若干原因可说明为什么有些人认为他们在接种疫苗之后患上流感。

name: outmoded
trans: adj. 过时的，不流行的

sentences.english: outmoded ideas
sentences.chinese: 过时的观点

detailed_translations.english: no longer fashionable or useful

name: academy
trans: n. 学院；研究院；学会；专科院校

sentences.english: the American Academy of Arts and Letters
sentences.chinese: 美国艺术和文学学会

detailed_translations.chinese: 学院；研究院；学会；专科院校
detailed_translations.english: an official organization which encourages the development of literature, art, science etc

name: due
trans: n. 应付款；应得之物

sentences.english: The team are due to fly to Italy next month.
sentences.chinese: 该球队预定下个月飞往意大利。

sentences.english: Any money due you will be sent by cheque through the post.
sentences.chinese: 应该支付给你的款项将会以支票邮寄给你。

detailed_translations.english: expected to happen or arrive at a particular time

name: extract
trans: n. 汁；摘录；榨出物；选粹

sentences.english: You’ll have to have that tooth extracted.
sentences.chinese: 你得把那颗牙拔掉。

sentences.english: Oils are extracted from the plants.
sentences.chinese: 从这些植物中提炼出油。

sentences.english: I’ve only seen short extracts from the film.
sentences.chinese: 我只是看过那部电影的一些小片段。

detailed_translations.english: to remove an object from somewhere, especially with difficulty
a short piece of writing, music etc taken from a particular book, piece of music etc

name: ice skating
trans: n. 【体】滑冰；溜冰

name: advertise
trans: vt. 通知；为…做广告；使突出

sentences.english: They no longer advertise alcohol or cigarettes at sporting events.
sentences.chinese: 他们不再在体育赛事上做烟酒广告了。

sentences.english: Colleges and universities have found that it pays to advertise (=  advertising brings good results  ) .
sentences.chinese: 大专院校发现做广告效果很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…做广告， 宣传； 公告； 登广告
detailed_translations.english: to tell the public about a product or service in order to persuade them to buy it

name: despite
trans: prep. 尽管，不管

sentences.english: Despite all our efforts to save the school, the authorities decided to close it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我们竭力想保住这所学校，当局还是决定把它关闭。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something happens or is true even though something else might have prevented it

name: proponent
trans: n. 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者

sentences.english: Halsey was identified as a leading proponent of the values of progressive education.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔西被认为是进步教育价值观的首要支持者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者
detailed_translations.english: someone who supports something or persuades people to do something

name: ensure
trans: vt. 保证，确保；使安全

sentences.english: facilities to ensure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

detailed_translations.english: to make certain that something will happen properly

name: mendacious
trans: adj. 虚假的；说谎的

sentences.english: mendacious propaganda
sentences.chinese: 虚假的宣传

detailed_translations.english: not truthful

name: neophyte
trans: n. 新信徒；新入教者；初学者

sentences.english: ...the self-proclaimed political neophyte Ross Perot.
sentences.chinese: ...一个自命为政治新手的叫罗斯·佩罗的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 新信徒；新入教者；初学者
detailed_translations.english: someone who has just started to learn a particular skill, art, job etc

name: altruism
trans: n. 利他；利他主义

sentences.english: Many choose to work in developing countries out of altruism.
sentences.chinese: 许多人无私地选择在发展中国家工作。

detailed_translations.english: when you care about or help other people, even though this brings no advantage to yourself

name: ratio
trans: n. 比率，比例

sentences.english: Yeah, , now you know how the sex ratio matters!
sentences.chinese: 是的，现在你知道性别比例的问题了吧！ ！

sentences.english: The ratio could reach one in four within a year.
sentences.chinese: 一年之内这个比例可以达到四分之一。

sentences.english: When using profiling it is typical to consider only the ratio (or percentage) of time spent in certain areas.
sentences.chinese: 当使用分析时，它是典型的考虑时间花费在某些领域的比例（或百分比）。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship between two amounts, represented by a pair of numbers showing how much bigger one amount is than the other

name: scheme
trans: n. 计划；组合；体制；诡计

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

name: throw
trans: n. 投掷；冒险

sentences.english: The bus stopped suddenly and we were all thrown forwards.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车猛地停住，我们都往前栽。

detailed_translations.chinese: [threw-thrown] 投， 扔， 抛； 使突然陷入； 使困惑， 使吃惊
detailed_translations.english: to make an object such as a ball move quickly through the air by pushing your hand forward quickly and letting the object go

name: innovator
trans: n. 改革者，创新者

sentences.english: He is an innovator in this field.
sentences.chinese: 他是这个领域的革新者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who introduces changes and new ideas

name: translate
trans: vt. 翻译；转化；解释；转变为；调动

sentences.english: Poetry doesn’t usually translate well.
sentences.chinese: 诗歌通常都译不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 翻译；转化；解释；转变为；调动
detailed_translations.english: to change written or spoken words into another language

name: potential
trans: n. 潜能；可能性；[电] 电势

sentences.english: The company has identified 60 potential customers.
sentences.chinese: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

detailed_translations.english: likely to develop into a particular type of person or thing in the future
the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect

name: adversary
trans: n. 对手；敌手

sentences.english: His business rivals knew they could expect no quarter from such a ruthless adversary.
sentences.chinese: 他的业务对手都知道他们不能指望这样无情的对手的慈悲。

sentences.english: They tell us, sir, that we are weak -- unable to cope with so formidable an adversary.
sentences.chinese: 先生，他们告诉我们，我们是弱小的——不能应付如此强大的对手。

sentences.english: If we use exponentiation to encrypt or decrypt , the adversary can use logarithm to attack .
sentences.chinese: 如果我们运用求幂运算来加密和解密，对手就可以运用对数进行攻击。

detailed_translations.english: a country or person you are fighting or competing against

name: challenge
trans: n. 挑战；怀疑

sentences.english: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑战，邀请比赛；艰巨的任务；怀疑，质问
detailed_translations.english: something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

name: deteriorate
trans: vi. 恶化，变坏

sentences.english: Ethel’s health has deteriorated.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞尔的健康状况恶化了。

sentences.english: America’s deteriorating economy
sentences.chinese: 美国日渐恶化的经济

detailed_translations.english: to become worse

name: Spectator
trans: Not Found

name: deform
trans: adj. 畸形的；丑陋的

sentences.english: Wearing badly-fitting shoes can deform your feet.
sentences.chinese: 穿不合脚的鞋会使脚变形。

detailed_translations.english: if you deform something, or if it deforms, its usual shape changes so that its usefulness or appearance is spoiled

name: opinion
trans: n. 意见；主张

sentences.english: What’s your opinion of Cathy?
sentences.chinese: 你对凯茜的看法如何？

detailed_translations.english: your ideas or beliefs about a particular subject

name: hothouse
trans: n. 温室；温床

sentences.english: ...the reputation of the college as a hothouse of novel ideas.
sentences.chinese: ...该学院享有的新思想摇篮的美誉。

detailed_translations.english: a heated building, usually made of glass, where delicate plants can grow

detailed_translations.chinese: 温室的；过分保护的；娇弱的

name: conscientious
trans: adj. 认真的；尽责的；本着良心的；小心谨慎的

sentences.english: A conscientious teacher may feel inclined to take work home.
sentences.chinese: 一个认真负责的教师可能会想着把工作带回家去做。

sentences.english: a conscientious and hard-working student

detailed_translations.english: careful to do everything that it is your job or duty to do

name: exotic
trans: adj. 异国的；外来的；异国情调的

sentences.english: exotic places
sentences.chinese: 有异国风情的地方

detailed_translations.english: something that is exotic seems unusual and interesting because it is related to a foreign country – use this to show approval

name: sleep
trans: n. 睡眠

sentences.english: I usually sleep on my back.
sentences.chinese: 我一般仰卧着睡觉。

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: He’s lucky because at least he has somewhere to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他算是幸运的，至少还有个睡觉的地方。

the natural state of resting your mind and body, usually at night

name: lend
trans: vt. 贷；增添，提供；把……借给

sentences.chinese: 医院同意借给我们一把轮椅。

sentences.english: The bank is reassessing its criteria for lending money.
sentences.chinese: 银行正在重新评估其贷款标准。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone borrow money or something that belongs to you for a short time

name: imperative
trans: n. 必要的事；命令；需要；规则；[语]祈使语气

sentences.english: It is imperative that politicians should be good communicators.
sentences.chinese: 政治家应该是很好的沟通者，这很重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的；紧急的，极重要的；命令的
detailed_translations.english: extremely important and needing to be done or dealt with immediately

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的事， 必须完成的事； 【语】祈使语气
detailed_translations.english: something that must be done urgently

name: outbreak
trans: n. （战争的）爆发；（疾病的）发作

sentences.english: a cholera outbreak
sentences.chinese: 霍乱的爆发

detailed_translations.english: if there is an outbreak of fighting or disease in an area, it suddenly starts to happen

name: federation
trans: n. 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府

sentences.english: the National Federation of Women’s Institutes
sentences.chinese: 〔英国及英联邦国家〕妇女协会全国联合会

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府
detailed_translations.english: a group of organizations, clubs, or people that have joined together to form a single group

name: tumour
trans: n. [肿瘤] 瘤；肿瘤；肿块

sentences.english: a brain tumour
sentences.chinese: 脑瘤

detailed_translations.english: a mass of diseased cells in your body that have divided and increased too quickly

name: massive
trans: adj. 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的

sentences.english: The bell is massive, weighing over 40 tons.
sentences.chinese: 那口钟非常大，有40多吨重。

sentences.english: the castle’s massive walls
sentences.chinese: 城堡高大厚实的围墙

detailed_translations.chinese: (尺寸、数量、规模) 非常大的
detailed_translations.english: very large in size, quantity, or extent

name: client
trans: n. [经] 客户；顾客；委托人

sentences.english: a meeting with an important client
sentences.chinese: 与一位重要客户的会面

detailed_translations.english: someone who gets services or advice from a professional person, company, or organization

name: shard
trans: n. （甲虫的）[昆] 鞘翅；陶瓷碎片

name: tribe
trans: n. 部落；族；宗族；一伙

sentences.english: a tribe of Aborigines known as the Dolphin People
sentences.chinese: 一个叫“海豚族”的澳大利亚土著部落

detailed_translations.english: a social group consisting of people of the same  race  who have the same beliefs, customs, language etc, and usually live in one particular area ruled by their leader

trans: vt. 抚慰，安抚；与…和解

detailed_translations.english: to make someone who has been unfriendly or angry with you feel more friendly by doing something to please them

name: quarantine
trans: n. 检疫；隔离；检疫期；封锁

sentences.english: She was sent home and put in quarantine.
sentences.chinese: 她被送回家实施隔离。

detailed_translations.english: to keep a person or animal apart from others for a period of time in case they are carrying a disease

name: swimsuit
trans: n. 游泳衣（女式）

sentences.english: ...pictures of models in swimsuits.
sentences.chinese: …泳装模特的照片。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing worn for swimming

name: submission
trans: n. 投降；提交（物）；服从；（向法官提出的）意见；谦恭

sentences.english: The deadline for the submission of proposals is May 1st.
sentences.chinese: 呈交提案的最后期限是 5 月 1 日。

sentences.english: Plans were drawn up for submission to the housing council.
sentences.chinese: 计划已起草，要提交给住房委员会。

sentences.english: Submissions will not be accepted after May.
sentences.chinese: 过了5月再提交将不予接受。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投降；提交（物）；服从；（向法官提出的）意见；谦恭
detailed_translations.english: when you give or show something to someone in authority, for them to consider or approve

name: regular
trans: n. 常客；正式队员；中坚分子

sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.english: His breathing was slow and regular.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.english: Trains will run at regular intervals from 11 am to 4 pm.
sentences.chinese: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.english: We hear from him on a regular basis .
sentences.chinese: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.english: He phones us every Sunday at six, regular as clockwork (= always at the same time ) .
sentences.chinese: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

sentences.english: a regular job
sentences.chinese: 固定的工作

detailed_translations.english: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

name: calculate
trans: vt. 计算；预测；认为；打算

sentences.english: These instruments calculate distances precisely.
sentences.chinese: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算， 推算； 计划， 打算
detailed_translations.english: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers

name: register
trans: n. 登记；注册；记录；寄存器；登记簿

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

name: dispersal
trans: n. 分散；传播；散布；疏散；消失

sentences.english: the role of birds in the dispersal of seeds
sentences.chinese: 鸟类对传播种子的作用

detailed_translations.english: the process of spreading things over a wide area or in different directions

name: utility
trans: n. 实用；效用；公共设施；功用

sentences.english: Does your rent include utilities?
sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
detailed_translations.english: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

name: absence
trans: n. 没有；缺乏；缺席；不注意

sentences.chinese: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

detailed_translations.english: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

trans: n. 新闻业，新闻工作；报章杂志

sentences.chinese: 新闻工作生涯

sentences.chinese: 这家医院成了调查报道的目标。

detailed_translations.english: the job or activity of writing news reports for newspapers, magazines, television, or radio

trans: n. 黎明；开端

sentences.chinese: 破晓的时候，我们离加尔各答还有50英里。

sentences.english: I was up at the crack of dawn (= very early in the morning ) to get the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我一大早就起来赶飞机。

sentences.english: We worked from dawn to dusk (= through the whole day while it is light ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们从早干到晚。

sentences.english: the cold light of dawn
sentences.chinese: 清冷的晨曦

sentences.english: The morning dawned fresh and clear after the storm.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨过后，破晓时天朗气清。

if day or morning dawns, it begins

name: church
trans: n. 教堂；礼拜；教派

sentences.english: a short church service
sentences.chinese: 简短的教堂礼拜仪式

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a building where Christians go to worship

detailed_translations.chinese: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

name: metropolitan
trans: adj. 大都市的；大主教辖区的；宗主国的

sentences.chinese: 南澳大利亚的一个都市区

sentences.chinese: 乌克兰的天主教代表——弗拉基米尔大主教和索夫龙主教

detailed_translations.english: relating or belonging to a very large city
a metropolitan is an important priest in the Orthodox and Catholic Churches. He has authority over other priests and is in charge of a particular area.

name: picture
trans: n. 照片，图画；影片；景色；化身

sentences.chinese: 那个房间墙上有几幅画。

sentences.english: a book with pictures in it
sentences.chinese: 带插图的书

sentences.english: He asked her permission to paint her picture (= paint a picture of her ) .
sentences.chinese: 他请求她允许为她画像。

detailed_translations.english: shapes, lines etc painted or drawn on a surface, showing what someone or something looks like
to show someone or something in a photograph, painting, or drawing

name: seminar
trans: n. 讨论会，研讨班

sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚研讨班

detailed_translations.english: a class at a university or college for a small group of students and a teacher to study or discuss a particular subject

name: skim
trans: n. 撇；撇去的东西；表层物；瞒报所得的收入

sentences.chinese: 掠过浪尖的海鸥

sentences.chinese: 朱莉浏览了体育版。

name: evaporate
trans: vt. 使……蒸发；使……脱水；使……消失

sentences.chinese: 大部分的水都蒸发了。

sentences.english: The sun evaporates moisture on the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 太阳会蒸发叶子上的水分。

if a liquid evaporates, or if heat evaporates it, it changes into a gas

trans: n. 微生物学

sentences.chinese: ...一位微生物学和免疫学教授。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of very small living things such as  bacteria

trans: n. 争论，争辩；争夺；论点

sentences.chinese: 他的案子已变成了公民自由活动家们和政府之间的争论缘由。

detailed_translations.english: a strong opinion that someone expresses

trans: n. 治疗，疗法；处理；对待

sentences.chinese: 癌症治疗有了很大的进展。

sentences.chinese: 蟾蜍的皮肤会分泌一种致命毒素。

trans: n. 本质；要素；要点；必需品

sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary

name: placate
trans: vt. 抚慰；怀柔；使和解

sentences.english: These changes did little to placate the unions.
sentences.chinese: 这些变革对于工会没有起到多少安抚作用。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone stop feeling angry

name: respondent

sentences.english: Upon receipt of a copy of the arbitration application, the respondent shall, within the time limit prescribed by the Arbitration Rules, submit its defence to the arbitration commission.
sentences.chinese: 被申请人收到仲裁申请书副本后，应当在仲裁规则规定的期限内向仲裁委员会提交答辩书。

name: skyscraper
trans: n. 摩天楼，超高层大楼；特别高的东西

sentences.chinese: 那幢摩天大楼高耸入云。

sentences.english: The majesty of the skyscraper awed me .
sentences.chinese: 这幢摩天大厦的雄伟气势令我惊叹。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a top needle of a skyscraper is pressing toward him. He fails to dodge and bumps heavily on the concrete needle.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一座摩天大厦的尖型顶柱朝他逼来，他躲避不及，重重地撞在混凝土顶柱上。

detailed_translations.english: a very tall modern city building

name: plantation
trans: n. 栽植；殖民；大农场

sentences.english: a rubber plantation
sentences.chinese: 橡胶园

detailed_translations.chinese: 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的

name: digression
trans: n. 离题；脱轨

sentences.english: Thee direct address of an absent or imaginary person or of a personified abstraction, especially as a digression in the course of a speech or composition.
sentences.chinese: 呼语：直接称呼不在场或虚构的人物或称呼拟人的事物，尤指作为演讲或作文过程中的离题话。 。

sentences.english: In that speech in Alexandria, though, Nasser chose to delve back even further into history, in a long digression on the building of the Suez canal a century earlier.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在亚历山大港的那次演说，纳赛尔选择的是远远的向回探究历史，离题很远地谈到了早在一个世纪之前苏伊士运河的修建。

sentences.english: After this digression we return now to our original problem.
sentences.chinese: 在这一段插话以后，现在回到原来的问题。

name: logical
trans: adj. 合逻辑的，合理的；逻辑学的

sentences.english: It’s a logical site for a new supermarket, with the housing development nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近有住宅区，新的超级市场选址在此是合情合理的。

sentences.english: a logical conclusion
sentences.chinese: 合理的结论

detailed_translations.chinese: 逻辑的， 合乎常理的
detailed_translations.english: seeming reasonable and sensible

name: defiance
trans: n. 蔑视；挑战；反抗

sentences.english: ...his courageous defiance of the government.
sentences.chinese: …他对政府的大胆蔑视。

detailed_translations.english: behaviour that shows you refuse to do what someone tells you to do, especially because you do not respect them

name: inspiration
trans: n. 灵感；鼓舞；吸气；妙计

sentences.english: The Malvern Hills have provided inspiration for many artists and musicians over the decades.
sentences.chinese: 几十年来，莫尔文丘陵为很多艺术家和音乐家提供了灵感。

sentences.english: He raised his eyes to the altar as if seeking inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他抬头看看祭坛，似乎在寻求灵感。

sentences.english: He draws inspiration from ordinary scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他从日常生活中得到灵感。

sentences.english: Mary Quant’s inspiration comes from the glam style of the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉·官的灵感来自70年代的魅惑风格。

sentences.english: He had a sudden flash of inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他突然灵感闪现。

sentences.english: He has always been a source of inspiration for me.
sentences.chinese: 他一直是我灵感的源泉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灵感； 鼓舞人心的人
