name: exhibit
trans: n. 展览品；证据；展示会

sentences.english: Her paintings have been exhibited all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的绘画作品在世界各地展出。

detailed_translations.english: to show something in a public place so that people can go to see it
something, for example a painting, that is put in a public place so that people can go to see it

name: protein
trans: n. 蛋白质；朊

sentences.english: Where do you get your protein?
sentences.chinese: 你从哪里获得蛋白质？

sentences.english: Dairy source of protein and calcium.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛的蛋白质来源和钙。

sentences.english: So, what happens, this is another view of a sodium channel, so this is actually looking a little bit more at the protein structure .
sentences.chinese: 那么，这里发生了什么，这是钠离子通道的另一张图片，在这种蛋白质结构中，它看起来更复杂一点。

detailed_translations.english: one of several natural substances that exist in food such as meat, eggs, and beans, and which your body needs in order to grow and remain strong and healthy

name: arduous
trans: adj. 努力的；费力的；险峻的

sentences.english: ...a long, hot and arduous trip.
sentences.chinese: …一段漫长、灼热、艰难的旅程。

detailed_translations.english: involving a lot of strength and effort

name: hood
trans: n. 头巾；覆盖；兜帽

sentences.english: Why don’t you put your hood up if you’re cold?
sentences.chinese: 你冷的话为什么不把风帽拉起来？

detailed_translations.english: a part of a coat, jacket etc that you can pull up to cover your head
to cover or provide with or as if with a hood

name: similar
trans: n. 类似物

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

name: floor
trans: n. 地板，地面；楼层；基底；议员席

sentences.english: a polished wooden floor
sentences.chinese: 上过蜡的木地板

sentences.english: a puddle of water on the kitchen floor
sentences.chinese: 厨房地面上的一摊水

sentences.english: a warehouse that has 410,000 square feet of floor space
sentences.chinese: 楼面面积为41万平方英尺的仓库

detailed_translations.chinese: 地板，地面；楼层；基底；议员席
detailed_translations.english: the flat surface that you stand on inside a building

detailed_translations.chinese: 铺地板；打倒，击倒；（被困难）难倒
detailed_translations.english: to hit someone so hard that they fall down

name: talkative
trans: adj. 饶舌的；多话的；多嘴的；爱说话的

sentences.english: He suddenly became very talkative, his face slightly flushed, his eyes much brighter.
sentences.chinese: 他突然变得很爱说话，他的脸颊稍微有点红，他的眼睛明亮多了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 饶舌的；多话的；多嘴的；爱说话的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is talkative talks a lot

name: audacious
trans: adj. 无畏的；鲁莽的

sentences.english: the risks involved in such an audacious operation
sentences.chinese: 如此大胆的行动中存在的风险

detailed_translations.chinese: 厚颜无耻的；大胆鲁莽的

trans: n. 智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力；才智，智慧；天分

sentences.english: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

sentences.english: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
sentences.chinese: 根据我们的情报，还会有更进一步的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things

name: proverb
trans: n. 谚语，格言；众所周知的人或事

sentences.english: An old Arab proverb says, "The enemy of my enemy is my friend."
sentences.chinese: 有一句古老的阿拉伯谚语说：“我敌人的敌人是我的朋友。”

detailed_translations.english: a short well-known statement that gives advice or expresses something that is generally true. ‘A penny saved is a penny earned’ is an example of a proverb.

name: corner
trans: n. 角落，拐角处；地区，偏僻处；困境，窘境

sentences.english: He pulled a dirty handkerchief out by its corner and waved it at me.
sentences.chinese: 他拽出一块脏手帕，捏着一角向我挥动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 角落，拐角处；地区，偏僻处；困境，窘境
detailed_translations.english: the point at which two lines or edges meet

name: emulate
trans: n. 仿真；仿效

sentences.english: He hoped to emulate the success of Wilder.
sentences.chinese: 他希望效仿怀尔德的成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 仿真；模仿；尽力赶上；同…竞争
detailed_translations.english: to do something or behave in the same way as someone else, especially because you admire them

name: subsequent
trans: adj. 后来的，随后的

sentences.english: These skills were passed on to subsequent generations.
sentences.chinese: 这些技能代代相传。

sentences.english: subsequent pages of the book
sentences.chinese: 接下去的书页

detailed_translations.english: happening or coming after something else

name: diffident
trans: adj. 羞怯的；缺乏自信的；谦虚谨慎的

sentences.english: John was as bouncy and ebullient as Helen was diffident and reserved.
sentences.chinese: 约翰活泼、热情；而海伦却羞怯、矜持。

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞怯的；缺乏自信的；谦虚谨慎的
detailed_translations.english: shy and not wanting to make people notice you or talk about you

name: uninhabitable
trans: adj. 不适宜居住的

sentences.english: Much of the country is uninhabitable because it is desert.
sentences.chinese: 由于地处沙漠，这个国家的许多地区不适宜居住。

sentences.english: Many houses were so badly damaged in the war that they were made permanently uninhabitable.
sentences.chinese: 很多房屋在战争中严重受损，再也不能居住了。

detailed_translations.english: if a place is uninhabitable, it is impossible to live in

name: chairman
trans: n. 主席，会长；董事长

sentences.english: deputy/vice chairman Barrett serves as vice chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴雷特担任副主席一职。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a man, who is in charge of a meeting or directs the work of a committee or an organization

name: technological
trans: adj. 技术的；工艺的

sentences.english: The steam engine was the greatest technological advance of the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽机是19世纪最伟大的技术进步。

detailed_translations.english: related to technology

name: lie
trans: vi. 躺；说谎；位于；展现

sentences.english: to lie on your back/side/front
sentences.chinese: 仰 / 侧 / 俯卧

sentences.english: The book lay open on his desk.
sentences.chinese: 那本书摊开放在他的书桌上。

sentences.english: The town lies in a small wooded valley.
sentences.chinese: 该城镇坐落于一个林木茂盛的山谷中。

detailed_translations.english: to be or put yourself in a flat or horizontal position so that you are not standing or sitting

name: evidence
trans: n. 证据，证明；迹象；明显

sentences.english: We found further scientific evidence for this theory.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。

sentences.english: I was asked to give evidence (= to say what I knew, describe what I had seen, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 我被要求出庭作证。

detailed_translations.english: facts or signs that show clearly that something exists or is true

name: tissue
trans: n. 组织；纸巾；薄纱；一套

sentences.english: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.
sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.english: As we age we lose muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

detailed_translations.english: light thin paper used for wrapping, packing etc

name: hygienic
trans: adj. 卫生的，保健的；卫生学的

name: request
trans: n. 请求；需要

sentences.english: They have made an urgent request for international aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们紧急请求国际援助。

sentences.english: To request more information, please call our toll free number.
sentences.chinese: 欲知详情，请拨打我们的免费电话。

detailed_translations.english: a polite or formal demand for something
to ask for something in a polite or formal way

name: swift
trans: n. 褐雨燕

sentences.english: My letter received a swift reply.
sentences.chinese: 我的信很快就得到了回复。

sentences.english: She shot a swift glance at Paul.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速瞥了保罗一眼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done quickly and immediately

name: select
trans: n. 被挑选者；精萃

sentences.english: The party was small and select.
sentences.chinese: 团里人员不多，都是经过精心挑选的。

sentences.english: Honorary degrees are handed out to a select few .
sentences.chinese: 荣誉学位颁给挑选出的少数几个人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精选的， 挑选出来的； 优等的， 第一流的
detailed_translations.english: a select group of people or things is a small special group that has been chosen carefully
to choose something or someone by thinking carefully about which is the best, most suitable etc

name: validity
trans: n. [计] 有效性；正确；正确性

sentences.english: So that satisfies the definition of validity.
sentences.chinese: 所以这满足了有效性的定义。

sentences.english: Does this argument satisfy the definition of validity or does it not?
sentences.chinese: 这个论点满足有效性的定义吗？,还是不满足？

sentences.english: While each of these might have some validity, in many cases the same general comments may also apply to many of the other projects you work on.
sentences.chinese: 尽管其中每个问题可能具有某些正确性，但是在许多情况下，一般性评论还可能适用于您从事的其他项目。

name: trap
trans: n. 陷阱；圈套；[建] 存水湾

sentences.english: Mr Smith has walked straight into a trap laid by the Tories.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生直接落入了保守党布设的圈套。

sentences.english: He felt he had been trapped into accepting the terms of the contract.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得自己是中了圈套才接受这合同条款的。

sentences.english: Were you just trying to trap her into making some admission?
sentences.chinese: 你仅仅是在试图诱骗她招供吗？

detailed_translations.english: a clever trick that is used to catch someone or to make them do or say something that they did not intend to
to trick sb into sth

name: resemble
trans: vt. 类似，像

sentences.english: It’s amazing how closely Brian and Steve resemble each other.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩和史蒂夫真是惊人地相像。

sentences.english: He grew up to resemble his father.
sentences.chinese: 他长大了，很像他父亲。

detailed_translations.english: to look like or be similar to someone or something

name: qualitative
trans: adj. 定性的；质的，性质上的

sentences.english: There are qualitative differences in the way children of different ages and adults think.
sentences.chinese: 不同年龄的儿童和成人在思维方式上有着质的差异。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the quality or standard of something rather than the quantity

name: commission
trans: n. 委员会；佣金；犯；委任；委任状

sentences.english: The Government set up a commission to investigate allegations of police violence.
sentences.chinese: 政府成立了一个委员会调查对警察施暴行为的指控。

detailed_translations.chinese: 委任状；委员会；佣金，回扣；授权，委托
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have been given the official job of finding out about something or controlling something
to formally ask someone to write an official report, produce a work of art for you etc

name: nickname
trans: n. 绰号；昵称

sentences.english: Stephen earned himself the nickname Hawkeye.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬得了个“鹰眼”的绰号。

sentences.english: When he got older I nicknamed him Little Alf.
sentences.chinese: 他长大些后，我给他起了绰号“小阿尔夫”。

detailed_translations.english: a name given to someone, especially by their friends or family, that is not their real name and is often connected with what they look like or something they have done
If you nickname someone or something, you give them an informal name

name: reduction
trans: n. 减少；下降；缩小；还原反应

sentences.english: strategies for noise reduction
sentences.chinese: 减少噪音的对策

sentences.english: The company promised they would make no staff reductions for at least two years.
sentences.chinese: 公司承诺至少两年不裁员。

detailed_translations.english: a decrease in the size, price, or amount of something, or the act of decreasing something

name: nun
trans: n. 修女，尼姑

sentences.english: Mr. Thomas was taught by the Catholic nuns whose school he attended to work and study hard.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯先生受教于天主教修女。在修女开办的学校里他专心工作，刻苦学习。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is a member of a group of religious women that live together in a convent

name: viable
trans: adj. 可行的；能养活的；能生育的

sentences.english: viable seeds
sentences.chinese: 可存活的种子

detailed_translations.chinese: 可行的；能养活的；能生育的
detailed_translations.english: a viable idea, plan, or method can work successfully

name: blowout
trans: n. 爆裂；喷出；[电] 保险丝烧断；井中喷水或油等

name: methodology
trans: n. 方法学，方法论

sentences.english: Teaching methodologies vary according to the topic.
sentences.chinese: 教学方法因题目而不同。

detailed_translations.english: A methodology is a system of methods and principles for doing something, for example for teaching or for carrying out research

name: pathology
trans: n. 病理（学）; 〈比喻〉异常状态

sentences.english: One person may show lots of pathology in their brain while another shows very little, yet both may have had dementia.
sentences.chinese: 即使两人都患有痴呆症，但一人的大脑可能在病理现象中呈现较多，而另一个人可能较少。

sentences.english: According to the scientific team, only one of these four categories of gamblers actually shows signs of a significant pathology.
sentences.chinese: 根据科学小组得知，事实上在这四种赌徒里只有一种显示出明显的病理学的迹象。

sentences.english: It makes sense to leave the ovaries if there is no risk factors or pathology at the time of surgery, especially in young women since those are the ones who seem to be most affected.
sentences.chinese: 斯科西亚说，“如果在手术时没有出现危险因素或病理原因，那么保留卵巢就是合理的，尤其是那些年轻妇女，因为她们似乎是受到影响最大的人群。”

detailed_translations.english: the study of the causes and effects of illnesses

name: bather
trans: n. 入浴者；游泳者；浴疗者

name: relaxation
trans: n. 放松；缓和；消遣

sentences.english: I play the piano for relaxation.
sentences.chinese: 我弹钢琴自娱。

sentences.english: Meditation allows you to enter a state of deep relaxation .
sentences.chinese: 冥想能使你进入完全放松的状态。

detailed_translations.english: a way of resting and enjoying yourself

name: evolution
trans: n. 演变；进化论；进展

sentences.english: the theory of evolution
sentences.chinese: 进化论

detailed_translations.english: the scientific idea that plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time

name: virus
trans: n. [病毒] 病毒；恶毒；毒害

sentences.english: children infected with the Aids virus
sentences.chinese: 感染艾滋病病毒的儿童

sentences.english: a virus infection
sentences.chinese: 病毒感染

detailed_translations.english: a very small living thing that causes infectious illnesses

name: rainforest
trans: n. （热带）雨林

sentences.english: The rainforest is essential in other areas also.
sentences.chinese: 雨林在其他地区也是必不可少的。

sentences.english: The rainforest around our house sometimes brings forth intriguing creatures like this.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房子周围的雨林有时带来了这样有趣的生物。

sentences.english: Then we carried on in the worst conditions yet: low, tangled rainforest that blocked out the light, and mud up to our thighs.
sentences.chinese: 那时我们还在最糟糕的环境里行进着：低矮、纷乱的雨林遮住了阳光，泥浆没至我们的大腿。

name: proliferate
trans: vi. 增殖；扩散；激增

sentences.english: Computer courses continue to proliferate.
sentences.chinese: 计算机课程层出不穷。

detailed_translations.english: if something proliferates, it increases quickly and spreads to many different places

name: text
trans: n. [计] 文本；课文；主题

sentences.english: a chemistry text
sentences.chinese: 化学课本

detailed_translations.english: a textbook
to send someone a written message on a  mobile phone

name: leadership
trans: n. 领导能力；领导阶层

sentences.english: The US must now take a firm leadership role.
sentences.chinese: 美国现在必须扮演一个强有力的领导人角色。

sentences.english: the Conservative leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 保守党的领导人角逐

sentences.english: The next leadership election is due in November.
sentences.chinese: 下一届领导人选举将在十一月举行。

detailed_translations.english: the position of being the leader of a group, organization, country etc

name: inspection
trans: n. 视察，检查

sentences.english: An inspection was carried out at the school.
sentences.chinese: 有人来学校视察了一遍。

sentences.english: However, on closer inspection, a number of problems emerged.
sentences.chinese: 然而，经进一步检查，很多问题冒了出来。

detailed_translations.english: an official visit to a building or organization to check that everything is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed

name: bemuse
trans: vt. 使发呆；使茫然；使困惑

sentences.english: The sheer quantity of detail would bemuse even the most clear-headed author.
sentences.chinese: 大量的细节会让即使是头脑最清醒的作者都感到困惑。

detailed_translations.english: If something bemuses you, it puzzles or confuses you

name: picnic
trans: n. 野餐

sentences.english: We decided to have a picnic down by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定在湖边野餐。

sentences.english: a picnic table
sentences.chinese: 野餐桌

sentences.english: There is free parking for visitors, as well as a restaurant and picnic area (= a special area with tables where people can have a picnic ) .
sentences.chinese: 除了餐厅和野餐区，我们还为游客提供免费停车位。

sentences.english: The area is very popular with picnickers.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区很受野餐者的欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a picnic, you take food and eat it outdoors, especially in the country
to have a picnic

name: lock
trans: vt. 锁，锁上；隐藏

sentences.english: I’m sorry, there isn’t a lock on the bathroom door.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，浴室门上没有锁。

sentences.english: The key turned stiffly in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 这把钥匙开锁不灵活。

sentences.english: a bike lock
sentences.chinese: 自行车锁

sentences.english: Did you lock the car?
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车锁好了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar
to fasten something, usually with a key, so that other people cannot open it, or to be fastened like this

name: anarchy
trans: n. 无政府状态；混乱；无秩序

sentences.english: The prison is close to anarchy.
sentences.chinese: 那所监狱几乎一片混乱。

sentences.english: The classroom was in a constant state of anarchy .
sentences.chinese: 教室里永远是一片混乱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无政府状态；混乱；无秩序
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is no effective government in a country or no order in an organization or situation

name: vacation
trans: n. 假期；（房屋）搬出

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.english: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere for a holiday
a holiday, or time spent not working

name: felicitous
trans: adj. 恰当的；善于措辞的；幸福的

sentences.english: a felicitous choice of candidate
sentences.chinese: 最佳候选人

detailed_translations.chinese: 恰当的；善于措辞的；幸福的
detailed_translations.english: well-chosen and suitable

name: punctuation
trans: n. 标点；标点符号

sentences.english: He was known for his poor grammar and punctuation.
sentences.chinese: 他以很差的语法和标点符号使用而出名。

detailed_translations.english: the marks used to divide a piece of writing into sentences, phrases etc

name: salary
trans: n. 薪水

sentences.english: The average salary for a teacher is $39,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 教师的平均工资是39,000美元一年。

detailed_translations.english: money that you receive as payment from the organization you work for, usually paid to you every month

name: associate
trans: n. 同事，伙伴；关联的事物

sentences.english: Through science we've got the idea of associating progress with the future.
sentences.chinese: 通过科学我们已有了将进步与未来联系起来的观念。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…联系在一起；使联合，结合；交往	[ə'səuʃiət]
detailed_translations.english: to make a connection in your mind between one thing or person and another
someone who is a member etc of something, but who is at a lower level and has fewer rights
someone who you work or do business with

name: require
trans: vt. 需要；要求；命令

sentences.english: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.english: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.english: The bill failed to get the required number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 法案没有得到规定的票数。

detailed_translations.english: to need something

name: botany
trans: n. 植物学；地区植物总称

sentences.english: He studied botany at university.
sentences.chinese: 他在大学学习植物学。

sentences.english: To what degree are you interested in botany?
sentences.chinese: 你对植物学的兴趣达到什么程度?

sentences.english: The first of these in the field of botany were the herbals.
sentences.chinese: 在植物学领域，这些最早的著作是本草书。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of plants

name: appendix
trans: n. 附录；阑尾；附加物

sentences.english: See Appendix 2.6.
sentences.chinese: 见附录2.6。

sentences.english: Christine had to go into hospital to have her appendix out (=  have it removed  ) .
sentences.chinese: 克里丝蒂娜不得不去医院切除阑尾。

detailed_translations.english: a part at the end of a book containing additional information

name: disdain
trans: n. 蔑视

sentences.english: a look of complete disdain
sentences.chinese: 极为鄙视的样子

detailed_translations.english: a complete lack of respect that you show for someone or something because you think they are not important or good enough
to have no respect for someone or something, because you think they are not important or good enough

name: stamen
trans: n. [植] 雄蕊

name: rage
trans: n. 愤怒；狂暴，肆虐；情绪激动

sentences.english: Sobbing with rage, Carol was taken to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 卡罗尔气得呜呜哭，被送往医院。

sentences.english: Richens was 17 when he flew into a rage and stabbed another teenager.
sentences.chinese: 里琴斯17岁那年一怒之下捅了一名少年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 愤怒；狂暴，肆虐；情绪激动
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of uncontrollable anger
to feel very angry about something and show this in the way you behave or speak

name: relevance
trans: n. 关联；适当；中肯

sentences.english: I think we can all appreciate the relevance of that now.
sentences.chinese: 我想，我们大家现在都能领会这句话中肯。

name: desiccate
trans: vt. 使干；干贮

sentences.english: The device was able to desiccate the salty water and to condense the moisture into drinkable water.
sentences.chinese: 这个装置能先把盐水蒸干，再让水蒸气冷凝成可饮用的水。

sentences.english: Although many bdelloids live in desiccation-prone habitats, such as ephemeral ponds, there are substantial numbers found in permanently aquatic habitats that are unable to desiccate.
sentences.chinese: 尽管许多轮虫生活在干燥的栖息地，如短时间的小水塘，但是有许多轮虫却生活在不会干涸的多水环境里。

sentences.english: Tympanic center leaves the alveolus of one desiccate.
sentences.chinese: 鼓膜中心则留下一变干的小孔。

name: adventurous
trans: adj. 爱冒险的；大胆的；充满危险的

sentences.english: Andy isn’t a very adventurous cook.

sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

sentences.chinese: 然而，如果这些居民的科技次于地球，你应该尽快找到一个小的原始部落。

sentences.chinese: 珀杜斯基曾经勤奋地学习他所选的外语。

name: interaction
trans: n. 相互作用；[数] 交互作用

sentences.chinese: 但您只能在实现所有方法的情况下获得最大收益，因为它们的力量来自它们之间的交互。

sentences.chinese: 幸亏驾驶员设法将俯冲的飞机拉起，恢复了对飞机的控制。

detailed_translations.english: to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

detailed_translations.chinese: 跳水（的动作）；潜水（的动作）；俯冲
detailed_translations.english: a jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

name: recover
trans: n. 还原至预备姿势

sentences.english: After a few days of fever, she began to recover.
sentences.chinese: 发烧几天之后，她开始恢复。

sentences.english: Two bodies were recovered from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 残骸中找到了两具尸体

detailed_translations.english: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

name: indication
trans: n. 指示，指出；迹象；象征

sentences.english: Could you give me some indication as to when I am likely to receive a reply?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我透露一下什么时候我能收到回复吗？

sentences.english: Indications are that the situation hasn’t improved much.
sentences.chinese: 迹象表明局势并没有多大好转。

sentences.english: There is every indication (= there are very clear signs ) that it is true.
sentences.chinese: 很明显这是真的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指示， 表示， 表明； 象征， 迹象
detailed_translations.english: a sign, remark, event etc that shows what is happening, what someone is thinking or feeling, or what is true

name: overt
trans: adj. 明显的；公然的；蓄意的

sentences.english: an overt attempt to silence their political opponents
sentences.chinese: 他们想压制政敌言论的明显企图

sentences.english: Overt race discrimination is illegal.
sentences.chinese: 公然的种族歧视是非法的。

detailed_translations.english: overt actions are done publicly, without trying to hide anything

name: moustache
trans: n. 小胡子；髭；触须

sentences.english: He’s shaved off his moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他剃去了小胡子。

detailed_translations.english: hair that grows on a man’s upper lip

name: sword
trans: n. 刀，剑；武力，战争

sentences.english: He girded his sword on.
sentences.chinese: 他佩带上他的剑。

detailed_translations.english: a weapon with a long pointed blade and a handle

name: exclusive
trans: n. 独家新闻；独家经营的项目；排外者

sentences.english: Bel Air is an exclusive suburb of Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 贝莱尔是洛杉矶郊外一处高级住宅区。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奢华的，高级的；独有的，独享的；排斥的，排他的；不包括…的，不把…计算在内的
detailed_translations.english: available or belonging only to particular people, and not shared
an important or exciting story that is printed in only one newspaper, because that newspaper was the first to find out about it

name: Norm
trans: Not Found

name: participate
trans: vi. 参与，参加；分享

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

name: precursor
trans: n. 先驱，前导

sentences.english: Error is often the precursor of what is correct.
sentences.chinese: 错误常常是正确的先导。

sentences.english: Viewed as a precursor to a wider open data movement, it could be as important as any we have seen in the web era.
sentences.chinese: 它被视为更宽泛的数据开放运动的先导，它将像我们在互联网时代看到的所有重要的事物一样重要。

detailed_translations.english: something that happened or existed before something else and influenced its development

name: arrogant
trans: adj. 自大的，傲慢的

sentences.english: He was unbearably arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 他的傲慢让人无法忍受。

sentences.english: an arrogant attitude
sentences.chinese: 傲慢的态度

detailed_translations.english: behaving in an unpleasant or rude way because you think you are more important than other people

name: cancel
trans: vi. 取消，撤销

sentences.english: Our flight was cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 我们的航班取消了。

sentences.english: I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.english: You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.
sentences.chinese: 你只能打电话给约翰取消了。

detailed_translations.english: to decide that something that was officially planned will not happen

name: introduction
trans: n. 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入

sentences.english: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.chinese: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.english: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.english: the introduction of Buddhism to China nearly 2,000 years ago
sentences.chinese: 约2,000年前佛教传入中国

sentences.english: In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.chinese: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

detailed_translations.english: the act of formally telling two people each other’s names when they first meet

name: subside
trans: vi. 平息；减弱；沉淀；坐下

sentences.english: Simon waited until the laughter subsided.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙一直等到笑声平息下来。

sentences.english: The pains in his head had subsided, but he still felt dizzy and sick.
sentences.chinese: 他的头痛已经减轻，但仍感到眩晕和恶心。

detailed_translations.english: if a feeling, pain, sound etc subsides, it gradually becomes less and then stops

name: emit
trans: vt. 发出，放射；发行；发表

sentences.english: The kettle emitted a shrill whistle.
sentences.chinese: 水壶发出了刺耳的鸣笛声。

detailed_translations.english: to send out gas, heat, light, sound etc

name: auditory
trans: n. 听众；礼堂

sentences.english: ...the limits of the human auditory range.
sentences.chinese: …人类听觉范围的局限。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the ability to hear

name: tiger
trans: n. 老虎；凶暴的人

sentences.english: He came at me like a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 他像老虎一般地向我冲过来。

sentences.english: Or tiger ?
sentences.chinese: 或者老虎？

detailed_translations.english: a large wild animal that has yellow and black lines on its body and is a member of the cat family

name: burn
trans: n. 灼伤，烧伤；烙印

sentences.english: I burnt all his old letters.
sentences.chinese: 我把他以前的信全烧了。

sentences.english: Cars were burned and shops were looted during the rioting.
sentences.chinese: 暴乱期间，汽车被焚，商店遭抢劫。

sentences.english: The Grand Hotel had burnt to the ground .
sentences.chinese: 格兰德大酒店被大火夷为平地。

sentences.english: Make sure the iron isn’t too hot or you’ll burn the cloth.
sentences.chinese: 注意熨斗温度不能过高，免得烫坏布料。

sentences.english: He dropped his cigarette and burnt a hole in the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 他的香烟掉下来，把地毯烫了一个洞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 燃烧；烧毁，灼伤；激起…的愤怒
detailed_translations.english: to destroy or damage something with fire
an injury caused by fire, heat, the light of the sun, or acid

name: cholesterol
trans: n. [生化] 胆固醇

sentences.english: So why would you want to lower your cholesterol?
sentences.chinese: 那么为什么你想降低你的胆固醇呢？

sentences.english: If it does, you should discuss with your physician other approaches to cholesterol control.
sentences.chinese: 若确实如此，您应该与您的医生讨论其他控制胆固醇方法。

sentences.english: "In order to prevent this oxidation of cholesterol, we need to consume antioxidants, preferably natural antioxidants that you get from fruits and vegetables, " he said in an interview.
sentences.chinese: “为了防止这种胆固醇氧化，我们需要消耗抗氧化剂，最好是从水果和蔬菜得到的天然抗氧化剂， ”他在接受采访时说道。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance found in your blood. Too much cholesterol in your body may cause heart disease.

name: headache
trans: n. 头痛；麻烦；令人头痛之事

sentences.english: If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The airline's biggest headache is the increase in the price of aviation fuel.
sentences.chinese: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in your head

name: petroleum
trans: n. 石油

sentences.english: petroleum-based products
sentences.chinese: 石油产品

detailed_translations.english: oil that is obtained from below the surface of the Earth and is used to make petrol,  paraffin  , and various chemical substances

name: monolingual
trans: adj. 单语的；仅用一种语言的；仅懂一种语言的

sentences.english: a monolingual dictionary
sentences.chinese: 单语词典

detailed_translations.chinese: 单语的；仅用一种语言的；仅懂一种语言的
detailed_translations.english: speaking or using only one language

name: bedside
trans: n. 床边，床旁

sentences.english: She put a cup of tea down on the bedside table.
sentences.chinese: 她把一杯茶放在了床边的桌子上。

detailed_translations.english: the area beside your bed – used especially when talking about someone who is ill in bed

name: interest-free
trans: adj. 无息的

name: carefree
trans: adj. 无忧无虑的；不负责的

sentences.english: He thought back to the carefree days of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 他回想起自己无忧无虑的童年时代。

sentences.english: a carefree attitude
sentences.chinese: 无所谓的态度

detailed_translations.english: having no worries or problems

name: frequently
trans: adv. 频繁地，经常地；时常，屡次

sentences.english: He was frequently drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他经常喝醉。

detailed_translations.english: very often or many times

name: constrain
trans: vt. 驱使；强迫；束缚

sentences.english: Poor soil has constrained the level of crop production.
sentences.chinese: 贫瘠的土地限制了农作物的产量。

sentences.english: Women’s employment opportunities are often severely constrained by family commitments.
sentences.chinese: 女性的就业机会常常受到家庭责任的严重限制。

detailed_translations.english: to limit something

name: rich
trans: adj. 富有的；肥沃的；昂贵的

sentences.english: Rich mineral deposits have been found in the sea bed.
sentences.chinese: 海底发现有丰富的矿床。

sentences.english: Red meat is a rich source of iron.
sentences.chinese: 红肉含有大量铁质。

sentences.english: This is a system in which the rich are taken care of and the poor are left to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 这是个富人受关照，而穷人遭罪的制度。

detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of something

detailed_translations.chinese: (Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什
detailed_translations.english: The rich are rich people

name: suppose
trans: conj. 假使…结果会怎样

sentences.english: There were many more deaths than was first supposed.
sentences.chinese: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.english: There's no reason to suppose (= it is unlikely that ) he’s lying.
sentences.chinese: 没有理由认为他在说谎。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is probably true, based on what you know

sentences.chinese: 如果你因为沮丧而打算暴食的话，首先要设法弄清你悲伤的来源。

name: illness
trans: n. 病；疾病

sentences.english: She had all the normal childhood illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.english: Her mother was recovering from a serious illness.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.english: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.chinese: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

sentences.english: ways to improve your health and reduce the risk of illness
sentences.chinese: 增进健康减少疾病的方法

detailed_translations.english: a disease of the body or mind, or the condition of being ill

name: domain
trans: n. 领域；域名；产业；地产

sentences.english: Looking after the house was viewed as a woman’s domain.
sentences.chinese: 料理家务被认为是女性的份内之事。

detailed_translations.english: an area of activity, interest, or knowledge, especially one that a particular person, organization etc deals with

name: assert
trans: vt. 维护，坚持；断言；主张；声称

sentences.english: She continued to assert that she was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 她仍然坚称自己无辜。

sentences.english: to assert your independence/rights
sentences.chinese: 维护独立 / 权利

detailed_translations.english: to state firmly that something is true

name: definition
trans: n. 定义；[物] 清晰度；解说

sentences.english: a dictionary definition
sentences.chinese: 词典里的释义

detailed_translations.english: a phrase or sentence that says exactly what a word, phrase, or idea means

name: impassive
trans: adj. 冷漠的；无感觉的

sentences.chinese: 她表情冷淡，毫无反应。

trans: adj. 熟的，成熟的；时机成熟的

sentences.chinese: 那些番茄还没熟。

sentences.english: The conditions were ripe for social change.
sentences.chinese: 社会变革的时机已经成熟。

trans: n. 飞行；班机；逃走

sentences.chinese: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.english: In 1968, the first supersonic airliner took flight (= began flying ) .
sentences.chinese: 1968年，首架超音速客机飞上天空。

detailed_translations.english: a journey in a plane or space vehicle, or the plane or vehicle that is making the journey

name: inert
trans: adj. [化学] 惰性的；呆滞的；迟缓的；无效的

sentences.chinese: 惰性气体

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 惰性的；呆滞的；迟缓的；无效的
detailed_translations.english: not producing a chemical reaction when combined with other substances

name: upward
trans: adj. 向上的；上升的

sentences.chinese: 针对银行利率的越来越大的压力

sentences.english: They climbed upward along the steep cliffs surrounding the village.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿着环绕村庄的陡峭悬崖向上爬。

sentences.english: 'There,' said Jack, pointing upwards.
sentences.chinese: “那儿，”杰克往上指着说。

detailed_translations.english: increasing to a higher level
If someone moves or looks upward, they move or look up towards a higher place

name: flag
trans: n. 标志；旗子

sentences.english: Children waving flags greeted the Russian leader.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们挥舞着旗帜，欢迎俄罗斯领导人。

sentences.english: the flag of Kenya
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚国旗

sentences.english: the Spanish flag
sentences.chinese: 西班牙国旗

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth with a coloured pattern or picture on it that represents a country or organization

name: kindle

sentences.english: We watched as the fire slowly kindled.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着火慢慢地燃烧起来。

detailed_translations.english: to start burning; to make a fire start burning

name: instill
trans: vt. 徐徐滴入；逐渐灌输

sentences.english: We must instill a sense of duty in our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在我们的孩子当中灌输一种责任感。

sentences.english: I aim to instill in them the pleasure of giving.
sentences.chinese: 我的目的在于灌输给他们给予的乐趣。

name: option
trans: n. [计] 选项；选择权；买卖的特权

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

name: dwelling house
trans: n. 住宅

name: frustrate
trans: vt. 挫败；阻挠；使感到灰心

sentences.english: Their attempts to speak to him were frustrated by the guards.
sentences.chinese: 他们想跟他说话，但被警卫拦住了。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent someone’s plans, efforts, or attempts from succeeding

name: civilization
trans: n. 文明；文化

sentences.english: modern American civilization
sentences.chinese: 现代美国文明

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Greece and Rome
sentences.chinese: 希腊和罗马的古代文明

detailed_translations.english: a society that is well organized and developed, used especially about a particular society in a particular place or at a particular time

name: unattractive
trans: adj. 不吸引人注意的；没有魅力的；不美丽的

sentences.english: an unattractive man
sentences.chinese: 没有魅力的男子

detailed_translations.chinese: 无魅力的, 无吸引力的
detailed_translations.english: not attractive, pretty, or pleasant to look at

name: true
trans: n. 真实；准确

sentences.english: No, honestly, it’s a true story .
sentences.chinese: 不，真的，这是一个真实的故事。

sentences.english: Students decide if statements are true or false .
sentences.chinese: 由学生来判断说法正确还是错误。

sentences.english: It’s generally true to say that fewer people are needed nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说现在需要的人员少了。

sentences.english: The results appear to hold true (= still be correct ) for other countries.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果在其他国家似乎同样正确。

detailed_translations.english: based on facts and not imagined or invented

name: purposeful
trans: adj. 有目的的；有决心的

sentences.english: a purposeful and consistent foreign policy
sentences.chinese: 明确而一贯的外交政策

sentences.english: a purposeful movement
sentences.chinese: 目标明确的运动

detailed_translations.english: having a clear aim or purpose

name: master
trans: vt. 控制；精通；征服

sentences.english: a work of art by a true master
sentences.chinese: 一件真正的大师之作

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: Master of Arts/Science/Education etc
sentences.chinese: 文学/理学/教育学等硕士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is very skilled at something

name: historical
trans: adj. 历史的；史学的；基于史实的

sentences.english: places of historical interest
sentences.chinese: 历史名胜

sentences.english: It is important to look at the novel in its historical context .
sentences.chinese: 在历史背景下看待这部小说很重要。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the past

name: chip
trans: n. [电子] 芯片；筹码；碎片；(食物的) 小片; 薄片

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers

name: height
trans: n. 高地；高度；身高；顶点

sentences.english: Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆现在身高和他姐姐差不多了。

sentences.english: State your age, height, and weight.
sentences.chinese: 说出你的年龄、身高和体重。

sentences.english: Rachel had always been scared of heights.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔过去一直恐高。

detailed_translations.english: how tall someone or something is

name: exasperation
trans: n. 恼怒；恶化；惹人恼怒的事

sentences.english: Carol sighed in exasperation.
sentences.chinese: 卡罗尔恼怒地叹了口气。

detailed_translations.english: when you feel annoyed because someone continues to do something that is upsetting you

name: disadvantage
trans: n. 缺点；不利条件；损失

sentences.english: Criminal behaviour can be linked to economic disadvantage.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为可能会与经济困难有关。

detailed_translations.english: something that causes problems, or that makes someone or something less likely to be successful or effective

name: sequentially
trans: adv. 从而；继续地；循序地

name: sophisticate
trans: n. 久经世故的人；精通者

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄复杂；使变得世故；曲解

detailed_translations.english: someone who is sophisticated

name: governmental
trans: adj. 政府的；政治的；统治上的

sentences.english: an attempt to restrict governmental power
sentences.chinese: 限制政府权力的尝试

detailed_translations.english: of a government, or relating to government

name: affair
trans: n. 事情；事务；私事；（尤指关系不长久的）风流韵事

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交部

sentences.english: Women had little role in public affairs.

sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

name: rock-climbing

trans: vi. 推断；作出推论

sentences.chinese: 根据这些统计资料可以推断出很多事情。

sentences.english: From the evidence, we can infer that the victim knew her killer.
sentences.chinese: 根据证据我们可以推断出受害者认识凶手。

sentences.english: a family reunion

sentences.english: a high-school reunion
sentences.chinese: 高中同学联谊聚会

sentences.english: Can you come and make yourself useful(= help people to do something )?

trans: n. 娱乐；消遣；款待

sentences.english: The town provides a wide choice of entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 该镇提供各式各样的娱乐活动。

sentences.english: The dolphins give good entertainment value (= a lot of amusement and interest ).

trans: n. 烦躁；焦急；磨损

sentences.chinese: 别担心——一切都会好的。

detailed_translations.english: to worry about something, especially when there is no need

trans: n. 分解，腐烂；变质

sentences.english: So no one decomposition is sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 因此一种分解是不够的。

sentences.english: This is an important difference, because it means that the additional transaction decomposition can be turned on only when required.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很重要的不同点，因为这意味着仅仅在需要时才进行附加的事务分解。

sentences.english: Unlike other decomposition solutions, due to this algorithm, there are no constraints that allow only sibling or child elements/attributes to be mapped to the same table.
sentences.chinese: 由于有了此算法，与其他的分解解决方案不同，没有只允许将兄弟或孩子元素/属性映射到同一个表的约束。

detailed_translations.english: Decomposition is the process of decay that takes place when a living thing changes chemically after dying

name: ember
trans: n. 灰烬，余烬

sentences.english: glowing embers
sentences.chinese: 发光的余烬

detailed_translations.english: a piece of wood or coal that stays red and very hot after a fire has stopped burning

name: insight
trans: n. 洞察力；洞悉

sentences.english: a writer of great insight
sentences.chinese: 有深刻洞察力的作家

sentences.english: The book gives us fascinating insights into life in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 这本书生动地表现了墨西哥的生活。

trans: adj. 重要的；物质的，实质性的；肉体的

sentences.english: materials like wood or stone
sentences.chinese: 木材或石头之类的材料

sentences.english: harmful radioactive material
sentences.chinese: 有害的放射性材料

sentences.english: a paper company which imports raw materials (= substances which have not been treated ) from North America
sentences.chinese: 从北美进口原材料的纸业公司

sentences.english: recycled material

sentences.chinese: 安妮塔正在收集小说素材。

sentences.english: a society that places high importance on material rewards

name: nanometre
trans: Not Found

sentences.chinese: 海生植物

sentences.chinese: 咖喱粉

sentences.english: talcum powder
sentences.chinese: 滑石[爽身]粉

sentences.chinese: 把糖碾成粉末。

sentences.english: The paint is supplied in powder form .
sentences.chinese: 这种涂料以粉末状供应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉；粉末；[化工][军] 火药；尘土

sentences.chinese: 那只小鹿跑上山脊。

a young  deer
having a pale yellow-brown colour

name: overlook
trans: vt. 忽略；俯瞰；远眺；检查；高耸于…之上

sentences.english: Our room overlooks the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房间可以俯视大海。

sentences.english: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.chinese: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.english: She found him entertaining enough to overlook his faults.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得他很有趣，足以让她包容他的缺点。

detailed_translations.english: if a house, room etc overlooks something, it has a view of it, usually from above

name: dynamic
trans: n. 动态；动力

sentences.english: a dynamic and unstable process
sentences.chinese: 不断变化的、不稳定的过程

detailed_translations.chinese: 有活力的；动力的；不断变化的
detailed_translations.english: continuously moving or changing
something that causes action or change

trans: n. 大陆，洲，陆地

sentences.english: the continents of Asia and Africa
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及非洲大陆

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of land surrounded by sea
able to control your sexual desires

name: interviewer
trans: n. 采访者；会见者；面谈者；进行面试者

sentences.chinese: 不过，好的采访者需要许多准备和技巧。

sentences.chinese: …一小堆肥堆。

sentences.chinese: 我是一位历史学家，在美国一所大学任教。

sentences.chinese: “关于[这一或]或任何其他事故是如何处理的，我没有什么可以告诉你的，”中央情报局历史学家大卫·罗巴尔说。

sentences.chinese: 历史学家在日期上画了一条水平线来记住这天。

sentences.chinese: 水漫过了河堤并淹没了蒙特古特75%的地区。

detailed_translations.english: the buildings and land that a shop, restaurant, company etc uses

trans: Not Found

name: memory
trans: n. 记忆，记忆力；内存，[计] 存储器；回忆

sentences.chinese: 他对在日本逗留的那段时光有许多美好的回忆。

sentences.english: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.

detailed_translations.english: something that you remember from the past about a person, place, or experience

trans: n. [数] 收敛；会聚，集合

sentences.chinese: 通过收敛到一种理想状态，您可以期望系统处于或接近那一理想状态。

sentences.chinese: 这颗彗星肉眼看得见。

sentences.english: Check the plant for any visible signs of disease.
sentences.chinese: 检查一下植物是否有患病的迹象。

sentences.english: Light silk is best for parachutes, as it compresses well and then expands rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 轻质丝绸最适合制作降落伞，因为这种面料便于压缩，而且展开迅速。

sentences.chinese: 伊索贝尔紧闭着双唇点了点头。

sentences.chinese: 矿工使用钻岩机和压缩空气来凿穿坚硬的岩石。

name: reintroduce
trans: vt. 再引入；再提出；再介绍

name: respiratory
trans: adj. 呼吸的

sentences.english: respiratory disease
sentences.chinese: 呼吸道疾病

detailed_translations.english: relating to breathing or your lungs

name: extinction
trans: n. 灭绝；消失；消灭；废止

sentences.english: species in danger of extinction
sentences.chinese: 有灭绝危险的物种

sentences.english: They were hunted almost to extinction.
sentences.chinese: 它们遭受猎杀，几近灭绝。

sentences.english: Conservationists are trying to save the whale from extinction.
sentences.chinese: 生态环境保护工作者正努力挽救鲸类以防止其灭绝。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular type of animal or plant stops existing

name: website

sentences.english: For more information on weight loss and healthy eating, visit our website.
sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

detailed_translations.chinese: 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）

name: eradicate
trans: vt. 根除，根绝；消灭

sentences.english: an attempt to eradicate inflation
sentences.chinese: 为消除通货膨胀所作的努力

sentences.english: This problem has now been completely eradicated.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题现已彻底杜绝。

detailed_translations.english: to completely get rid of something such as a disease or a social problem

name: synthetic
trans: n. 合成物

sentences.english: synthetic chemicals
sentences.chinese: 合成化学品

detailed_translations.english: produced by combining different artificial substances, rather than being naturally produced

name: concoction
trans: n. 混合；调合；调合物

sentences.english: He sipped the concoction cautiously.
sentences.chinese: 他小心翼翼地啜着调配出来的酒。

name: proficiency
trans: n. 精通，熟练

sentences.english: I brought her proficiency up to the required level.
sentences.chinese: 我把她的熟练程度提高到所规定的水平。

sentences.english: With study and practice, almost anyone can do it with some level of proficiency, but most people don't learn how to think critically or analytically—nor are they even aware of its value.
sentences.chinese: 通过学习和实践，几乎任何人都能以不同的熟练程度来掌握它，但是大多数人都不会去学习如何进行批判性或分析性思维，或者说，他们根本意识不到其价值。

sentences.english: How do you think of your proficiency in written and spoken English?
sentences.chinese: 你认为你的书面 英语和 口语熟练程度如何？

name: ignore

sentences.chinese: 电话铃响了，但她只当没听见。

sentences.english: Sam rudely ignored the question.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆粗鲁地对这个问题不予理睬。

name: location
trans: n. 位置（形容词locational）；地点；外景拍摄场地

sentences.chinese: 工程师们面临的主要难题是要确定该地区地下河的位置。

detailed_translations.english: the act of finding the position of something

name: symptomatic
trans: adj. 有症状的；症候的

sentences.english: These serve to show that children with mental disorders can not only be treated but can direct some of their symptomatic behavior into positive channels.
sentences.chinese: 做这些是为了告诉人们，精神疾病患儿不仅是可以治疗的，而且可以将一些症状行为引导到积极的方面上。

sentences.english: Across the board, parents rated honey as significantly better than DM or no treatment for symptomatic relief of their child’s nighttime cough and sleep difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 通过选举，家长将蜂蜜评为比右美沙芬或无治疗对于减缓孩子夜间咳嗽和睡眠困难症状更有效的东西。

sentences.english: The cooperation of residents is good, house-to-house surveillance for febrile illness is continuing, and specimens have been taken from symptomatic persons and sent for testing.
sentences.chinese: 居民的合作良好，正在继续开展对发热疾病的挨家挨户监测，并且已从有症状的人那里采集标本和送去检测。

detailed_translations.english: showing that someone has a particular illness

name: rewind
trans: n. 重绕；倒带器

sentences.english: You first must create the buffer, fill it, then rewind the position to the beginning so you can read from the start.
sentences.chinese: 必须首先创建一个缓冲区，先填充它，然后将位置倒回起始点，这样才能从头读。

detailed_translations.english: to make a  cassette  tape or  video  go backwards in order to see or hear it again

name: scan
trans: n. 扫描；浏览；审视；细看

sentences.english: He scanned the horizon, but there was no sign of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 他朝地平线处仔细眺望，但是找不到那艘船的踪影。

sentences.english: She scanned his face, looking for signs of what he was thinking.
sentences.chinese: 她端详着他的脸，想知道他在想些什么。

sentences.english: Video cameras scanned the car park.
sentences.chinese: 摄像机监视着停车场。

sentences.english: She scanned through the paper.
sentences.chinese: 她浏览了一下报纸。

sentences.english: 英文例句:You scan the text into the computer, then edit it.
sentences.chinese: 把文本扫描进电脑，然后进行编辑。

detailed_translations.english: to examine an area carefully but quickly, often because you are looking for a particular person or thing

name: grammar
trans: n. 语法；语法书

sentences.english: Check your spelling and grammar.
sentences.chinese: 检查你的拼写和语法。

sentences.english: the rules of English grammar
sentences.chinese: 英语的语法规则

sentences.english: A dictionary lists the words, a grammar states the rules.
sentences.chinese: 词典收列单词，语法书讲解语法规则。

detailed_translations.english: the rules by which words change their forms and are combined into sentences, or the study or use of these rules

name: loquacious
trans: adj. 饶舌的，多话的

name: grotesque
trans: n. 奇异风格；怪异的东西

sentences.chinese: 格拉斯的小说充斥着稀奇古怪的人物：丑陋的怪人、小丑、邋遢的人以及侏儒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奇形怪状的；奇怪的；可笑的

sentences.english: second-year undergraduates

detailed_translations.english: a student at college or university, who is working for their first degree

trans: n. 事件，事变；插曲

sentences.chinese: 他的不良行为只是个别事件。

sentences.english: Roads were sealed off because of a major incident.
sentences.chinese: 因为发生重大事故，道路被封锁了。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially sth unusual or unpleasant

trans: n. （美）电话；电话机；电话耳机

sentences.chinese: 我正要走，电话铃响了。

detailed_translations.english: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place

name: itinerary
trans: n. 旅程，路线； 旅行日程

sentences.chinese: 我们旅行计划的下一站是塞多纳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅程，路线； 旅行日程

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅程的； 巡回的，流动的

name: collect
trans: vt. 收集；募捐

sentences.english: After 25 years of collecting recipes, she has compiled them into a cookbook.
sentences.chinese: 她搜集了25年食谱，把它们编成一本烹饪书。

sentences.english: The company collects information about consumer trends.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司搜集有关消费者趋向的信息。

sentences.english: We’ve been out collecting signatures for our petition.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去为我们的请愿征集签名。

detailed_translations.english: to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together
to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together

name: switch
trans: n. 开关；转换；鞭子

sentences.english: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

detailed_translations.english: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another

trans: n. 竞争；比赛，竞赛

sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations

name: primacy
trans: n. 首位；卓越；大主教的职位

sentences.chinese: 我们必须以教育为本。

trans: n. 碎片；片断或不完整部分

sentences.chinese: 玻璃碎片

trans: adj. 怀疑的；怀疑论的，不可知论的

sentences.chinese: 那么，我们如何加强自身的怀疑技能呢？

sentences.chinese: 我们在这门课中提及的理论不全是怀疑性的。

sentences.english: L.M.:Well, I was skeptical myself in the beginning. But these are facts. The findings are very reproducible and we are waiting for confirmation by other labs.
sentences.chinese: 大爷：我老人家一开始也是很怀疑的。但是这个是事实。这个发现可以被反复验证，我们正在等待别的实验是的验证。

name: surge
trans: n. 汹涌；大浪，波涛；汹涌澎湃；巨涌

sentences.chinese: 一台计算机电涌保护设备

detailed_translations.english: a sudden quick movement of a liquid, electricity, chemical etc through something
if a feeling surges or surges up, you begin to feel it very strongly

name: newsreader
trans: n. （英）新闻广播员；报纸读者

name: employ
trans: n. 使用；雇用

sentences.chinese: 这家工厂雇用了2,000多名员工。

sentences.english: The report examines teaching methods employed in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 这个报告探讨了课堂教学方法。

sentences.english: Her days are employed in gardening and voluntary work.
sentences.chinese: 她的时间都花在搞园艺和做义工上。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone to work for you

name: construction
trans: n. 建设；建筑物；解释；造句

sentences.english: a road construction project
sentences.chinese: 道路修建计划

sentences.english: construction workers
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人

detailed_translations.english: the process of building things such as houses, bridges, roads etc

name: specimen
trans: n. 样品，样本；标本

sentences.english: a blood specimen
sentences.chinese: 血样

detailed_translations.english: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined

name: epidemiology
trans: n. 流行病学；传染病学

name: ebullient
trans: adj. 热情洋溢的；沸腾的

sentences.english: ...the ebullient Russian president.
sentences.chinese: …精力充沛的俄罗斯总统。

detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as ebullient, you mean that they are lively and full of enthusiasm or excitement about something

name: gender
trans: n. 性；性别；性交

sentences.english: people of the same gender
sentences.chinese: 同性别的人

sentences.english: Discrimination on grounds of race or gender is forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentences.english: There may be gender differences in attitudes to paid work.
sentences.chinese: 对待有偿劳动的态度可能存在着性别差异。

sentences.english: traditional gender roles
sentences.chinese: 传统的性别角色

sentences.english: toys that do not reinforce gender stereotypes
sentences.chinese: 不强化性别模式化观念的玩具

sentences.english: a science fiction story dealing with gender issues
sentences.chinese: 以性别问题为题材的科幻故事

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being male or female

name: heavily
trans: adv. 沉重地；猛烈地；沉闷地

sentences.english: I became heavily involved in politics.
sentences.chinese: 我深陷政治之中。

sentences.english: The report was heavily criticized in the press.
sentences.chinese: 该报道遭到了新闻界的严厉批评。

sentences.english: a heavily populated area
sentences.chinese: 人口密集地区

sentences.english: thousands of heavily armed troops
sentences.chinese: 全副武装的数千人的部队

sentences.english: His wife was heavily pregnant at the time.
sentences.chinese: 那时他妻子已经待产。

detailed_translations.english: in large amounts, to a high degree, or with great severity

trans: adj. 鬼鬼祟祟的，秘密的

sentences.chinese: 他的行为有点鬼鬼祟祟。

detailed_translations.english: behaving as if you want to keep something secret

sentences.chinese: 试图为每个场合适当地打扮。

sentences.chinese: 我们是否有可能根据对这些风险的理解来适当地调整我们的研究方向呢？

name: irresolute
trans: adj. 优柔寡断的；踌躇不定的；无决断的

sentences.english: The worst reason to launch an attack would be a fear of seeming irresolute.
sentences.chinese: 发起攻击最坏的理由就是因为害怕看起来犹豫不决。

name: drone

sentences.chinese: 一架飞机在头顶上轰鸣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雄蜂；嗡嗡的声音；懒惰者

trans: adj. 语言的；语言学的

sentences.chinese: 儿童的语言发展

detailed_translations.english: related to language, words, or linguistics

name: inbreed
trans: vt. 生育，生产

trans: n. 注意；尊重；问候；凝视

sentences.chinese: 他被看成是近代最成功的总统。

trans: n. 倔强的人；耐火物质

sentences.chinese: ...拒绝支持国王的桀骜不驯的牧师。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难治的；难熔的；不听话的

sentences.chinese: 一位专业运动员

detailed_translations.english: someone who competes in sports competitions, especially running, jumping, and throwing

sentences.chinese: 这些数字看上去确实很可观。

sentences.chinese: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

trans: vt. 取代，代替；替换，更换；归还，偿还；把…放回原处

sentences.chinese: 我将接替队里的休。

sentences.chinese: 课堂授课取代了旧式的导师制。

detailed_translations.english: to start doing something instead of another person, or start being used instead of another thing

name: naturally
trans: adv. 自然地

sentences.english: After a while, we naturally started talking about the children.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我们自然而然地谈起了孩子。

sentences.english: naturally occurring chemicals
sentences.chinese: 天然存在的化学物质

trans: adv. 难以置信地；非常地

sentences.english: Nicotine is incredibly addictive.
sentences.chinese: 尼古丁很容易让人上瘾。

detailed_translations.english: extremely

sentences.chinese: 远处小黑点般的一条小船出现在地平线上。

sentences.chinese: 一门能开阔眼界的课程

sentences.chinese: 想到要结婚，艾丽斯害怕极了。

sentences.chinese: 我没有工作，没受过什么教育，前途渺茫。

name: pose

sentences.chinese: 我们摆好姿势准备拍照。

sentences.chinese: 安摆好姿势露出笑脸准备拍照。

trans: vt. 使更新；续借；续费；复兴；重申

sentences.chinese: 窗框需要换新的。

sentences.chinese: 他擦去了额头的汗珠。

detailed_translations.english: liquid that appears on your skin when you are hot or nervous

sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

name: inflammatory
trans: adj. 炎症性的；煽动性的；激动的

sentences.chinese: 煽动性言论

detailed_translations.english: an inflammatory speech, piece of writing etc is likely to make people feel angry

name: peer

sentences.english: American children did less well in math than their peers in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 美国儿童的数学成绩不如日本的同龄儿童。

sentences.english: Staff members are trained by their peers.
sentences.chinese: 员工由同事培训。

detailed_translations.english: your peers are the people who are the same age as you, or who have the same type of job, social class etc

name: obscure
trans: adj. 昏暗的，朦胧的；晦涩的，不清楚的；隐蔽的；不著名的，无名的

sentences.chinese: 名不见经传的诗人

sentences.english: The details of his life remain obscure.
sentences.chinese: 他的生平不详。

sentences.english: Trees obscured his vision; he couldn't see much of the square's southern half.
sentences.chinese: 树木遮住了他的视线，他不怎么看得见广场南半部。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不著名的，不重要的；费解的，模糊不清的

If one thing obscures another, it prevents it from being seen or heard properly

name: fax
trans: n. 传真

sentences.english: Did you get my fax?
sentences.chinese: 你收到我的传真了吗？

sentences.english: She asked me to fax her the details.
sentences.chinese: 她要我把详细情况传真给她。

detailed_translations.english: a letter or message that is sent in electronic form down a telephone line and then printed using a special machine
to send someone a letter or message using a fax machine

name: acceptable
trans: adj. 可接受的；合意的；可忍受的

sentences.english: Students who achieve an acceptable standard will progress to degree studies.
sentences.chinese: 达到一定程度的学生可以进一步攻读学位。

sentences.english: How do we reach an acceptable level of data security?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何使数据安全达到令人满意的程度？

detailed_translations.english: good enough to be used for a particular purpose or to be considered satisfactory

name: reticent
trans: adj. 沉默的；有保留的；谨慎的

sentences.english: She is so reticent about her achievements.
sentences.chinese: 她对于自己的成就如此缄默。

detailed_translations.chinese: 沉默的；有保留的；谨慎的
detailed_translations.english: Someone who is reticent does not tell people about things

name: passport
trans: n. 护照，通行证；手段

sentences.english: I have an Irish passport.
sentences.chinese: 我持爱尔兰护照。

sentences.english: They need to check that your passport is in order.
sentences.chinese: 他们要检查一下你的护照是否有效。

detailed_translations.english: a small official document that you get from your government, that proves who you are, and which you need in order to leave your country and enter other countries

name: debris
trans: n. 碎片，残骸

sentences.english: She was hit by flying debris from the blast.
sentences.chinese: 她被爆炸产生的飞散碎片击中。

detailed_translations.english: the pieces of something that are left after it has been destroyed in an accident, explosion etc

name: pension
trans: n. 退休金，抚恤金；津贴；膳宿费

sentences.english: At what age can you start drawing your pension ?
sentences.chinese: 从多少岁可以开始领取养老金？

sentences.english: If you are self-employed, you should think about taking out a private pension .
sentences.chinese: 如果你是自由职业者，应该考虑办理私人养老金事宜。

sentences.english: Many people find it hard to live on a basic state pension .
sentences.chinese: 许多人发现仅凭国家基本养老金不能养活自己。

sentences.english: She pays a quarter of her salary into a pension plan.
sentences.chinese: 她将每月工资的四分之一用于养老金计划。

to grant a pension to

name: significance
trans: n. 意义；重要性；意思

sentences.english: a decision of major political significance
sentences.chinese: 具有重大政治意义的决定

detailed_translations.english: the importance of sth, especially when this has an effect on what happens in the future

name: alphabet
trans: n. 字母表，字母系统；入门，初步

sentences.english: The modern Russian alphabet has 31 letters.
sentences.chinese: 现代俄语字母表有31个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a set of letters, arranged in a particular order, and used in writing

name: unlock
trans: vt. 开启；开…的锁；表露

sentences.english: to unlock the door
sentences.chinese: 打开门锁

detailed_translations.english: to unfasten the lock on a door, box etc

name: radiator
trans: n. 散热器；暖气片；辐射体

sentences.english: We bled the car radiator off.
sentences.chinese: 我们排放汽车散热器中的气。

sentences.english: When her cellphone rang in class one day, the teacher smashed it against the radiator.
sentences.chinese: 有一次在课堂上她的手机响了，老师立马将它摔到了暖气片上。

sentences.english: It still has dingy corridors, ancient washrooms, rusting bunk beds (six to a room), a single fluorescent bulb hanging from the ceiling and an ancient radiator in front of the window.
sentences.chinese: 仍旧是昏暗的走廊，老式的厕所，生锈的床铺（六人一间），一只荧光灯泡吊在天花板上，还有一只旧暖气片放在窗前。

name: headline
trans: n. 大标题；内容提要；栏外标题；头版头条新闻

sentences.english: a paper carrying the front-page headline: ‘Space Aliens meet with President’
sentences.chinese: 头版报道题为“天外来客会见总统”的报纸

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…加标题；使成为注意中心；大力宣传
