name: ailment
trans: n. 小病；不安

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["minor ailments"]}
sentences.chinese: 小恙

detailed_translations.english: an illness that is not very serious

name: genetic
trans: adj. 遗传的；基因的；起源的

sentences.english: genetic defects
sentences.chinese: 遗传性缺陷

sentences.english: each person’s genetic make-up
sentences.chinese: 每个人的遗传特征

sentences.english: genetic research
sentences.chinese: 基因研究

detailed_translations.english: relating to genes or genetics

name: anxiety
trans: n. 焦虑；渴望；挂念；令人焦虑的事

sentences.english: his feelings of anxiety
sentences.chinese: 他焦虑的心情

sentences.english: A high level of anxiety was created by the introduction of cameras into the factory.
sentences.chinese: 工厂安装了摄像头，这引起了工人的高度不安。

sentences.english: It can help if you discuss your anxieties with someone.
sentences.chinese: 与别人谈谈自己的忧虑会有帮助的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being very worried about something

name: ripen
trans: vt. 使成熟

sentences.english: The apples were ripening on the trees.
sentences.chinese: 树上的苹果都熟了。

detailed_translations.english: to become ripe or to make something ripe

name: enquiry
trans: n. [计] 询问，[贸易] 询盘

sentences.english: We are pleased to receive your enquiry.
sentences.chinese: 我们很高兴收到您的询问函。

sentences.english: She has taken my enquiry as a personal affront.
sentences.chinese: 她将我的询问当成了人身侮辱。

sentences.english: When fresh supplies come into the market, we can revert to your enquiry.
sentences.chinese: 等新货上市时，我们才能回头考虑你们的询盘。

name: pie chart
trans: n. 饼形图；饼分图

name: penury
trans: n. 贫困；贫穷

sentences.english: He died in penury in 1644.
sentences.chinese: 1644年他穷困潦倒而死。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being very poor

name: whatever
trans: conj. 无论什么

sentences.english: She has shown no interest whatever in anything scientific.
sentences.chinese: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.english: This is just a stupid argument that has nothing whatever to do with your job.
sentences.chinese: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: [用于否定句中以加强语气]任何； 无论什么
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a negative statement

name: schedule
trans: n. 时间表；计划表；一览表

sentences.english: How can he fit everything into his busy schedule ?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.english: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

detailed_translations.english: a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it

name: activism
trans: n. 行动主义；激进主义

sentences.english: The constant buzz of shared activity and knowledge gives rise to constant innovation and activism.
sentences.chinese: 共同活动和知识的不断传播带来了不断的创新和激进主义。

sentences.english: The baby boomers, who entered adulthood promising a lifetime of activism, have been a politically undistinguished generation.
sentences.chinese: 出生于生育高峰的人，在成年后承诺行动主义，只是一代政治上平庸的一代。

sentences.english: Japanese bosses gripe about activism, yet privately concede that the pressure is spurring many firms to increase returns to shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 日本的老板抱怨激进主义，然而，私下却承认这种压力刺激了很多公司给股东增加了投资回报。

detailed_translations.chinese: 行动主义； 激进主义
detailed_translations.english: Activism is the process of campaigning in public or working for an organization in order to bring about political or social change

name: workshop
trans: n. 车间；研讨会；工场；讲习班

sentences.english: a modestly equipped workshop.
sentences.chinese: 一个装备普通的车间。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things

name: homeless
trans: adj. 无家可归的

sentences.english: Thousands of people have been made homeless .
sentences.chinese: 成千上万人被逼得无家可归。

detailed_translations.english: without a home

name: standard
trans: n. 标准；水准；旗；度量衡标准

sentences.english: Students have to reach a certain standard or they won’t pass.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须达到某一标准，否则无法通过。

sentences.english: The airline has rigorous safety standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家航空公司有严格的安全标准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 标准；水准；旗；度量衡标准
detailed_translations.english: the level that is considered to be acceptable, or the level that someone or something has achieved

detailed_translations.chinese: 标准的；合规格的；公认为优秀的
detailed_translations.english: accepted as normal or usual

name: core
trans: n. 核心；要点；果心；[计] 磁心

sentences.english: Remove the cores, and bake the apples for 40 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 去除果心，然后把苹果烤40分钟。

sentences.english: Debt is at the core of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 债务是问题的关键。

detailed_translations.english: the hard central part of a fruit such as an apple

name: disingenuous
trans: adj. 虚伪的；不诚实的；不老实的；狡猾的

sentences.english: Keeping the details of the tax changes vague is disingenuous.
sentences.chinese: 对税收变革的细节含糊其词并不光明正大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虚伪的；不诚实的；不老实的；狡猾的
detailed_translations.english: not sincere and slightly dishonest

name: censure
trans: n. 责难

sentences.english: The ethics committee may take a decision to admonish him or to censure him.
sentences.chinese: 道德规范委员会可能决定对他进行警告或批评。

detailed_translations.english: If you censure someone for something that they have done, you tell them that you strongly disapprove of it
the act of expressing strong disapproval and criticism

name: vacant
trans: adj. 空虚的；空的；空缺的；空闲的；茫然的

sentences.english: Only a few apartments were still vacant.
sentences.chinese: 只有几套公寓仍然空着。

sentences.english: There was only a vacant lot (= empty unused area of land in a city ) where her house used to be.
sentences.chinese: 她以前房子所在的地方只剩下一块空地了。

detailed_translations.english: a vacant seat, building, room or piece of land is empty and available for someone to use

name: pus
trans: n. 脓；脓汁

name: sediment
trans: n. 沉积；沉淀物

sentences.english: a thick layer of sediment
sentences.chinese: 一层厚厚的沉积物

detailed_translations.english: solid substances that settle at the bottom of a liquid

name: plummet
trans: n. [测] 铅锤，坠子

sentences.english: House prices have plummeted down.
sentences.chinese: 房价已经暴跌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 垂直落下；（价格、水平等）骤然下跌
detailed_translations.english: to suddenly and quickly decrease in value or amount

name: postcode
trans: n. （英）邮政编码；邮区号

sentences.english: Type your street address and postcode.
sentences.chinese: 键入你的街道地址和邮政编码。

detailed_translations.english: a group of numbers and letters that you write at the end of an address on an envelope, package etc. The postcode shows the exact area where someone lives and helps the post office deliver the post more quickly.

name: superior
trans: n. 上级，长官；优胜者，高手；长者

sentences.english: She had that superior tone of voice.
sentences.chinese: 她带着那种傲慢的语气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上级的，较高的；优越的；有优越感的，高傲的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are better than other people – used to show disapproval
someone who has a higher rank or position than you, especially in a job

name: edition
trans: n. 版本

sentences.english: a paperback edition
sentences.chinese: 平装本

sentences.english: the US edition of Marie Claire magazine
sentences.chinese: 《嘉人》杂志的美国版

sentences.english: Martin was reading the early edition of the Evening News.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在看《新闻晚报》的早间版

sentences.english: The textbook was first published in 1858 and is now in its 39th edition.
sentences.chinese: 该课本初版于1858年，现在已经是第39版了。

detailed_translations.english: the form that a book, newspaper, magazine etc is produced in

name: reactive
trans: adj. 反应的；电抗的；反动的

sentences.english: a reactive foreign policy
sentences.chinese: 回应式的外交政策

detailed_translations.english: reacting to events or situations rather than starting or doing new things yourself

name: surgical
trans: n. 外科手术；外科病房

sentences.english: surgical techniques
sentences.chinese: 外科技术

detailed_translations.english: relating to or used for medical operations

name: consideration
trans: n. 考虑；原因；关心；报酬

sentences.english: proposals put forward for consideration
sentences.chinese: 提请考虑的建议

sentences.english: They’ve got no consideration for others.
sentences.chinese: 他们一点都不为别人着想。

detailed_translations.english: careful thought and attention, especially before making an official or important decision

name: concept
trans: n. 观念，概念

sentences.english: a new concept in business travel
sentences.chinese: 商务旅行的新理念

sentences.english: our basic concepts of decent human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 我们对得体的人类行为的基本观念

sentences.english: It’s very simple, once you grasp the concept .
sentences.chinese: 你一旦掌握了这个概念之后就很简单了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概念， 观念； 设想
detailed_translations.english: an idea of how something is, or how something should be done

name: bilingual
trans: n. 通两种语言的人

sentences.english: a bilingual dictionary
sentences.chinese: 双语词典

sentences.english: The report proposed bilingual education in schools.
sentences.chinese: 报告建议在学校中实行双语教学。

detailed_translations.english: written or spoken in two languages

name: immune
trans: n. 免疫者；免除者

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

name: harmonious
trans: adj. 和谐的，和睦的；协调的；悦耳的

sentences.english: The decor is a harmonious blend of traditional and modern.
sentences.chinese: 这种装饰风格是传统与现代的和谐统一。

detailed_translations.english: arranged together in a pleasing way so that each part goes well with the others

name: recreation
trans: n. 娱乐；消遣；休养

sentences.english: His only recreations are drinking beer and watching football.
sentences.chinese: 他唯一的消遣就是喝啤酒和看足球比赛。

sentences.english: the provision of recreation facilities
sentences.chinese: 提供娱乐设施

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you do for pleasure or amusement

name: radically
trans: adv. 根本上；彻底地；以激进的方式

name: shortcoming
trans: n. 缺点；短处

sentences.english: Peter was painfully aware of his own shortcomings.
sentences.chinese: 彼得痛苦地认识到了自己的短处。

detailed_translations.english: a fault or weakness that makes someone or something less successful or effective than they should be

name: multiple
trans: adj. 多重的；多样的；许多的

sentences.english: Baxter was rushed to the hospital with multiple stab wounds.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯特因多处刺伤被紧急送往医院。

sentences.english: Having multiple partners increases your risk of sexual diseases.
sentences.chinese: 性伴侣多会增加得性病的风险。

sentences.english: His new album includes multiple versions of the same songs.
sentences.chinese: 他的新专辑包括同一些歌曲的多种版本。

detailed_translations.english: many, or involving many things, people, events etc
a number that contains a smaller number an exact number of times

name: stadium
trans: n. 体育场；露天大型运动场

sentences.english: the new Olympic Stadium
sentences.chinese: 新的奥林匹克体育场

detailed_translations.chinese: 体育场；露天大型运动场
detailed_translations.english: a building for public events, especially sports and large rock music concerts, consisting of a playing field surrounded by rows of seats

name: unwind
trans: vt. 放松；解开；[计] 展开

sentences.english: a beautiful country hotel that is the perfect place to unwind
sentences.chinese: 优美的乡村酒店，放松身心的绝佳场所

detailed_translations.english: to relax and stop feeling anxious

name: manager
trans: n. 经理；管理人员

sentences.english: one of our regional managers
sentences.chinese: 我们的一位地区经理

sentences.english: a middle manager in a computer company
sentences.chinese: 一家计算机公司的中层管理人员

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to manage part or all of a company or other organization

name: gear
trans: n. 齿轮；装置，工具；传动装置

sentences.english: His mountain bike had 18 gears.
sentences.chinese: 他的山地自行车有18挡。

sentences.english: Andy drove cautiously along in third gear.
sentences.chinese: 安迪挂着三挡小心地行驶。

sentences.english: Does this thing have a reverse gear?
sentences.chinese: 这玩意儿有倒挡吗？

sentences.english: Any cyclist can climb a difficult hill; you just change gear.
sentences.chinese: 谁都能骑上难爬的山坡，只要换挡就行了。

sentences.english: Don’t turn off the engine while you’re still in gear.
sentences.chinese: 还挂着挡的时候不要关发动机。

sentences.english: It’s a good habit to take the car out of gear while you’re at a stoplight.
sentences.chinese: 等红灯时换空挡的习惯很好。

sentences.english: Colleges are not always geared to the needs of mature students.
sentences.chinese: 大学并不总是去适应成年学生的需要。

sentences.english: My training was geared toward winning gold.
sentences.chinese: 我的训练是为赢得金牌去规划的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 齿轮，传动装置，排挡；用具，设备；衣服
detailed_translations.english: the machinery in a vehicle such as a car, truck, or bicycle that you use to go comfortably at different speeds
If someone or something is geared to or toward a particular purpose, they are organized or designed in order to achieve that purpose

name: identifiable
trans: adj. 可辨认的；可认明的；可证明是同一的

sentences.english: In the corridor were four dirty, ragged bundles, just identifiable as human beings.
sentences.chinese: 走廊里有4堆脏兮兮、衣衫褴褛的东西，依稀可辨出人形。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可辨认的；可认明的；可证明是同一的
detailed_translations.english: able to be recognized

name: colloquial
trans: adj. 白话的；通俗的；口语体的

sentences.english: ...a colloquial expression.
sentences.chinese: …一个口语表达法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 白话的；通俗的；口语体的
detailed_translations.english: language or words that are colloquial are used mainly in informal conversations rather than in writing or formal speech

name: supermassive
trans: Not Found

name: spin
trans: n. 旋转；疾驰

sentences.english: The plane’s propellers were spinning.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的螺旋桨在快速旋转。

sentences.english: She sat by the window spinning.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在窗前纺线。

sentences.english: the Earth’s spin
sentences.chinese: 机的螺旋桨在快速旋转。

detailed_translations.english: to turn around and around very quickly, or to make something do this
an act of turning around quickly

name: defer
trans: vt. 使推迟；使延期

sentences.english: The committee deferred their decision .
sentences.chinese: 委员会延期作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to delay something until a later date

name: texture
trans: n. 质地；纹理；结构；本质，实质

sentences.english: This cloth has a silky texture.
sentences.chinese: 这种布具有丝的质地。

sentences.english: What is the texture of your experience?
sentences.chinese: 这次经历的实质是什么？

name: salvage
trans: n. 打捞；海上救助；抢救财货；救难的奖金

sentences.english: a massive salvage operation
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抢救行动

detailed_translations.chinese: 打捞；海上救助；抢救财货；救难的奖金
detailed_translations.english: when you save things from a situation in which other things have already been damaged, destroyed, or lost
to save something from an accident or bad situation in which other things have already been damaged, destroyed, or lost

name: populate
trans: vt. 居住于；构成人口；移民于；殖民于

sentences.english: The highlands are populated mainly by peasant farmers.
sentences.chinese: 高原人口主要是农民。

detailed_translations.english: if an area is populated by a particular group of people, they live there

name: plasticity
trans: n. 塑性，可塑性；适应性；柔软性

sentences.english: This kind of plasticity may play a vital role in evolution as well as during the lifetime of individuals.
sentences.chinese: 这种可塑性不仅贯穿生命个体的一生，也许对进化也产生了至关重要的作用。

sentences.english: Whether we choose to do this or not is a matter of broader social and ethical debate over our growing ability to fiddle with the plasticity of the brain.
sentences.chinese: 我们选择这样做还是不这样做，是个更广泛的社会的和伦理的论辩，这一论辩涉及到我们日益增长的、改变大脑可塑性的能力。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being easily made into any shape, and of staying in that shape until someone changes it

name: define
trans: vt. 定义；使明确；规定

sentences.english: the ability to define clients’ needs
sentences.chinese: 确定客户需求的能力

sentences.english: The duties of the post are difficult to define.
sentences.chinese: 这一职位的职责很难界定。

sentences.english: Define precisely what you mean by ‘crime’.
sentences.chinese: 把你说的 “犯罪” 明确定义一下。

detailed_translations.english: to describe something correctly and thoroughly, and to say what standards, limits, qualities etc it has that make it different from other things

name: librarian
trans: n. 图书馆员；图书管理员

sentences.english: The new librarian is a friend of mine.
sentences.chinese: 这位新来的图书管理员是我的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in a library

name: misgive
trans: Not Found

name: illustrious
trans: adj. 著名的，杰出的；辉煌的

sentences.english: She has had an illustrious career.
sentences.chinese: 她已经有了辉煌的事业。

sentences.english: Wagner was just one of many illustrious visitors to the town.
sentences.chinese: 瓦格纳只是到访过这座小镇的众多名人中的一位。

detailed_translations.english: famous and admired because of what you have achieved

name: sustainable
trans: adj. 可以忍受的；足可支撑的；养得起的；可持续的

sentences.english: The government should do more to promote sustainable agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 政府应该做更多工作来推动可持续农业的发展。

sentences.english: the sustainable use of rainforest resources
sentences.chinese: 雨林资源的可持续利用

sentences.english: Cycling is a totally sustainable form of transport.
sentences.chinese: 骑自行车是一种绝对环保的交通方式。

sentences.english: environmentally sustainable development
sentences.chinese: 生态环境的可持续发展

detailed_translations.english: able to continue without causing damage to the environment

name: engender
trans: vt. 使产生；造成

sentences.english: In such circumstances, governments must do all they can to create and engender trust among its nation’s constituents and institutions.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，政府必须尽其所能在它的国家选民和公共机构之间创造和产生信任。

sentences.english: Retrospectives on the process and working practices regularly capture the lessons learned by the project and engender a culture of continuous process improvement within the project.
sentences.chinese: 对过程和工作实践的回顾有规律地捕捉从项目中得到的经验，并在项目中造成一个持续的过程改进的文化。

name: undeniable
trans: adj. 不可否认的；公认优秀的；无可争辩的

sentences.english: undeniable proof
sentences.chinese: 确证

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可否认的, 无可辩驳的
detailed_translations.english: definitely true or certain

name: presumptuous
trans: adj. 专横的；放肆的；冒昧的

sentences.english: "Without being presumptuous, "he reports, "it has been my main objective for those twenty years to keep the highest possible level of service on what is, after all, a train.
sentences.chinese: “没有放肆，”他说，“这是我的主要目标是为那些二十年保持最高水准的服务是什么，毕竟，一列火车。”

detailed_translations.english: doing something that you have no right to do and that seems rude

name: colonist
trans: n. 殖民者；殖民地居民；移民

sentences.english: The colonists struggled through their first winter.
sentences.chinese: 这些殖民地居民艰难地度过了第一个冬天。

detailed_translations.english: someone who settles in a new colony

name: semi-skimmed
trans: adj. 撇去奶皮的

name: linear
trans: adj. 线的，线型的；直线的，线状的；长度的

sentences.english: a linear diagram
sentences.chinese: 线形图

sentences.english: linear measurements
sentences.chinese: 长度量度

detailed_translations.english: consisting of lines, or in the form of a straight line

name: citation
trans: n. 引用，引证；[法] 传票；褒扬

sentences.english: The essay begins with a citation from ‘Hamlet’.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章开头引用了《哈姆雷特》中的一句话。

detailed_translations.english: a line taken from a book, speech etc

name: overdue
trans: adj. 过期的；迟到的；未兑的

sentences.english: an overdue gas bill
sentences.chinese: 逾期未付的煤气账单

sentences.english: The library books are overdue.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书过期未还。

sentences.english: The baby was a week overdue (= it was expected to be born a week ago ).
sentences.chinese: 宝宝超过预产期有一周了。

trans: n. 地位；状态；情形；重要身份

sentences.chinese: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.english: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?

detailed_translations.english: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc

name: extol
trans: vt. 颂扬；赞美；赞颂

sentences.chinese: 现在专家们在颂扬粗陋的马铃薯的种种好处。

detailed_translations.english: to praise something very much

name: tick
trans: n. 滴答声；扁虱；记号；赊欠

sentences.chinese: 那只古老的钟大声地嘀嗒着。

detailed_translations.english: if a clock or watch ticks, it makes a short repeated sound
A tick is a written mark like a V. It is used to show that something is correct or has been selected or dealt with.
to mark a test, list of questions etc with a tick, in order to show that something is correct, to choose something etc

name: inhabit
trans: vt. 栖息；居住于；占据

sentences.english: The woods are inhabited by many wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 很多野生动物栖居在这片森林里。

sentences.english: inhabited islands
sentences.chinese: 有人居住的岛屿

detailed_translations.english: if animals or people inhabit an area or place, they live there

name: tourist
trans: n. 旅行者，观光客

sentences.english: Cambridge is always full of tourists in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 剑桥在夏季总是挤满了游客。

sentences.english: The Statue of Liberty is a major tourist attraction .
sentences.chinese: 自由女神像是主要的旅游景点。

sentences.english: What effect will this have on the local tourist industry ?
sentences.chinese: 这对当地的旅游业会有什么影响？

detailed_translations.english: someone who is visiting a place for pleasure on holiday

name: inconceivable
trans: adj. 不可思议的；难以置信的；不能想象的；非凡的

sentences.english: A few years ago a car fuelled by solar energy would have been inconceivable.
sentences.chinese: 几年前太阳能汽车还是不可思议的事。

sentences.english: It is inconceivable that a man in such a powerful position could act so unwisely.
sentences.chinese: 真是难以置信，这么大权在握的人行事竟如此愚蠢。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可思议的；难以置信的；不能想象的；非凡的
detailed_translations.english: too strange or unusual to be thought real or possible

name: bankruptcy
trans: n. 破产

sentences.english: In 1999 it was revealed that he was close to bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 1999年他被披露几近破产。

sentences.english: When inflation rises, so do bankruptcies.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀加剧，破产个案也会增加。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being unable to pay your debts

name: internal
trans: n. 内脏；本质

sentences.english: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.english: the threat to internal security
sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: internal markets
sentences.chinese: 国内市场

sentences.english: There’s to be an internal inquiry into the whole affair.
sentences.chinese: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

detailed_translations.english: within a particular country

name: burnish
trans: n. 光泽；抛光；闪闪发光

sentences.english: The agency hired a New York public-relations firm to burnish Washington's image.
sentences.chinese: 该机构雇用了一家纽约公关公司来提升华盛顿的形象。

detailed_translations.chinese: 擦亮；使…光亮；将…打磨光亮
detailed_translations.english: to polish metal or another substance until it shines

name: rend
trans: vt. 撕碎；分裂；强夺

sentences.english: ...pain that rends the heart.
sentences.chinese: ...撕心裂肺的疼痛。

detailed_translations.english: to tear or break something violently into pieces

name: gregarious
trans: adj. 社交的；群居的

sentences.chinese: 她就是这样一个爱社交而且外向的人。

detailed_translations.english: friendly and preferring to be with other people

name: certainty
trans: n. 必然；确实；确实的事情

sentences.chinese: 被抓的必然

detailed_translations.english: the fact that something is certain to happen

name: occurrence
trans: n. 发生；出现；事件；发现

sentences.english: The greatest occurrence of coronary heart disease is in those over 65.
sentences.chinese: 冠心病的最高发病率在65岁以上的人群中。

sentences.english: Complaints seemed to be an everyday occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 投诉似乎成了天天发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of something happening

name: random
trans: n. 随意

sentences.chinese: 这帮犯罪分子随意选择对象下手。

sentences.chinese: 公司已实行对雇员的随机毒品测试。

detailed_translations.english: without any definite plan, aim, or pattern
happening or chosen without any definite plan, aim, or pattern

name: prey
trans: n. 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物

sentences.chinese: 潜行跟踪猎物的老虎

sentences.english: Cats prey on birds and mice.
sentences.chinese: 猫捕食鸟和老鼠。

detailed_translations.english: an animal, bird etc that is hunted and eaten by another animal
(of an animal or a bird) to hunt and kill another animal for food

name: annex
trans: n. 附加物；附属建筑物

sentences.english: Any annex is the integral part of this contract.
sentences.chinese: 本合同一切附件均为本合同的有效组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: to take control of a country or area next to your own, especially by using force

name: sunscreen
trans: n. （防晒油中的）遮光剂；防晒霜

name: tradition
trans: n. 惯例，传统；传说

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

name: regimen
trans: n. [医] 养生法；生活规则；政体；支配

sentences.english: Patients maintain a strict dietary regimen.
sentences.chinese: 病人严格遵守饮食规律。

detailed_translations.chinese: [医] 养生法；生活规则；政体；支配
detailed_translations.english: a special plan of food, exercise etc that is intended to improve your health

name: viscous
trans: adj. 粘性的；黏的

sentences.chinese: 这液体冷却后会变黏稠。

detailed_translations.english: (of a liquid 液体) thick and sticky; not flowing freely

name: weekend
trans: n. 周末，周末休假；周末聚会

sentences.chinese: 这个周末你有什么好的安排？

sentences.english: Tony has been unwell over the weekend (= during the weekend ).
sentences.chinese: 托尼这个周末身体不舒服。

sentences.english: We’re going to Paris for a long weekend (= Saturday and Sunday, and also Friday or Monday, or both ).
sentences.chinese: 我们要到巴黎去度一个长周末。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周末，周末休假；周末聚会
detailed_translations.english: Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
to spend the weekend somewhere

name: dietary
trans: n. 规定的食物；饮食的规定；食谱

sentences.english: special dietary requirements
sentences.chinese: 特殊的饮食要求

detailed_translations.chinese: 规定的食物；饮食的规定；食谱
饮食的，饭食的，规定食物的
detailed_translations.english: related to the food someone eats

name: studio
trans: n. 工作室；[广播][电视] 演播室；画室；电影制片厂

sentences.english: a recording studio in Nashville
sentences.chinese: 在纳什维尔的一间录音室

sentences.english: a photographer’s studio
sentences.chinese: 摄影师的工作室

detailed_translations.english: a room where television and radio programmes are made and broadcast or where music is recorded

name: everyone
trans: n. 每个人

sentences.english: If everyone is ready, I’ll begin.
sentences.chinese: 如果大家都准备好了，我就开始。

sentences.english: Send my best wishes to everyone in the family.
sentences.chinese: 请向全家人致以最美好的祝愿。

sentences.english: Of course everyone else thought it was hilarious!
sentences.chinese: 当然其他所有人都觉得好笑极了！

sentences.english: Not everyone enjoys sport.
sentences.chinese: 并不是谁都喜欢体育运动的。

detailed_translations.english: every person

name: offspring
trans: n. 后代，子孙；产物

sentences.chinese: 一个想管住自己孩子的年轻妈妈

detailed_translations.english: someone’s child or children – often used humorously

name: inchoate
trans: adj. 早期的；刚开始的；未充分发展的

sentences.chinese: 他的梦想毫无意义，很不成熟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 早期的；刚开始的；未充分发展的
detailed_translations.english: inchoate ideas, plans, attitudes etc are only just starting to develop

name: subject
trans: n. 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民

sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语

to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: bottom
trans: n. 底部；末端；臀部；尽头

sentences.chinese: 你帮我扶住梯子底部好吗？

detailed_translations.english: the lowest part of something

trans: n. 介入；调停；妨碍

sentences.english: government intervention to regulate prices
sentences.chinese: 政府介入控制物价

detailed_translations.english: the act of becoming involved in an argument, fight, or other difficult situation in order to change what happens

name: pedestrian
trans: n. 行人；步行者

sentences.chinese: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is walking, especially along a street or other place used by cars

trans: n. 响应；反应；回答

sentences.chinese: 他的第一反应是不相信。

sentences.chinese: 卡尔没有回答，继续吃饭。

name: abide
trans: vi. 持续；忍受；停留

sentences.english: I can't abide people with no sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌和没有幽默感的人打交道。

sentences.english: You'll have to abide by the rules of the club.
sentences.chinese: 你必须遵守俱乐部的规定。

detailed_translations.english: bear, stand

name: biology
trans: n. （一个地区全部的）生物；生物学

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

name: matchstick
trans: n. 火柴棍，火柴杆；火柴杆似的东西

name: dimension
trans: n. 方面;[数] 维；尺寸；次元；容积 vt. 标出尺寸

sentences.chinese: 即使你不信宗教，也可以在生命中拥有精神层面的内容。

name: explore
trans: vi. 探索；探测；探险

sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.english: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探险， 探索； 仔细查阅， 探究

name: intensive
trans: n. 加强器

sentences.english: a one-week intensive course in English
sentences.chinese: 为期一周的英语强化课程

sentences.english: a day of intensive negotiations
sentences.chinese: 紧张谈判的一天

name: enervate
trans: adj. 衰弱的，无力的

sentences.chinese: 热辣辣的太阳把她晒得快要晕过去了。

deprived of strength or vitality; weakened

trans: n. 负担；责任；船的载货量

sentences.chinese: 家庭责任已开始成为他的负担。

detailed_translations.english: something difficult or worrying that you are responsible for

name: complaisant

sentences.english: A Quaker preacher, traveling in the more complaisant colony of Maryland, came upon a party of young people who were dancing merrily together.
sentences.chinese: 一个贵格会的传道人，在更殷勤有礼的马里兰殖民地旅行时，遇到了一群年轻人在欢快的跳舞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 彬彬有礼的， 殷勤的； 柔顺的

name: application
trans: n. 应用；申请；应用程序；敷用

sentences.english: We receive hundreds of job applications each year.
sentences.chinese: 我们每年收到数百封求职信。

sentences.english: I filled in the application form and sent it off.
sentences.chinese: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

sentences.english: You have to submit your application before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 月底之前必须递交申请。

sentences.english: I’ve put in an application for a transfer.
sentences.chinese: 我已递交了调动申请。

sentences.english: He received a letter saying that his application had been rejected .
sentences.chinese: 他收到一封信，告知他的申请已被拒绝。

sentences.english: It can take a long time for your visa application to be processed .
sentences.chinese: 办理签证申请可能需要很长时间。

sentences.english: The Council is currently reviewing the way it deals with planning applications .
sentences.chinese: 市政会目前正在审查其处理规划申请的方式。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of application , which we received yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 你的申请信昨天收悉，谢谢。

detailed_translations.chinese: 申请， 申请书； 施用， 涂抹； 应用， 实施； 实用性

name: grind
trans: n. 磨；苦工作

sentences.english: a stone for grinding knives and scissors
sentences.chinese: 磨刀剪的石头

sentences.english: The lenses are ground to a high standard of precision.
sentences.chinese: 镜片被磨到很高的精确度。

detailed_translations.english: to make something smooth or sharp by rubbing it on a hard surface or by using a machine

a movement in  skateboarding  or  rollerblading  , which involves moving sideways along the edge of something, so that the bar connecting the wheels of the  skateboard  or  rollerblade  presses hard against the edge

name: constant
trans: n. [数] 常数；恒量

sentences.english: There was a constant stream of visitors to the house.
sentences.chinese: 参观这幢房子的游客川流不息。

sentences.english: Amy lived in constant fear of being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 埃米一直生活在害怕遭到袭击的恐惧之中。

sentences.english: He kept in constant contact with his family while he was in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚时一直和家人保持着联系。

sentences.english: travelling at a constant speed
sentences.chinese: 以恒定速度行驶

detailed_translations.english: happening regularly or all the time

name: compliant
trans: adj. 顺从的；服从的；应允的

sentences.english: For years I had tried to be a compliant and dutiful wife.
sentences.chinese: 多年来我都在努力做一个顺从尽职的妻子。

detailed_translations.english: willing to obey or to agree to other people’s wishes and demands

name: intensity
trans: n. 强度；强烈；[电子] 亮度；紧张

sentences.english: The intensity of the hurricane was frightening.
sentences.chinese: 飓风的猛烈程度令人恐惧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈，剧烈；〔光、声等的〕强度
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being felt very strongly or having a strong effect

name: brochure
trans: n. 手册，小册子

sentences.english: a holiday brochure
sentences.chinese: 度假手册

detailed_translations.english: a thin book giving information or advertising something

name: adhere
trans: vi. 坚持；依附；粘着；追随

sentences.english: Small particles adhere to the seed.
sentences.chinese: 微小的粒子紧贴着种子。

sentences.english: We adhere to the principles of equal rights and freedom of expression for all.
sentences.chinese: 我们坚持人人平等和言论自由的原则。

detailed_translations.english: to stick firmly to something

name: conversion
trans: n. 转换；变换；[金融] 兑换；改变信仰

sentences.english: ...the conversion of disused rail lines into cycle routes.
sentences.chinese: …把废弃的铁路改变成自行车道。

detailed_translations.english: when you change something from one form, purpose, or system to a different one

name: judge
trans: vt. 判断；审判

sentences.english: You should never judge a person by their looks.
sentences.chinese: 决不要以貌取人。

sentences.english: Judge us on the improvements we make in the economy.
sentences.chinese: 请根据我们在经济方面取得的进步来评价我们。

sentences.english: The therapist judged that Margaret had made a serious attempt to kill herself.
sentences.chinese: 治疗专家断定玛格丽特曾真的企图自杀。

sentences.english: pollutants that were judged hazardous to human health
sentences.chinese: 被认为对人体健康有害的污染物

sentences.english: I am in no position to judge whether what she is doing is right or wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我无权评判她在做的事是对是错。

sentences.english: The economic results of the reforms are very difficult to judge.
sentences.chinese: 这些改革所带来的经济成效很难评价。

sentences.english: The likelihood of future bombs was impossible to judge.
sentences.chinese: 未来发生爆炸案的可能性无法预测。

sentences.english: We judge the success of a product by the number of sales it brings in.
sentences.chinese: 我们以销量来评价一种产品成功与否。

sentences.english: His conduct, judged objectively by what he has done, is dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为，从他所做的这一切客观地来评价，是不诚实的。

sentences.english: Robert wanted to go and help him, but judged it best to stay where he was.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特想过去帮他，但考虑之后还是觉得待在原地为妙。

sentences.english: Do not judge her too harshly, as she was very young at the time.
sentences.chinese: 对她的评价不要太苛刻，毕竟那时候她还很年轻。

detailed_translations.english: to form or give an opinion about someone or something after thinking carefully about all the information you know about them
the official in control of a court, who decides how criminals should be punished

name: elementary
trans: adj. 基本的；初级的；[化学] 元素的

sentences.english: the elementary principles of justice and democracy
sentences.chinese: 正义和民主的基本信条

sentences.english: You’ve made a very elementary mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个非常基本的错误。

sentences.english: I’m only familiar with the subject at an elementary level.
sentences.chinese: 我对这门学科的了解只是初级水平。

detailed_translations.english: simple or basic

name: scary
trans: adj. （事物）可怕的；恐怖的；吓人的；（人）提心吊胆的；引起惊慌的；胆小的

sentences.english: a scary moment
sentences.chinese: 恐怖的一刻

sentences.english: a scary movie
sentences.chinese: 恐怖片

sentences.english: The book is both scary and funny.
sentences.chinese: 这本书既恐怖又有趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕的， 骇人的； 惊慌的， 害怕的； 胆小的， 易受惊的
detailed_translations.english: frightening

name: probity
trans: n. 廉洁；正直

sentences.english: I have always found Bentner to be a model of probity in our dealings.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的交往中，我一贯认为班特纳是诚实的典范。

detailed_translations.english: complete honesty

name: confess
trans: vi. 承认；坦白；忏悔；供认

sentences.english: Occasionally people confess to crimes they haven’t committed just to get attention.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔人们会承认自己并未犯过的罪行，那只是为了引人注意。

sentences.english: Torture was used and Fian confessed.
sentences.chinese: 酷刑用过之后菲安就招供了。

detailed_translations.english: to admit, especially to the police, that you have done something wrong or illegal

name: incur
trans: vt. 招致，引发；蒙受

sentences.english: And operational downtime caused by reliability or performance problems can incur opportunity costs if customers are unable to access your system or the business is unable to do its work.
sentences.chinese: 并且如果顾客不能访问你的系统或业务不能进行工作，那么由可靠性或性能问题引起的运作停工就会招致机会成本。

detailed_translations.english: if you incur a cost, debt, or a fine, you have to pay money because of something you have done

name: pure
trans: adj. 纯的；纯粹的；纯洁的；清白的；纯理论的

sentences.english: rings made of pure gold
sentences.chinese: 纯金制成的戒指

sentences.english: Our beef patties are 100% pure.
sentences.chinese: 我们的牛肉饼是100%的纯牛肉。

sentences.english: His motives were pure.
sentences.chinese: 他动机纯正。

detailed_translations.english: not mixed with anything else; with nothing added

name: aggravate
trans: vt. 加重；使恶化；激怒

sentences.english: Their money problems were further aggravated by a rise in interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 由于利率上调，他们的财务问题更加严重。

sentences.english: Building the new road will only aggravate the situation .
sentences.chinese: 建造那条新路只会使情况恶化。

detailed_translations.english: to make a bad situation, an illness, or an injury worse

name: especially
trans: adv. 特别；尤其；格外

sentences.english: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.english: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.english: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others

name: gradually
trans: adv. 逐步地；渐渐地

sentences.english: Jill gradually became aware of an awful smell.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔渐渐地闻到了一股难闻的气味。

sentences.english: Gradually, my ankle got better.
sentences.chinese: 我的脚踝慢慢好了。

detailed_translations.english: slowly, over a long period of time

name: essence
trans: n. 本质，实质；精华；香精

sentences.english: In essence his message was very simple.
sentences.chinese: 实质上他想表达的意思很简单。

detailed_translations.english: the most basic and important quality of something

name: stair
trans: n. 楼梯，阶梯；梯级

sentences.english: We walked up four flights of stairs (= sets of stairs ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们往上走了四段楼梯。

detailed_translations.english: a set of steps built for going from one level of a building to another

name: grain
trans: n. 粮食；颗粒；[作物] 谷物；纹理

sentences.english: There were crumbs and grains of sugar on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷物， 谷粒， 颗粒； 少量， 微量
detailed_translations.english: a single very small piece of a substance such as sand or salt

name: constitution
trans: n. 宪法；体制；章程；构造；建立，组成；体格

sentences.english: The right to speak freely is written into the Constitution of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。

sentences.english: She’s got a strong constitution – she’ll recover in no time.
sentences.chinese: 她体质强壮，很快就会恢复。

sentences.english: What’s the chemical constitution of the dye?
sentences.chinese: 这种染料的化学成分是什么？

detailed_translations.english: a set of basic laws and principles that a country or organization is governed by

name: extroversion
trans: n. [心理] 外向性；[医] 外翻

sentences.english: Two personality traits shine through the complexity of economists’ regression analyses: neuroticism and extroversion.
sentences.chinese: 经济学家通过复杂的回归分析突出了两种性格：神经质及外向型。

sentences.english: They also rated the man’s general likability, kindness, and extroversion.
sentences.chinese: 他们也要评估出该男子的总体可爱程度、友好程度和性格外向程度。

sentences.english: Additionally, earlier investigations have shown that both neuroticism and extroversion are associated with the brain's serotonin processing systems, which are targeted by SSRI antidepressants.
sentences.chinese: 此外，早期的调查显示神经质和外向都与大脑的5-羟色胺处理系统相关，这也是抗抑郁药主要针对的目标。

detailed_translations.chinese: [心理] 外向性；[医] 外翻
detailed_translations.english: the directing of one's interest outwards, esp towards social contacts

name: zone
trans: [地名] 地带、地区（德语）

sentences.english: San Francisco and Tokyo are both located in earthquake zones.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.english: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

detailed_translations.english: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way

name: endurance
trans: n. 忍耐力；忍耐；持久；耐久

sentences.english: She was pushed beyond her powers of endurance.
sentences.chinese: 她被逼得忍无可忍。

sentences.english: The marathon is a test of endurance.
sentences.chinese: 马拉松赛跑是对耐力的考验。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to continue doing something difficult or painful over a long period of time

name: decoration
trans: n. 装饰，装潢；装饰品；奖章

sentences.english: Christmas decorations
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节装饰物

sentences.english: cake decorations
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕上的裱花

detailed_translations.english: something pretty that you put in a place or on top of something to make it look attractive

name: Calorie
trans: Not Found

name: vitamin
trans: n. [生化] 维生素；[生化] 维他命

sentences.english: Try to eat foods that are rich in vitamins and minerals.
sentences.chinese: 尽量吃富含维生素和矿物质的食物。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance in food that is necessary for good health

name: equilibrium
trans: n. 均衡；平静；保持平衡的能力

sentences.english: The government is anxious not to upset the economic equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 政府急切希望不要打乱经济平衡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 均衡；平静；保持平衡的能力
detailed_translations.english: a balance between different people, groups, or forces that compete with each other, so that none is stronger than the others and a situation is not likely to change suddenly

name: desperate
trans: adj. 不顾一切的；令人绝望的；极度渴望的

sentences.english: I had no money left and was desperate.
sentences.chinese: 我身无分文，已经走投无路了。

sentences.english: Time was running out and we were getting desperate .
sentences.chinese: 时间越来越少，我们越来越感到绝望。

sentences.english: the missing teenager’s desperate parents
sentences.chinese: 失踪少年绝望的父母

detailed_translations.english: willing to do anything to change a very bad situation, and not caring about danger

name: converge
trans: vt. 使汇聚

sentences.english: The two rivers converge into one near Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 这两条河在匹兹堡附近汇合。

detailed_translations.chinese: 会合， 互相靠拢； 聚集， 集中； 趋近
detailed_translations.english: to come from different directions and meet at the same point to become one thing

name: occasionally
trans: adv. 偶尔；间或

sentences.english: Occasionally Alice would look up from her books.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯偶尔会从书中抬起头来。

name: terrorist
trans: n. 恐怖主义者，恐怖分子

sentences.english: We refuse to talk to terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 我们拒绝和恐怖分子对话。

sentences.english: a terrorist bomb that left 168 people dead
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子引爆造成168人死亡的炸弹

detailed_translations.english: someone who uses violence such as bombing, shooting etc to obtain political demands

name: parade
trans: n. 游行；阅兵；炫耀；行进；阅兵场

sentences.english: a victory parade
sentences.chinese: 胜利游行

sentences.english: the St Patrick’s Day parade
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克节庆祝游行

sentences.english: a military parade
sentences.chinese: 军事检阅

sentences.english: The marchers paraded peacefully through the capital.
sentences.chinese: 游行队伍有秩序地列队穿过首都。

detailed_translations.english: a public celebration when musical bands, brightly decorated vehicles etc move down the street
to walk or march together to celebrate or protest about something

name: transitional
trans: adj. 变迁的；过渡期的

sentences.english: ...a transitional period following more than a decade of civil war.
sentences.chinese: …十多年内战之后的一个过渡时期。

detailed_translations.english: relating to a period during which something is changing from one state or form into another

name: maintain
trans: vt. 维持；继续；维修；主张；供养

sentences.english: Careers Officers maintain contact with young people when they have left school.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.english: Britain wants to maintain its position as a world power.
sentences.chinese: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.english: A lot depends on building and maintaining a good relationship with your customers.
sentences.chinese: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.english: The hotel prides itself on maintaining high standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店以保持高标准而自豪。

sentences.english: How can we maintain control of spending?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

sentences.english: Critics maintain that these reforms will lead to a decline in educational standards.
sentences.chinese: 批评者坚称这些改革会导致教育标准下降。

detailed_translations.english: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before

name: analogous
trans: adj. 类似的；[昆] 同功的；可比拟的

sentences.english: Marine construction technology like this is very complex, somewhat analogous to trying to build a bridge under water.
sentences.chinese: 像这样的海洋建筑技术非常复杂，有些类似于尝试在水下建筑一座桥。

detailed_translations.chinese: 类似的；[昆] 同功的；可比拟的
detailed_translations.english: similar to another situation or thing so that a comparison can be made

name: surf
trans: vi. 作冲浪运动

sentences.english: I'm going to buy a surfboard and learn to surf.
sentences.chinese: 我要去买个冲浪板来学冲浪。

detailed_translations.english: to ride on waves while standing on a special board

name: library
trans: n. 图书馆，藏书室；文库

sentences.english: a public library
sentences.chinese: 公共图书馆

sentences.english: a library book
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书

sentences.english: My thanks go to the British School of Osteopathy, for the use of their library.
sentences.chinese: 感谢不列颠骨疗法学校允许我使用他们的藏书。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed

name: centricity
trans: Not Found

name: tirade
trans: n. 激烈的长篇演说

sentences.english: Now I fully recognize that I’m sitting here, a nobody myself, spouting off in what could be considered a hypocritical tirade, guilty of the same thing Ms. Barr is.
sentences.chinese: 现在，我完全意识到我正坐在这儿，只有我自己，进行着一次被认为是伪善的长篇演讲，对同巴尔遇到的同样的事儿感到内疚。

name: broadcast
trans: n. 广播；播音；广播节目

sentences.english: The interview was broadcast live across Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这次采访向整个欧洲进行了现场直播。

detailed_translations.chinese: 播送，播放；（无线电或电视）广播；播撒（种子）
detailed_translations.english: to send out radio or television programmes
a programme on the radio or on television

name: ridge
trans: n. 山脊；山脉；屋脊

sentences.english: We made our way carefully along the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着山脊小心前行。

detailed_translations.english: a long area of high land, especially at the top of a mountain

name: cautionary
trans: adj. 警告的；劝诫的

sentences.english: Barely fifteen months later, it has become a cautionary tale of the pitfalls of international mergers and acquisitions.
sentences.chinese: 15个月刚过，这便成了一个有关国际并购陷阱的警世故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 劝人谨慎的， 警戒的
detailed_translations.english: giving a warning about what not to do

name: dialogue
trans: n. 对话；意见交换

sentences.english: a boring movie full of bad dialog
sentences.chinese: 充满差劲对白的乏味电影

sentences.english: Students were asked to read simple dialogues out loud.
sentences.chinese: 学生被要求大声朗读简单的对话。

detailed_translations.english: a conversation in a book, play, or film

name: progress
trans: n. 进步，发展；前进

sentences.english: The police are disappointed by the slow pro-gress of the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 警方对调查进度缓慢感到失望。

sentences.english: We made good progress despite the snow.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下雪，我们的行程还是很顺利。

sentences.english: I asked the nurse how my son was progressing.
sentences.chinese: 我询问护士我儿子身体恢复得如何。

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something
to improve, develop, or achieve things so that you are then at a more advanced stage

name: refresh
trans: vt. 更新；使……恢复；使……清新；消除……的疲劳

sentences.english: A shower will refresh you.
sentences.chinese: 洗个淋浴你就凉快了。

sentences.english: He refreshed himself with a glass of iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了杯冰茶提了提神。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less tired or less hot

name: judgement
trans: n. 意见；判断力；[法] 审判；评价

sentences.english: He trusted in his judgement.
sentences.chinese: 他相信他的判断。

sentences.english: All action is based on judgement.
sentences.chinese: 一切行动均以判断为基础。

sentences.english: The judgement is often biased by interest.
sentences.chinese: 判断往往因利害关系而有偏差。

name: concentration
trans: n. 浓度；集中；浓缩；专心；集合

sentences.english: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.chinese: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.english: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.english: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩； 浓度
detailed_translations.english: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time

name: chicanery
trans: n. 狡辩；欺骗；强词夺理

sentences.english: Clearly there is some chicanery going on.
sentences.chinese: 这里面显然有诈。

detailed_translations.english: the use of clever plans or actions to deceive people

name: venue
trans: n. 审判地；犯罪地点；发生地点；集合地点

sentences.english: The first thing to do is book a venue.
sentences.chinese: 首先要做的是预订一个会场。

sentences.english: The band will play (= perform at ) as many venues as possible.
sentences.chinese: 那支乐队将在尽可能多的地方演出。

detailed_translations.english: a place where an organized meeting, concert etc takes place

name: sanction
trans: n. 制裁，处罚；认可；支持

sentences.english: a resolution to impose sanctions (= start using sanctions ) on DPRK
sentences.chinese: 对朝鲜实施制裁的决议

sentences.english: the threat of trade sanctions
sentences.chinese: 贸易制裁的威胁

sentences.english: The UN security council may impose economic sanctions .
sentences.chinese: 联合国安理会可能会实施经济制裁。

sentences.english: Any talk about lifting sanctions (= ending them ) is premature.
sentences.chinese: 现时就谈取消制裁为时过早。

detailed_translations.english: official orders or laws stopping trade, communication etc with another country, as a way of forcing its leaders to make political changes
to officially accept or allow something

name: subsistence
trans: n. 生活；生存；存在

sentences.english: Many of the families are forced to live at the subsistence level.
sentences.chinese: 很多家庭被迫生活在基本生活水准线上。

sentences.english: The land provided subsistence and little more.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地只能提供人们的基本生活所需，别无富余。

detailed_translations.english: the condition of only just having enough money or food to stay alive

name: resemblance
trans: n. 相似；相似之处；相似物；肖像

sentences.english: The resemblance between Susan and her sister was remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊和她的姐姐十分相像。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being or looking similar to sb/sth

name: devotion
trans: n. 献身，奉献；忠诚；热爱

sentences.english: her devotion to duty
sentences.chinese: 她对职责的忠诚

sentences.english: Her devotion to the job left her with very little free time.
sentences.chinese: 她全身心投入工作，几乎没有闲暇。

detailed_translations.english: the action of spending a lot of time or energy on sth

name: adultery
trans: n. 通奸，通奸行为

sentences.english: She had committed adultery on several occasions.
sentences.chinese: 她数次与人私通。

detailed_translations.english: sex between someone who is married and someone who is not their wife or husband

name: quell
trans: vt. 平息；镇压；减轻；消除

sentences.english: ‘Jerry?’ she called, trying to quell the panic inside her.
sentences.chinese: “杰里？”她叫道，试图减轻内心的惊慌。

detailed_translations.english: to end a situation in which people are behaving violently or protesting, especially by using force

name: interact
trans: n. 幕间剧；幕间休息

sentences.english: While the other children interacted and played together, Ted ignored them.
sentences.chinese: 当其他孩子们相互交往、一起玩耍时，泰德却不理他们。

detailed_translations.english: if people interact with each other, they talk to each other, work together etc

name: death
trans: n. 死；死亡；死神；毁灭

sentences.english: 1.5 million people are in immediate danger of death from starvation.
sentences.chinese: 150万人正因饥饿而即将面临死亡的危险。

detailed_translations.english: a creature that looks like a human  skeleton  , used in paintings, stories etc to represent the fact that people die

name: undesirable
trans: n. 不良分子；不受欢迎的人

sentences.english: punishment of undesirable behaviour
sentences.chinese: 对不良行为的惩罚

sentences.english: It would be highly undesirable to increase class sizes further.
sentences.chinese: 再增加班级人数，是大家都极不愿意的。

detailed_translations.english: not welcome or wanted because they may affect a situation or person in a bad way

name: propagate
trans: vt. 传播；传送；繁殖；宣传

sentences.english: The group launched a website to propagate its ideas.
sentences.chinese: 这个团体建了一个网站来宣扬他们的主张。

sentences.english: The plant can be propagated from seed.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物可由种子繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: to spread an idea, belief etc to many people

name: thrive
trans: vi. 繁荣，兴旺；茁壮成长

sentences.english: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 在热带雨林蓬勃生长的植物

sentences.english: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
sentences.chinese: 在经济萧条时期也能顺利发展的一家企业

detailed_translations.english: to become very successful or very strong and healthy

name: twinkle
trans: n. 闪烁

sentences.english: stars twinkling in the sky
sentences.chinese: 天空中闪烁的星星

sentences.english: I saw lights twinkling in the little town below us.
sentences.chinese: 我看到我们下面的小镇灯火闪烁。

detailed_translations.english: if a star or light twinkles, it shines in the dark with an unsteady light
an expression in your eyes that shows you are happy or amused

name: unshaven
trans: adj. 未修面的；不剃须的

name: regeneration
trans: n. [生物][化学][物] 再生，重生；重建

sentences.english: But they can definitely determine how they plan to grow as more people move in, and also how they want to rehabilitate areas that need regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 但它们确实可以决定怎样在更多的人迁移进来的同时计划它们的增长，以及它们希望怎样修复需要重建的区域。

sentences.english: There are three parts to your hair: the hair shaft (the fiber), the hair bulb (the root) and the hair cycle (the period of rest and regeneration).
sentences.chinese: 我们的头发包含三个部分：毛干(纤维)，毛球(根部)和毛发周期(休息和再生的周期)。

sentences.english: And doctors are already experimenting with ways of using tactile cues to improve wound healing and regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 医生已经在试验运用触觉信号来提高伤口愈合及再生的方法。

name: relief
trans: n. 救济；减轻，解除；安慰；浮雕

sentences.english: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.

sentences.chinese: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

sentences.chinese: 你应该穿轻便舒适的鞋子。

sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车很轻，容易驾驶。

sentences.chinese: 我祖母教过我编织。

sentences.chinese: 她在织毛衣。

trans: adj. 贪污的；用金钱买得的；贿赂的；贪赃枉法的

sentences.chinese: 我们腐败的政客

name: hill
trans: n. 小山；丘陵；斜坡；山冈

sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

trans: n. 研究者；调查者；侦查员

sentences.english: police investigators
sentences.chinese: 警探

detailed_translations.english: someone who investigates things, especially crimes

name: atmospheric
trans: adj. 大气的，大气层的

sentences.english: atmospheric pressure
sentences.chinese: 大气压力

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth’s atmosphere

name: rivet
trans: n. 铆钉

sentences.english: The property parameters of stainless steel, full steel sealed type blind rivet .
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢、 全钢封闭型抽芯铆钉的性能参数图。

sentences.english: Every nail driven should be as another rivet in the machine of the universe, you carrying on the work.
sentences.chinese: 钉入的每颗钉子，都应像宇宙机器中的铆钉一样固定，你的工作才能继续下去。

name: excursion
trans: n. 偏移；远足；短程旅行；离题；游览，游览团

sentences.chinese: 他们到约克旅游去了。

sentences.chinese: 在马赛住了几星期后，我开始待不住了，决定换个地方。

trans: n. 双关语；俏皮话

sentences.chinese: 我也许可以玩世不恭的说他这么做是希望开发出一个在市场上“必杀”的游戏——请原谅我的双关语——但为了更高层的论题，我权且同意他的话。

an amusing use of a word or phrase that has two meanings, or of words that have the same sound but different meanings

name: scene
trans: n. 场面；情景；景象；事件

sentences.english: Hamlet, Act 5 Scene 2
sentences.chinese: 《哈姆雷特》第5幕第2场

sentences.english: battle scenes
sentences.chinese: 战斗场面

sentences.english: The police soon arrived at the scene of the crime .
sentences.chinese: 警察很快就到达了案发现场。

sentences.english: He photographed a wide range of street scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他拍下了丰富多彩的街景。

detailed_translations.english: part of a play during which there is no change in time or place

name: hurricane
trans: n. 飓风，暴风

sentences.english: I still remember a hurricane that hit us thirty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得三十年前袭击我们的一次飓风。

sentences.english: Our love is not fierce, not hot, but despite the tsunami hurricane, also vowed.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱，不剧烈，不炙热，可是任凭海啸飓风，也矢志不渝。

sentences.english: If an earthquake, hurricane, winter storm, or other disaster strikes your community, you might not have access to food , water, and electricity for days or even weeks.
sentences.chinese: 如果有地震、飓风、暴风雪或其他的灾害突袭你的家园，你可能会好几天甚至好几个星期都得不到食物、水和电。

detailed_translations.english: a storm that has very strong fast winds and that moves over water

name: sick
trans: adj. 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的

sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.english: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的

people who are ill

name: spirit
trans: n. 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒

sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people

name: fantastically
trans: adv. 想像中地；奇特地；难以置信地

trans: n. 蒸发；消失

sentences.chinese: 水通过蒸发进入空气。

sentences.english: Because it is located in a very hot and dry region, the Dead Sea loses much water through evaporation, causing its level to fluctuate during the year.
sentences.chinese: 因为它处于一个非常炎热和干燥的地区，死海由于蒸发损失掉大量的水，导致其水平面一年到头不断波动。

sentences.english: There has not been much change in rainfall in those areas but the temperature has risen by over 1 degree Centigrade since 1970, which will have enhanced losses due to evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 那些地区的降雨量没有太大变化，但是自1970年以来上升的气温已经超过了1摄氏度，由于蒸发这将会造成水分的更大流失。

trans: n. 踏板；脚蹬子

sentences.chinese: 她飞快地踩着踏板。

of or relating to the foot or feet

sentences.chinese: 她的衣服胡乱堆在地板上。

sentences.chinese: 这位海洋学家告诉与会代表，高纬度地区的海洋酸化问题更加严重，北极和南极周围比赤道附近糟糕得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海洋学者, 海洋研究者

sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.chinese: 明天天气干燥，间或晴朗。

sentences.chinese: 他非常害怕乘飞机。

sentences.chinese: 乔安妮如此诚实，所以克莱尔除了相信她以外没有别的选择。

sentences.chinese: 此类公司如果想在现代社会中与别人竞争，就必须有所改变。

sentences.english: They are the youngest children in modern times to face murder charges.
sentences.chinese: 他们是近代面临谋杀指控儿童中年龄最小的。

sentences.chinese: 一本关于现代史的书

sentences.chinese: 最初的超级市场按现代的标准来看是很小的。

name: influenza

sentences.chinese: 这个地区的所有医务工作者参加了消灭流行性感冒的工作。

sentences.chinese: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

trans: n. 素食者；食草动物

sentences.chinese: 我们的小女儿是个素食主义者。

sentences.chinese: 适合素食者的菜肴

sentences.chinese: 我在考虑戒除荤食。

sentences.english: Yasmin sticks to a strict vegetarian diet.
sentences.chinese: 亚斯敏坚持一种严格的纯素饮食。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does not eat meat or fish
Someone who is vegetarian never eats meat or fish

name: consent

sentences.english: The chairman was elected by common consent (= with most people agreeing ) .
sentences.chinese: 主席是大家一致推选出来的。

sentences.chinese: 双方均同意的离婚

sentences.chinese: 她父亲勉强答应了这桩婚事。

detailed_translations.english: agreement about something
to give your permission for something or agree to do something

name: basis
trans: n. 基础；底部；主要成分；基本原则或原理

sentences.english: Their claim had no basis in fact (=  it was not true  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的说法没有事实根据。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基础， 根据； 原则
detailed_translations.english: the facts, ideas, or things from which something can be developed

name: disjoint
trans: adj. 互斥；没有共同元素；不相交的

name: movement
trans: n. 运动；活动；运转；乐章

sentences.chinese: 舞蹈演员优美的动作

sentences.english: reports of troop movements in the area
sentences.chinese: 该地区部队动向的报告

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something changes position or moves from one place to another

name: information
trans: n. 信息，资料；知识；情报；通知

sentences.english: I need more information.
sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: facts or details that tell you something about a situation, person, event etc

name: expertise
trans: n. 专门知识；专门技术；专家的意见

sentences.english: She was not an accountant and didn't have the expertise to verify all of the financial details.
sentences.chinese: 她不是会计，不具有核查所有这些财政细目的专业知识。

detailed_translations.english: Expertise is special skill or knowledge that is acquired by training, study, or practice

name: rammer
trans: Not Found

name: abate
trans: vt. 减轻；减少；废除

sentences.english: We waited for the storm to abate.
sentences.chinese: 我们等风暴减弱。

detailed_translations.english: to become less strong or decrease

name: rush
trans: n. 冲进；匆促；急流；灯心草

sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩从她身边匆匆经过。

sentences.english: Mo rushed off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 莫匆匆走过走廊。

name: empirical

sentences.chinese: 实验证据

detailed_translations.english: based on scientific testing or practical experience, not on ideas

sentences.chinese: 到1900年英国已基本进入工业社会。

name: paint

sentences.english: The ceiling needs painting.
sentences.chinese: 天花板需要粉刷了。

sentences.english: brightly paintedhouses
sentences.chinese: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.english: The living room was painted in pastel shades of pink and blue.
sentences.chinese: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface

sentences.chinese: 一个在内存空间中的，包含每个外设的名字和可由处理器设置的地址范围的表格或图表。

sentences.chinese: 电视放映室

detailed_translations.chinese: 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的

someone who has not learned to read or write

name: bibliography
trans: n. 参考书目；文献目录

sentences.chinese: 本章末尾附着有用书籍的精选书目。

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the books and articles used in preparing a piece of writing

trans: n. 摩托车

sentences.english: The motorbike is supposed to make annoying noise.
sentences.chinese: 摩托车当然会发出令人感到烦恼的噪音。

sentences.english: Some earlier witness reports cited by police or security officials had explosives being thrown from a motorbike or the upper storey's of an adjacent hotel.
sentences.chinese: 一些更早的证词报道引用警方或安全部门的话说，爆炸物从摩托车上扔下，或是从领进旅馆的楼上扔下来。

detailed_translations.english: a small fast two-wheeled vehicle with an engine

name: immediacy
trans: n. 直接；目前

name: intentioned
trans: Not Found

name: pronunciation
trans: n. 发音；读法

sentences.english: She gave the word its French pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 她给出了这个单词的法语发音。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which a language or a particular word is pronounced

name: pedantic
trans: adj. 迂腐的；学究式的；卖弄学问的；假装学者的

sentences.english: His lecture was so pedantic and uninteresting.
sentences.chinese: 他的讲座学究气十足且没趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 迂腐的；学究式的；卖弄学问的；假装学者的
detailed_translations.english: paying too much attention to rules or to small unimportant details

name: confidence
trans: n. 信心；信任；秘密

sentences.english: I have never betrayed a confidence.
sentences.chinese: 我从未泄露过别人的秘密。

sentences.english: They spent their evenings drinking wine and sharing confidences.
sentences.chinese: 晚上他们就喝喝酒，说说知心话。

detailed_translations.english: a secret or a piece of information that is private or personal

name: expensive
trans: adj. 昂贵的；花钱的

sentences.english: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.english: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 汽油越来越贵了。

sentences.english: Photography is an expensive hobby.
sentences.chinese: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。

sentences.english: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).
sentences.chinese: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。

sentences.english: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.
sentences.chinese: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

sentences.english: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。

detailed_translations.english: costing a lot of money

name: pragmatic
trans: adj. 实际的；实用主义的；国事的

sentences.english: Williams took a more pragmatic approach to management problems.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯在管理问题上采用的是一种更务实的做法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 实际的；实用主义的；国事的
detailed_translations.english: dealing with problems in a sensible practical way instead of strictly following a set of ideas

name: observatory
trans: n. 天文台；气象台；瞭望台

sentences.english: An observatory on the back side of the Moon would be a giant leap for astronomy, but there is a for more important reason to return.
sentences.chinese: 即使仅仅在月球的背面设置一个天文台，也将为天文学带来革命性的突破，何况月球的价值远远不止这些。

sentences.english: With a full-power observatory in place, that explanation, as well as a better explanation of high-energy astrophysical phenomena throughout the universe, may be available in the years to come.
sentences.chinese: 一个满负荷运作的观测站的到位，对那些热点的解释，以及对遍及宇宙的高能天文学现象的更好的解释，将会在今年内成为可能。

name: electricity
trans: n. 电力；电流；强烈的紧张情绪

sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

detailed_translations.english: the power that is carried by wires, cables etc, and is used to provide light or heat, to make machines work etc

name: infinitely
trans: adv. 无限地；极其

sentences.english: Human beings are infinitely adaptable.
sentences.chinese: 人类的适应力是无限的。

detailed_translations.english: extremely; with no limit

name: handball
trans: n. 手球，手球运动

name: gruelling
trans: n. 惩罚；痛打

name: electronic
trans: adj. 电子的

sentences.english: electronic games
sentences.chinese: 电子游戏

sentences.english: an electronic organizer (= a small piece of electronic equipment that you can use to record addresses, phone numbers etc )
sentences.chinese: 电子记事本

detailed_translations.english: electronic equipment, such as computers and televisions, uses electricity that has passed through computer chips, transistors etc

name: quiescent
trans: adj. 静止的；不活动的；沉寂的

sentences.english: ...a society which was politically quiescent and above all deferential.
sentences.chinese: ...一个遵循顺从至上及政治上平静的社会。

detailed_translations.chinese: 静止的；不活动的；沉寂的
detailed_translations.english: not developing or doing anything, especially when this is only a temporary state

name: sovereignty
trans: n. 主权；主权国家；君主；独立国

sentences.english: the sovereignty of Parliament
sentences.chinese: 议会至高无上的权威

detailed_translations.chinese: 主权；主权国家；君主；独立国
detailed_translations.english: complete freedom and power to govern

name: chapter
trans: n. 章，回；（俱乐部、协会等的）分会；人生或历史上的重要时期

sentences.english: Read Chapter 11 as your homework.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是阅读第 11 章。

sentences.english: This chapter discusses power, and how people use it.
sentences.chinese: 这一章节讲权力，以及人们如何运用权力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts into which a book is divided

name: spell
trans: n. 符咒；一段时间；魅力

sentences.english: How do you spell ‘juice’?
sentences.chinese: juice 怎么拼？

sentences.english: Pupils should know how to spell commonly used words.
sentences.chinese: 小学生应该知道常用词的拼法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值
detailed_translations.english: to form a word by writing or naming the letters in order
a piece of magic that someone does, or the special words or ceremonies used in doing it

name: indoor
trans: adj. 室内的，户内的

sentences.english: an indoor swimming pool
sentences.chinese: 室内游泳池

sentences.english: the world indoor athletics championship
sentences.chinese: 世界室内田径锦标赛

sentences.english: Too much central heating can harm indoor plants.
sentences.chinese: 中央供暖系统温度太高对室内植物有害。

detailed_translations.english: used or happening inside a building

name: nutrition
trans: n. 营养，营养学；营养品

sentences.english: Nutrition and exercise are essential to fitness and health.
sentences.chinese: 营养和运动是保持健康所必不可少的。

sentences.english: a nutrition expert
sentences.chinese: 营养专家

detailed_translations.english: the process of giving or getting the right type of food for good health and growth

name: screen
trans: n. 屏，幕；屏风

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

name: population
trans: n. 人口；[生物] 种群，[生物] 群体；全体居民

sentences.english: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.english: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc

name: penalty
trans: n. 罚款，罚金；处罚

sentences.english: No littering. Penalty $500.
sentences.chinese: 禁止乱扔垃圾。 违者罚款500美元。

sentences.english: Withdrawing the money early will result in a 10% penalty.
sentences.chinese: 提前支取这笔钱将被处以10%的罚金。

sentences.english: If he is convicted, he could receive the death penalty (= be killed as a punishment ) .
sentences.chinese: 一旦定罪，他可能会被判处死刑。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment for breaking a law, rule, or legal agreement

name: connoisseur
trans: n. 鉴赏家；内行

sentences.english: a wine connoisseur
sentences.chinese: 品酒专家

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about something such as art, food, or music

name: reclaim
trans: n. 改造，感化；再生胶

sentences.chinese: 你也许可以享受一定额度的退税。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开拓；回收再利用；改造某人，使某人悔改
detailed_translations.english: to get back an amount of money that you have paid

name: inoculation
trans: n. [医] 接种；接木；接插芽

name: fanatic
trans: n. 狂热入迷者；盲信者；盲信

sentences.english: fanatics who represent a real danger to democracy
sentences.chinese: 对民主构成很大威胁的狂热分子

sentences.english: a religious fanatic
sentences.chinese: 宗教狂热分子

detailed_translations.chinese: 狂热入迷者；盲信者；盲信
detailed_translations.english: someone who has extreme political or religious ideas and is often dangerous
Fanatic means the same as

name: captivate

sentences.chinese: 我为她的聪慧所迷。

detailed_translations.english: to attract someone very much, and hold their attention

sentences.chinese: 拥挤的交通一向是令人头痛的问题。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being annoyed about something, especially something that happens repeatedly or for a long time

name: robbery
trans: n. 抢劫，盗窃；抢掠

sentences.chinese: 警方正在调查发生在南威尔士的连环银行抢劫案。

sentences.english: He received a 10 year prison sentence for armed robbery (= robbery using a gun ) .
sentences.chinese: 他因持枪抢劫被判十年监禁。

sentences.english: He admitted attempted robbery and was given a suspended sentence.
sentences.chinese: 他承认企图行劫，被判了缓刑。

detailed_translations.english: the crime of stealing money or things from a bank, shop etc, especially using violence

name: scurry
trans: vi. 急赶；急跑

sentences.english: People were scurrying off to work.
sentences.chinese: 人们急匆匆赶着去上班。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急跑；短距离赛跑（或赛马）

detailed_translations.english: to move quickly with short steps, especially because you are in a hurry

name: universal
trans: n. 一般概念；普通性

sentences.english: free universal healthcare
sentences.chinese: 免费的全民保健制度

sentences.english: These stories have universal appeal.
sentences.chinese: 这些故事人人都喜欢。

sentences.english: a topic of universal interest
sentences.chinese: 人们普遍感兴趣的一个话题

sentences.english: a universal truth
sentences.chinese: 普遍的真理

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙的，全世界的；普遍的
detailed_translations.english: involving everyone in the world or in a particular group

name: withdraw
trans: vt. 撤退；收回；撤消；拉开

sentences.english: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.chinese: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩回， 退出； 撤退
detailed_translations.english: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

name: fascinate
trans: vt. 使着迷，使神魂颠倒

sentences.chinese: 政治让富兰克林的父亲着迷。

detailed_translations.english: If something fascinates you, it interests and delights you so much that your thoughts tend to concentrate on it

trans: adj. 反复无常的；任性的

sentences.chinese: 她和她母亲当初一样反复无常。

detailed_translations.english: likely to change your mind suddenly or behave in an unexpected way

name: rhetoric
trans: n. 修辞，修辞学；华丽的词藻

sentences.english: The speech was dismissed by some people as merely political rhetoric .
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为这场演讲只是华而不实的政治空谈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 修辞，修辞学；华丽的词藻
detailed_translations.english: the art of speaking or writing to persuade or influence people

name: locality
trans: n. 所在；位置；地点

sentences.english: weather reports from several different localities
sentences.chinese: 来自几个不同地区的天气报告

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a country, city etc

name: commitment
trans: n. 承诺，保证；委托；承担义务；献身

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

name: assure
trans: vt. 保证；担保；使确信；弄清楚

sentences.english: The document is genuine, I can assure you .
sentences.chinese: 我能向你保证，这文件是真的。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something will definitely happen or is definitely true so that they are less worried

name: supervisor
trans: n. 监督人，[管理] 管理人；检查员

sentences.english: ...a full-time job as a supervisor at a factory.
sentences.chinese: …在一家工厂担任监督员的一项全职工作。

detailed_translations.english: someone who supervises a person or activity

name: stare
trans: n. 凝视；注视

sentences.english: She sat there staring into space (= looking for a long time at nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 她坐在那里，出神地凝视前方。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something or someone for a long time without moving your eyes, for example because you are surprised, angry, or bored

name: home stay
trans: n. （在国外的访问者）在当地居民家居住的时期

name: documentary
trans: n. 纪录片

sentences.english: One of the most useful sources of documentary evidence is maps.
sentences.chinese: 最有价值的文献证据之一就是地图。

sentences.english: ...a TV documentary on homelessness.
sentences.chinese: …一部关于无家可归现象的电视记录片。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of or written on documents
a film or television or a radio programme that gives detailed information about a particular subject

name: prospective
trans: n. 预期；展望

sentences.english: The story should act as a warning to other prospective buyers.
sentences.chinese: 这篇报道应该可以对其他可能的购买者起到警告作用。

detailed_translations.english: You use prospective to describe someone who wants to be the thing mentioned or who is likely to be the thing mentioned

name: landlord
trans: n. 房东，老板；地主

sentences.english: His landlord doubled the rent.
sentences.chinese: 他的房东把房租提高了一倍。

detailed_translations.english: a man who rents a room, building, or piece of land to someone

name: solid
trans: n. 固体；立方体

sentences.english: The lake was frozen solid .
sentences.chinese: 湖水冻得结结实实。

sentences.english: It was good to be back on solid ground again.
sentences.chinese: 又能踏上坚实的土地感觉真好。

sentences.english: Is the baby eating solid food (= bread, meat etc ) yet?
sentences.chinese: 宝宝吃固体食物了吗？

sentences.english: The ship’s sonar can detect the presence of solid objects in the water.
sentences.chinese: 船上的声呐能够探测出水中的固体物。

sentences.english: the properties of liquids and solids
sentences.chinese: 液体和固体的特性

detailed_translations.english: hard or firm, with a fixed shape, and not a liquid or gas
a firm object or substance that has a fixed shape, not a gas or liquid

name: dominance
trans: n. 优势；统治；支配

sentences.english: The latest fighting appears to be an attempt by each group to establish dominance over the other.
sentences.chinese: 最近的战斗似乎是冲突各方在试图争夺控制权。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being more powerful, more important, or more noticeable than other people or things

name: inhabitant
trans: n. 居民；居住者

sentences.english: a city of six million inhabitants
sentences.chinese: 有600万居民的城市

detailed_translations.english: one of the people who live in a particular place

name: improve
trans: vt. 改善，增进；提高…的价值

sentences.english: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

name: reflect
trans: vt. 反映；反射，照出；表达；显示;反省

sentences.english: The drop in consumer spending reflects concern about the economy.
sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

detailed_translations.english: if a person or a thing is reflected in a mirror, glass, or water, you can see an image of the person or thing on the surface of the mirror, glass, or water

name: exhibitor
trans: n. 展出者；显示者

sentences.english: Schedules will be sent out to all exhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 日程安排将会发送给所有的参展者。

detailed_translations.english: An exhibitor is a person or company whose work or products are being shown in an exhibition

name: submit
trans: vi. 提交；服从

sentences.english: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从， 听从； 忍受； 甘心
detailed_translations.english: If you submit to something, you unwillingly allow something to be done to you, or you do what someone wants, for example because you are not powerful enough to resist

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从，听从，服从；呈送，提交；主张，建议
detailed_translations.english: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve

name: approximate
trans: adj. [数] 近似的；大概的

sentences.english: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.english: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.chinese: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.english: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

detailed_translations.english: to be close to a particular number
an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it

name: vehicle
trans: n. [车辆] 车辆；工具；交通工具；运载工具；传播媒介；媒介物

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

name: rear
trans: n. 后面；屁股；后方部队

sentences.english: It’s a good place to rear young children.
sentences.chinese: 这地方非常适合抚养小孩子成长。

sentences.english: The birds have been successfully reared in captivity.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟笼养成功。

detailed_translations.english: to look after a person or animal until they are fully grown

name: noisy
trans: adj. .嘈杂的；喧闹的；聒噪的

sentences.english: The kids have been really noisy today.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们今天实在是吵。

sentences.english: a noisy engine
sentences.chinese: 噪声大的发动机

sentences.english: The bar was very noisy.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里非常嘈杂。
